spell.name: Light Wall I
spell.description: Creates a black, insubstantial wall up to 20'x20'x1" that light cannot pass into or through (i.e., it does not hinder movement, but it blocks vision)

spell.name: Airwall
spell.description: Creates a wall of dense churning air up to 10'x10'x3'. This wall reduces all movement through it by 50%. In addition, all attacks through the wall suffer a -50 penalty.

spell.name: Light Wall II
spell.description: As Light Wall I, except for duration.

spell.name: Waterwall
spell.description: Creates a wall of water up to 10'x10'x1'. This wall reduces all movement through it by 80%. In addition, all attacks through the wall suffer a -80 penalty.

spell.name: Woodwall
spell.description: Creates a wall of wood up to 10'x20'x1". This wall can be burned though, chopped through, or toppled (if not propped up somehow)

spell.name: Earthwall
spell.description: As Woodwall, except wall is made of earth and has a size up to 10'x10'x(3' at base, 1' at top) of packed earth.

spell.name: Icewall I
spell.description: As Woodwall, except wall is made of ice and has a size of to 10'x10'x(2' at base, 1' at top). It can be melted through, chipped through, or toppled (if not propped up somehow).

spell.name: Barrier Pit
spell.description: Opens a pit (500 cubit feet in stone, 1000 cubic feet in earth or ice). The entire pit must be within 50' of caster. A pit max not be opened except on a horizontal surface with an incline of less than 45°.

spell.name: Airwall True
spell.description: As Airwall, except for duration

spell.name: Stonewall
spell.description: As Woodwall, except wall is made of stone and has a size of 10'x10'x1'. It can be chipped through.

spell.name: Waterwall True
spell.description: As Waterwall, except for duration.

spell.name: Woodwall True
spell.description: As Woodwall, except for duration.

spell.name: Earthwall True
spell.description: As Earthwall, except for duration.

spell.name: Icewall II
spell.description: As Icewall I, except wall is up to 20'x20'x(4' at base, 2' at top)

spell.name: Stonewall True
spell.description: As Stonewall, except for duration.

spell.name: Meld Walls
spell.description: Fuses 2 touching wall (seam can be up to 20' long) or fuses a section of stone blocks (up to 100 cubic feet).

spell.name: Curved Wall
spell.description: As any of the lower level "wall" spells on this list, except the wall can be curved up to a semicircle.

spell.name: Wall of Force
spell.description: By directly Channeling the power of his deity, the caster creates a transparent wall of "force" that is absolutely impassible by anyone or anything. It can be up to 10'x20'x1".

notes.note: All "Wall" spells created by spells on this list must rest (i.e. stand) on a solid surface.
All "Wall" spells (except Wall of Force) require that at least 1 cubic foot of the material that the wall consist of be within 50' of the caster.

With all wall, the caster has the option of varying the width and height (not the thickness) up to the allowed dimensions. If the caster is attempting to "fill" a space with a wall, the wall will not fit perfectly (i.e. not snug)
A wall cannot be created in the same space as other solid material. It can only displace liquids and gasses.

spell.name: Healing I
spell.description: Target is healed of d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief I
spell.description: Target is healed of one area of up to mild frostbite or 1st degree burn.

spell.name: Minor Irritation Relief
spell.description: Target is healed of one minor irritation (e.g. headache, toothache, bee-sting, hangover, etc.).

spell.name: Healing III
spell.description: As Healing I, except that target is healed of 3d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Stun Relief
spell.description: Target is relieved of 1 round's worth of accumulated sun effects.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief II
spell.description: As Forst/Burn Relief I, except caster can heal 2 areas of mild damage or 1 area of modest damage (e.g. 2nd degree burn).

spell.name: Regeneration I
spell.description: Will reduce damage target has by 1 hit every minute as long as caster concentrates. If the caster is unconscious this spell will operate on him without concentration.

spell.name: Healing V
spell.description: As Healing I except that target is healed of 5d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief III
spell.description: As Forst/Burn Relief I, except caster can heal 3 areas of mild damage or 1 area of severe damage (e.g. 3nd degree burn) or a combination of 1 mild and 1 moderate area of damage.

spell.name: Awakening
spell.description: Target is instantly awake.

spell.name: Healing VII
spell.description: As Healing I except that target is healed of 7d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Regeneration II
spell.description: As Regeneration I, except target's damage is reduced by 2 hits per minute of concentration.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief IV
spell.description: As Frost/Burn Relief I, except caster can heal 4 mild or 2 moderate or 1 mild and 1 severe or 2 mild and 1 moderate area(s) of damage.

spell.name: Healing X
spell.description: As Healing I except that target is healed of 10d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Long Stun Relief
spell.description: As Stun Relief, except that the caster's range is 100'.

spell.name: Regeneration III
spell.description: As Regeneration I, except target's damage is reduced by 3 hits per minute of concentration.

spell.name: Healing XV
spell.description: As Healing I except that target is healed of 15d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Regeneration V
spell.description: As Regeneration I, except target's damage is reduced by 5 hits per minute of concentration.

spell.name: True Healing
spell.description: As Healing I, except that target is healed of all concussion hits.

spell.name: Mass True Healing
spell.description: Allows caster to heal all concusion hits in a number of targets equal to level of caster.

spell.name: Detect Channeling
spell.description: Detects any active spell or item from the Channeling realm; caster can concentrate on a different 5'R each round.

spell.name: Detect Essence
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except realm is Essence.

spell.name: Detect Mentalism
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except realm is Mentalism

spell.name: Detect Life
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except detects living beings.

spell.name: Detect Curse
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except detects curses on people or things.

spell.name: Detect Undead
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except detects the presence of Undead.

spell.name: Detect Traps
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except it gives a 75% chance of detecting a trap (trap sophistication modifiers may reduce or enhance this chance).

spell.name: Life Typing
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except it analyzes one living being; giving race, age, and current state of health.

spell.name: Detect Invisible
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except detects invisible things. All attacks against invisible targets suffer a -50 penalty (instead of the standard -100).

spell.name: Perceive Power I
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except it will give an estimation of the power (i.e., level) of the person, item, or spell examined.

spell.name: Poison Analysis
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except it gives an analysis of any poisons on a single object or a single being.

spell.name: Power Typing
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except it analyzes general spell type (in item or cast) and what spell list it was casts from. In the case of a person, it gives his exact profession.

spell.name: Detect Spell
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except detects any spell that has ever been cast in the area examined.

spell.name: Perceive Power II
spell.description: As Perceive Power I, except range is 500' and area is 50'R:

spell.name: Location
spell.description: Gives the direction and distance to any specific object or place the caster is familiar with or has had described in detail. The caster must have the dimensions of the object exact within 10% of the actual size and know at least two other attributes that make the item unique (e.g. color, texture, weight, etc.). Note that sometimes the caster must know more than two other attributes to make the item unique.

spell.name: Curse Analysis
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except a curse may be analyzed for level, effect and required cure.

spell.name: Life Analysis
spell.description: As Life Typing, except also gives exact profession, alignment, and other pertinent details.

spell.name: Detect True
spell.description: As Detect Channeling, except any of the lower spells on this list can be used once per round.

spell.name: Location True
spell.description: As Location, except range is 1 mile per level.

notes.note: All of the spells on this list are Passive in type. The target of the spell is allowed an RR, but success only indicates that the target is ware that a spell was cast upon him (i.e. the spell still works).
A "curse" (for the purpose of the Detect Curse spell) is defined as something that is detrimental and magical in nature (e.g., delivered from the Curses spell list).

spell.name: Projected Light
spell.description: Beam of light (like a flashlight) springs from the caster's palm;50' effective range. If the caster closes his fist, the light will "turn off"; when the first is opened, the light will come back on (so long as the spell duration has not expired).

spell.name: Light I
spell.description: Lights a 10'R area about the point touched; if the point is a mobile object or being held, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: Aura
spell.description: Creates a bright aura about the target, making him appear more powerful and subtracting 10 from all attacks against the target.

spell.name: Light II
spell.description: As Light I, except 1 or 2 areas can be created with a total radius of 20'.

spell.name: Sudden Light
spell.description: Causes a 10'R burst of intense light, all within are stunned for 1 round per 10 failure.

spell.name: True Aura
spell.description: As Aura, except it makes him appear very powerful; subtracting 15 from all attacks against the target.

spell.name: Shock Bolt
spell.description: A bolt of intense, charged light is shot from the palm of the caster; results are determined on the Shock Bolt Attack Table.

spell.name: Light III
spell.description: As Light II, up to 3 areas can be created with a total radius of 30'.

spell.name: Utterlight I
spell.description: As Light II, except it is the equivalent of full daylight; it also nullifies all magically created darkness for the duration.

spell.name: Waiting Light
spell.description: As Light I, except caster can delay the spell up to 24 hours; it can be triggered by on of the following (decided by caster): elapsed time, specific movements, specific sounds, or touch.

spell.name: Flare
spell.description: A 6" radius ball of light is shot from the palm of the caster. It will travel to the limit of the range, explode (as a flare), burn with a bright light (as a flare), drift slowly to the earth, and go out. An area equal to the target is lit if the flare can raise to the full range. If used against a target, us the Shock Bolt Attack Table but deliver Heat criticals.

spell.name: Light V
spell.description: As Light III, except up to 5 areas can be created with a total radius of 50'.

spell.name: Light X
spell.description: As Light III, except up to 10 areas can be created with a total radius of 100'.

spell.name: Utterlight V
spell.description: As Utterlight I, except up to 5 areas can be created with a total radius of 50'.

spell.name: Mass Light
spell.description: As Light III, except total radius is 10' per level.

spell.name: Mass Aura
spell.description: As Aura, except as many targets as the caster's level can be affected.

spell.name: Lightning Call
spell.description: Caster can causes a lighting bolt to strike a target within his range. Results are determined on the Lightning Bolt Attack Table. There must be a storm within 1 mile that is severe enough to cause precipitation or lighting or very heavy winds. The caster bust be outdoors to cast this spell.

spell.name: Alkar
spell.description: As Aura, except target seems like a minor god and the subtraction is 25.

spell.name: Mass Utterlight
spell.description: As Utterlight I, except as many areas as the caster levels can be created with a total radius of 10' per level.

notes.note: None of the Aura spells (Aura, True Aura, Mass Aura and alkar) are cumulative with each other or with the Blur spell.

spell.name: Edgewalking
spell.description: Target can walk along narrow edges (down to 2" wide) that can support his weight. Maneuver rolls are not normally required.

spell.name: Limbwalking
spell.description: Target can walk along tree limbs as if he were on level ground.

spell.name: Stonewalking
spell.description: Target can walk on stone surfaces of up to 60° as if he were on level ground.

spell.name: Waterwalking
spell.description: Target can walk on water as if he were on level ground; may not be used on rough water.

spell.name: Merging Organic
spell.description: Target can merge into organic material (live or dead). While merged, the target cannot move or perceive. When the the target emerges from the material, he can emerge from any side or face of the material. The target cannot move "through" material greater in width than his own body size plus 2 feet.

spell.name: Store Sanctuary
spell.description: Caster "stores" a location for use with spells later on this list. While casting this spell, the caster must meditate for one hour in the location that will be stored. The caster can only have one sanctuary stored at a time. As long as this location remains "stored" it will detect as magical (i.e. "holy") place.

spell.name: Limbrunning
spell.description: As Limbwalking, except target can run.

spell.name: Stonerunning
spell.description: As Stonewalking, except target can run.

spell.name: Waterrunning
spell.description: As Waterwalking, except target can run.

spell.name: Windwalking
spell.description: Target can walk on calm air. This spell only allows horizontal movements. Vertical movement must be achieved by other means.

spell.name: Returning I
spell.description: Caster may return to his stored sanctuary so long as the sanctuary is no more than 1 mile away.

spell.name: Greater Merging Organic
spell.description: As Merging Organic, except target may turn within material and perceive the world outside the material.

spell.name: Returning V
spell.description: As Returning I, except that the sanctuary may be up to 5 miles away.

spell.name: Windrunning
spell.description: As Windwalking, except target can run.

spell.name: Returning X
spell.description: As Returning I, except that the sanctuary may be up to 10 miles away.

spell.name: Merging True Organic
spell.description: As Greater Merging Organic, except target may use spells on himself while merged.

spell.name: Windrunning True
spell.description: As Windrunning, except target can run up to twice the normal speed on calm air without expending energy.

spell.name: Word of Return
spell.description: As Returning I, except the sanctuary can be any distance away up to 10 miles per level of caster.

spell.name: Rereturning
spell.description: Caster may go to his sanctuary (as per Word of Return), stay up to 1 round per level, and then return to the prior point where he cast his spell (thus making it a round trip).

spell.name: Plant Lore
spell.description: Caster learns nature, history, and value of any 1 plant.

spell.name: Herb Lore
spell.description: Caster can understand the nature, origin, and value of any 1 herb; if the plant is not an herb, no information will be related.

spell.name: Stone Lore
spell.description: Caster learns the nature, history, and origin of any 1 stone.

spell.name: Speed Growth
spell.description: Caster can increase speed of growth for any 1 species of plant within the radius by 10 times.

spell.name: Animal Tongues
spell.description: Allows caster to understand and "speak" the language of any 1 animal species.

spell.name: Animal Mastery I
spell.description: Caster can control the actions of any 1 animal.

spell.name: Nature's Awareness I
spell.description: Caster can monitor animal activity in the area (e.g. he will be aware of subtle movements). For the duration of the spell, the caster cannot move.

spell.name: Plant Tongues
spell.description: Allows caster to understand and "speak" the language of any 1 plant species.

spell.name: Animal Mastery III
spell.description: As Animal Mastery I, except caster can control 3 animals.

spell.name: Animal Empathy
spell.description: Caster can understand and/or visualize the thoughts and emotions of any 1 animal.

spell.name: Plant Control I
spell.description: Caster can control the automatic and/or mental processes of any 1 plant. Caster can also control the plant's movements. Note that this spell doe not allow movement beyond normal allowances.

spell.name: Stonespeech
spell.description: Caster can communicate with any 1 stone if it possesses any animate qualities (e.g., caster could speak to a holy stone that possesses an intelligence).

spell.name: Herb Production
spell.description: Caster can grow an herb by planting the proper seed. The herb is sterile and the growth takes 1-10 rounds.

spell.name: Animal Mastery V
spell.description: As Animal Master I, except caster can control 5 animals.

spell.name: Plant Control III
spell.description: As Plant Control I, except caster can control any 3 plants.

spell.name: Nature's Awareness V
spell.description: As Nature's Awareness I, except the radius is 500'.

spell.name: Earth Empathy
spell.description: Caster can understand and/or visualize the thoughts and emotions of any 1 animal, plant, stone, or dead organic objects. The caster can change target once per round.

spell.name: Mastery
spell.description: As Animal Mastery I, except caster can control all of the animals of a given species within a range equal to 10' per level.

spell.name: Animal Mastery True
spell.description: As Animal Mastery I, except duration is permanent and concentration is not required. At a given time, there may only be 1 animal controlled by caster through use of this spell.

notes.note: Any spell that provides information to the caster can be tricky for the GM to run. Every GM should examine lore spells and determine how much information he is willing to impart to the players.
A herb is defined as a plant that, when specially prepared, provides some unusual benefit for the user. This does not apply to poisons.

spell.name: Disease Purification
spell.description: Stops infection and/or spread of disease in 1 target after he has acquired the disease. No further damage will occur in uninfected areas of the body.

spell.name: Food Preservation
spell.description: This spell perfectly preserves one day's worth of food for 1 week, after which it will spoil normally.

spell.name: Poison Purification
spell.description: Neutralized any 1 poison in the system of 1 target. Damage already sustained is not cured.

spell.name: Disease Resistance I
spell.description: For the duration of the spell, target gets an additional RR versus any disease(s).

spell.name: Poison Resistance I
spell.description: For the duration of the spell, target gets an additional RR versus any poison(s).

spell.name: Sustenance Purification
spell.description: This spell neutralizes abnormal diseases, poison, and other similar substances in one day's worth of food and/or water. It will not neutralize a poison or similar substance that is a natural part of the food (e.g., it will not neutralize the natural poison in poisoned mushrooms).

spell.name: Disease Resistance II
spell.description: As Disease Resistance I, except target gets 2 additional RRs.

spell.name: Poison Resistance II
spell.description: As Poison Resistance I, except target gets 2 additional RRs.

spell.name: Mind Disease Cures
spell.description: Target is cured of any 1 mind disease, recovery 1-50 days.

spell.name: Disease Resistance III
spell.description: As Disease Resistance I, except target gets 3 additional RRs.

spell.name: Poison Resistance III
spell.description: As Poison Resistance I, except target gets 3 additional RRs.

spell.name: Undisease
spell.description: Caster can remove any 1 disease from a target.

spell.name: Unpoison
spell.description: Caster can remove any 1 poison from target.

spell.name: Mass Undisease
spell.description: Caster can remove any 1 disease from a number of targets equal to his level.

spell.name: Mass Unpoison
spell.description: Caster can remove any 1 poison from a the system of a number of targets equal to his level.

spell.name: Mind Disease Cures True
spell.description: As Mind Disease Cures, except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Greater Disease Purification
spell.description: All disease in the area is eliminated.

spell.name: Greater Poison Purification
spell.description: All poison in the area is neutralized.

spell.name: Purification True
spell.description: Eliminates all poisons and/or diseases in the area.

spell.name: Speech I
spell.description: Target is able to communicate basic ideas in the language of a specific being (e.g., hungry, thirsty, bathroom, peace, etc.). For the duration of the spell, the target has the equivalent of skill rank 2 in the language.

spell.name: Quiet I
spell.description: Creates 1 1'R area around the target, into and out of which sound cannot travel; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being; +25 to Stalking attempts.

spell.name: Soundwall I
spell.description: Creates a plane (up to 20'x20'), through which sound will not pass.

spell.name: Speech II
spell.description: As Speech I, except target can communicate in more complex concepts, although there is a good chance of misinterpretations. For the duration of the spell, the target has the equivalent of skill rank 4 in the language.

spell.name: Silence I
spell.description: As Quiet I, except radius is 10'.

spell.name: Quiet III
spell.description: As Quiet I, except 3 targets can be affected.

spell.name: Soundwall V
spell.description: As Soundwall I, except 5 such walls are created. Each Soundwall must bet connected to at least one other Soundwall.

spell.name: Quiet V
spell.description: As Quiet I, except 5 targets can be affected.

spell.name: Silence V
spell.description: As Silent I, except radius is 50'.

spell.name: Speech III
spell.description: As Speech II, except target is reasonably fluent in the language. Target's accent is imperfect, but there is only a slight chance of misinterpretation. For the duration of the spell, the target has the equivalent of skill rank 6 in the language.

spell.name: Sounding
spell.description: Tarrget can speak at 5 times his normal loudness.

spell.name: Silence X
spell.description: As Silent I, except radius is 100'.

spell.name: Mass Soundwalls
spell.description: As Soundwall V, except as many Soundwalls as the caster's level can be created.

spell.name: Mass Quiet
spell.description: As Quiet I, except as many targets as the caster's level can be affected.

spell.name: Speech True
spell.description: As Speech III, except for the duration and target speaks the specific language as if he were a native. For the duration of the spell, the target has the equivalent of skill rank 8 in the language.

spell.name: Protection I
spell.description: Subtracts 6 from elemental attack rolls against target, and adds 5 to all the target's RRs versus spells.

spell.name: Cancel Channeling
spell.description: When the caster of this spell is a target of a spell from the realm of Channeling, the "incoming" spell must first make an RR before the caster makes an RR. For RR purposes, each spell uses a level equal to its caster's level. If the "incoming" spell passes the RR, it max target the caster of this spell normally; otherwise the incoming spell has no effect on the target.

spell.name: Protection Sphere I
spell.description: As Protection I, except for duration and all beings within 10' of target get the benefit.

spell.name: Cancel Essence
spell.description: As Cancel Channeling, except the caste is protected from spells in the realm of Essence.

spell.name: Protection II
spell.description: As Protection I, except bonuses are 10.

spell.name: Cancel Mentalism
spell.description: As Cancel Channeling, except the caster is protected from spells in the realm of Mentalism.

spell.name: Protection Sphere II
spell.description: As Protection Sphere I, except the bonuses are 10.

spell.name: Dispel Channeling I
spell.description: Any active spell from the realm of Channeling that is on the target must make an RR (use the level of the spell's caster as the spell's level). If the spell fails its RR, it is dispelled.

spell.name: Channeling Shield
spell.description: Creates a shimmering shield in front of the caster. This shield subtracts 10 from all frontal Channeling attack rolls on the caster (base and elemental). If the caster performs no other action during a round, he can "parry" (as with a normal shield) one spell attack. The parry bonus is equal to the sum of all the bonus the caster would normally have for his spell's base attack roll.

spell.name: Protection III
spell.description: As Protection I, except bonuses are 15

spell.name: Essence Shield
spell.description: As CHanneling Shield, except is effective only against Essence spells.

spell.name: Dispel Essence I
spell.description: As Dispel Channeling, except effects spells in the realm of Essence.

spell.name: Mind Shield
spell.description: As CHanneling Shield, except is effective only against Mentalism spells.

spell.name: Protection IV
spell.description: As Protection I, except bonuses are 20

spell.name: Spell Shield II
spell.description: As Channeling Shield, except is effective against two realms of the caster's choice.

spell.name: Dispel Mentalism I
spell.description: As Dispel Channeling, except effects spells in the realm of Mentalism.

spell.name: Protection V
spell.description: As Protection I, except bonuses are 25

spell.name: Spell Shield True
spell.description: As Channeling Shield, except all three realms are affected.

spell.name: Channeling Resistance
spell.description: Target gets +50 to all RRs against Channeling spells.

spell.name: Essence Resistance
spell.description: As Channeling Resistance, except it is only effective against Essence spells.

spell.name: Mentalism Resistance
spell.description: As Channeling Resistance, except it is only effective against Mentalism spells.

spell.name: Resistance True
spell.description: As Channeling Resistance. except is effective against all three realms.

spell.name: Living Gauge
spell.description: Caster can ascertain information from the surrounding atmosphere. Information that may be gained includes: temperature, humidity, barometric pressure, and wind speed. The caster can gain a different piece of information each round.

spell.name: Rain Prediction
spell.description: Gives caster a 95% chance of predicting the time and type of precipitation (±15 minutes) over the next 24 hour period.

spell.name: Storm Prediction
spell.description: As Rain Prediction, except it allows a 95% chance of predicting the time and type of a storm ±15 minutes over the next 24 hour period.

spell.name: Weather Prediction I
spell.description: As Rain Prediction except it allows 94% chance of predicting time, type, and severity of weather (±15 minutes) over the next 24 hour period.

spell.name: Breeze Call
spell.description: Caster causes a breeze to come forth that will drive out any gaseous matter (cloud etc.) and subtracts from all missile attacks (-10). Once set, the direction of the breeze will not change.

spell.name: Fog Call
spell.description: Caster causes fog to arise that obscures all vision in and through the radius. All missile attacks into or out of the fog are modified by -10 to -50 (GM's discretion).

spell.name: Weather Prediction III
spell.description: As Weather Prediction I, except that caster has a 95% chance of predicting weather over a 3 day period.

spell.name: Precipitation Call
spell.description: Caster causes rain or snow (depending on temperature) to fall. The precipitation obscures vision into the radius by 25% and modifies all missile attacks passing though any part of the area by -25.

spell.name: Weather Prediction V
spell.description: As Weather Prediction I, except that caster has a 95% chance of predicting weather over a 5 day period.

spell.name: Wind Mastery
spell.description: Caster can control the speed and direction of the wind. Caster can increase or decrease wind speed by 1 mph x his level. By directing the wind against missile attacks he cause a -1 modifier for each mph of wind speed. Note that caster can also control the direction of the flow of gases and/or clouds.

spell.name: Clear Skies
spell.description: Caster can make the skies clear of haze, precipitation, clouds, etc. The spell will not affect the wind.

spell.name: Weather Prediction True
spell.description: As Weather Prediction I, except that caster has a 95% chance of predicting weather over a 30 day period.

spell.name: Rain Call
spell.description: Caster can summon rain of moderate intensity. The rain will obscure short range vision by up to 25% and long range vision by up to 75%. In addition, missile attacks will suffer penalties. Short-range attacks suffer a -25, Medium-range attacks suffer a -75. Long-range attacks are not possible.

spell.name: Weather Call
spell.description: Caster may use any of the lower spells on this list, bit with an increased area of effect (1 mile radius).

spell.name: Storm Call
spell.description: Caster may call forth a storm of any type with maximum wind speeds equal to twice his level, and an intensity according to his desires. Effects will vary according to circumstances (and the GM's discretion). For example, a 30th level caster could summon a lightning storm with intense rain and constant wind speeds of up to 60 mph: the GM may wish to have random rolls to determine possible lightning strikes versus exposed targets.

spell.name: Weather Mastery
spell.description: Caster may indicate the weather conditions in the area, modifying wind speeds by ±1 mph per level, and setting the level of intensity, fog, cloud cover, etc. Caster may call for shifts in the pattern as he concentrates, but the change will take at least 1 minute.

notes.note: All weather generating spells cause weather to gradually form over a period of one minute. In addition, weather generating spells have no effect in areas where there are no normally occurring weather patterns (e.g. inside buildings, etc.).

spell.name: Flowstop I
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding on a wound that is bleeding 1 hit per round; target may not move, or bleeding will resume at prior rate.

spell.name: Flowstop III
spell.description: As Flowstop I, except caster can stop bleeding on a wound that is bleeding up to 3 hits per round (total).

spell.name: Clotting I
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding on a wound that is bleeding 1 hit per round; for 1 hour, target can move at no more than walking pace, or bleeding will resume at prior rate.

spell.name: Flowstop V
spell.description: As Flowstop I, except caster can stop bleeding on a wound that is bleeding up to 5 hits per round (total).

spell.name: Limb Preservation
spell.description: Allows caster to prevent the deterioration of 1 limb (even while severed); also requires use of same spells from Muscle Law, Bone Law, and Nerve Law.

spell.name: Cut Repair I
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding from 1 wound that is bleeding 1 hit per round.

spell.name: Clotting III
spell.description: As Clotting I, except that caster can stop bleeding in a wound that is bleeding up to 3 hits per round (total).

spell.name: Minor Vessel Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to completely mend a damaged minor blood vessel (a vessel that bleeds at up to 3 hits per round, not major arteries or veins).

spell.name: Cut Repair III
spell.description: As Cut Repair I, except that caster can repair wound(s) that bleed(s) up to 3 hits per round (total).

spell.name: Major Vessel Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair 1 damaged blood vessel of any size, including severed veins and arteries; recovery time: 1-10 days, depending on size of vessel and severity of damage. A major vessel is one that bleeds at 5 hits per round or more when severed.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach severed limb; also requires use of Bone Law, Muscle Law, and Nerve Law Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in 10-100 days.

spell.name: Flowstop True
spell.description: As Flowstop I, except that all blood loss (i.e., hits per round) from one wound is stopped.

spell.name: Clotting True
spell.description: As Clotting I, except that all blood loss (i.e. hits per round) from one wound is stopped.

spell.name: Unclotting
spell.description: Allows caster to remove any one blood clot; will counter Clotting Curse (on the Evil Cleric list, Curses). This spell has no effect on bleeding wounds that have clotted (i.e., "clots" in this sense apply only to internal blood clotting).

spell.name: Cut Repair True
spell.description: As Cut Repair I, except that it will stop bleeding and close any one wound.

spell.name: Mass Flowstop
spell.description: As Flowstop True, except that caster may stop bleeding from a number of wounds equal to his level.

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: As Joining, except that limb is fully functional in 10 minutes (provided caster also uses the other three Joining True spells).

spell.name: Mass Clotting
spell.description: As Mass Flowstop, except that bleeding is stopped as Clotting True.

spell.name: Mass Blood Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding in, and fully repair, 1 wound per level.

spell.name: Bone Lore
spell.description: Caster acquires complete understanding of any bone damage, including the tools and methods required for healing. Caster does not receive the skill or power to perform the cure.

spell.name: Minor Fracture Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to mend one simple fracture (not compound fractures, shatters, joint damage etc.). Recovery time is one day.

spell.name: Cartilage Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair all cartilage damage around one joint. Recovery time is one day.

spell.name: Limb Preservation
spell.description: Allows caster to preserve the deterioration of one limb (even if severed). Also requires the use of the same spell from Nerve Law, Muscle Law, and Blood Law.

spell.name: Major Fracture Repair
spell.description: As Minor Fracture Repair, except that the caster can also repair compound fractures. Recovery time is one day.

spell.name: Skull Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to mend one fracture in a skull (but not a shattered area). Recovery time is 1-10 days (depending on the damage).

spell.name: Joint Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair one broken (but not shattered) joint. Recovery time is 1-10 days.

spell.name: Minor Fracture Repair True
spell.description: As Minor Fracture Repair except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach a limb. Requires the use of Muscle Law, Blood Law, and Nerve Law Joining spells to restore functional status. Limb is fully functional in 10-100 days.

spell.name: Cartilage Repair True
spell.description: As Cartilage Repair, except recovery time is instantaneous,

spell.name: Major Fracture Repair True
spell.description: As Major Fracture Repair except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Skull Repair True
spell.description: As Skull Repair, except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Joint Repair True
spell.description: As Joint Repair, except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Shatter Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any broken or shattered bone. Requires a 10 minute operation and 1-10 days recovery time.

spell.name: Mass Minor Fracture Repair
spell.description: As Minor Fracture Repair, except it repairs one minor fracture per level of the caster. Spell operates as long as caster concentrates; each mended fraction requires a one day recovery period.

spell.name: Mass Cartilage Repair
spell.description: As Mass Minor Fracture Repair, except it repairs cartilage (as in Cartilage Repair).

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: As Joining, except that the limb is fully functional in 10 minutes (providing that the caster also uses the three other Joining True spells).

spell.name: Mass Major Fracture Repair
spell.description: As Mass Minor Fracture Repair, except for the range and it repairs major fractures (as in Major Fracture Repair).

spell.name: Mass Shatter Repair
spell.description: As Mass Minor Fracture Repair, except for the range and it repairs and broken or shattered bone (as in Shatter Repair).

spell.name: Calm I
spell.description: Target will take no aggressive/offensive action, and will fight only if attacked.

spell.name: Calm II
spell.description: As Calm I, except 2 target may be affected.

spell.name: Hold Kind
spell.description: Humanoid target is held to 25% of normal action.

spell.name: Calm III
spell.description: As Calm I, except 3 targets may be affected.

spell.name: Calm IV
spell.description: As Calm I, except 4 targets may be affected.

spell.name: Calm V
spell.description: As Calm I, except 5 targets may be affected.

spell.name: Mass Animal Calming I
spell.description: Caster can calm a number of animals equal to his level.

spell.name: True Hold
spell.description: As Hold Kind, except it will affect any target.

spell.name: Calm X
spell.description: As Calm I, except 10 targets may be affected.

spell.name: Shout of Calming
spell.description: All targets in radius must resist or they are calmed.

spell.name: Mass Animal Calming II
spell.description: As Mass Animal Calming I, except RRs are modified by -20 and the range is 10'/lvl.

spell.name: Lord Calm
spell.description: Allows caster to calm up to 20 targets.

spell.name: Long Calm
spell.description: Caster can calm any 1 target.

spell.name: Mass Calm
spell.description: Caster can calm a number of targets equal to his level.

spell.name: Calm True
spell.description: Caster can calm any 1 target.

notes.note: An "aggressive" action is defined as any action with the intent to directly harm any individual(s). Actions that result in harm indirectly to individuals are not "aggressive". Pulling the lever on the wall to drop an into a put is an aggressive action (the action directly resulted in the harm on an individual). Running away to get help is not an aggressive action.

spell.name: Sustain Self
spell.description: Allows caster to go without food or water and not suffer damage (i.e., provides nutrition and water for 1 day).

spell.name: Water Production I
spell.description: Caster can produce sufficient in any available receptacle to supply a being for one day.

spell.name: Food Production I
spell.description: Caster can produce sufficient food from the surrounding area to feed 1 hearty appetite for 1 day.

spell.name: Fire Starting
spell.description: Allows caster to set a fire of 1'R: fire will then last as long as there is fuel. A target in the 1'R: will take an 'A' Heat critical.

spell.name: Nutrient Conjures I
spell.description: Caster can produce 1 loaf of waybread that weights .5lb and will support 1 being for 1 day; the loaf will lose potency in 1 month.

spell.name: Water Production III
spell.description: Was Water Production I, except caster can produce 3 days of water.

spell.name: Food Production III
spell.description: As Food Production I, except caster can produce sufficient food to feed 3 beings for 1 day.

spell.name: Herb Enhancement
spell.description: Allows caster to enhance the potency of any 1 growing herb by 100% (i.e., x2); spell may be employed only once per herb.

spell.name: Water Production V
spell.description: Was Water Production I, except caster can produce 5 days of water.

spell.name: Food Production V
spell.description: As Food Production I, except caster can produce sufficient food to feed 5 beings for 1 day.

spell.name: Nutrient Conjures III
spell.description: As Nutrient COnjures I, except caster can produce 3 loaves of waybread.

spell.name: Herb Mastery
spell.description: Caster can double the potency of any 1 herb (growing or dead); spell may be employed only once per herb. My not be combined with Herb Enhancement.

spell.name: Lesser Plant Production
spell.description: Caster can produce as plant up to 10' in height and/or width; plant must be commonly found in the region.

spell.name: Mass Water Production
spell.description: Was Water Production I, except caster can produce 1 days of water per level.

spell.name: Food Production True
spell.description: As Food Production I, except caster can produce sufficient food to feed a number of beings equal to his level.

spell.name: Lesser Animal Production
spell.description: Caster can create an animal representative of the surrounding region and weighting no more than 10 pounds; animal will be friendly to caster.

spell.name: Nutrient Conjures True
spell.description: As Nutrient Conjure I, except caster can produce loaves of waybread equal to his level.

spell.name: Greater Plant Production
spell.description: As Lesser Plant Production, except that caster can create 1 plant with a height and/or width of 1' per level; plant bust be commonly found in the local area.

spell.name: Greater Animal Production
spell.description: As Lesser Animal Production, except that caster can produce an animal with a maximum weight of 1 pound per level; the animal must be a native of the area.

spell.name: Guess
spell.description: When faced with a choice about which he has little or no information (e.g., which corridor leads outside the quickest) the caster may cast this spell and the Gamemaster will determine which way he goes, biasing the choice favorable by 25% (e.g. roll 1-100: correct on 26-100, incorrect on 01-25).

spell.name: Pathfinding I
spell.description: Caster learns the location(s) of any "path(s)" within 100'; gives the nearest point on path, but not the path's course.

spell.name: Guidance
spell.description: The caster is subtly directed (hints and clues) towards a specific destination (within 100'/lvl) by guidance from his deity. The exact form of guidance may vary from deity to deity (e.g., a deity of water might leave hints in the rocks of a stream, etc.). For the duration of the spell, the caster must concentrate on following the guidance.

spell.name: Location I
spell.description: Gives the direction and distance to any specific object or place that the caster is familiar with or has had described in detail.

spell.name: Pathfinding III
spell.description: As Pathfinding I, except range is 300'.

spell.name: Location III
spell.description: As Location I, except range is 300'.

spell.name: Pathfinding V
spell.description: As Pathfinding I, except range is 500'.

spell.name: Location V
spell.description: As Location I, except range is 500'.

spell.name: Memory's Path
spell.description: Caster can remember an exact route he traveled; whether or not he was without one or more of his senses when he made the original journey (e.g., a 12th level caster could remember the course of 12 hours of a trip even if he has been blindfold). To be effective, this spells must be cast within 1 month of the journey.

spell.name: Pathfinding X
spell.description: As Pathfinding I, except range is 1 mi.

spell.name: Divine Guidance
spell.description: As Guidance, except the form of the guidance is that of an animal companion sent by the deity. The caster can follow the animal to the specific destination. If more than 24 hours pass without the caster making progress towards the destination, the animal will leave.

spell.name: Finding I
spell.description: Caster can locate any 1 object he describes, if indeed it exists and is in range (e.g., caster could describe a type of mace he had never seen or head of).

spell.name: Location X
spell.description: As Location I, except range is 1 mi.

spell.name: Pathfinding True
spell.description: As Pathfinding I, except range is 10 mi.

spell.name: Finding III
spell.description: As Finding I, except range is 300'.

spell.name: Lord Location
spell.description: As Location I, except range is 20 mi.

spell.name: Paths True
spell.description: As Pathfinding I, except range is 1 mi/lvl and exact route(s) within the range are ascertained.

spell.name: Location True
spell.description: As Location I, except range is 1 mi per lvl.

spell.name: Finding True
spell.description: As Finding I, except range is 100' per level.

notes.note: When using Guess, the caster must have a limited number of options (i.e., finite and countable). After the spell is cast, the caster may not cast another Guess for the same information until his experience level has increased.
A path is defined as either; a trodden path/way or a road/way/track mode for a particular purpose.

When using any Location spell, the caster must provide an unambiguous description of the object being sought. This includes a minimum of: the item's dimensions (within 10% of actual size) and at least two other identifying attributes (e.g., color, weight, shape, texture, etc.). Often, it will take more than two other attributes to make the description "unique" (i.e. no other item within range can possibly match the description).

spell.name: Afterthoughts
spell.description: Allows caster virtual total recall of any conversation or writing he encountered within a period of days equal to his level.

spell.name: Detect Evil
spell.description: Detects "true evil" in an animate or inanimate target; caster can concentrate on an 5'R area each round.

spell.name: Detect Curse
spell.description: As Detect Evil, except caster can detect curses.

spell.name: Detect Emotion
spell.description: As Detect Evil, except caster can detect extremes of emotion (e.g., hatred, love, sadness, etc.). In addition, the caster learns which emotions the target is feeling in extreme. If there are no extreme emotions (i.e., only normal feelings), this spell detects nothing.

spell.name: Light Lore I
spell.description: Caster can ascertain origin point and nature of any 1 "holy item" that is not "of darkness" or "of evil"; will not give specific capabilities.

spell.name: Poison Lore
spell.description: Caster can ascertain exact nature and type of poison; he can determine what cure may be used, but does not receive the required tools or skills.

spell.name: Life Lore
spell.description: Caster can determine the nature and type of any 1 living target. He will not be able to ascertain the targets personal traits or capabilities, but will know the normal abilities associated with the target's species.

spell.name: Curse Tales
spell.description: Caster can determine nature and origin of any 1 curse, including the name of the one who bequeathed it.

spell.name: Dark Lore I
spell.description: As Light Lore I, except caster can ascertain the origin point and nature of any 1 item "of darkness" or "of evil".

spell.name: Light Lore II
spell.description: As Light Lore I, except that caster can ascertain the origin point and nature of any 2 "holy items" or caster can determine the nature, origin point and exact significance of any 1 "holy item".

spell.name: Emotion Analysis
spell.description: Caster can determine the nature and origin of extreme emotion(s) found within any 1 target (inanimate or animate); the degree and other details of the emotion(s) can also be acquired.

spell.name: Light Lore III
spell.description: As Light Lore I, except that caster can ascertain the origin point and nature of any 3 "holy items" or caster can determine the age, origin point, name of the creature and nature of any 1 "holy item". Caster also learns item's specific capabilities.

spell.name: Dark Lore II
spell.description: As Light Lore II, except that it can only be used on items "of darkness" or "of evil".

spell.name: White Lore
spell.description: Caster can ascertain exact nature, origin, purpose, and history of any 1 "holy item"; it allows caster to visualize all who have possessed the item.

spell.name: Dark Lore III
spell.description: As Light Lore III, except it can be used only on items of "evil" or "darkness".

spell.name: Life Lore True
spell.description: As Life Lore, except caster can determine specific traits and capabilities of any 1 target.

spell.name: Black Lore
spell.description: As White Lore, except it can only be used on an item "of darkness" or "of evil".

spell.name: White Lore Mastery
spell.description: As White Lore, except caster can acquire the information on all "holy items" within 100'.

notes.note: A "curse" is usually something that is detrimental and magical in nature (e.g., delivered form the Curses spell list). The GM may decide that the "curses" spells on this list only apply to magical curses. Normally, curses may not be Dispelled; the may only be affected by Remove Curse spells.

spell.name: Muscle Lore
spell.description: Caster acquires complete understanding of any muscle damage, including the tools and methods required for healing; caster does not receive the skill or power to perform the cure.

spell.name: Tendon Lore
spell.description: As Muscle Lore, except the knowledge obtained concerns the healing of tendon damage.

spell.name: Sprain Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) 1 sprain; recovery time: 1 hour

spell.name: Muscle Repair I
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (nor replace) 1 damaged muscle; recovery time: 1 hour.

spell.name: Limb Preservation
spell.description: Allows caster to prevent the deterioration of 1 limb (even while severed); also requires use of same spell from Nerve Law, Bone Law and Blood Law.

spell.name: Tendon Repair I
spell.description: Allows caster to repair one damaged tendon; recovery time: 1 hour.

spell.name: Muscle Repair III
spell.description: As Muscle Repair I, except caster can repair 3 damaged muscles.

spell.name: Tendon Repair III
spell.description: As Tendon Repair I, except caster can repair 3 damaged tendons.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach severed limb; also requires use of Bone Law, Blood Law, and Nerve Law Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in 1-10 days.

spell.name: Muscle Repair True
spell.description: As Muscle Repair I, except recovery is instantaneous and requires 1 minute "operation" (concentration by caster).

spell.name: Tendon Repair True
spell.description: As Tendon Repair I, except recovery is instantaneous and requires 1 minute "operation" (concentration by caster).

spell.name: Mass Muscle Repair
spell.description: Allows repair of 1 muscle per level of the caster; spell can be used as long as caster concentrates; recovery time: 1 hour.

spell.name: Mass Tendon Repair
spell.description: As Mass Muscle Repair, except caster heals tendons.

spell.name: Muscle Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate 1 muscle; regrowth takes 1-10 hrs, depending on the extent of loss.

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: As Joining, except that limb is fully functional in 10 minutes (provided caster also uses the other three Joining True spells).

spell.name: Tendon Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate 1 tendon; regrowth takes 1-10 hrs, depending on the extent of loss.

spell.name: Mass Repair True
spell.description: As Mass Muscle Repair, except any combination of muscles and tendons may be healed, the range is 100' and recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Nerve Lore
spell.description: Caster acquires complete understanding of any nerve damage, including the tools and methods required for healing; caster does not receive the skill or power to perform the cure.

spell.name: Minor Nerve Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair minor damage to 1 nerve; requires 1 day recovery period. Minor damage is defined as any nerve damage that results in penalties up to -20.

spell.name: Limb Preservation
spell.description: Allows caster to prevent the deterioration of 1 limb (even while severed); also requires use of same spell from Muscle Law, Bone Law and Blood Law.

spell.name: Major Nerve Repair
spell.description: As Minor Nerve Repair, except will heal any nerve damage.

spell.name: Unparalysis
spell.description: Caster can cure 1 paralysis problem.

spell.name: Minor Nerve Repair True
spell.description: As Minor Nerve Repair, except there is no recovery time.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach severed limb; also requires use of Bone Law, Blood Law, and Muscle Law Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in 1-10 days.

spell.name: Minor Brain Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair minor brain damage (including recovery from coma); note that experience lost is not restored (% lost permanently depends on severity of damage); requires 1 hour operation; recovery time 1-10 days.

spell.name: Major Nerve Repair True
spell.description: As Major Nerve Repair, except that there is no recovery period required.

spell.name: Paralysis Cures
spell.description: Allows caster to cure paralysis in 1 target (recovery time of 1-10 days); paralysis must have resulted from a spell or disease (not a poison).

spell.name: Unpsychosis
spell.description: Allows caster to repair a minor psychosis in 1 target (recovery time of 1-10 days). Minor psychoses include mild to moderate phobias.

spell.name: Mass Nerve Repair True
spell.description: As Nerve Repair True, except that each spell cast affects 1 nerve per level of caster.

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: As Joining, except that limb is fully functional in 10 minutes (provided caster also uses the other three Joining True spells).

spell.name: Nerve Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate lost nerve; regrowth takes 1-10 days, depending of extent of loss.

spell.name: Brain Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate lost brain material; regrowth takes 10-100 days, depending on extent of damage; target is in coma during recovery; note that experience list is not restored (amount lost permanently is dependent on severity of damage).

spell.name: Organ Lore
spell.description: Caster acquires complete understanding of any organ damage, including the tools and the methods required for healing; caster does not receive the skill or power to perform the cure.

spell.name: Nasal Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any nose damage short of complete noss loss; requires 6-60 minutes depending on damage.

spell.name: Minor Ear Repair
spell.description: Caster can repair any external damage, including ear loss (regeneration takes 1-10 hours).

spell.name: Minor Eye Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any minor eye damage (e.g., corneal scratch, removal of foreign object, etc.)

spell.name: Major Ear Repair
spell.description: As Minor Ear Repair except that caster can repair any interior or exterior damage; hearing is restored in 1-10 days (note that complete replacement of the inner ear is an exception).

spell.name: Major Eye Repair
spell.description: As Minor Eye Repair, except that caster can repair any eye damage short of total eye loss; recovery time: 1-10 days.

spell.name: Heart Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any heart damage short of total loss or destruction (i.e. replacement); requires 1-10 hour operation and 1-100 day recovery time.

spell.name: Lung Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any lung damage short of total loss or destruction (i.e., replacement); requires a 1-10 hour operation and 1-100 day recovery time.

spell.name: Organ Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any internal or external organ damage (not including the brain or nervous system); requires a 1-10 hour operation and 1-10 day recovery time.

spell.name: Nose Regeneration
spell.description: Allows target to regenerate 1 lost nose; regrowth takes 1-10 days.

spell.name: Organ Transplant
spell.description: Allows caster to transplant 1 healthy organ; operation takes 1 hour; recovery time: 1-10 days; chance of rejection is 10% if same race, 50% if other humanoid.

spell.name: Eye & Ear Regeneration
spell.description: Allows target to regenerate 1 lost eye or ear (including inner ear); regrowth takes 1-10 days, depending of loss.

spell.name: Organ Repair True
spell.description: As Organ Repair, except recovery time is 10 minutes and no operation is required.

spell.name: Heart Regeneration
spell.description: Allows Caster to regenerate heart; regrowth takes 1-10 days.

spell.name: Organ Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate any internal or external organ (not including brain or nervous system); regrowth takes 1-10 days.

spell.name: Analyze Symbol
spell.description: Caster learns what spell is emplaced within one Symbol within 50'. The Symbol will not be triggered (unless specifically created to be triggered by an Analyze Symbol spell).

spell.name: Spell Prime
spell.description: This spell "primes" the next spell cast by the caster - that spell is treated as if it were instantaneous. The PP cost of this spell is equal to the highest level that the caster desires to be primed. For example, if the caster wants any fourth level spell (or less) to be treated as instantaneous, this spell will cost 4PPs. In addition, when casting this spell, the caster must pray for one minute per PP spent in the spell.

spell.name: Unsymbol I
spell.description: Catser can remove one Symbol I. The Symbol's RR is based on the level of the spell in the Symbol spell and the level of the Unsymbol spell.

spell.name: Symbol I
spell.description: Caster can emplace once 1st level spell on any 1 given non-mobile stone (see below). Within one minute, the spell to be emplace must also be cast (within 10'). The symbol is usually visible, but is only required to be visible if reading is the trigger (see below). The Symbol must be placed on a lob of stone (block, piece, etc.). weighting at least 2000 pounds. Only one Symbol may be placed on each continuous slab. The stone may not be moved without dispelling the Symbol. A Symbol can be triggered by one of the following (decided by cast): time period, specified movements, specified sounds, touch, reading, violant actions in the area, etc. The triggering range is normally 10' or the range of the emplaced spell, whichever is larger. If the spell emplace is an attack spell, the attack level is the spell's level (i.e. for Symbol I the attack level is always 1st level, not the level of the caster). If the spell is an elemental attack, the OB is normally +0. However, the attack can be focused on a location (as opposed to simply the person which triggers the symbol). In this case the OB is +50. Normally, if the Symbol affects a being or thing (e.g. healing, attacks, etc.) it can be triggered only once per day.

spell.name: Symbol II
spell.description: As above, except a 2nd level spell is emplaced.

spell.name: Unsymbol II
spell.description: As above, except a 2nd level spell is removed.

spell.name: Symbol III
spell.description: As above, except a 3rd level spell is emplaced.

spell.name: Analyze Symbol True
spell.description: As Analyze Symbol, except caster learns what spells are emplaced in all Symbols within 50'R.

spell.name: Symbol V
spell.description: As above, except a 5th level spell is emplaced.

spell.name: Unsymbol III
spell.description: As above, except a 3nd level spell is removed.

spell.name: Symbol VI
spell.description: As above, except a 6th level spell is emplaced.

spell.name: Symbol VII
spell.description: As above, except a 7th level spell is emplaced.

spell.name: Unsymbol V
spell.description: As above, except a 5nd level spell is removed.

spell.name: Symbol VIII
spell.description: As above, except a 8th level spell is emplaced.

spell.name: Unsymbol X
spell.description: As above, except a 10nd level spell is removed.

spell.name: Symbol IX
spell.description: As above, except a 9th level spell is emplaced.

spell.name: Symbol X
spell.description: As above, except a 10th level spell is emplaced.

spell.name: Lord Research
spell.description: See Spell Law 7.4

spell.name: Lord Symbol
spell.description: As above, except a 20th level spell is emplaced.

spell.name: Unsymbol True
spell.description: As above, except caster can remove any spell of a level less than his own.

notes.note: A symbol is permanent unless dispelled magically or unless the stone it is place upon is moved.
The precise size of a symbol may vary. Suggested sizes range form 3"x3" to 1'x1'.

The GM may decide to make the attack level of the symbol equal to the type of symbol spell used. For example, a first level spell placed in a Symbol X would attack as a 10th level spell instead of a 1st level spell.

spell.name: Animal Sleep I
spell.description: Puts any animal (i.e., non-humanoid) to sleep; will not affect enchanted creatures or "intelligent" animals.

spell.name: Animal Restoration I
spell.description: Caster may heal any non-fatal damage in any animal up to 10 pounds in weight. Healing takes 6-600 minutes.

spell.name: Animal Tongues
spell.description: Allows caster to understand and "speak" the language of any one animal species.

spell.name: Animal Sleep III
spell.description: Puts any three animals (i.e., non-humanoid) to sleep; will not affect enchanted creatures or "intelligent" animals.

spell.name: Animal Mastery I
spell.description: Allows caster to control the actions of any one animal.

spell.name: Animal Location
spell.description: Caster can locate members of any one species of animal or he can find out what species are in the area.

spell.name: Befriending
spell.description: All animals within 10' will act friendly towards caster; does not control the animals.

spell.name: Animal Restoration II
spell.description: AS Animal Restoration I, except will affect an animal up to 150 pounds in weight or an animal up to 10 pounds in weight can be healed of fatal damage (though not brought back from death).

spell.name: Animal Empathy
spell.description: Caster can understand and/or visualize the thoughts and emotions of any one animal.

spell.name: Animal Summons I
spell.description: Caster can summon any one animal within radius; as long as he concentrates, caster controls the animal; animal is random representation of specified species.

spell.name: Animal Mastery III
spell.description: Allows caster to control the actions of any three animals.

spell.name: Animal Summons III
spell.description: Caster can summon any three animals within radius; as long as he concentrates, caster controls the animals; animals is random representation of specified species.

spell.name: Animal Call
spell.description: Caster can "call" any one know, specific animal; if it is physically possible, the animal will come to him.

spell.name: Animal Reviving I
spell.description: Will return any animal up to 10 pounds in weight from death. The dead animal must make a roll (d100, open-ended) and add 2 times its previous level. There is an additional modifier of -2 per day that the animal was dead. If the result is over 100, the animal is returned from death. If the results than 100, the animal may not be returned from death by this caster (until the caster gains another level). The animal will be at -100 to all actions for a number of days equal to 20 days per day dead.

spell.name: Call of the Wild
spell.description: When cast upon any domesticated animal, that animal will return to its "wild" state. The animal will have no difficulty adapting to the harsh requirements of the wilderness (and have no desire to return to domestication).

spell.name: Animal Mastery V
spell.description: Allows caster to control the actions of any five animals.

spell.name: Animal Restoration III
spell.description: As Animal Restoration I, except will affect an animal up to 3000 pounds in eight, or an animal up to 150 pounds in weight may be healed of fatal damage (thought not brought back from dead).

spell.name: Animal Summons V
spell.description: Caster can summon any five animals within radius; as long as he concentrates, caster controls the animals; animals is random representation of specified species.

spell.name: Animal Reviving II
spell.description: As Animal Reviving I, except modifier is -1 for every two days dead and there is no recovery time.

spell.name: Animal Summons X
spell.description: As Animal Summons II, except nine options may be chosen.

spell.name: Animal Master True
spell.description: As Animal Mastery I, except caster can control all animals of a given species within 10'R per level.

spell.name: Animal Reviving III
spell.description: As Animal Reviving II, except target is automatically brought back from dead and there is no recovery period; and range is 100'.

spell.name: Animal Summons True
spell.description: As animal Summons I, except caster can select one option for every two levels of experience.

spell.name: Herb Lore
spell.description: Caster can understand the nature, origin, and value of any one herb (a plant used in medicine); if the plant is not an herb (i.e., is inedible or lacks medicinal use), no information will be related.

spell.name: Enhancement
spell.description: Allows caster to enhance the potency of any one growing herb by 100% (i.e., x2); spell may be employed only once per herb.

spell.name: Herb Finding I
spell.description: Allows caster to locate any one specific variety of herb that is sought, regardless of physical obstacles: gives exact direction, distance, and quantity.

spell.name: Instant Herbal Cures
spell.description: Allows caster to make any one herb capable of being instantly effective; when the herb is subsequently used, its benefits/dangers will be immediately felt.

spell.name: Herb Mastery II
spell.description: Caster can double the potency of any one herb (growing or dead); spell may be employed only once per herb. May not be combined with Herb Enhancement.

spell.name: Herb Finding III
spell.description: Allows caster to locate any one specific variety of herb that is sought, regardless of physical obstacles: gives exact direction, distance, and quantity.

spell.name: Herb Production
spell.description: Caster can grow an herb by planting the proper seed; The herb is sterile and the growth takes 1 to 10 rounds.

spell.name: Herb Mastery III
spell.description: Caster can triple the potency of any one herb (growing or dead)); spell may be employed only once per herb. May not be combined with Herb Enhancement.

spell.name: Herb Finding V
spell.description: Allows caster to locate any one specific variety of herb that is sought, regardless of physical obstacles: gives exact direction, distance, and quantity.

spell.name: Herb Cleansing
spell.description: Allows caster to remove any harmful poisons, by-products, or side effects from all herbs within range.

spell.name: Herb Mastery V
spell.description: Caster can make the potency of any one herb (growing or dead) 5x stronger; spell may be employed only once per herb. May not be combined with Herb Enhancement.

spell.name: Herb Finding X
spell.description: Allows caster to locate any one specific variety of herb that is sought, regardless of physical obstacles: gives exact direction, distance, and quantity. Location is known within 10'.

spell.name: Herb Mastery X
spell.description: Caster can make the potency of any one herb (growing or dead) 10x stronger; spell may be employed only once per herb. May not be combined with Herb Enhancement.

spell.name: Preserved Instant Herbal Cures
spell.description: As Instant Herbal Cures, except herb will keep for 1 week per level of the caster.

spell.name: Herb Finding XX
spell.description: As Herb Finding I, except range is 5 miles. Location is known within 25'R.

spell.name: Lord Herb Finding
spell.description: Allows caster to locate any one specific variety of herb that is sought, regardless of physical obstacles: gives direction, distance, and quantity. Location is known within 100'.

spell.name: Enhancement True
spell.description: Caster can make the potency of any one growing herb 1x / level stronger; spell may be employed only once per herb. May not be combined with Herb Enhancement. For example, a 50th level caster could increase the potency of a herb by 5000%, i.e., 50x.

spell.name: Herb Mastery True
spell.description: Caster can make the potency of any one herb (growing or dead) 1x / level stronger; spell may be employed only once per herb. May not be combined with Herb Enhancement. For example, a 50th level caster could increase the potency of a herb by 5000%, i.e., 50x.

spell.name: Herb Finding True
spell.description: Allows caster to locate any one specific variety of herb that is sought, regardless of physical obstacles: gives direction, distance, and quantity. Location is known within 100'.

spell.name: Trap Detection
spell.description: Caster has a 75% chance of detecting each individual trap in a 5'R; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Nature's Awareness I
spell.description: Allows caster to monitor animate activity in the area (e.g., he will be aware of movements, subtle and overt); caster cannot move while concentrating.

spell.name: Pathfinding
spell.description: Caster learns the location(s) of any "path(s)" within 100'. The spell gives the nearest point on the path, but not the path's course.

spell.name: Detect Magic
spell.description: Caster has a 75% chance of detecting active magic in the area of effect. The caster can concentrate on a different area each round. There must be living plants or animals in the area of effect or no information will be gained.

spell.name: Weather Prediction I
spell.description: Gives caster a 95% chance of predicting the time , type, and severity of weather over the next 24 hour period.

spell.name: Nature's Awareness II
spell.description: Allows caster to monitor animate activity in the area (e.g., he will be aware of movements, subtle and overt); caster cannot move while concentrating.

spell.name: Weather Prediction III
spell.description: Gives caster a 95% chance of predicting the time, type, and severity of weather over the next 3 day period.

spell.name: Locate Landmark I
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, the caster will know the distance and direction of any unique natural feature that the caster is familiar with. The feature must be within range or no information is gained.

spell.name: Waiting Awareness I
spell.description: Allows caster to set up a natural "alarm system"; any disturbing activity will cause caster to be alerted.

spell.name: Nature's Awareness III
spell.description: Allows caster to monitor animate activity in the area (e.g., he will be aware of movements, subtle and overt); caster cannot move while concentrating.

spell.name: Weather Prediction V
spell.description: Gives caster a 95% chance of predicting the time, type, and severity of weather over the next 5 day period.

spell.name: Memory's Path
spell.description: Caster can remember an exact route he traveled; whether or not he was without one or more of his senses when he made the original journey (e.g., a 12th level caster could remember the course of 12 hours of a trip even if he has been blindfold). To be effective, this spells must be cast within 1 month of the journey.

spell.name: Waiting Awareness II
spell.description: Allows caster to set up a natural "alarm system"; any disturbing activity will cause caster to be alerted.

spell.name: Locate Landmark II
spell.description: As Locate Landmark I, except for the range.

spell.name: Nature's Eye I
spell.description: Allows caster to visualize and sense activity in a known fixed area (100' R).

spell.name: Nature's Awareness V
spell.description: As Nature's Awareness I, except for the area of effect.

spell.name: Elemental Communication
spell.description: The caster can communicate with any elemental force within range. The elemental force must be able to communicate with caster (i.e., this spell does not confer communications abilities to the force). Elemental forces include all magical elementals, water spirits, forest spirits, etc.

spell.name: Water Visions
spell.description: The target of this spell is a small poll of water. The water must be calm (and remain calm for the duration of this spell). The caster may design a topic and a vision will appear in the pool that relates to the topic. The vision takes 1-50 rounds.

spell.name: Locate Landmark True
spell.description: As Locate Landmark I, except for the range.

spell.name: Nature's Eye II
spell.description: As Nature's Eye I, except for the range and area of effect.

spell.name: Weather Prediction True
spell.description: Gives caster a 95% chance of predicting the time , type, and severity of weather over the next one day per level period.

spell.name: Nature's Eye III
spell.description: Allows caster to visualize and sense activity in a known fixed area (500' R).

spell.name: Animist's Eye
spell.description: Allows caster to monitor an area of 100' R that he has both been to and become acquainted with (i.e., spent at least one day meditating in or 30 days living in).

spell.name: Cat Step
spell.description: Caster moves as quietly as cat. Adds +20 to all Stalking maneuvers.

spell.name: Chameleon Skin
spell.description: Caster's skin takes on the coloration of the surrounding terrain. Adds +10 to +50 to all Stalking/Hiding maneuvers. As caster moves, coloration changes to match the surrounding terrain. This spell does not affect gear or clothing.

spell.name: Wolf Sense
spell.description: Caster gains an increased sense of smell and hearing (subtle smells and higher sonic ranges included). Adds +50 to Perceptions with only these senses; +20 to Perceptions using these sense combined with others.

spell.name: Deer Speed I
spell.description: Caster can run two times normal pace (i.e., Run pace) and expend exhaustion points as if only walking.

spell.name: Bat Sense
spell.description: Increases caster's ability to maneuver without his sight. When blinded or otherwise without sight, this spell adds +10 to +50 to maneuver rolls in the dark. Note that this spell does not negate penalties for blindness; it simply decreases them.

spell.name: Otterlungs
spell.description: Caster can safely hold his breath for the duration of this spell.

spell.name: Glide I
spell.description: Caster can glide as a bird. The product of the caster's altitude and horizontal speed cannot exceed 100' per round. Note that the total must equal 100' (i.e, the caster cannot choose to have a total less than or more than 100').

spell.name: Hawk Sense
spell.description: Caster gains the visual acuity of a hawk. Adds +50 to all Perceptions involving only sight; +20 to all Perceptions involving this sense combined with others.

spell.name: Tiger Skin
spell.description: Caster's skin has the resilience of a large cat (effective AT of 3).

spell.name: Boar Strength
spell.description: Caster gains the ferocity of a wild board. He gains +20 to his melee OB, but cannot perry or use missiles for the duration of this spell.

spell.name: Lion Claws
spell.description: Caster gains the ability to make claw attacks as a lion. He must attack using the Claw Attack Table (from Arms Law), with a maximum of Medium results. The caster must develop skill (i.e. an OB) with these claws (cost to develop is the same as Martial Arts Striking; stat modifiers are St/St/Ag).

spell.name: Insect Sense
spell.description: Caster gains the vibratory sensitivity of an insect. He can sense vibrations in the ground (or other solid material) up to the area of effect. He will gain information indicating general movements and number of targets (±10%). Treat as a +25 to +100 bonus to Perception (depending on the type of activity).

spell.name: Deer Speed II
spell.description: As Deer Speed I, except the speed increase is three times.

spell.name: Bear Skin
spell.description: Caster's skin has the resilience of a bear (effective AT of 8).

spell.name: Bear Arms
spell.description: Caster gains the ability to make grapple attacks as a bear. He may attack suing the Grapple Attack Table (from Arms Law), with a maximum of Medium results. The caster must develop skill (i.e., an OB) with this attack (cost to develop is the same as Martial Arts Sweeps/Throws; stat modifier are St/St/Ag).

spell.name: Glide III
spell.description: As Glide I, except product must equal 300'.

spell.name: Viperfang
spell.description: Caster gains the ability to make bite attacks as a serpent. He may attack using the Bite Attack Table (from Arms Law), with a maximum of Medium results. The caster must develop skill (i.e. an OB) with these claws (cost to develop is the same as Martial Arts Striking; stat modifiers are St/Ag/Ag).

spell.name: Wyvern Skin
spell.description: Caster's skin has the resilience of a minor drake (effective AT of 12).

spell.name: Deer Speed III
spell.description: As Deer Speed I, except the speed increase is four times.

spell.name: Ox Strength
spell.description: Caster gains the strength of an ox. He gains a +40 melee OB, but cannot parry or use missiles for the duration of this spell.

spell.name: Glide True
spell.description: As Glide I, except product must be 500'.

spell.name: Deer Speed True
spell.description: As Deer Speed I, except speed increase is five times.

spell.name: Dragon Skin
spell.description: Caster's skin takes on the resilience of a lesser drake (effective AT of 20).

notes.note: With the exception of Chameleon Skin, Lion Claws, and Viperfang, the caster does not physically change with any of the spells on this list.

spell.name: Study Form
spell.description: Caster studies and memorizes the form of one type of animal or plant for use with spells later on this list. The cast can only have as many forms studied as he has levels.

spell.name: Resist Elements
spell.description: Protects the caster from natural heat up to 200 degrees F and natural cold down to -20 degrees F. Give a +10 to caster's RRs vs. heat and cold spells; -10 to all elemental spell attacks against caster.

spell.name: Hues
spell.description: Allows caster to take on the physical coloration of any one organic object; caster must be in contact with object. In many situations this will give a 10 to 50 bonus (GM discretion) to Hiding attempts (and perhaps to some Stalking attempts).

spell.name: Plant Facade
spell.description: Allows caster to appear as any one type of plant he has studied; caster retains his size and will not smell or feel like the plant; it is purely a visual illusion.

spell.name: Silent Moves
spell.description: Caster can move silently, so long as he does not create a sound originating more than 1' from his body.

spell.name: Underwater Breathing
spell.description: Caster can breath under normal water.

spell.name: Animal Facade
spell.description: Allows caster to appear as any one type of animal he has studied; caster retains his size and will not smell or feel like the animal; it is purely a visual illusion.

spell.name: Shadow
spell.description: Caster and objects on his person appear to be shadow; and thus are almost invisible in dark areas(e.g., in many situations this could be handled with a Stalking/Hiding bonus between 25 and 75).
