spell.name: Shielding Organic I
spell.description: Any single attack made against caster this round suffers a -50 modifier. The weapon or object striking the caster must be from an organic source or at least partially organic.

spell.name: Plant Form I
spell.description: Allows caster to take the form of any one plant he has studied; caster will look and feel like the plant, but will not change in size.

spell.name: Protection From Elements
spell.description: Protects the caster from any natural weather extremes. Give a +25 to caster's RRs vs. heat and cold spells; -25 to all elemental spell attacks against caster.

spell.name: Animal Thoughts
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, the caster's mental patterns will appear to be those of any animal he has studied. The caster cannot move while the spell is active.

spell.name: Shielding Organic II
spell.description: AS Shielding Organic I, except penalty is -100

spell.name: Animal Form I
spell.description: Allows caster to take the form of any one animal he has studied; caster will look and feel like the animal, but will not change in size. This will not bestow any of the animal's physical abilities.

spell.name: Animal Thoughts True
spell.description: As Animal Thoughts, except caster can move (though must maintain concentration).

spell.name: Animal Form II
spell.description: As Animal Form I, except caster gains the movement abilities of the chosen animal. Caster can vary his size from 50% normal to 400% normal.

spell.name: Plant Form II
spell.description: As Plant Form II, except caster gains the scent and physical abilities of the plant. Caster can vary his size from 50% normal to 400% normal.

spell.name: Shielding Organic III
spell.description: As Shielding Organic I, except attack automatically misses.

spell.name: Animal Form III
spell.description: As Animal Form I, except caster gains the movement abilities of the chosen animal. Caster can vary his size from 5% normal to 4000% normal.

spell.name: Plant Form True
spell.description: As Plant Form III, except caster can change his form to any other plant he has studied at any time during the duration of this spell.

spell.name: Animal Form True
spell.description: As Animal Form III, except caster can change his form to any other animal he has studied at any time during the duration of this spell.

spell.name: Nature's Form True
spell.description: As Plant Form True and Animal Form True in operation at the same time.

spell.name: Shielding Organic True
spell.description: Each round, caster can negate (i.e., cause to miss) one missile or melee attack directed at him; attack weapon must be partial organic; it must be within his field of vision.

spell.name: Plant Lore
spell.description: Caster learns nature and history of any one plant.

spell.name: Speed Growth I
spell.description: Allows caster to increase speed of growth for any one species of plant within the radius by 10x.

spell.name: Plant Tongues
spell.description: Allows caster to understand and "speak" the language of any one plant species.

spell.name: Plant Restore
spell.description: Heals damage to one plant that is less complex than a tree.

spell.name: Speed Growth II
spell.description: Allows caster to increase speed of growth for any one species of plant within the radius by 100x.

spell.name: Plant Location
spell.description: Caster can locate members of any one species of plant or he can find out what species are in the area.

spell.name: Plant Growth II
spell.description: Allows caster to double the size of any one plant; requires one days growth; when fully mature the plant will achieve twice its normal size.

spell.name: Plant Control I
spell.description: Caster can control the automatic and/or mental processes of any one plant; caster can also control the plant's movements; doesn't allow movement beyond normal allowances.

spell.name: Speed Growth III
spell.description: Allows caster to increase speed of growth for any one species of plant within the radius by 10x.

spell.name: Plant Growth III
spell.description: Allows caster to triple the size of any one plant; requires one days growth; when fully mature the plant will achieve 3x its normal size.

spell.name: Plant Control III
spell.description: Caster can control the automatic and/or mental processes of any three plants; caster can also control the plant's movements; doesn't allow movement beyond normal allowances.

spell.name: Tree Restore
spell.description: As Plant Restore, except it can affect any plant.

spell.name: Plant Growth V
spell.description: Allows caster to increase the size of any one plant by 5x; requires one days growth; when fully mature the plant will achieve 5x its normal size.

spell.name: Speed Growth IV
spell.description: Allows caster to increase speed of growth for any one species of plant within the radius by 100x.

spell.name: Plant Control V
spell.description: Caster can control the automatic and/or mental processes of any five plants; caster can also control the plant's movements; doesn't allow movement beyond normal allowances.

spell.name: Wall of Thorns
spell.description: Summons a wall of very tough (but pliable) thorns. The wall is up to 10'x10'x5'. Anyone moving through the wall receives d10 dagger attacks (use a +50 dagger attack) per foot of wall moved through. The wall must rest on solid surface.

spell.name: Firestop
spell.description: This spell will put out any fires upon living material that are in the area of effect.

spell.name: Plant Growth X
spell.description: Allows caster to increase the size of any one plant by 10x; requires one days growth; when fully mature the plant will achieve 10x its normal size.

spell.name: Plant Growth True
spell.description: Allows the caster to increase the size of all plants of any one species in the area by 5x; requires one days growth; when fully mature the plant will achieve 5x their normal size.

spell.name: Speed Growth True
spell.description: As Speed Growth I, except for the range and area of effect.

spell.name: Plant Control True
spell.description: Caster can control the automatic and/or mental processes of all plants within range; caster can also control the plant's movements; doesn't allow movement beyond normal allowances.

spell.name: Plant Animation
spell.description: Caster can animate any one plant; the plant can then move slowly, carrying any root system it may possess along.

spell.name: Create Holy Water
spell.description: When this spell is cast, up to four ounces of water is transformed into holy water. This spell takes one hour to cast. If the water is not placed into a clean receptial, its holy nature is ruined.

spell.name: Calming
spell.description: Caster points arm (elbow locked and fist clenched) at the target and channels raw power form his source (usually a deity). The target of the spell may take no aggressive/offensive action, and will only fight if attacked.

spell.name: Channels I
spell.description: When this spell is cast, the 1st lvl spell that the caster begins to cast the next round will be "Channeled" to another spell user of the Channeling realm. The "channeled" spell is transmitted to the other spell user when it would normally take effect, and must be used by him immediately. All normal restrictions on the transmitted spell apply. The caster of the transmitter must be able to see the receiver or know exactly where he is (direction and distance, or specific place). The receiver must know exactly when the spell is coming. For example, if a Cleric was at a certain altar at a certain time (midnight of full moon) ready to receive a spell; then another spell user or deity could use Channels to send him a spell (if he knew where the altar was and the correct time).

spell.name: Stunning
spell.description: Caster points his arm (elbow locked and fist clenched) at the target and channels raw power from his power source (usually a deity); target is stunned.

spell.name: Channels III
spell.description: As Channels 1 expect a 1-3rd level spell may be transmitted.

spell.name: Golden Slumbers
spell.description: Caster points his arm (elbow locked and fist clenched) at the target and channels raw power from his power source (usually a deity); target falls into a deep sleep.

spell.name: Channels V
spell.description: As Channels 1 except a 1 - 5th level spell may be transmitted.

spell.name: Blinding
spell.description: Caster points his arm (elbow locked and fist clenched) at the target and channels raw power from his power source (usually a deity); target blinded for 10 minutes per 10 failure.

spell.name: Channels VIII
spell.description: As Channels 1 except a 1 -8th level spell may be transmitted.

spell.name: Absolution
spell.description: Target's "soul" is torn from his body; it remains in whatever place "souls" go for 1 week/10 failure. The soul can be returned early only through the spell Lifegiving. Target is unconscious until soul is restored; even for subconscious activity, he is at -75.

spell.name: Holy Shout
spell.description: All beings not of the caster's own "alignment" (religious persuasion) are affected; all failing to resist by 1 to 40 are stunned 1 round per 10 failure. Those failing by more than 40 are unconscious.

spell.name: Item Returning
spell.description: Target item (weighting no more than 10 pounds) will return to a designated location. This spell has two possible durations (determined at the time of casting). The caster may send (i.e., teleport) the target item to a designed location at the time of casting (with an instant duration) or the caster can designate that the target item return to the caster when the possessor of the item has completed a specific task (specified at the time of casting).

spell.name: Channels X
spell.description: As Channels 1 expect a 1-10th level spell may be transmitted.

spell.name: Sanctuary
spell.description: Caster is returned to a predefined place (a type of teleportation). Caster must live in the place for 30 days (mediating 16 hours per day) to define it as his "place of returning". Only one such place may be defined at any one time; to change it, the new place must be defined as above.

spell.name: Item Rereturning
spell.description: AS Item Returning, except object will stay at the designated location (set at time of casting) for up to 1 round per level. At the end of this time, the object will go back to where it "returned" from.

spell.name: Absolution Pure
spell.description: Target's "soul" is torn from his body. The soul can only be returned through the spell Lifegiving. Target is unconscious until soul is restored; even for subconscious activity, he is at -75.

spell.name: Sanctuary True
spell.description: For up to 1 round per level after he has used the spell Sanctuary, caster may cast this spell and be returned to within 20' of the point he "Returned" from.

spell.name: Lord Channels
spell.description: As Channels 1 expect a 1-20th level spell may be transmitted.

spell.name: Holy Bridge
spell.description: This spell opens a direct channel to the caster's deity; results depend on the deity's personality, motives, and powers. Any spell the deity can cast may be transmitted through the gate.

spell.name: Guess
spell.description: When faced with a choice about which he has little or no information (i.e., which corridor leads to the wine cellar) the caster may cast this spell and the Gamemaster will determine which way he goes, biasing the choice favorable by 25% (e.g., roll 1-100: correct on 26 to 100, incorrect on 01 to 25).

spell.name: Intuitions I
spell.description: Caster gains a vision of what will happen in the next minute if he takes a specific action.

spell.name: Dream I
spell.description: Caster has a dream relating to a topic decided upon just before retiring; limited to once per night.

spell.name: Intuitions III
spell.description: Caster gains a vision of what will happen in the next three minutes if he takes a specific action.

spell.name: Death's Tale
spell.description: Caster gets a vision of the events surrounding the death of any one dead being through the eyes of the deceased; he also gets a view of the killer, if any. Caster must be within 10' of the corpse. Corpse must have died within a number of years equal to the caster's level.

spell.name: Channel Opening I
spell.description: Caster can make contact with any one known being he is acquainted with; this spell will enable the caster to learn the specific location of the other being, making it possible for the caster to use a Channels spell (see Channels list).

spell.name: Intuitions V
spell.description: Caster gains a vision of what will happen in the next five minutes if he takes a specific action.

spell.name: Dreams III
spell.description: Caster has a dream relating to a topic decided upon just before retiring; limited to three dreams per night on different topics.

spell.name: Intuitions X
spell.description: Caster gains a vision of what will happen in the next ten minutes if he takes a specific action.

spell.name: Commune I
spell.description: Caster receives (usually from his patron deity) a "yes" or "no" to a question on a single topic; usable but once a day.

spell.name: Magic Basin I
spell.description: The target of this spell is a small poll of water. The water must be calm (and remain calm for the duration of this spell). The caster may design a topic and a vision will appear in the pool that relates to the topic. The vision takes 1-50 rounds.

spell.name: Channel Opening II
spell.description: Caster can make contact with any one known being he is acquainted with; this spell will enable the caster to learn the specific location of the other being, making it possible for the caster to use a Channels spell (see Channels list).

spell.name: Magic Basin II
spell.description: As Magic Basin I, except up to two topics may be designated (5-50 rounds is required for each one).

spell.name: Death's Tale True
spell.description: Caster gets a vision of the events surrounding the death of any one dead being within 10'. Caster gets an understanding of the reason(s) the deceased died, exactly who the killer was (if any), and who was ultimately responsible (if anyone). Corpse may be of any age.

spell.name: Commune True
spell.description: Caster receives (usually from his patron deity) detailed answer to a question involving only one topic (e.g., a name or short phrase may constitute the answer); usable but once a day.

spell.name: Intuitions True
spell.description: Caster gains a vision of what will happen in the next one minute per level if he takes a specific action.

spell.name: Channel Opening True
spell.description: Caster can make contact with any one being, regardless of whether or not he is acquainted with the being. Caster must specify the type of being he is seeking. This spell will enable the caster to learn the specific location of the other being, making it possible for the caster to use a Channels spell (see Channels list).

spell.name: High Prayer
spell.description: Caster receives detailed information from his deity on a single topic question.

spell.name: Preservation I
spell.description: Caster can preserve a "Dead" body, preventing any further deterioration (i.e. stat deterioration) or damage from already existing wounds; the target will be in a coma; this spell will not prevent the target's soul from leaving the body.

spell.name: Lifekeeping I
spell.description: Caster can prevent the soul of a "dead" body from leaving, thus preventing actual death an enabling the fallen being to be restored via simple bodily repairs. Lifekeeping must be cast upon the target within 2 minutes of "death", or Lifegiving will be necessary for recovery.

spell.name: Preservation II
spell.description: As Preservation I, except for the duration

spell.name: Heal Life Essence I
spell.description: The target of this spell is any being who has suffered some form of soul damage. The target will be healed of d10 points of lost temporary Constitution.

spell.name: Lifekeeping II
spell.description: As Lifekeeping I, except for the duration

spell.name: Heal Life Essence II
spell.description: As Heal Life Essence I, except will heal 2d10 lost points.

spell.name: Preservation III
spell.description: As Preservation I, except for the duration

spell.name: Heal Life Essence III
spell.description: As Heal Life Essence I, except will heal 3d10 lost points.

spell.name: Preservation IV
spell.description: As Preservation I, except for the duration

spell.name: Lifekeeping III
spell.description: As Lifekeeping I, except for the duration

spell.name: Lifegiving I
spell.description: Caster can "raise" one dead being by restoring the being's lost soul. The target's soul must still exist and he must have died within the last year. In order to be successfully "raised", the target must roll below his Constitution stat; but, +10 is added to the result for every day the target has been dead (e.g., if the target has been dead for 3 days, 30 will be added to the roll; thus, a roll of 54 would become an 84 and a target with a CO of 84 or less would not be "raised"). Target will be incapacitated (-100 to all activity) for a period equal to 100 x the time "dead" (e.g., if the target was dead for 2 days, the recovery period would be 200 days).

spell.name: Heal Life Essence True
spell.description: As Heal Life Essence I, except will heal one point of temporary Constitution per level of the caster.

spell.name: Preservation V
spell.description: As Preservation I, except for the duration

spell.name: Lifegiving II
spell.description: As Lifegiving I, except a modification of -5 per day is applied to target's roll and the recovery period is only 50 days per day dead.

spell.name: Lifekeeping IV
spell.description: As Lifekeeping I, except for the duration

spell.name: Lifegiving III
spell.description: As Lifegiving I, except a modification of -2 per day is applied to target's roll and the recovery period is only 20 days per day dead.

spell.name: Preservation True
spell.description: AS Preservation I, except for the duration.

spell.name: Restoration
spell.description: Caster can restore most of the target's mental capabilities (including experience), the % that is unrecoverable by the use of this spell is equal to 1%times number of days that the mind was destroyed.

spell.name: Lifegiving IV
spell.description: As Lifegiving I, except a modification of -1 per day is applied to target's roll and the recovery period is equal to the number of day dead.

spell.name: Lifegiving V
spell.description: As Lifegiving I, except a modification of -2 per two days dead is applied to target's roll and there is no recovery period.

spell.name: Restoration True
spell.description: As Restoration, except that target's mind is fully restored (including experience)

spell.name: Lifegiving True
spell.description: As Lifegiving, except the target is automatically raised from dead and there is no recovery period.

spell.name: Prayer I
spell.description: Target gets a 5 bonus to his RRs and maneuver rolls. If cast only on "self", concentration is not required and the duration is 1 min/lvl.

spell.name: Bless I
spell.description: Target gets a 5 bonus to his DB and maneuver rolls. If cast only on "self", concentration is not required and the duration is 1 min/lvl.

spell.name: Resistance I
spell.description: Target gets a 5 bonus to his RRs and DB. If cast only on "self", concentration is not required and the duration is 1 min/lvl.

spell.name: Heat Resistance
spell.description: Target is protected from natural heat up to 200 degrees Fahrenheit; +20 to all RRs vs. heat; -20 to elemental fire/heat attacks. If cast only on "self", concentration is not required and the duration is 1 min/lvl.

spell.name: Cold Resistance
spell.description: Target is protected from natural cold up to -20 degrees Fahrenheit; +20 to all RRs vs. cold; -20 to elemental cold/ice attacks. If cast only on "self", concentration is not required and the duration is 1 min/lvl.

spell.name: Temperature Sphere I
spell.description: All who are within the sphere are allowed the benefits of either a Heat Resistance or a Cold Resistance Spell; the sphere is not mobile.

spell.name: Protections Sphere I
spell.description: All within the radius are allowed the benefits of Prayer 1 or Bless 1 or Resistance 1; the sphere is not mobile.

spell.name: Prayer III
spell.description: Target gets a 15 bonus to his RRs and maneuver rolls. Multiple targets would have the 15 divided up. Three targets would get +5 each, etc. If cast only on "self", concentration is not required and the duration is 1 min/lvl.

spell.name: Bless III
spell.description: Target gets a 15 bonus to his DB and maneuver rolls. Multiple targets would have the 15 divided up. Three targets would get +5 each, etc. If cast only on "self", concentration is not required and the duration is 1 min/lvl.

spell.name: Resistance III
spell.description: Target gets a 15 bonus to his RRs and DB. Multiple targets would have the 15 divided up. Three targets would get +5 each, etc. If cast only on "self", concentration is not required and the duration is 1 min/lvl.

spell.name: Temperature Sphere II
spell.description: All who are within the sphere are allowed the benefits of either a Heat Resistance or a Cold Resistance Spell; the sphere is not mobile.

spell.name: Protections Sphere III
spell.description: All within the radius are allowed the benefits of Prayer 3 or Bless 3 or Resistance 3; the sphere is not mobile.

spell.name: Prayer V
spell.description: Target gets a 25 bonus to his RRs and maneuver rolls. Multiple targets would have the 15 divided up. Five targets would get +5 each, etc. If cast only on "self", concentration is not required and the duration is 1 min/lvl.

spell.name: Bless V
spell.description: Target gets a 25 bonus to his DB and maneuver rolls. Multiple targets would have the 15 divided up. Five targets would get +5 each, etc. If cast only on "self", concentration is not required and the duration is 1 min/lvl.

spell.name: Resistance V
spell.description: Target gets a 25 bonus to his RRs and DB. Multiple targets would have the 25 divided up. Five targets would get +5 each, etc. If cast only on "self", concentration is not required and the duration is 1 min/lvl.

spell.name: Protections Sphere V
spell.description: All within the radius are allowed the benefits of Prayer 5 or Bless 5 or Resistance 5; the sphere is not mobile.

spell.name: Protections True
spell.description: Target gets a +30 bonus to his RRs, maneuver rolls, and DB; and 30 is subtracted from elemental attacks against him.

spell.name: Repel Undead V
spell.description:
Causes up to 5 Undead "Animated Dead" to flee or disintegrate; 5 "points" of Undead my be affected: a "Class I" Undead counts as 1 pt, a "Class II" Undead counts as 2 pts, etc. "Animated Dead" are treated as "Class I" Undead and are not entitled to a RR (automatically disintegrate if the spell does not fail). See Necromancy (Evil Cleric base list) for a brief description of Animated and Undead "Classes", creation, and control Creatures & Treasures Section 2.36 provides complete descriptions of more than forty different types of Undead. Each affected target is entitled to a RR: if it fails by (1-50), it will flee; if it fails by more than 50, it disintegrates (if the target(s) can not flee it will remain motionless). One BAR (Base Attack Roll) is applied to all targets. For the purpose of RR's, if not level is given for an Undead, use the following: (Class I = lvl 1-2), (Class II = lvl 3-5), (Class III = lvl 6-8), (Class IV= lvl 9-12), (Class IV= lvl 13-15), (Class VI = lvl 16-up).
The RR of any single Undead can be modified by concentrating the effects on that target. For each additional point of the spell allocated to a target (beyond those normally needed to affect it), that target's RR is modified by -5. This, Repel Undead V could affect five Class I Undead with no RR modifier, or one Class I with an RR modifier of -20 to each, or one Class II undead at -5, and two Class I with no modifier or any other combination of targets providing no more than 5 points were allocated.

spell.name: Cancel Channeling
spell.description: When the caster of this spell is target of a spell of the realm of Channeling, the "incoming" spell must first make an RR (before the caster of this spell makes a RR). For RR purpose, each spell uses a level equal to its caster's level. If the "incoming" spell's RR is successful, it may target the caster normally; otherwise, the incoming spell has no effect on this target.

spell.name: Anti-Channels I
spell.description: Cancels a Channels 1 spell being transmitted or received within range. No RR for the canceled spell.

spell.name: Neutralize Curse I
spell.description: Nullifies a curse for the duration of this spell. The curse is not dispelled and takes affect again afterwards.

spell.name: Anti-Channels III
spell.description: Cancels a channels of a 1-3 level spell being transmitted or received within range. No RR for the canceled spell.

spell.name: Repel Undead IX
spell.description: Causes up to 9 Undead "Animated Dead" to flee or disintegrate 9 "points" of Undead my be affected: a "Class I" Undead counts as 1 pt, a "Class II" Undead counts as 2 pts, etc. "Animated Dead" are treated as "Class I" Undead and are not entitled to a RR (automatically disintegrate if the spell does not fail). See Necromancy (Evil Cleric base list) for a brief description of Animated and Undead "Classes", creation, and control Creatures & Treasures Section 2.36 provides complete descriptions of more than forty different types of Undead.Each affected target is entitled to a RR: if it fails by (1-50), it will flee; if it fails by more than 50, it disintegrates (if the target(s) can not flee it will remain motionless). One BAR (Base Attack Roll) is applied to all targets. For the purpose of RR's, if not level is given for an Undead, use the following: (Class I = lvl 1-2), (Class II = lvl 3-5), (Class III = lvl 6-8), (Class IV= lvl 9-12), (Class IV= lvl 13-15), (Class VI = lvl 16-up,

spell.name: Remove Curse
spell.description: Cancels a curse if the curse fails a RR: the curse's target level is the attack level of the original curse and the attack level is this spell's attack level. If the curse is not canceled, the caster cannot try again until he has gone up another level of experience (however, another caster may try).

spell.name: Dispel Channeling I
spell.description: Any active spell from the realm of Channeling that is on the target must make an RR (use the level of the spell's caster as the spell's level). If the spell fails it RR; it is dispelled.

spell.name: Neutralize Curse II
spell.description: Nullifies a curse for the duration of this spell. The curse is not dispelled and takes affect again afterwards.

spell.name: Anti-Channels V
spell.description: Cancels a channels of a 1-5 level spell being transmitted or received within range. No RR for the canceled spell.

spell.name: Repel Undead XII
spell.description: Causes up to 12 Undead "Animated Dead" to flee or disintegrate; 12 "points" of Undead my be affected: a "Class I" Undead counts as 1 pt, a "Class II" Undead counts as 2 pts, etc. "Animated Dead" are treated as "Class I" Undead and are not entitled to a RR (automatically disintegrate if the spell does not fail). One BAR (Base Attack Roll) is applied to all targets. For the purpose of RR's, if not level is given for an Undead, use the following: (Class I = lvl 1-2), (Class II = lvl 3-5), (Class III = lvl 6-8), (Class IV= lvl 9-12), (Class IV= lvl 13-15), (Class VI = lvl 16-up,

spell.name: Anti-Channels VIII
spell.description: Cancels a channels of a 1-8 level spell being transmitted or received within range. No RR for the canceled spell.

spell.name: Dispel Channeling V
spell.description: As Dispel Channeling, except affects up to five targets.

spell.name: Anti-Channels X
spell.description: Cancels a channels of a 1-10 level spell being transmitted or received within range. No RR for the canceled spell.

spell.name: Repel Undead XV
spell.description: Causes up to 15 Undead "Animated Dead" to flee or disintegrate; 15 "points" of Undead my be affected: a "Class I" Undead counts as 1 pt, a "Class II" Undead counts as 2 pts, etc. "Animated Dead" are treated as "Class I" Undead and are not entitled to a RR (automatically disintegrate if the spell does not fail). One BAR (Base Attack Roll) is applied to all targets. For the purpose of RR's, if not level is given for an Undead, use the following: (Class I = lvl 1-2), (Class II = lvl 3-5), (Class III = lvl 6-8), (Class IV= lvl 9-12), (Class IV= lvl 13-15), (Class VI = lvl 16-up,

spell.name: Neutralize Curse III
spell.description: Nullifies a curse for the duration of this spell. The curse is not dispelled and takes affect again afterwards.

spell.name: Dispel Channeling X
spell.description: As Dispel Channeling, except affects up to ten targets.

spell.name: Repel Undead True
spell.description: This spell disintegrates any one Undead of Class V or lower automatically; and sends a Class VI fleeing.Causes up to 5 Undead "Animated Dead" to flee or disintegrate; 5 "points" of Undead my be affected: a "Class I" Undead counts as 1 pt, a "Class II" Undead counts as 2 pts, etc. "Animated Dead" are treated as "Class I" Undead and are not entitled to a RR (automatically disintegrate if the spell does not fail). See Necromancy (Evil Cleric base list) for a brief description of Animated and Undead "Classes", creation, and control Creatures & Treasures Section 2.36 provides complete descriptions of more than forty different types of Undead.Each affected target is entitled to a RR: if it fails by (1-50), it will flee; if it fails by more than 50, it disintegrates (if the target(s) can not flee it will remain motionless). One BAR (Base Attack Roll) is applied to all targets. For the purpose of RR's, if not level is given for an Undead, use the following: (Class I = lvl 1-2), (Class II = lvl 3-5), (Class III = lvl 6-8), (Class IV= lvl 9-12), (Class IV= lvl 13-15), (Class VI = lvl 16-up,

spell.name: Uncurse True
spell.description: Cancels a curse if the curse fails a RR: the curse's target level is the attack level of the original curse and the attack level is this spell's attack level. If the curse is not canceled, the caster cannot try again until he has gone up another level of experience (however, another caster may try).Note that some curses may have their own RR modification, being especially difficult to remove.

spell.name: Anti-Channels True
spell.description: Cancels a channels any spell being transmitted or received within range. No RR for the canceled spell. The only exception is the spell Holy Bridge (Cleric Base List, Channels), which is not affected.

spell.name: Rechanneling
spell.description: Caster can intercept one channeled spell that is being transmitted or received within his range and cast that spell himself. The person sending the channeled spell gets a RR (the attack level of this spell versus his level -- not the level of the spell being intercepted).

notes.note: For all spells that affect Undead, GMs may want to give modifications to certain very powerful Undead. See Creatures & Monsters for a complete listing of Undead.
A caster can only attempt to repel a given Undead once per experience level (see Section 7.1.4).
See Section 7.1.30 of Spell Law for information on curses and removing them.

spell.name: Summons I
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon a first level non-intelligent creature that he can control by concentrating on it. The creature disappears after 1 minute (6 rounds). The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Summons II
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one second level non-intelligent creature or two first level creatures or one first level creature for 2 minutes. He can control them by concentrating on them.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Summons III
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one third level non-intelligent creature or three first level creatures or any combination there of were the total does not exceed three. He can control them by concentrating on them.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Summons IV
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one 4th level non-intelligent creature or four first level creatures or any combination there of were the total does not exceed four. He can control them by concentrating on them.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Summons V
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one 5th level non-intelligent creature or five first level creatures or any combination there of were the total does not exceed five. He can control them by concentrating on them.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Summons VI
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one 6th level non-intelligent creature or six first level creatures or any combination there of were the total does not exceed six. He can control them by concentrating on them.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Summons VII
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one 7th level non-intelligent creature or seven first level creatures or any combination there of were the total does not exceed seven. He can control them by concentrating on them.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Summons VIII
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one 8th level non-intelligent creature or eight first level creatures or any combination there of were the total does not exceed eight. He can control them by concentrating on them.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Summons X
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one 10th level non-intelligent creature or ten first level creatures or any combination there of were the total does not exceed ten. He can control them by concentrating on them.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Demonic Gate I
spell.description: Caster summons a Type 1 Demon that appears over the course of two rounds; the caster can control it by concentrating. After the caster stops concentrating, the demon will fade out over the course of two rounds; attacking the closest being until gone. See Dark Summons or Creature and Treasures for a description of the Demon types.

spell.name: Summons XV
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one 15th level non-intelligent creature or fifteen first level creatures or any combination there of were the total does not exceed fifteen. He can control them by concentrating on them.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Lord Summons
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one 20th level non-intelligent creature or twenty first level creatures or any combination there of were the total does not exceed twenty. He can control them by concentrating on them.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Demonic Gate II
spell.description: Caster summons a Type 2 Demon that appears over the course of two rounds; the caster can control it by concentrating. After the caster stops concentrating, the demon will fade out over the course of two rounds; attacking the closest being until gone. See Dark Summons or Creature and Treasures for a description of the Demon types.

spell.name: Waiting Summons
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one 10th level non-intelligent creature or ten first level creatures or any combination there of were the total does not exceed ten. He can control them by concentrating on them.The summoning can be delayed up to 1 day/level of caster or until triggered by one of the following (decided by the caster): certain movements, certain sounds, touch, violent actions in the area, etc.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Demonic Gate III
spell.description: Caster summons a Type 3 Demon that appears over the course of two rounds; the caster can control it by concentrating. After the caster stops concentrating, the demon will fade out over the course of two rounds; attacking the closest being until gone. See Dark Summons or Creature and Treasures for a description of the Demon types.

spell.name: Mass Summons
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one non-intelligent creature of the caster's level or a number of first level creatures or any combination there of were the total does not exceed the caster's level. He can control them by concentrating on them.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster by exactly what creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Summons True
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon one non-intelligent creature of random level in strength. The caster can specify what creature it is. The creature will remain as long as the caster concentrates.

spell.name: Gate
spell.description: Caster can pull any being through a "gate" to the caster's location; if the being is intelligent, he must be willing to come. An intelligent being will get a feeling of the alignment of the gating person and a vague idea of the reason and significance for the "gate".

spell.name: Detect Enemies
spell.description: Detects the total number of "enemies" (giving approximate direction and distance). This spell also reveals the most heavily represented type of enemy (by total levels). Caster can concentrate on a different 50'R each round.

spell.name: Cancel Channeling
spell.description: When the caster of this spell is a target of a spell from the realm of Channeling, the "incoming" spell must first make an RR. For RR purposes, each spell uses a level equal to its caster's level. If the "incoming" spell passes the RR it may target the caster normally; otherwise the incoming spell has no effect on this target.

spell.name: Cancel Essence
spell.description: As Cancel Channeling, except affects spells from the realm of Essence.

spell.name: Cancel Mentalism
spell.description: As Cancel Channeling, except affects spells form the realm of Mentalism.

spell.name: Dreams I
spell.description: Caster has a dream relating to a topic decided upon just before retiring. The caster must sleep for a normal sleep cycle (minimum 4 hours) for this spell to work.

spell.name: Enemy Speech
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, the caster can read and speak one "enemy" language with skill rank 8.

spell.name: Dispel Channeling I
spell.description: Any active spell from the realm of channeling that is on the target must make an RR (use the level of that spell's caster as the spell's level). If the spell fails it RR, it is dispelled.

spell.name: Dispel Essence I
spell.description: As Dispel Channeling, except affects spells from the realm of Essence.

spell.name: Dispel Mentalism I
spell.description: As Dispel Channeling, except affects spells form the realm of Mentalism.

spell.name: Detect Enemies II
spell.description: As Detect Enemies I, except for range and area of effect.

spell.name: Dream III
spell.description: As Dream I, except limit is 3 dreams per night on different topics.

spell.name: Death's Tale
spell.description: Caster gets a vision of the events surrounding the death of any 1 dead target through the eyes of the deceased. He also gets a view of the killer (if any). The caster must be within 10'R of the corpse. Corpse must have died within a number of years equal to caster's level.

spell.name: Channel Opening I
spell.description: Caster can contact with any 1 known target he is acquainted with. This spell will enable the caster to learn the specific location (direction and distance only) of the being. This spell is often used with a Channels spell.

spell.name: Dispel Channeling Sphere I
spell.description: As Dispel Channeling, except for the area of effect (centered on the caster). If the radius encounters an already existing spell, the spell must make an RR (with a +30 modifier) or be cancelled (not dispelled) for as long as the active spell is inside the radius.

spell.name: Dispel Essence Sphere I
spell.description: As Dispel Channeling Sphere I, except affects spells from the realm of Essence.

spell.name: Dispel Mentalism Sphere I
spell.description: As Dispel Channeling Sphere I, except affects spells from the realm of Mentalism.

spell.name: Commune I
spell.description: Caster receives (usually from his patron deity) a "yes" or "no" answer to a question on a single topic. This spell may be used a maximum of once a day.

spell.name: Death's Tale True
spell.description: Caster gets a vision of the events surrounding the death of any 1 dead target within 10 feet. Caster gets an understanding of the reason(s) the deceased died, exactly who the killer was (if any), and who was ultimately responsible (if anyone). Corpse may be of any age.

spell.name: Detect Enemies True
spell.description: As Detect Enemies I, except for range and area of effect.

spell.name: Commune True
spell.description: As Commune I, except caster can receive a more detailed answer (e.g. a name or short phrase) to a question involving only 1 concept.

spell.name: Channel Opening True
spell.description: As Channel Opening I, except caster can open a channel to anyone he chooses, regardless of whether or not he is acquainted with the being. The caster must specify the type of the being he is seeking (e.g. a priest of a specific deity, a warrior with blue eyes, etc.)

spell.name: High Prayer
spell.description: Caster receives detailed information from his deity on a single topic question.

spell.name: Repel Undead I
spell.description: Causes Undead to flee or disintegrate. All Undead have a class assigned to them. This spell will affect 1 point of Undead (Class I Undead count as 1 point, Class II Undead count as 2 points, etc.) Animated Dead are treated as Class I Undead and are not entitled to an RR. Each target is entitled to an RR. If the target fails the RR by 59 or less, it will flee (if the target cannot flee. it will remain motionless). If the target fails by more than 50, it disintegrates. One Base Attack Roll is applied to all targets. The RR of any single undead can be modified by concentrating the effects of the spell on that target. For each additional point of the spell allocated to a target that target's RR is modified by -5.

spell.name: Detect Undead
spell.description: Detects the presence of Undead in the area of effect. Caster can move the area of effect 5' each round.

spell.name: Repel Undead III
spell.description: As Repel Undead I, except affects 3 points of Undead.

spell.name: Repel Demon I
spell.description: For as long as the caster concentrates, Type I Demons that are in the area of effect may not leave and Type I Demons that are outside the area of effect may not enter.

spell.name: Repel Undead V
spell.description: As Repeal Undead I, except affects 5 points of Undead.

spell.name: Repel Demon II
spell.description: As Repel Demon I, except affects up to Type II Demons.

spell.name: Banish Demon I
spell.description: Banishes the target Type I Demon from this plane of existence for the duration of the spell.

spell.name: Neutralize Curse I
spell.description: Nullifies a curse for the duration of this spell. The curse is not dispelled and takes effect after the duration of this spell.

spell.name: Repel Demon III
spell.description: As Repel Demon I, except affects up to Type III Demons.

spell.name: Repel Undead X
spell.description: As Repeal Undead I, except affects 10 points of Undead.

spell.name: Banish Demon II
spell.description: As Banish Demon I, except affects up to a Type II Demon,

spell.name: Repel Undead XII
spell.description: As Repeal Undead I, except affects 12 points of Undead.

spell.name: Repel Demon IV
spell.description: As Repel Demon I, except affects up to Type IV Demons.

spell.name: Neutralize Curse II
spell.description: As Neutralize Curse I, except for the duration.

spell.name: Repel Undead XV
spell.description: As Repeal Undead I, except affects 15 points of Undead.

spell.name: Repel Demon V
spell.description: As Repel Demon I, except affects up to Type V Demons.

spell.name: Banish Demon III
spell.description: As Banish Demon I, except affects up to a Type III Demon,

spell.name: Neutralize Curse III
spell.description: As Neutralize Curse I, except for the duration.

spell.name: Repel Demon VI
spell.description: As Repel Demon I, except affects up to Type VI Demons.

spell.name: Repel Undead True
spell.description: As Repel Undead I, except one Undead of type V or less is disintegrated. Type VI Undead are sent fleeing.

spell.name: Repel Demon True
spell.description: As Repel Demon VI, except for the area of effect.

spell.name: Uncurse True
spell.description: Dispel a curse if the curse fails an RR. The curse's level is the level of the caster of the original curse. If the curse is not dispelled, the caster cannot try again until he as gone up another level of experience.

spell.name: Banish Demon True
spell.description: As Banish Demon I, except affects up to a Type IV Demon.

spell.name: Holy Attack I
spell.description: Adds a +15 to the caster's melee or missile attack for the current round.

spell.name: Righteous Blow I
spell.description: After casting this spell, there is a a chance that the caster's next attack (melee of missile) will be treated as "Magic" for the purpose of resolving criticals (usually only applicable against Large and Super Large creatures). The chance is equal to 10% plus 5% for each round of concentration (i.e., prays) immediately prior to preparing and casting this spell. The attack affected by this spell must occur within 1 minute per level after this spell was cast.

spell.name: Holy Strength I
spell.description: Caster gains a +5 to his strength stat bonus for the purpose of one maneuver. In combat, this results in a +10 to melee attacks and +5 to missile attacks.

spell.name: Holy Attack II
spell.description: As Holy Attack I, except bonus is +20.

spell.name: Righteous Blow II
spell.description: As Righteous Blow I, except attack is treated as "Mithril".

spell.name: Holy Focus
spell.description: As Righteous Blow I, except critical is treated as "Holy" and the chance is equal to 20% plus 2% for every extra Power Point used to cast this spell. A maximum number of PPs equal to the caster's level may be used to cast this spell.

spell.name: Holy Attack III
spell.description: As Holy Attack I, except bonus is +25.

spell.name: Righteous Blow III
spell.description: As Righteous Blow I, except attack is treated as "Holy".

spell.name: Holy Aura I
spell.description: A bright, shimmering aura surrounds the caster. All creatures "of darkness" who are in the area of effect must make an RR each round or receive an 'A' severity critical (type to be determined by the GM; based upon the nature of the creature).

spell.name: Holy Attack IV
spell.description: As Holy Attack I, except bonus is +30.

spell.name: Righteous Blow IV
spell.description: As Righteous Blow I, except attack is treated as "Slaying" (creature type must be chosen when spell is cast).

spell.name: Holy Strength II
spell.description: As Holy Strength I, except strength stat is +10 for a maneuver (+20 to melee attacks; +10 to missile attacks).

spell.name: Holy Attack V
spell.description: As Holy Attack I, except bonus is +35.

spell.name: Holy Aura II
spell.description: As Holy Aura I, except delivers a 'B' critical.

spell.name: Holy Attack VI
spell.description: As Holy Attack I, except bonus is +40.

spell.name: Holy Strength III
spell.description: As Holy Strength I, except strength stat is +15 for a maneuver (+30 to melee attacks; +15 to missile attacks).

spell.name: Holy Attack VII
spell.description: As Holy Attack I, except bonus is +45.

spell.name: Holy Aura True
spell.description: As Holy Aura I, except delivers a 'C' critical.

spell.name: Holy Attack True
spell.description: As Holy Attack I, except bonus is +50.

spell.name: Holy Focus True
spell.description: As Holy Focus, except attack is automatically Holy.

spell.name: Holy Martyr
spell.description: The caster exposes all within the area of effect to the raw power of his deity. All in the area suffer a +100 Fireball attack (centered on the caster). All concussion damage is doubled and an extra Slaying Critical (on the Large Creature Critical Strike Table) is delivered. The caster acts as the center-point for the blast and is not immune to any of the damage. For the caster, no objects, spells, etc. will protect him from the blast.

spell.name: Healing I
spell.description: Target is healed of d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Flowstop I
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding on a wound that is bleeding 1 hit per round. Target may not be moved, or bleeding will resume at prior rate.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief I
spell.description: Target is healed of one area of mild frostbite or first degree burn.

spell.name: Minor Fracture Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to mend one simple fracture (not compound fractures, shatters, joint damage, etc.) Recovery time is one day.

spell.name: Healing III
spell.description: As Healing I, except heals 3d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Stun Relief I
spell.description: Target is relieved of one round's worth of accumulated stun.

spell.name: Major Fracture Repair
spell.description: As Minor Fracture Repair, except that the caster can also repair compound fractures. Recovery time is one day.

spell.name: Disease Resistance I
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, the target gets an additional RR versus any disease(s).

spell.name: Poison Resistance I
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, the target gets an additional RR versus any poison(s).

spell.name: Minor Vessel Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to completely mend a damaged minor blood vessel (a vessel that bleeds at up to 2 hits per round, not major arteries or veins).

spell.name: Healing V
spell.description: As Healing I, except heals 5d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Muscle/Tendon Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (nor replace) one damaged muscle or tendon. Recovery time is 1 hour.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief III
spell.description: As Frost/Burn Relief I, except caster can heal 3 areas of mild damage or 1 area of severe damage or a combination of 1 mild and 1 moderate area of damage.

spell.name: Stun Relief II
spell.description: As Stun Relief I, except relieves 2 rounds of stun.

spell.name: Unparalysis
spell.description: Caster can cure any one paralysis problem.

spell.name: Healing X
spell.description: As Healing I, except heals 10d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief IV
spell.description: As Frost/Burn Relief I, except caster can heal 4 areas of mild damage or 2 moderate or 1 mild and 1 area of severe damage or a combination of 2 mild and 1 moderate area of damage.

spell.name: Undisease
spell.description: Caster can remove any on disease from the target.

spell.name: Unpoison
spell.description: Caster can remove any on poison from the target.

spell.name: Stun Relief True
spell.description: As Stun Relief I, except relives all rounds of stun.

spell.name: Healing XV
spell.description: As Healing I, except heals 15d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Healing True
spell.description: As Healing I, except heals all concussion damage.

spell.name: Laying on Hands True
spell.description: Caster can use any one lower level spell on this list once per round.

spell.name: Protection Prayer I
spell.description: Everyone in the area of effect who is aligned with the caster (GM's discretion) subtracts 5 from all elemental attacks against him. They may also add 6 to all RRs versus spells. These bonuses are not conferred to the caster.

spell.name: Aura
spell.description: Creates a bright aura about the caster, making him appear more powerful and subtracting 10 from all attacks against him.

spell.name: Shield
spell.description: Creates an invisible force shield in front of the caster. This functions as a normal shield (subtracting 25 from appropriate attacks, etc.) except it does not occupy a hand. This spell cannot be combined with a "real" shield.

spell.name: Blur
spell.description: Causes target to appear blurred to attackers. This subtracts 10 from all attacks.

spell.name: Unpain I
spell.description: Caster is able to sustain an additional 25% of his total concussion hits before passing out. Hits are still taken and remain when the spell lapses.

spell.name: Protection Prayer II
spell.description: As Protection Prayer I, except bonuses are 10.

spell.name: Deflections I
spell.description: Caster can deflect any one missile that passes within 10' of him (caster must be able to see the missile). This causes 100 to be subtracted from the missile's attack.

spell.name: True Aura
spell.description: As Aura, except make the caster appear very powerful; subtracting 15 from all attacks against him.

spell.name: Bladeturn I
spell.description: Caster can deflect any one melee attack that he can see (and is within range). This causes 50 to be subtracted from the attack.

spell.name: Unpain II
spell.description: As Unpain I, except an additional 50% can be sustained.

spell.name: Protection Prayer III
spell.description: As Protection Prayer I, except bonuses are 15.

spell.name: Deflections II
spell.description: As Deflection I, except will deflect up to two missiles.

spell.name: Aim Untrue I
spell.description: Caster can deflect any missile that passes within 100' of him (caster must be able to see the missile). This causes the missile to automatically miss.

spell.name: Bladeturn II
spell.description: As Bladeturn I, except affects 2 attacks.

spell.name: Unpain III
spell.description: As Unpain I, except an additional 75% can be sustained.

spell.name: Protection Prayer IV
spell.description: As Protection Prayer I, except bonuses are 20.

spell.name: Deflections III
spell.description: As Deflection I, except will deflect up to three missiles.

spell.name: Aim Untrue II
spell.description: As Aim Untrue I, except affects up to two missiles.

spell.name: Bladeturn III
spell.description: As Bladeturn I, except affects 3 attacks.

spell.name: Unpain IV
spell.description: As Unpain I, except an additional 100% can be sustained.

spell.name: Protection Prayer True
spell.description: As Protection Prayer I, except bonuses are 25.

spell.name: Mass Deflections
spell.description: As Deflections I, except will deflect one missile per level of the caster.

spell.name: Holy Shields True
spell.description: Caster may use any lower level spell on this list once per round.

spell.name: Courage
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, all within the area of effect (including the caster) may make a second RR versus any fear or panic effect. This second RR is made with an additional +10 modifier.

spell.name: Inspirations I
spell.description: Caster inspires all allies who are within the area of effect (they must be aware of the caster). All allies get +5 to melee attacks and moving maneuvers for the duration of the spell. This spell will only work during combat or highly religious moments (e.g. an oratory presentation prior to a large battle). Theses bonuses do not apply to the caster.

spell.name: Voice of Friendship
spell.description: For as long as they speak together, the target of this spell will believe that the caster is a good friend and is acting in the target's best interest.

spell.name: Inspirations II
spell.description: As Inspirations I, except bonuses are +10.

spell.name: Voice of Reason
spell.description: For as long as the caster speaks, the target will belive that the reasoning and ideas that the caster expresses are correct and valid.

spell.name: Inspirations III
spell.description: As Inspirations I, except bonuses are +15.

spell.name: Voice of Caution
spell.description: For as long as the caster speaks, the target will become more cautious (less rash) and will tend to obey the caster's warning without hesitation or doubt.

spell.name: Command I
spell.description: Target must obey the caster. However, he will not perform any act that is completely alien to him (e.g. no suicide suggestions, no blinding himself suggestions, etc.)

spell.name: Inspirations IV
spell.description: As Inspirations I, except bonuses are +20.

spell.name: Words of Friendship
spell.description: As Voice of Friendship, except will affect all who can hear the caster.

spell.name: Inspirations V
spell.description: As Inspirations I, except bonuses are +25.

spell.name: Command II
spell.description: As Command I, except affects two targets.

spell.name: Words of Reason
spell.description: As Voice of Reason, except will affect all who can hear the caster.

spell.name: Inspirations VI
spell.description: As Inspirations I, except bonuses are +30.

spell.name: Courage True
spell.description: As Courage, except the second RR automatically succeeds.

spell.name: Inspirations VII
spell.description: As Inspirations I, except bonuses are +35.

spell.name: Words of Caution
spell.description: As Voice of Caution, except will affect all who can hear the caster.

spell.name: Inspirations VIII
spell.description: As Inspirations I, except bonuses are +40.

spell.name: Voice of Conviction
spell.description: After casting this spell, the caster must tell the truth (as he knows it). All targets who fail their RR will belive the caster is speaking the absolute truth.

spell.name: Inspirations True
spell.description: As Inspirations I, except bonuses are +50.

spell.name: Words of Conviction
spell.description: As Voice of Conviction, except will affect all who can hear the caster.

spell.name: Inspirations Mastery
spell.description: Caster can use any lower level spell from this list once per round.

spell.name: Heat Resistance
spell.description: Target is totally protected from natural heat to 200 degrees F; and modifies spells involving heat by +20 to RRs and -20 to elemental fire/heat attacks.

spell.name: Cold Resistance
spell.description: Target is totally protected from natural cold to -20 degrees F; and modifies spells involving cold by 20; -20 to elemental cold/ice attacks.

spell.name: Resistance I
spell.description: Caster gets a 5 bonus to his RRs and DB.

spell.name: Bless I
spell.description: Caster gets a 5 bonus to his Maneuver rolls and DB.

spell.name: Prayer I
spell.description: Caster gets a 5 bonus to his RRs and Maneuver rolls.

spell.name: Sterilization
spell.description: Caster can sterilize 1 cu'/lvl of any solid or liquid; will not affect inert poisons or harm creatures larger then 1/4" in length.

spell.name: Resistance II
spell.description: Caster gets a 10 bonus to his RRs and DB.

spell.name: Bless II
spell.description: Caster gets a 10 bonus to his Maneuver rolls and DB.

spell.name: Prayer II
spell.description: Caster gets a 10 bonus to his RRs and Maneuver rolls.

spell.name: Protection from Elements
spell.description: Target is totally protected from all natural heat and cold; and modifies spells involving heat by +20 to RRs and -20 to elemental fire/heat attacks.

spell.name: Resistance III
spell.description: Caster gets a 15 bonus to his RRs and DB.

spell.name: Bless III
spell.description: Caster gets a 15 bonus to his Maneuver rolls and DB.

spell.name: Prayer III
spell.description: Caster gets a 15 bonus to his RRs and Maneuver rolls.

spell.name: Resistance IV
spell.description: As Resistance I, except bonus is +15

spell.name: Bless IV
spell.description: As Bless I, except bonus is +20

spell.name: Prayer IV
spell.description: As Prayer II, except bonus is +20

spell.name: Purge Disease
spell.description: Allows target to attempt to throw off any one disease by making another RR with a special +50 modification.

spell.name: Purge Curse
spell.description: Caster can throw this spell on a given target only once per caster's level. A RR is made for the curse (the caster's level is the attack level, the original attack level of the curse is the target level); if RR fails, the curse is removed.

spell.name: Purge Poison
spell.description: Allows target to attempt to throw off the effects of any poison by making a RR with a special +50 modification.

spell.name: Inner Wall
spell.description: Caster gets a 25 bonus to his RRs, Maneuvers and DB.

spell.name: Rockrunning
spell.description: Caster can run on nearly horizontal stone surfaces as if he were on level ground.

spell.name: Limbwalking
spell.description: Target can walk along nearly horizontal tree limbs (that can support the weight) as if he were on level ground.

spell.name: Swimming
spell.description: Enables target to swim without expending energy.

spell.name: Waterwalking
spell.description: Target can walk on water as if he were on level ground; may not be used on rough water.

spell.name: Sandrunning
spell.description: Target can run on sandy surfaces of as if he were on level ground.

spell.name: Limbrunning
spell.description: Target can run along nearly horizontal tree limbs (that can support the weight) as if he were on level ground.

spell.name: Traceless Passing
spell.description: Caster can walk without leaving tracks or other visible signs of his passing

spell.name: Hide Tracks I
spell.description: Caster can hide the tracks of any one being; this spell and Traceless Passing can be used simultaneously.

spell.name: Waterrunning
spell.description: Target can run on water as if he were on level ground; may not be used on rough water.

spell.name: Hide Tracks II
spell.description: Caster can hide the tracks of any two beings; this spell and Traceless Passing can be used simultaneously.

spell.name: Swimming True
spell.description: Enables target to swim as fast as a run without expending energy.

spell.name: Hide Tracks V
spell.description: Caster can hide the tracks of any five beings; this spell and Traceless Passing can be used simultaneously.

spell.name: Running True
spell.description: As the lower level Running spells, except any one of the spells can be used each round (e.g., the caster could run on sand, then on water, then on tree limbs, etc.).

spell.name: Traceless Passing True
spell.description: As Traceless Passing, except caster need not concentrate.

spell.name: Merging Organic
spell.description: Caster can merge (body +1' depth) into organic material (live or dead); caster can not move while merged.

spell.name: Hide Tracks X
spell.description: As Hide Tracks I, except hides 10 beings' tracks.

spell.name: Traceless Running
spell.description: As Traceless Passing, except caster can move two times normal pace.

spell.name: Hide Tracks XV
spell.description: As Hide Tracks I, except hides 15 beings' tracks.

spell.name: Traceless Running True
spell.description: As Traceless Passing True, except caster can move two times normal pace.

spell.name: Great Merging Organic
spell.description: Caster can merge (body +1' depth) into organic material (live or dead); they can also move within the material and see outside if within 6" of the surface.

spell.name: Hide Tracks XX
spell.description: Caster can hide the tracks of any twenty beings; this spell and Traceless Passing can be used simultaneously.

spell.name: Merging True Organic
spell.description: Caster can merge (body +1' depth) into organic material (live or dead); they can also move within the material and see outside if within 6" of the surface. Target may also use spells on himself while merged.

spell.name: Hide Tracks True
spell.description: Caster can either absolutely hide his own tracks (preventing discovery via any spell, etc.) or hide the tracks of any number of beings up to his level; this spell and Traceless Passing can be used simultaneously.

spell.name: Hues
spell.description: Allows caster to take on the physical coloration of any one organic object; caster must be in contact with that object. In many situations this will give a +10 to 50 bonus (GM discretion) to Hiding attempts (and perhaps to some Stalking attempts).

spell.name: Shade
spell.description: All shadows and darkness within radius deepen, giving all Stalking and Hiding attempts a +25 bonus; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: Freeze Liquid
spell.description: Up to 1 cu' of Liquid per level can be cooled to freezing at rate of 1 cu' per round; will not lower temperature below -20 degrees F (makes great ice for drinks).

spell.name: Silent Moves
spell.description: Caster can move silently, so long as he does not create a sound originating more than 1' from his body. In many situations this will give a +10 to 50 bonus (GM discretion) to Stalking/ Hiding attempts.

spell.name: Self Cloaking
spell.description: Caster blends into surrounding terrain; gives a +75 bonus to Hiding attempts; caster may not move (appreciably) without destroying effect.

spell.name: Light
spell.description: Light s a 10' R area surrounding point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object / being.

spell.name: Darkness I
spell.description: Darkens a 10' R area surrounding point touched into normal darkness; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object / being.

spell.name: Shadow
spell.description: Caster and objects on his person appear to be a shadow; and thus are almost invisible in dark areas (e.g., in many situations this could be handled with a stalk/hiding bonus between 25 and 75).

spell.name: Study Form
spell.description: Caster studies and memorizes the form of one type of animal or plant for use with spells later on this list. The cast can only have as many forms studied as he has levels.

spell.name: Plant Facade
spell.description: Allows caster to appear as any one type of plant; caster retains his size and will not smell or feel like the plant; it is purely a visual illusion.

spell.name: Animal Thoughts
spell.description: As long as caster does not move, his mental patterns will appear to be those of any local animal; even if he move, his specific thoughts can't be read.

spell.name: Study Form True
spell.description: As Study Form, except a specific animal or plant form may be studied.

spell.name: Animal Facade
spell.description: Allows caster to appear as any one type of animal; caster retains his size and will not smell or feel like the animal; it is purely a visual illusion.

spell.name: Animal Thoughts True
spell.description: Caster's mental patterns will appear to be those of any local animal; his specific thoughts can't be read.

spell.name: Plant Form I
spell.description: Allows caster to take the form of any one plant he has studied; caster will look and feel like the plant, but will not change in size.

spell.name: Animal Form I
spell.description: Allows caster to take the form of any one animal he has studied; caster will look and feel like the animal, but will not change in size. This will not bestow any of the animal's physical abilities.

spell.name: Plant Form II
spell.description: As Plant Form II, except caster gains the scent and physical abilities of the plant. Caster can vary his size from 50% normal to 400% normal.

spell.name: Animal Form II
spell.description: As Animal Form I, except caster gains the movement abilities of the chosen animal. Caster can vary his size from 50% normal to 400% normal.

spell.name: Plant Form True
spell.description: As Plant Form III, except caster can change his form to any other plant he has studied at any time during the duration of this spell.

spell.name: Animal Form True
spell.description: As Animal Form III, except caster can change his form to any other animal he has studied at any time during the duration of this spell.

spell.name: Summon Nourishment
spell.description: An animal will arrive bearing some form of nourishment for the caster. This may take the form of berries, nuts, or tubers (always some form of vegetable matter). The animal will drop the food and return to the wilderness.

spell.name: Summon Warmth
spell.description: A heavily-furred animal will arrive and lie down near the caster. The animal will allow the caster (and only the caster) to lie down next to it.

spell.name: Summon Guide
spell.description: An animal who knows the path to a specific location will arrive to guide the caster to that location. The animal will only guide the caster as long as he concentrates on the desired location.

spell.name: Summon Guardian
spell.description: A suitable large animal will arrive. The animal will attempt to protect the caster form hostile attacks for the duration of the spell. The animal will be one that is capable of inflicting at least Medium animal attacks. The animal will only protect the caster as long as the caster remains in the same general area the spell was cast (i.e. if the caster leaves the area, the animal will not travel with him).

spell.name: Summon Mount
spell.description: A large animal will arrive and serve as a mount for the caster.

spell.name: Summon Hunter
spell.description: An animal will arrive bearing a recently killed prey for the caster (some form of meat). The animal will drop the food close by and return to the wilderness.

spell.name: Summon Sense
spell.description: An animal with a specified heightened sense will arrive. For the duration of the spell, the animal will "perceive" for the caster. The caster can concentrate to have the animal communicate what he has been perceiving.

spell.name: Summon Group
spell.description: A "group" of animals will arrive and stay near the area where the spell was cast. For the purpose of this spell, the animals summoned must normally travel in groups (e.g., wolves, deers, birds, etc.)

spell.name: Mass Summons
spell.description: The caster can use any lower level spell on this list, except that one animal per level will be summoned. All of the animals will serve only the caster.

spell.name: Spread Plants
spell.description: This spell produces ground covering of grass and small plants of other varieties. The plants must already exist in the area of effect. This spell simply allows them to multiply and grow faster (coverage takes 20d100 hours).

spell.name: Fog Prayer
spell.description: Caster prays to his deity for fog. The chance that the prayer is answered is 2% per level of the caster.

spell.name: Rain Prayer
spell.description: As Fog Prayer, except generates a light rain.

spell.name: Spread Plants II
spell.description: As Spread Plants I, except will also spread saplings and small trees.

spell.name: Storm Prayer
spell.description: As Fog Prayer, except will generate a heavy thunderstorm.

spell.name: Hail Prayer
spell.description: As Fog Prayer, except generates a hail storm.

spell.name: Lightning Prayer
spell.description: As Fog Prayer, except will generate a lightning storm.

spell.name: Tornado Prayer
spell.description: As Fog Prayer, except will generate weather that results in a tornado.

spell.name: Clear Weather Prayer
spell.description: As Fog Prayer, except will ensure clear weather.

spell.name: Weather Prayer True
spell.description: As Fog Prayer. except caster's deity will grant whatever weather would be most beneficial for the caster's current goal.

spell.name: Prayer Mastery
spell.description: As any of the Prayer spells on this list, except chance of getting the effect is 95%.

spell.name: Trap Detection
spell.description: Caster has a 75% chance of detecting each individual trap in a 5'R; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Water Finding I
spell.description: Caster can locate any natural source of running water, exposed groundwater, etc., exceeding one gallon; learns approximate size and quality of water.

spell.name: Fire Starting
spell.description: Allows caster to set a fire of 1' R; fire will then last as long as there is fuel. A target in the 1' R will take an 'A' Heat Critical.

spell.name: Food Finding I
spell.description: Caster learns location, type, and approximate quantity of edible food (e.g., dead animal matter, plants, etc.); food source must exceed one lb.

spell.name: Water Purification
spell.description: Allows caster to purify a number of gallons of water equal to his level.

spell.name: Shelter Finding I
spell.description: Caster learns location, type, and approximate size of any waterproof, covered space exceeding 125 cu'; shelter must have an entry (exceeding 2' R) bordering on open air.

spell.name: Lesser Traps
spell.description: Caster can construct a minor outdoor trap within one round; trap can deliver up to a "B" critical hit to any one person (e.g., a shallow spiked pit, a snare that throws victim into tree trunk, etc.); area of effect/triggering must be a 10' R or less.

spell.name: Weather Prediction I
spell.description: Gives caster a 95% chance of predicting the time , type, and severity of weather over the next 24 hour period.

spell.name: Nature's Awareness I
spell.description: Allows caster to monitor animate activity in the area (e.g., he will be aware of movements, subtle and overt); caster cannot move while concentrating.

spell.name: Water Finding II
spell.description: Caster can locate any natural source of running water, exposed groundwater, etc., exceeding one gallon; learns approximate size and quality of water.

spell.name: Waiting Awareness I
spell.description: Allows caster to set up a natural "alarm system"; any disturbing activity will cause caster to be alerted.

spell.name: Food Finding II
spell.description: Caster learns location, type, and approximate quantity of edible food (e.g., dead animal matter, plants, etc.); food source must exceed one lb.

spell.name: Major Traps
spell.description: Caster can construct a major outdoor trap within one round; trap can deliver up to a "E" critical hit to any one person (e.g., a shallow spiked pit, a snare that throws victim into tree trunk, etc.); area of effect/triggering must be a 10' R or less.

spell.name: Shelter Finding II
spell.description: Caster learns location, type, and approximate size of any waterproof, covered space exceeding 125 cu'; shelter must have an entry (exceeding 2' R) bordering on open air.

spell.name: Nature's Awareness III
spell.description: Allows caster to monitor animate activity in the area (e.g., he will be aware of movements, subtle and overt); caster cannot move while concentrating.

spell.name: Water Finding True
spell.description: Finds the closest water source (as defined in Water Finding I). This spell only gives direction and distance; no additional information about size and quality of water is gained.

spell.name: Food Finding True
spell.description: Finds the closest source of food (as defined in Food Finding I). This spell only gives direction and distance; no additional information about quantity or and quality of the food source is gained.

spell.name: Shelter Finding True
spell.description: Finds the closest shelter (as defined in Shelter Finding I). This spell only gives direction and distance; no additional information about size or type of shelter is gained.

spell.name: Nature's Awareness V
spell.description: As Nature's Awareness I, except for the area of effect.

spell.name: Weather Prediction V
spell.description: Gives caster a 95% chance of predicting the time , type, and severity of weather over the next 5 day period.

spell.name: Waiting Awareness II
spell.description: Allows caster to set up a natural "alarm system"; any disturbing activity will cause caster to be alerted.

spell.name: Nature's Awareness True
spell.description: Allows caster to visualize and sense activity in a known fixed area (100' R).

spell.name: Pathlore
spell.description: Caster learns origin and nearest "destination" of any path within 10' R.

spell.name: Nightvision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' on a normal night as if it were daylight. May only be used outside.

spell.name: Tracking I
spell.description: Caster gets a +50 bonus for all Tracking attempts.

spell.name: Path Tale
spell.description: Caster acquires visual image of any user(s) of a given path within a period of 1 hour per level.

spell.name: Pathfinding I
spell.description: Caster learns the location(s) of any path(s) within one mile; give s the nearest point on path, but not the path's course; may only be used outdoors.

spell.name: Tracks Lore
spell.description: Caster learns origin of tracks, and acquires a visual image of the one who left them; provides a +25 bonus when later tracking that particular being or animal.

spell.name: Detect Ambush I
spell.description: Allows caster to detect any hostile, thinking force within 50'; provides direction, but not distance of danger; may only be used in outdoors.

spell.name: Passing Lore
spell.description: Caster acquires visual and aural (sound) image of any being or animal which has passed within a 50' R of a specific object (up to 1 hour per level earlier).

spell.name: Pathfinding V
spell.description: Caster learns the location(s) of any path(s) within five miles; give s the nearest point on path, but not the path's course; may only be used outdoors.

spell.name: Animal Tongues
spell.description: Allows caster to understand and "speak" the language of any one species of animal.

spell.name: Tracks Analysis
spell.description: Cater acquires a visual image of all beings or animals who left tracks in the area; provides a 50 bonus when later tracking a particular being or animal.

spell.name: Plant Tongues
spell.description: Allows caster to understand and "speak" the language of any one plant species.

spell.name: Pathfinding XX
