spell.description: Caster learns the location(s) of any path(s) within twenty miles; give s the nearest point on path, but not the path's course; may only be used outdoors.

spell.name: Detect Ambush II
spell.description: Allows caster to detect any hostile, thinking force within 100'; provides direction, but not distance of danger; may only be used in outdoors.

spell.name: Stonespeech
spell.description: Caster can communicate with any one stone - if it possesses any required animate qualities (e.g., caster could speak to a holy stone which possesses some sort of intelligence).

spell.name: Tracking II
spell.description: As Tracking I, except bonus is +75.

spell.name: Detect Ambush III
spell.description: As Detect Ambush I, except area of effect is 150'R.

spell.name: Path True
spell.description: As Pathfinding I, except range is 1 mi/lvl and exact route(s) within range are ascertained.

spell.name: Detect Ambush True
spell.description: Allows caster to detect any hostile, thinking force within 10' per level; provides direction, but not distance of danger; may only be used in outdoors.

spell.name: Know Path
spell.description: Allows caster to ascertain the proper path to what he seeks (includes the course along that path); e.g., he will always know the best way to Syclax, etc.

spell.name: Tracking True
spell.description: Caster gets a +100 bonus for all Tracking attempts. Will negate any Hide Track spell (except Hide Tracks True).

spell.name: Tracks Ahead
spell.description: Allows caster to know entire course of the tracks in question (i.e., exactly where and how they go); will not negate Hide Tracks True.

spell.name: Clotting I
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding at rate of 1 hit/rnd on one target; for one hour target can move at no more than a walking pace, or bleeding will resume at prior rate.

spell.name: Cut Repair I
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding from one wound that bleeds at a rate of 1 hit /rnd.

spell.name: Minor Vessel Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair one damaged minor blood vessel (a vessel that bleeds at up to two hits/rnd, not major arteries or veins).

spell.name: Clotting V
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding at rate of 5 hit/rnd on one to three targets (total); for one hour target can move at no more than a walking pace, or bleeding will resume at prior rate.

spell.name: Cut Repair III
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding from one wound that bleeds at a rate of 3 hits /rnd (total).

spell.name: Major Vessel Repair I
spell.description: Allows caster to repair one damaged blood vessel of any size, including severed veins and arteries; recovery time is 1 to 10 days, depending on the size and severity of damage. A major vessel is one that bleeds at five hits/rnd or more when severed.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Bone Ways, Muscle Ways, and Organ Ways Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in 10-100 days.

spell.name: Mass Clotting
spell.description: Allows caster to all stop bleeding from any one wound; target can not move at more then a walking rate, or bleeding will resume at prior rate. Caster can may stop bleeding from a number of wounds equal to his level (e.g., a 20th lvl caster can stop bleeding from 20 wounds).

spell.name: Mass Cut Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding from one wound that bleeds at a rate of 1 hits per level per rnd (total).

spell.name: Unclotting
spell.description: Allows caster to remove any one blood clot; will counter Clotting Curse (on the Evil Cleric list, Curses).

spell.name: Major Vessel Repair III
spell.description: Allows caster to repair three damaged blood vessels of any size, including severed veins and arteries; recovery time is 1 to 10 days, depending on the size and severity of damage. A major vessel is one that bleeds at five hits/rnd or more when severed.

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Bone Ways, Muscle Ways, and Organ Ways Joining spells in order to restore functional status; recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Major Vessel Repair V
spell.description: As Major Vessel Repair I, except caster can repair up to 5 veins and/or arteries.

spell.name: Unclotting True
spell.description: As Unclotting, except all blood clots are removed.

spell.name: Regulations
spell.description: Allows caster to regulate his own blood flow and completely eliminate any blood loss without fear of harm; caster may not move.

spell.name: New Blood
spell.description: Caster can restore all of the blood lost from his body; recovery time: 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Blood Disease Cures
spell.description: Caster can eliminate any blood diseases from his body; recovery time: 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Blood Repairs True
spell.description: Caster can use any one of the lower spells on this list in a given round at will.

spell.name: Minor Fracture Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to mend one simple fracture (not compound fractures, shatters, joint damage, etc.) Recovery time is 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Cartilage Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair all carilage damage around one joint. Recovery time is 1-2 hours.

spell.name: Major Fracture Repair
spell.description: As Minor Fracture Repair, except that caster can also repair compound fractures.

spell.name: Skull Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to mend one fracture in his skull (but not a shattered area). Recovery time is 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Joint Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair one broken (but not shattered) joint. Recovery time is 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Minor Fracture Repair True
spell.description: As Minor Fracture Repair, except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach spread limb. Also requires the use of Blood Ways, Muscle Ways, and Organ Ways Joining spells to restore limb to functional status. Limb will be full functional in 1-0 days.

spell.name: Cartilage Repair True
spell.description: As Cartilage Repair, except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Major Fracture Repair True
spell.description: As Major Fracture Repair, except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Skull Repair True
spell.description: As Skull Repair, except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Joint Repair True
spell.description: As Joint Repair, except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Shatter Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any broken or shattered bone. Recovery time is 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Cartilage Regeneration
spell.description: Caster can regenerate any one area of cartilage. Recoverytime is 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Bone Regeneration
spell.description: Caster can regenerate any one bone. Recovery time is 1-10 hours. This spell will not work on the skull.

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: As Joining, except caster must cast the other 3 Healer Joining True and recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Rapid Shatter Repair
spell.description: As Shatter Repair, except recovery time is 5-50 minutes.

spell.name: Rapid Cartilage Regeneration
spell.description: As Cartilage Regeneration, except recovery time is 5-50 minutes.

spell.name: Skull Regeneration
spell.description: As Bone Regeneration, except will only work on the skull.

spell.name: Rapid Bone Regeneration
spell.description: As Bone Regeneration, except recovery time is 5-50 minutes.

spell.name: Shatter Repair True
spell.description: As Shatter Repair, except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Cartilage Regeneration True
spell.description: As Cartilage Regeneration, except the caster can regenerate all of the lost cartilage in his body. Recovery time is 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Bone Regeneration True
spell.description: As Bone Regeneration, except the caster can regenerate all of the lost bones in his body (including the skull). Recovery time is 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Skeletal Regeneration True
spell.description: Caster can recovery all of the lost bone and/or cartilage in his body. Recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Transfer
spell.description: Caster transfers one injury or addiction from the target to himself. The power point cost for this spell is equal to the cost of the healing spell necessary to heal the injury. This transfer spell must be cast multiple times for multiple injuries. If a single wound would take more than one healing spell to cast, this spell must be cast multiple times for the entire wound to heal (though the Healer may choose to not transfer all the wounds). Note that the Healer does not have to know the spell needed to heal the wound before he can transfer the wound. In the case of concussion hits, the caster must decide how many hits he wants to heal and then transfer according the the healing spell that could heal that many points with one spell. To transfer a severed limb, the caster must know all 4 Joining spells and he must spend 28 PPs (7 for each Joining spell). However, the caster may choose to only spend 7 PPs and leave the target with a stub (i.e., only casting the Joining spell from Blood Ways).

spell.name: Disease Purification
spell.description: Stops infection and/or spread of a disease after the disease is aquired. No further damage will occur in the uninfected area of the body.

spell.name: Poison Purification
spell.description: Neutralizes any 1 poison in the caster's system. Note: Damage already sustained is not cured.

spell.name: Self Preservation
spell.description: Caster's "dead" body is preserved for the duration of the spell. This prevents any further deterioration (i.e., stat deterioration) or damage from already existing wounds. The caster will be in coma and healing spells will continue to work (as they are all subcpnscious). This spell will not prevent the caster's soul from leaving his body (i.e., he must be healed to above the "death" theshold in a short amount of time or his soul will leave his body). If the soul leaves the body before the body is healed, only Lifegiving can return the soul.

spell.name: Ease Addiction I
spell.description: The caster is only check for withdrawal from a specific addiction once every two weeks (instead of once per week).

spell.name: Heal Addiction I
spell.description: The caster has one addiction level lowered by one.

spell.name: Ease Addiction II
spell.description: As Easy Addiction I, except the target must only check once per month.

spell.name: Heal Addiction II
spell.description: As Heal Addiction I, except the level is lowered by two.

spell.name: Mind Disease Cures
spell.description: Caster is cured of any 1 mind disease. Recovery time is 1-10 days.

spell.name: Heal Addiction III
spell.description: As Heal Addiction I, except the level is lowered by three.

spell.name: Long Transfer
spell.description: As Transfer, except the target can be up to 1' per level away.

spell.name: Cure Disease
spell.description: One disease is removed from the castr's system.

spell.name: Heal Addiction IV
spell.description: As Heal Addiction I, except the level is lowered by four.

spell.name: Cure Poison
spell.description: One poison is removed from the caster's system.

spell.name: Unpsychosis
spell.description: Allows the caster to repair a minor psychosis (recovery time is 1-10 hours). Minor psychosis include mild to moderate phobias.

spell.name: Heal Addiction V
spell.description: As Heal Addiction I, except the level is lowered by five.

spell.name: Mind Disease Cures True
spell.description: As Mind Disease Cures, except recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Heal Addiction X
spell.description: As Heal Addiction I, except the level is lowered by ten.

spell.name: Lord Heal Addiction
spell.description: As Heal Addiction I, except the level is lowered by twenty.

spell.name: Heal Addiction True
spell.description: As Heal Addiction I, except the level is lowered by one per level of the caster.

spell.name: Addiction Mastery
spell.description: As Heal Addiction True, except affects all addictions the target has.

notes.note: The caster can only cast these spells once per target until the caster increases his experience level. I.e. a single addiction can only be healed using Heal Addiction I once per level etc. This does not affect the Transfer spells, see Spell Law 7.1.4 for details.

spell.name: Sprain Repair
spell.description: Allows the caster to repair one sprain.

spell.name: Muscle Repair I
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) one damaged muscle; recovery time is 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Tendon Repair I
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) one damaged tendon; recovery time is 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Muscle Repair III
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) three damaged muscles; recovery time is 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Tendon Repair III
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) three damaged tendons; recovery time is 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Bone Ways, Organ Ways, and Blood Ways Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in 1-10 days.

spell.name: Muscle Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) one damaged muscle; recovery time is instantaneous.

spell.name: Tendon Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) one damaged tendon; recovery time is instantaneous.

spell.name: Mass Muscle Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) one damaged muscle per level; recovery time is instantaneous.

spell.name: Muscle Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate one muscle; regrowth takes one to ten hours, depending on the extent of loss.

spell.name: Mass Tendon Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) one per level damaged tendon; recovery time is instantaneous.

spell.name: Tendon Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate one tendon; regrowth takes one to ten hours, depending on the extent of loss.

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Bone Ways, Organ Ways, and Blood Ways Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Rapid Muscle Regeneration
spell.description: As Muscle Regeneration, except recovery time is 1-10 minutes.

spell.name: Rapid Tendon Regeneration
spell.description: As Muscle Regeneration, except recovery time is 1-10 minutes.

spell.name: Regeneration True
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate one muscle or tendon; recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Total Muscle Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate all of his muscles; regrowth takes one to ten hours, depending on the extent of loss.

spell.name: Total Tendon Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate all of his tendons; regrowth takes one to ten hours, depending on the extent of loss.

spell.name: Mass Repairs True
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate one muscle or tendon per level; recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Nasal Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any nose damage short of complete nose loss.

spell.name: Minor Nerve Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair minor nerve damage; recovery takes 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Minor Ear Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any exterior ear damage including ear loss (regeneration takes 1 to 10 hours).

spell.name: Minor Eye Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any minor eye damage (e.g., corneal scratch or removal of foreign object).

spell.name: Major Nerve Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair major nerve damage; recovery time is 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Major Ear Repair
spell.description: The caster can repair any exterior and interior damage. Recovery time is 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Bone Ways, Muscle Ways, and Blood Ways Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in 1-10 days.

spell.name: Major Eye Repair
spell.description: Caster can repair any eye damage short of total eye loss (e.g., eye's destruction precludes repair); recovery time is 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Nerve Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to repair major nerve damage; recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Organ Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any organ (except the brain) that has not been completely destroyed; recovery time is 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Paralysis Cures
spell.description: Caster can cure any paralysis problem; recovery time 1 to 10 days.

spell.name: Mass Nerve Regeneration
spell.description: Caster can regenerate all the nerves in his body (outside brain area); recovery time: 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Major Nerve Repair True
spell.description: As Major Nerve Repair, except that recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Bone Ways, Muscle Ways, and Blood Ways Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Rapid Paralysis Cures
spell.description: As Paralysis Cures, except recovery time is 5-50 minutes

spell.name: Rapid Mass Nerve Regeneration
spell.description: AS Mass Nerve Regeneration, except recovery time is 5-50 minutes.

spell.name: Brain Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair brain damage (such as that caused by a skull fracture, etc. at discretion of the GM). Experience lost by brain damage to the wounded being (the one from whom the damage is transferred) is not restored. Should the Healer have brain damage inflicted directly upon him (e.g., he is stuck in the head), he may suffer memory and or experience loss; this may result in the Healer's inability to cast this spell. Recovery time is 1 to 10 hours.

spell.name: Organ Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to completely regenerate lost organ; process takes 1 to 10 hours. Recovery time 1 to 10 days. Brain regeneration is not permitted.

spell.name: Paralysis Cures True
spell.description: Caster can cure any paralysis problem; recovery time is instantaneous.

spell.name: Reuniting
spell.description: Caster may reunite his soul with his body, provided the latter is functional. To restore a dead target to life, a Healer would first have to heal all of the latter's wounds (without "killing" himself), and then restore the target's soul by giving up his own (for the target this process operates like the 20th level Lifegiving spell on the Cleric Base list, Life Mastery). While technically alive, but without his soul, the Healer would be affected as if he had been "absolved" (per Absolution Pure, on the Cleric Base List, Channels); thus he could take no conscious actions and he would be at -75 for all conscious actions and he would be at -75 for all subconscious actions. He may regain his own soul through the use of this spell or through someone else casting the appropriate spell.

spell.name: Heal I
spell.description: Caster is healed of 1-10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief I
spell.description: Will heal one area of mild frostbite or 1st degree burn.

spell.name: Stun Relief I
spell.description: Caster is relieved of one round's worth of accumulated stun effects.

spell.name: Regenerate I
spell.description: Will reduce damage the caster has by one hit every round as long as caster concentrates. If caster is unconscious this spell will operate without concentration.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief II
spell.description: Will heal two areas of mild frostbite or 1st degree burn or one area of moderate damage (e.g., 2nd degree burn) are healed.

spell.name: Awake
spell.description: Caster is instantly awake.

spell.name: Heal V
spell.description: Caster is healed of 5-50 concussion hits.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief III
spell.description: Will heal three areas of mild frostbite or 1st degree burn or one area of severe damage (e.g., 3rd degree burn) are healed. Or a combination of one mild and 1 moderate area can be healed.

spell.name: Stun Relief III
spell.description: Caster is relieved of three round's worth of accumulated stun effects.

spell.name: Regenerate II
spell.description: Will reduce damage the caster has by two hits every round as long as caster concentrates. If caster is unconscious this spell will operate without concentration.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief V
spell.description: Will heal five areas of mild frostbite or 1st degree burn and one area of severe damage (e.g., 3rd degree burn) are healed. Or a combination of one mild and two moderate areas can be healed. Or one moderate and one severe or etc.

spell.name: Heal X
spell.description: Caster is healed of 10-100 concussion hits.

spell.name: Stun Relief V
spell.description: Caster is relieved of five round's worth of accumulated stun effects.

spell.name: Regenerate III
spell.description: Will reduce damage the caster has by three hits every round as long as caster concentrates. If caster is unconscious this spell will operate without concentration.

spell.name: Heal XV
spell.description: As Heal I, except caster can heal 15d10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Stun Relief X
spell.description: As Stun Relief I, except caster is relieved of 10 rounds of accumulated stun effects.

spell.name: Heal XX
spell.description: Caster is healed of 20-200 concussion hits.

spell.name: Heal True
spell.description: Caster is healed of all concussive hits damage.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief True
spell.description: Will heal all areas of frostbite / burn damage.

spell.name: Stun Relief True
spell.description: Caster is relieved of all accumulated stun effects.

spell.name: Detect Curse
spell.description: Detects a curse on an item or person.

spell.name: Nightvision Curse
spell.description: Target can see at night as if it were day, but he can only see in the day as if it were the darkest night.

spell.name: Ulcer Curse
spell.description: Target can only eat bread or dairy products; anything else will aggravate his ulcer (unless he makes a RR) and he will be incapaciated for 1 to 8 hours.

spell.name: Curse of Dake
spell.description: Target cannot move faster than a walking pace on his own (he may be carried or ride at a faster pace).

spell.name: Green Tongue
spell.description: Target can only eat green leaves; eating other food will incapacitate him (unless he makes a RR) for 1 to 8 hours.

spell.name: Sea Curse
spell.description: The target will never voluntarily swim, enter any water (even a bath), or get in a boat.

spell.name: Curse of Furd
spell.description: All of target's fumble/failure ranges (weapon attacks, spell casting, and skill resolution) are doubled.

spell.name: Excommunication
spell.description: Target losses all Channeling power points; thus he cannot cast any Channeling spells (even through bonus items). A hybrid spell user of Channeling (e.g., Sorcerer or Astrologer) would lose only half of his PPs.

spell.name: Learning of Mins
spell.description: Target can only speak and write his native language.

spell.name: Curse of Shar Bu
spell.description: The target is sterile and impotent.

spell.name: Power Leach
spell.description: Target losses 1 power point every 10 min. Power points are recovered in a normal fashion (usually a sleep period), but begin to leak away as soon as they are regained.

spell.name: Beauty of Arraer
spell.description: Target's appearance is raised to the maximum possible (and then some). If anyone sees the uncovered face of the target or gets within 3' (and is of the opposite sexual persuasion and fails a RR), they will attempt to possess and carry off the target (they will fight if necessary). Certain persons will get modifications to their RRs (eunuchs, hedonists, tacos, hosers, icers, etc.).

spell.name: Clotting Curse
spell.description: Target's blood will coagulate and create a blood clot around the area of any cut or wound. the clot will cut off circulation to the area fed by the given vessel and the target will lose the affected body section after 2 to 20 minutes due to system damage (e.g., a thigh wound might ultimately mean loss of leg; a neck wound would be fatal).

spell.name: Ugliness of Orn
spell.description: Target's appearance is lowered to 1 (in any system). If a person sees the uncovered face of the target (or gets within 3'), he must make a RR: if he fails by 51 or more, he attacks the target. Even if the viewer is successful in his RR, he will experience extreme distaste (i.e., distain) for the target. For example, if the target went home after failing against this curse, his mother might resist (she gets a large mod), but she might still make him sleep in the barn and eat on the porch.

spell.name: Curse of Oli
spell.description: Target will lie 50% of the time, regardless of topic.

spell.name: Curse of Penth
spell.description: Target may only speak the truth.

spell.name: Rewounding
spell.description: Once per day (at a random time), the target will experience the pain from an old wound. For new characters, treat this as an 'A' Krush critical, 40% of the time and a d10 concussion hits the other 50% of the time. Alternative the GM can reopen a specific old wound.

spell.name: Running Death
spell.description: Target will run until he dies of exhaustion; he may be restrained, but whenever freed, he will begin to run again.

spell.name: Friendslayer
spell.description: Every time the target is in a combat situation near friend(s) (within 10') there is a 10% chance each round (non-cumulative) that he will attack one of his friends (random determination) and attempt to kill him. For these purposes a "friend" is any companion or associate.

spell.name: Excommunication True
spell.description: Target losses all Channeling power points; thus he cannot cast any Channeling spells (even through bonus items). A hybrid spell user of Channeling (e.g., Sorcerer or Astrologer) would lose only half of his PPs.

spell.name: Dark Thoughts
spell.description: Target can not attack any "evil" creature and the target learns all evil languages and the target will obey the commands of any evil person who is 10+ levels higher than himself.

spell.name: Dark Stunning
spell.description: Caster points his arm (elbow locked and fist clenched) at the target and channels raw power (source is usually a deity); target is stunned.

spell.name: Channels I
spell.description: When this spell is cast, the 1st lvl spell that the caster begins to cast the next round will be "Channeled" to another spell user of the Channeling realm. The "channeled" spell is transmitted to the other spell user when it would normally take effect, and must be used by him immediately. All normal restrictions on the transmitted spell apply. The caster of the transmitter must be able to see the receiver or know exactly where he is (direction and distance, or specific place). The receiver must know exactly when the spell is coming. For example, if a Cleric was at a certain altar at a certain time (midnight of full moon) ready to receive a spell; then another spell user or deity could use Channels to send him a spell (if he knew where the altar was and the correct time).

spell.name: Dark Sleep
spell.description: Caster points his arm (elbow locked and fist clenched) at the target and channels raw power (source is usually a deity); target falls into a deep sleep.

spell.name: Channels III
spell.description: When this spell is cast, the 2nd or 3rd lvl spell that the caster begins to cast the next round will be "Channeled" to another spell user of the Channeling realm. The "channeled" spell is transmitted to the other spell user when it would normally take effect, and must be used by him immediately. All normal restrictions on the transmitted spell apply. The caster of the transmitter must be able to see the receiver or know exactly where he is (direction and distance, or specific place). The receiver must know exactly when the spell is coming. For example, if a Cleric was at a certain altar at a certain time (midnight of full moon) ready to receive a spell; then another spell user or deity could use Channels to send him a spell (if he knew where the altar was and the correct time).

spell.name: Channel Opening I
spell.description: Caster can make contact with any 1 known target he is acquainted with. This spell will enable the caster to learn the specific location (direction and distance only) of the being. This spell is often used with Channels spells.

spell.name: Dark Blinding
spell.description: Caster points his arm (elbow locked and fist clenched) at the target and channels raw power (source is usually a deity); target is blinded.

spell.name: Black Channel I
spell.description: Caster may cast one of the following Black Channels spells.1. Thrayn's Touch ( R:Touch, RR mod -50)Disrupts Body Cells; Foe operates at -50.2. Eye of Nur (R: 25', RR mod -30)Knocks foe out, 25 hits.3. Uonic Curse (R: 50', RR mod -25)Any one limb useless for 1 - 10 days.4.Tauric Finger (R: 50', RR mod -10)Blinds for 1 - 10 Days; +10 hits.5. Londarin's Hand (R: 100', RR mod none)Nerve disruption; foe is sent into a coma.The GM must determine which one(s) may be cast, based on: culture, background, deity served, etc. The caster might be allowed to pick and choose.

spell.name: Channels V
spell.description: When this spell is cast, the 4th or 5th lvl spell that the caster begins to cast the next round will be "Channeled" to another spell user of the Channeling realm. The "channeled" spell is transmitted to the other spell user when it would normally take effect, and must be used by him immediately. All normal restrictions on the transmitted spell apply. The caster of the transmitter must be able to see the receiver or know exactly where he is (direction and distance, or specific place). The receiver must know exactly when the spell is coming. For example, if a Cleric was at a certain altar at a certain time (midnight of full moon) ready to receive a spell; then another spell user or deity could use Channels to send him a spell (if he knew where the altar was and the correct time).

spell.name: Absolution
spell.description: Target's "soul" is torn from his body; it remains in whatever place "souls" go for 1 week/10 failure. The soul can be returned early only through the spell Lifegiving. Target is unconscious until soul is restored; even for subconscious activity, he is at -75.

spell.name: Black Channel II
spell.description: Caster may cast one of the following Black Channels spells.1. Womaw Finger (R: 25', RR mod -30)Destroys muscles and tendons in legs.2. Urulic Eye (R: 50, RR mod -25)Removes foe's hands.3. Finger of Sart (R: 75', RR mod -15)Paralyzes foe entirely.4. Channels of Crey (R: 100', RR mod -10)Severe brain disorder; convulsive spasms, foe operates at -75.5. Umli Breeze (R: 50', RR mod none)Sends foe into a permanent coma; +10 hits.The GM must determine which one(s) may be cast, based on: culture, background, deity served, etc. The caster might be allowed to pick and choose.

spell.name: Channel Opening II
spell.description: As Channel Opening I, except for the range.

spell.name: Channels VII
spell.description: As Channels I, except up to a seventh level spell may be transmitted

spell.name: Channels X
spell.description: As Channels I, except up to a tenth level spell may be transmitted

spell.name: Absolution Pure
spell.description: Target's "soul" is torn from his body. The soul can only be returned through the spell Lifegiving. Target is unconscious until soul is restored; even for subconscious activity, he is at -75.

spell.name: Black Channel III
spell.description: Caster may cast one of the following Black Channels spells.1. Black Finger (R: 25', RR mod -50)Erases facial area.2. Desert Curse (R: 50', RR mod -30)Blood boils.3. Death's Wave (R: 100', RR mod none)Liquifies skeleton.The GM must determine which one(s) may be cast, based on: culture, background, deity served, etc. The caster might be allowed to pick and choose.

spell.name: Dark Absolution
spell.description: Target's "soul" is torn from his body. The soul utterly destroyed. No coming back from this.

spell.name: Unholy Gate
spell.description: Opens a direct channel to the caster's deity; results depend on the deity's personality, motives and powers. Any spell the deity can cast can be transmitted through the gate.

spell.name: Afterthoughts
spell.description: Allows the caster virtual total recall of any conversation or writing he encountered within a period of days equal to his level.

spell.name: Detect Good
spell.description: Detects "true good" in an animate or inanimate target; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Detect Blessing
spell.description: Detects blessings on an animate or inanimate target; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Detect Emotion
spell.description: Detects extreme emotions in the living mind of a target, or in an object forged under extreme emotion. Caster can concentrate on a 5'R area each round.

spell.name: Dark Lore I
spell.description: Caster can ascertain the origin point and nature of any one "of darkness" or "of evil"; will not give specific capabilities.

spell.name: Detect Holy
spell.description: Detects "holy" in an animate or inanimate target; caster can concentrate on a 10' R area each round.

spell.name: Dream I
spell.description: Caster has a dream relating to a topic decided upon just before retiring; limited to once per night.

spell.name: Bless Tales
spell.description: Caster can determine the author, origin, and complete history of a given blessing; he also learns the nature and specific powers.

spell.name: Dark Lore II
spell.description: Caster can ascertain the origin point and nature of any two "of darkness" or "of evil"; will not give specific capabilities. Or he can get for one item the above information plus the exact significance of the item.

spell.name: Dreams II
spell.description: Caster has up to two dreams relating to up to two topics decided upon just before retiring; limited to once per night.

spell.name: Emotion Analysis
spell.description: Caster can determine the nature and origin of active extreme emotion found within any one target (inanimate or animate): the degree and other details of such emotion can also be acquired.

spell.name: Dark Lore III
spell.description: Caster can ascertain the origin point and nature of any three "of darkness" or "of evil"; will not give specific capabilities. Or he can get for one item the above information plus the exact significance of the item, specific capabilities and the name of the creator.

spell.name: Dreams III
spell.description: Caster has up to three dreams relating to up to three topics decided upon just before retiring; limited to once per night.

spell.name: Light Lore I
spell.description: As Dark Lore I, except caster can ascertain the origin point and nature of any 1 item "of light" or "of good".

spell.name: Light Lore II
spell.description: As Light Lore I, except caster can ascertain the origin point and nature of any 2 items of good or light or caster can determine the nature, origin point and the exact significance of any 1 item of light or good.

spell.name: Black Lore
spell.description: Caster can ascertain the exact nature, origin, purpose, and history of any one item of evil or darkness; it allows caster to visualize all who have possessed the item.

spell.name: Light Lore III
spell.description: As Light Lore I, except that caster can ascertain the origin point and nature of any 3 "holy items" or caster can determine the age, origin point, name of the creature and nature of any 1 "holy item". Caster also learns item's specific capabilities.

spell.name: White Lore
spell.description: AS Black Lore, except can only be used on an item "of light" or "of good".

spell.name: Black Lore Mastery
spell.description: Caster can ascertain the exact nature, origin, purpose, and history of all items of evil or darkness within 100'; it allows caster to visualize all who have possessed the item.

spell.name: Chills
spell.description: Target gets a cold; roll for severity (high is bad for target).

spell.name: Grey Vision
spell.description: Target is color-blind.

spell.name: Smelling Loss
spell.description: Target has no sense of smell.

spell.name: Hearing Loss
spell.description: Target has no sense of hearing.

spell.name: Tongue Rot
spell.description: Over the course of one week the target's tongue will rot away and he will not be able to speak.

spell.name: Asthma
spell.description: Target gets severe asthma; for every round of physical exertion (melee, running, firing a bow, rowing, etc.) the target will have a -5 mod to any activity involving physical exertion. When this reaches -100 the target lapses into unconscious. Each -5 mod requires three rounds of rest to eradicate.

spell.name: Leprosy
spell.description: Target gets leprosy, which causes a gradual loss of feeling in the extremities (and blood flow); this doubles the effectiveness of wounds in these areas.

spell.name: Minor Allergy
spell.description: The target becomes slightly allergic to a substance (not himself) of the caster's choosing; when in the presence of this substance, the target will be at -30 on all activity.

spell.name: Root Rot
spell.description: The roots of any one plant wither and die and no new roots can grow. The plant will eventually die.

spell.name: Hemophilia
spell.description: The target becomes a hemophiliac; any "hits/round" and concussion hits are doubled; healing hits requires double the normal expenditure.

spell.name: Malaria
spell.description: The target contracts malaria; after the initial bout of high fever, delirium, coma and incapacitation (lasting between 3 days and 2 weeks), the target will be subject to random "relapses" similar to the initial bout.

spell.name: Withering Hand
spell.description: Caster may instantly kill any one plant he touches.

spell.name: Epilepsy
spell.description: The target becomes an epileptic. In a tension situation there is a 5% chance he will go into an epileptic fit. If someone threats them (i.e., holds them down and places an object in his mouth), he has only a 1% chance of dying; if not, he has a 10% chance of dying.

spell.name: Pneumonia
spell.description: The target contracts pneumonia. If the target is kept warm and completely immobile for two weeks, he will have only a 25% chance of dying (much higher if not treated). The chance of dying is lowered 5% for every 10 points by which target's Constitution exceeds 50.

spell.name: Major Allergy
spell.description: The target becomes slightly allergic to a substance (not himself) of the caster's choosing; when in the presence of this substance, the target will be at -60 on all activity.

spell.name: Carrier I
spell.description: The target suffers any one of the diseases from this list (fifth level or lower) chosen by the caster. In addition, caster is contagious. All who come into contact (5'R) of the target make an RR (with a +26 modifier; modifier drops to #0 when touching the target; drops to -26 with intime contact with target). If the original target makes his RR, he does not suffer the effects, but is still a carrier of the disease. All people who catch the disease from the target are not contagious.

spell.name: Elephantiasis
spell.description: The target gets elephantiasis. One of his extremities swells and grows up to 5x normal size.

spell.name: Carrier II
spell.description: As Carrier I, except caster may select any disease from this list (10th level or lower)

spell.name: Leukemia
spell.description: The target catches leukemia. Target will weaken at a rate of 2% per day (-2/day, cumulative to all activity); when the total reaches 100%, the target is dead.

spell.name: Carrier III
spell.description: As Carrier I, except caster may select any disease from this list (15th level or lower)

spell.name: Rabies
spell.description: the target gets rabies. After 21 days of no visible effect, the disease sets in. The target's organs contract; the foams at the mouth, becomes very thirsty and violent; and any one he bites or scratches must resist or catch the disease. The target dies five to seven days after disease's onset.

spell.name: Plague
spell.description: The target gets the "plague". If he fails his RR, he will die 95% of the time (in 10 minutes); the other 5% of the time he believes that he resisted, but becomes a carrier instead. Anyone coming within 5' of a carrier must resist or face the same chances as the original target.

spell.name: Animate Dead I
spell.description: Caster can cause any dead body (within 50% of his own mass) to rise up and move. The caster must concentrate for the body to perform action; if he stops concentration, the body will stand motionless. The body can be maneuvered at -25, and can melee with a -20 OB. Body cannot have been dead more than one day. (See list description.)

spell.name: Control Undead I
spell.description: Caster can control one Class I Undead. The Undead's capabilities must be defined by the system used (see list description).

spell.name: Undead Mastery
spell.description: Caster may master 1 level of Undead per level of the caster. This spell bust be cast separately on each Undead. A mastered Undead allows the caster to control this specific undead without concentration. If the Undead is ever more than 10' per level from the master, this spell is dispelled. When this spell is cast, there is a flat 5% chance per Class of Undead that the Undead will resist the spell.

spell.name: Animate Dead II
spell.description: Caster can cause up to 2 dead bodies (within 50% of his own mass) to rise up and move. The caster must concentrate for the bodies to perform action; if he stops concentration, the body will stand motionless. The bodies can be maneuvered at -25, and can melee with a -20 OB. Body cannot have been dead more than one day. (See list description.) If he raises only one body, it can be maneuvered with a -15 and perform melee with a -10 OB.

spell.name: Create Undead I
spell.description: Given a body that has been dead less than one week, the caster can turn the body into a Class I Undead. The Undead will attempt to attack the closes living being (if uncontrolled), but can take no other activity other than moving to the being and attacking. If controlled, the Undead will do anything (within its capabilities) the the caster wills. The Undead can be Dispelled, Repelled, or just smashed into little pieces.

spell.name: Control Undead II
spell.description: Caster can control one Class II Undead or 2 Class 1 or etc. The Undead's capabilities must be defined by the system used (see list description).

spell.name: Animate Dead III
spell.description: Caster can cause up to 3 dead bodies (within 50% of his own mass) to rise up and move. The caster must concentrate for the bodies to perform action; if he stops concentration, the body will stand motionless. The bodies can be maneuvered at -25, and can melee with a -20 OB. Body cannot have been dead more than one day. (See list description.) If he raises only one body, it can be maneuvered with a -5 and perform melee with a +0 OB.

spell.name: Create Undead II
spell.description: Given a body that has been dead less than one week, the caster can turn the body into a Class II Undead or 2 Class I Undead. The Undead will attempt to attack the closes living being (if uncontrolled), but can take no other activity other than moving to the being and attacking. If controlled, the Undead will do anything (within its capabilities) that the caster wills. The Undead can be Dispelled, Repelled, or just smashed into little pieces.

spell.name: Control Undead III
spell.description: Caster can control one Class III Undead or 3 Class 1 or etc. The Undead's capabilities must be defined by the system used (see list description).

spell.name: Animate Dead IV
spell.description: Caster can cause up to 4 dead bodies (within 50% of his own mass) to rise up and move. The caster must concentrate for the bodies to perform action; if he stops concentration, the body will stand motionless. The bodies can be maneuvered at -25, and can melee with a -20 OB. Body cannot have been dead more than one day. (See list description.) If he raises only one body, it can be maneuvered with a +5 and perform melee with a +10 OB.

spell.name: Create Undead III
spell.description: Given a body that has been dead less than one week, the caster can turn the body into a Class III Undead or 3 Class I Undead, etc. The Undead will attempt to attack the closes living being (if uncontrolled), but can take no other activity other than moving to the being and attacking. If controlled, the Undead will do anything (within its capabilities) that the caster wills. The Undead can be Dispelled, Repelled, or just smashed into little pieces.

spell.name: Animate Dead V
spell.description: Caster can cause up to 5 dead bodies (within 50% of his own mass) to rise up and move. The caster must concentrate for the bodies to perform action; if he stops concentration, the body will stand motionless. The bodies can be maneuvered at -25, and can melee with a -20 OB. Body cannot have been dead more than one day. (See list description.) If he raises only one body, it can be maneuvered with a +10 and perform melee with a +20 OB.

spell.name: Control Undead IV
spell.description: Caster can control one Class IV Undead or 4 Class 1 or etc. The Undead's capabilities must be defined by the system used (see list description).

spell.name: Animate Dead VI
spell.description: Caster can cause up to 6 dead bodies (within 50% of his own mass) to rise up and move. The caster must concentrate for the bodies to perform action; if he stops concentration, the body will stand motionless. The bodies can be maneuvered at -25, and can melee with a -20 OB. Body cannot have been dead more than one day. (See list description.) If he raises only one body, it can be maneuvered with a +15 and perform melee with a +30 OB.

spell.name: Create Undead IV
spell.description: Given a body that has been dead less than one week, the caster can turn the body into a Class IV Undead or 4 Class I Undead, etc. The Undead will attempt to attack the closes living being (if uncontrolled), but can take no other activity other than moving to the being and attacking. If controlled, the Undead will do anything (within its capabilities) that the caster wills. The Undead can be Dispelled, Repelled, or just smashed into little pieces.

spell.name: Order Undead
spell.description: Any undead that is currently mastered (with the Undead Mastery spell) will follow simple, straight forward orders. This cancels the Undead Mastery spell. After completing the order (which it will attempt to do for up to 1 day per level of the caster), the Undead returns to a normal Undead status.

spell.name: Control Undead V
spell.description: Caster can control one Class V Undead or 5 Class 1 or etc. The Undead's capabilities must be defined by the system used (see list description).

spell.name: Create Undead V
spell.description: Given a body that has been dead less than one week, the caster can turn the body into a Class V Undead or 5 Class I Undead, etc. The Undead will attempt to attack the closes living being (if uncontrolled), but can take no other activity other than moving to the being and attacking. If controlled, the Undead will do anything (within its capabilities) that the caster wills. The Undead can be Dispelled, Repelled, or just smashed into little pieces.

spell.name: Control Undead True
spell.description: Caster can control any one Undead or any one Undead (Class V or lower) without concentration or all Class III or lower Undead within a 100' R. Range for controlling a single Undead is extended to 300'.

spell.name: Ritual of Black Eternity
spell.description: This ritual s considered to be one of the most evil of all magics. Using it, the caster transforms himself into a Lich, one of the most evil of the Undead. During the ritual, the caster's vital organs are "transferred" into a ready container (jar, box, item, etc.). If the spell succeeds (failure results in final death), the caster will be totally sustained by magic and will have slipped between the realm of life and unlife. He can only be irrevocably destroyed by the destruction of the container and his organs.

spell.name: Create Undead True
spell.description: Given a body that has been dead less than one week, the caster can turn the body into any Undead that exists in the world system in use (e.g., ring wraiths, vampires, etc.). The Undead will attempt to attack the closes living being (if uncontrolled), but can take no other activity other than moving to the being and attacking. If controlled, the Undead will do anything (within its capabilities) that the caster wills. The Undead can be Dispelled, Repelled, or just smashed into little pieces.

spell.name: Wounding I
spell.description: Causes d10 concussion hits of damage.

spell.name: Cramp
spell.description: Causes one muscle to cramp in the target. Target will be at -10% to activity per 10 failure.

spell.name: Bleeding I
spell.description: Target will bleed at the rate of 1 hit per round.

spell.name: Wounding III
spell.description: As Wounding I, except does 3d10 concussion hits of damage.

spell.name: Sensory Damage I
spell.description: One external sensory organ (e.g. eye, nose, ear etc.) is damages. Foe will operate without that organ until healed. In addition, he will have a -10 modification per 10 failure for all actions that partially use that organ (-100 for all actions involving that organ directly).

spell.name: Fracture
spell.description: One of target's limb suffers a minor fracture.

spell.name: Bleeding III
spell.description: As Bleeding I, except target bleeds for 3 hits per round.

spell.name: Wounding V
spell.description: As Wounding I, except does 5d10 concussion hits of damage.

spell.name: Sensory Damage II
spell.description: As Sensory Damage I, except 2 organs are affected.

spell.name: Paralysis
spell.description: The area touched by the caster on the target is paralyzed.

spell.name: Wounding VII
spell.description: As Wounding I, except does 7d10 concussion hits of damage.

spell.name: Drain Soul I
spell.description: Target is drained of d10 Temporary Constitution points. If the target's Constitution drops to 0 or below he becomes a Class I Created Undead.

spell.name: Energy Drain I
spell.description: Target loses 1 hit per round that the caster concentrates (and remains within 2' of the target). As each point is drained, the caster is restored 1 point (up to his maximum).

spell.name: Bleeding V
spell.description: As Bleeding I, except target bleeds for 5 hits per round.

spell.name: Wounding X
spell.description: As Wounding I, except does 10d10 concussion hits of damage.

spell.name: Energy Drain II
spell.description: As Energy Drain I, except drains 2 hits per round.

spell.name: Drain Soul II
spell.description: As Drain Soil I, except drains 2d10 points and target becomes a Class II Crated Undead if Constitution drops to 0 (or below).

spell.name: Wounding XV
spell.description: As Wounding I, except does 15d10 concussion hits of damage.

spell.name: Drain Soul True
spell.description: As Drain Soul I, except drains 1 point per level of the caster and target becomes a Class III Created Undead of Constitution drops to 0 (or below).

spell.name: Bleeding True
spell.description: As Bleeding I, except target bleeds for 1 hit for each 5 levels of the caster.

spell.name: Wounding True
spell.description: As Wounding I, except target loses all his hits and takes an additional 1 hit for each level of the caster.

notes.note: All spells on this list have a range of 2'. In melee, it is presumed that you are within 2' of your opponent.

spell.name: Text Analysis I
spell.description: Caster can read text written in an unknown language, but can only understand basic concepts of it.

spell.name: Stone Analysis
spell.description: Gives nature and origin of natural stone, and when and how stone was obtained and worked.

spell.name: Metal Analysis
spell.description: Gives nature and origin of metal, and when and how metal was obtained and worked.

spell.name: Gas Analysis
spell.description: Gives nature and origin of gas, and when and how gas was obtained and worked.

spell.name: Text Analysis II
spell.description: Caster can read text written in an unknown language, this gives a complete technical analysis (vocabulary and syntax) but not an understanding of idioms (jargon), implications, or cultural references.

spell.name: Liquid Analysis
spell.description: Gives nature and origin of liquid, and when and how liquid was obtained and worked.

spell.name: Delving
spell.description: Gives significant details about an item's construction and purpose (not specific powers).

spell.name: Spell Analysis
spell.description: Provides analysis of an active spell, giving its duration and the profession of its caster and its type (not its level or exactly what spell it is).

spell.name: Death Analysis
spell.description: Gives information concerning a being's death (weapon, spell, time since, etc.); must be cast in place of death (within 24 hours) or in the presence of the body (no time limit).

spell.name: Text Analysis III
spell.description: Caster can read text written in an unknown language, everything but implications is known (e.g., answers to riddles are not known automatically).

spell.name: Power Analysis
spell.description: One item, person, or place may be examined to see if it has power, which realm the power is from, a general idea of its origin, and its basic configuration.

spell.name: Conveyance
spell.description: Caster's awareness leaves his body (which is inactive) and may travel at 1 mile/min; however it can only travel 10'/round when in solid material or when observing the world. If the caster overstays the duration, he must make a RR modified by -50 or die (attack level is equal to the number of rounds overstayed).

spell.name: Death's Delving
spell.description: Gives information concerning a being's death (weapon, spell, time since, etc.) and a visual image of the killer. Also, a vague reason for death (e.g., revenge, robbery, accident, etc.). Must be cast in place of death (within 24 hours) or in the presence of the body (no time limit).

spell.name: Analysis
spell.description: Any of the lower level spells on this list (except for Conveyance) may be used on one item, person, or place.

spell.name: Mass Analysis
spell.description: Any of the lower level spells on this list (except for Conveyance) may be used on one item, person, or place per round.

spell.name: Power Analysis True
spell.description: One item, person, or place may be examined to see if it has power, which realm the power it is from, exact origin, creator, and detailed purpose are given.

spell.name: Conveyance True
spell.description: Caster's awareness leaves his body (which is inactive) and may travel at 10 mile/min; however it can only travel 50'/round when in solid material or when observing the world. If the caster overstays the duration, he must make a RR modified by -50 or die (attack level is equal to the number of rounds overstayed).

spell.name: Detect Essence
spell.description: Detects any active spells or items from the Essence realm; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Detect Mentalism
spell.description: Detects any active spells or items from the Mentalism realm; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Detect Channeling
spell.description: Detects any active spells or items from the Channeling realm; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Detect Invisible
spell.description: Detects any invisible things; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round. All attacks against something so detected are modified by -50.

spell.name: Detect Traps
spell.description: Detects any traps; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round. It gives a 75% chance of detecting a trap (may be modified by certain traps).

spell.name: Detect Evil
spell.description: Detects if any being is evil or an item created by evil or long used by a very evil person; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Location I
spell.description: Give the direction and distance to any specific object or place that the caster is familiar with or has described in detail.

spell.name: Perceive Power I
spell.description: Gives an estimate of power for any active spells, items, or persons(level); caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Detect Death
spell.description: Detects dead bodies and whether anything has died in the radius in the last 24 hours; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Location III
spell.description: Give the direction and distance to any specific object or place that the caster is familiar with or has described in detail.

spell.name: Detect Spell
spell.description: Detects any spells that have been cast in the area examined; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Location V
spell.description: Give the direction and distance to any specific object or place that the caster is familiar with or has described in detail.

spell.name: Perceive Power III
spell.description: Gives an estimate of power for any active spells, items, or persons(level); caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Greater Location
spell.description: Give the direction and distance to any specific object or place that the caster is familiar with or has described in detail.

spell.name: Detect Detections
spell.description: Detects any Detection spells that is operating in the area examined (gives exact spell detected); caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Detect True
spell.description: Any of the lower level detection spells can be used, 1/round.

spell.name: Location True
spell.description: Give the direction and distance to any specific object or place that the caster is familiar with or has described in detail.

spell.name: Resist Light
spell.description: Target is totally protected from all natural light (not lightning); +10 to all RRs vs light (electricity); -10 to elemental electricity attacks.

spell.name: Resist Heat
spell.description: Target is totally protected from all natural heat to 200 degrees F; and modifies spells involving heat by 10.

spell.name: Resist Cold
spell.description: Target is totally protected from all natural cold to -20 degrees F; and modifies spells involving cold by 10.

spell.name: Resist Light Sphere
spell.description: All within the radius are totally protected from all natural light (not lightning); +10 to all RRs vs light (electricity); -10 to elemental electricity attacks.

spell.name: Resist Heat Sphere
spell.description: All within radius are totally protected from all natural heat to 200 degrees F; and modifies spells involving heat by 10.

spell.name: Resist Cold Sphere
spell.description: All within radius are totally protected from all natural cold to -20 degrees F; and modifies spells involving cold by 10.

spell.name: Lightarmor
spell.description: Target is totally protected from all natural light and electricity; +20 to all RRs vs light (electricity); -20 to elemental electricity attacks.

spell.name: Heatarmor
spell.description: Target is totally protected from all natural heat; and modifies spells involving heat by 20.

spell.name: Coldarmor
spell.description: Target is totally protected from all natural cold; and modifies spells involving cold by 20.

spell.name: Lightarmor Sphere
spell.description: All within radius are totally protected from all natural light and electricity; +20 to all RRs vs light (electricity); -20 to elemental electricity attacks.

spell.name: Heatarmor Sphere
spell.description: All within radius are totally protected from all natural heat; and modifies spells involving heat by 20.

spell.name: Coldarmor Sphere
spell.description: All within radius are totally protected from all natural cold; and modifies spells involving cold by 20.

spell.name: Lightning Armor
spell.description: Target is totally protected from all natural light and electricity; +20 to all RRs vs light (electricity); -20 to elemental electricity attacks. In addition, all electrical damage is cut in 1/2 and electrical criticals are reduced by one severity.

spell.name: Fire Armor
spell.description: Target is totally protected from all natural heat; and modifies spells involving heat by 20. In addition, all heat damage is cut in 1/2 and heat criticals are reduced by one severity.

spell.name: Ice Armor
spell.description: Target is totally protected from all natural cold; and modifies spells involving cold by 20. In addition, all cold damage is cut in 1/2 and cold criticals are reduced by one severity.

spell.name: Mass Lightarmor
spell.description: One target per level is totally protected from all natural light and electricity; +20 to all RRs vs light (electricity); -20 to elemental electricity attacks.

spell.name: Mass Heatarmor
spell.description: One target per level is totally protected from all natural heat; and modifies spells involving heat by 20.

spell.name: Mass Coldarmor
spell.description: One target per level is totally protected from all natural cold; and modifies spells involving cold by 20.

spell.name: True Armor
spell.description: Target is totally protected from all natural light and electricity, heat and cold; +20 to all RRs vs light (electricity), heat and cold; -20 to elemental electricity attacks. In addition, all electrical, heat and cold damage is cut in 1/2 and all criticals from these three elements are reduced by one severity.

spell.name: Vibrations I
spell.description: Causes an object of up to 1 lb mass to vibrate rapidly; if fragile it may break (roll a RR). If it is an object held by a being the being must make a RR or fumble it (each round).

spell.name: Staying I
spell.description: Exerts 1 lb of pressure on a person or object. Object can not be moved by staying alone, and pressure can only be in one direction.

spell.name: Telekinesis I
spell.description: Can move one object, up to 1 lb in mass, up to 1' per second with no acceleration. Living beings or items in contact with a living being get a normal RR based on the living being. If the caster stops concentration before the duration is up, the object remains stationary as if it had Staying thrown on it.

spell.name: Vibrations II
spell.description: Causes an object of up to 5 lbs mass to vibrate rapidly; if fragile it may break (roll a RR). If it is an object held by a being the being must make a RR or fumble it (each round).

spell.name: Staying II
spell.description: Exerts 5 lbs of pressure on a person or object. Object can not be moved by staying alone, and pressure can only be in one direction.

spell.name: Telekinesis II
spell.description: Can move one object, up to 5 lbs in mass, up to 1' per second with no acceleration. Living beings or items in contact with a living being get a normal RR based on the living being. If the caster stops concentration before the duration is up, the object remains stationary as if it had Staying thrown on it.

spell.name: Vibrations III
spell.description: Causes an object of up to 25 lbs mass to vibrate rapidly; if fragile it may break (roll a RR). If it is an object held by a being the being must make a RR or fumble it (each round).

spell.name: Staying III
spell.description: Exerts 25 lbs of pressure on a person or object. Object can not be moved by staying alone, and pressure can only be in one direction.

spell.name: Vibrations IV
spell.description: Causes an object of up to 50 lbs mass to vibrate rapidly; if fragile it may break (roll a RR). If it is an object held by a being the being must make a RR or fumble it (each round).

spell.name: Aiming
spell.description: By concentrating on the mind of a missile firer and the flight of the missile, the caster causes 50 to be added to the attack roll of the missile. The caster must concentrate, touch the firer and see the missile for the entire round that the missile is fired.

spell.name: Telekinesis III
spell.description: Can move one object, up to 25 lbs in mass, up to 1' per second with no acceleration. Living beings or items in contact with a living being get a normal RR based on the living being. If the caster stops concentration before the duration is up, the object remains stationary as if it had Staying thrown on it.

spell.name: Staying IV
spell.description: Exerts 50 lbs of pressure on a person or object. Object can not be moved by staying alone, and pressure can only be in one direction.

spell.name: Mass Vibrations I
spell.description: Causes up to one object per level of up to 5 lbs mass to vibrate rapidly; if fragile it may break (roll a RR). If it is an object held by a being the being must make a RR or fumble it (each round).

spell.name: Telekinesis IV
spell.description: Can move one object, up to 50 lbs in mass, up to 1' per second with no acceleration. Living beings or items in contact with a living being get a normal RR based on the living being. If the caster stops concentration before the duration is up, the object remains stationary as if it had Staying thrown on it.

spell.name: Staying V
spell.description: Exerts 100 lbs of pressure on a person or object. Object can not be moved by staying alone, and pressure can only be in one direction.

spell.name: Hurling I
spell.description: Caster may "hurl" one object (that starts within 10' of him) of 1 lb or less with sufficient force to deliver an attack on the shock bolt attack table; use the elemental attack rules, Impact critical, ant the range effects on the Shock bolt table with a max attack of 300. Use the Sling attack table if Arms Law is available. Base the caster's OB on his directed spell skill with this spell.

spell.name: Telekinesis V
spell.description: Can move one object, up to 100 lbs in mass, up to 1' per second with no acceleration. Living beings or items in contact with a living being get a normal RR based on the living being. If the caster stops concentration before the duration is up, the object remains stationary as if it had Staying thrown on it.

spell.name: Mass Vibrations III
spell.description: Causes up to one object per level of up to 25 lbs mass to vibrate rapidly; if fragile it may break (roll a RR). If it is an object held by a being the being must make a RR or fumble it (each round).

spell.name: Lord Aim
spell.description: By concentrating on the mind of a missile firer and the flight of the missile, the caster causes 100 to be added to the attack roll of the missile. The caster must concentrate, touch the firer and see the missile for the entire round that the missile is fired.

spell.name: Staying True
spell.description: Exerts 10 lbs (per level) of pressure on a person or object. Object can not be moved by staying alone, and pressure can only be in one direction.

spell.name: Great Telekinesis
spell.description: Can move one object, up to 10 lbs per level in mass, up to 1' per second with no acceleration. Living beings or items in contact with a living being get a normal RR based on the living being. If the caster stops concentration before the duration is up, the object remains stationary as if it had Staying thrown on it.

spell.name: Aim True
spell.description: By concentrating on the mind of a missile firer and the flight of the missile, the caster causes the missile to do maximum damage. The caster must concentrate, touch the firer and see the missile for the entire round that the missile is fired. Using Arms Law, this would result in a "E" critical strike; but the "E" is rolled normally. If the creature is "Large" or "Super Larger" the missile would be treated as slaying.

spell.name: Presence
spell.description: Caster is aware of the presence of all sentient/thinking beings within 10'.

spell.name: Listen I
spell.description: Caster's can pick a point up to 10' away and he will hear as if he were at that point (there can be intervening objects such as walls).

spell.name: Long Ear I
spell.description: Caster's point of hearing may be moved independently up to 100' away (moves at 10'/rnd); he must be physically able to go there (e.g., he could not send his point of hearing through walls or closed doors).

spell.name: Watch I
spell.description: Caster's can pick a point up to 10' away and he will see as if he were at that fixed point (there can be intervening objects such as walls). The view can be rotated.

spell.name: Long Eye I
spell.description: Caster's point of sight may be moved independently up to 100' away (moves at 10'/rnd); he must be physically able to go there (e.g., he could not send his point of hearing through walls or closed doors). The view can be rotated.

spell.name: Listen II
spell.description: Caster's can pick a point up to 100' away and he will hear as if he were at that point (there can be intervening objects such as walls).

spell.name: Telepathy
spell.description: Caster can read the surface thoughts of one target. If the target makes his RR by more than 25 he realizes what is happening.

spell.name: Watch II
spell.description: Caster's can pick a point up to 100' away and he will see as if he were at that fixed point (there can be intervening objects such as walls). The view can be rotated.

spell.name: Long Ear II
spell.description: Caster's point of hearing may be moved independently up to 300' away (moves at 10'/rnd); he must be physically able to go there (e.g., he could not send his point of hearing through walls or closed doors).

spell.name: Listen III
spell.description: Caster's can pick a point up to 500' away and he will hear as if he were at that point (there can be intervening objects such as walls).

spell.name: Long Eye II
spell.description: Caster's point of sight may be moved independently up to 300' away (moves at 10'/rnd); he must be physically able to go there (e.g., he could not send his point of hearing through walls or closed doors). The view can be rotated.

spell.name: Watch III
spell.description: Caster's can pick a point up to 500' away and he will see as if he were at that fixed point (there can be intervening objects such as walls). The view can be rotated.

spell.name: Listen IV
spell.description: Caster's can pick a point up to one mile per level away and he will hear as if he were at that point (there can be intervening objects such as walls).

spell.name: Watch IV
spell.description: Caster's can pick a point up to one mile/level away and he will see as if he were at that fixed point (there can be intervening objects such as walls). The view can be rotated.

spell.name: Listen True
spell.description: Caster's can pick a point that is anywhere (he must be able to locate the desired point in terms of direction and distance) and he will listen as if he were at that fixed point (there can be intervening objects such as walls). The view can be rotated.

spell.name: Watch True
spell.description: Caster's can pick a point that is anywhere (he must be able to locate the desired point in terms of direction and distance) and he will see as if he were at that fixed point (there can be intervening objects such as walls). The view can be rotated.

spell.name: Ventriloquism
spell.description: Caster can speak and his voice will appear to come from any point that he wants within 100' (point must be within field of vision).

spell.name: Sound/Light Mirage
spell.description: Creates any simple immobile image or scene or set of sounds up to an area of 10' R. The visual/audio aspects of the scene are really created (no RR) and detecting that it is an illusion can normally be accomplished only through spells or the use of a sense other then sight.

spell.name: Taste/Smell Mirage
spell.description: As Sound/Light Mirage, except creates a set of immobile smells in the area of effect, or a set of immobile tastes in the area of effect.

spell.name: Illusions II
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. One of the following options may also be chosen: A\) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B\) the duration can be doubled or C\) the range can be doubled or D\) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R).

spell.name: Phantasm I
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere.

spell.name: Light Glamour
spell.description: Changes the visual appearance of one object. The target can be no larger than 10 pounds per level.

spell.name: Waiting Illusion II
spell.description: As Illusion II, except it can be delayed up to 24 hours. At the tie of casting, the caster must decide upon the trigger of the spell. The caster can choose one of the following: a. time period b. specific movement c. specific sound d. specific smell e. specific taste. If a sense is used to trigger the spell, that sense must be included in the illusion.

spell.name: Illusions III
spell.description: As Illusion II, except two options may be chosen.

spell.name: Phantasm II
spell.description: As Phantasm I, except one of the following options may also be choosen: a. an extra sense can be added (not the tactile or Presence senses), b. the duration can be doubled, c. the range can be doubled, d. the radius of the area of effect can be doubled, e. another image can be created and moved independently of the first (all separate images must be within the caster's field of vision and within range of the spell) or f. limited reptitious sounds, movements, etc. can be added that do not require concentration of the caster (the proper senses involved must also be included with the illusion).

spell.name: Waiting Phantasm II
spell.description: As Phantasm II, except it can be delayed as in Waiting Illusion II. The phantasm will move and act if given simple commands (at the time of casting), or it can deliver a short speech (if sound was one of the included senses).

spell.name: Waiting Illusion III
spell.description: As Waiting Illusion II, except two options may be chosen.

spell.name: Phantasm III
spell.description: As Phantasm II, except two options may be chosen.

spell.name: Illusions V
spell.description: As Illusions III, except four options may be chosen.

spell.name: Waiting Illusion IV
spell.description: As Waiting Illusion II, except three options may be chosen.

spell.name: Waiting Phantasm III
spell.description: As Waiting Phantasm II, except two options may be chosen.

spell.name: Waiting Illusion V
spell.description: As Waiting Illusion II, except four options may be choosen.

spell.name: Phantasm IV
spell.description: As Phantasm II, except three options may be choosen.

spell.name: Waiting Phantasm IV
spell.description: As Waiting Phantasm II, except three options may be choosen.

spell.name: Illusions VII
spell.description: As Illusions III, except five options may be choosen.

spell.name: Waiting Illusion VI
spell.description: As Waiting Illusion II, except five options may be choosen.

spell.name: Phantasm V
spell.description: As Phantasm II, except four options may be choosen.

spell.name: Illusions X
spell.description: As Illusion II, except nine options may be choosen.

spell.name: Phantasm X
spell.description: As Phantasm II, except nine options may be choosen.

notes.note: If more than one option can be added to the Illusion or Phantasm spell, the same option may be chosen more than once. For example, with an Illusion III, two options are available. The range could be doubled once to 200' and then doubled again to 400'.

The sense aspects of the illusion (mirage or phantasm) are actually created (no RR) and detecting that it is an illusion can normally be accomplished only through spells or through the use of conflicting sense. Even after the illusion is detected as is, it still exists (but the detector knows that it is not real).

spell.name: Mannish Scale
spell.description: Caster can tell the exact mass and/or weight of one object.

spell.name: Sly Ears
spell.description: Target gains double normal hearing (e.g., +50 to Perception involving only hearing, +25 to Perception involving hearing and other senses).

spell.name: Balance
spell.description: Target can see 100' on a normal night as if it were day.

spell.name: Nightvision
spell.description: Target can see 100' on a normal night as if it were day.

spell.name: Sidevision
spell.description: Target has a 300 degree field of vision.

spell.name: Sounding
spell.description: Target's voice has its loudness tripled. This has no effect on spell caster capabilities.

spell.name: Watervision
spell.description: Target can see 100' even in murky water.

spell.name: Waterlungs
spell.description: Target can breathe water but not air.

spell.name: Heatvision
spell.description: As Nightvision, except target can see varying degrees of heat on the surface of objects. This does not allow the caster to see "through" things. While this vision is sufficient for moving around, it is not sufficient for reading or mapping.

spell.name: Gaslungs
spell.description: Target can breathe any gas as normal air.

spell.name: Resist Poison
spell.description: Delays the effect of a poison on a target.

spell.name: Darkvision
spell.description: Target can see 100' on a clear night as if it were day. This also works in magically created darkness.

spell.name: Changing Lungs
spell.description: Target can breathe any air, water, and any gas at will.

spell.name: Mass Balance
spell.description: One target per level adds 50 to any rolls for one slow maneuver (e.g., walking a 3" beam).

spell.name: Mass Nightvision
spell.description: One target per level can see 100' on a normal night as if it were day.

spell.name: Mass Watervision
spell.description: One target per level can see 100' even in murky water.

spell.name: Vision
spell.description: As all Vision spells on this list below 15th level functioning at the same time. Nightvision, Sidevision, Watervision, and Darkvision.

spell.name: Mass Waterlungs
spell.description: One target per level can breathe water but not air.

spell.name: Mass Gaslungs
spell.description: One target per level can breathe any gas but not air.

spell.name: Mass Vision
spell.description: One target per level has all Vision spells on this list below 15th level functioning at the same time. Nightvision, Sidevision, Watervision, and Darkvision.

spell.name: Spell Store
spell.description: Caster may cast this spell with any spell he wants to store; then the stored spell may be cast at any time, with no preparation. The Storing spell costs the same number of power points as the spell stored. No other spell may be cast while a spell is stored. You will lose the stored spell when a new spell is cast.

spell.name: Rune I
spell.description: This spell inscribes a spell on a specially prepared piece of paper; i.e., rune paper. The rune can then be used to cast the inscribed spell once.
