spell.name: Dispel Sphere True
spell.description: As Dispel Essence Sphere V, except all 3 realms are affected.

spell.name: Familiar
spell.description: The caster can attune himself to a small animal (to be called his familiar). The caster must obtain the animal and cast the spell on the animal once/day for 1 week (concentrating for 2 hours/day). The caster can then control the familiar and view the world through its senses by concentrating on it (must be within 50'/lvl). If the animal is killed the caster will have a -25 modification to all actions for two weeks.

spell.name: Summons I
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon a first level non-intelligent creature that he can control by concentrating on it. The creature disappears after 1 minute (6 rounds). The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster but exactly what the creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and could get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Companion
spell.description: The caster can make a semi-intelligent being a companion. The companion can be no more than 50$ of the caster's mass. The companion can be nor more intelligent than the caster. The relationship between the caster and the companion is non-magical (and the caster must strive to maintain good relation with the companion or it will leave). The relationship should be treated as a parent/child relationship. The companion will almost always obey a "do not" command; but the companion may make an RR to resist a "do" command.

spell.name: Summons II
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon a 2nd level non-intelligent creature that he can control by concentrating on it. The creature disappears after 1 minute (6 rounds). Or two 1st level creatures for 1 minute or one 1st level creature for 2 minutes. If you multiply the levels. minutes and number of creatures, the result can not exceed two.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster but exactly what the creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and could get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Control Demon I
spell.description: Allows the caster to totally control a Type 1 Demon (the chance of non-control is {the demon's type x 2%]); the Demon leaves when the caster stops concentrating. The Demon will not speak with the summoner.

spell.name: Summons III
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon up to a 3rd level non-intelligent creature(s) that he can control by concentrating on it. If you multiply the levels, minutes and number of creatures, the result can not exceed three. Refer to summons 2.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster but exactly what the creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and could get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Lesser Demonic Gate
spell.description: Caster summons a Demon who gradually appears over the course of 2 rounds, roll for Type: (01-60) Type 1, (61-90) Type 2, (91-100) Type 3. If the Demon is not "Controlled" or "Mastered" (i.e. one of the spells this list) before the Demon materializes, the caster makes a 1-100 roll, adds the Demon Type times ten, and receives one of the following effects -(11-20) Roll on the attack column of the Spell Failure table(21-40) Caster takes a "A" Impact Critical(41-60) Caster takes a "B" Impact Critical(61-75) Caster takes a "C" Impact Critical(76-90) Caster takes a "D" Impact Critical(91-100) Caster takes a "E" Impact Critical(>100) Demon gives caster a Quest (GM discretion)The caster and the Demon make no RRs. The roll is open-ended. The Demon always leaves if uncontrolled.

spell.name: Summons V
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon up to a 5th level non-intelligent creature(s) that he can control by concentrating on it. Multiple creatures can be summoned if they are less then 5th level. If you multiply the levels, minutes and number of creatures, the result can not exceed Five. Refer to summons 2.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster but exactly what the creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and could get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Control Demon II
spell.description: As Control Demon I, except Type I and Type II demons can be controlled.

spell.name: Summons X
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon up to a 10th level non-intelligent creature(s) that he can control by concentrating on it. Multiple creatures can be summoned if they are less then 10th level. If you multiply the levels, minutes and number of creatures, the result can not exceed Ten. Refer to summons 2.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster but exactly what the creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and could get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Summon Folk
spell.description: After casting this spell, any nearby rural or occupational spirit will visit the caster (exact time before the visit may vary). The summoned folk will have the same nature as the caster. The exact results of their visit will vary (GM's discretion).

spell.name: Control Demon III
spell.description: Allows the caster to totally control a Type 1 to 3 Demon (the chance of non-control is {the demon's type x 2%]); the Demon leaves when the caster stops concentrating. The Demon will not speak with the summoner.

spell.name: Companion True
spell.description: As Companion, except there is no size limitation.

spell.name: Waiting Summons
spell.description: Caster can delay the summoning of up to a 10th level non-intelligent creature(s) that he can leave a single task to perform. This can be cast at a particular point and the arrival of the summoned creature(s) can be delayed up to 1 day/level of caster or until triggered by one of the following (decided by caster); certain movements, certain sounds, touch, violent actions in the area, etc. Multiple creatures can be summoned if they are less then 10th level. If you multiply the levels, minutes and number of creatures, the result can not exceed Ten. Refer to summons 2.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster but exactly what the creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and could get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Lord Summons
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon up to a 20th level non-intelligent creature(s) that he can control by concentrating on it. Multiple creatures can be summoned if they are less then 10th level. If you multiply the levels, minutes and number of creatures, the result can not exceed Twenty. Refer to summons 2.The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster but exactly what the creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and could get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Lesser Waiting Gate
spell.description: Caster can delay the opening of a Lesser Demonic Gate. This can be cast at a particular point and the arrival of the summoned creature(s) can be delayed up to 1 day/level of caster or until triggered by one of the following (decided by caster); certain movements, certain sounds, touch, violent actions in the area, etc. Caster summons a Demon who gradually appears over the course of 2 rounds, roll for Type: (01-60) Type 1, (61-90) Type 2, (91-100) Type 3. If the Demon is not "Controlled" or "Mastered" (i.e. one of the spells this list) before the Demon materializes, the caster makes a 1-100 roll, adds the Demon Type times ten, and receives one of the following effects -(11-20) Roll on the attack column of the Spell Failure table(21-40) Caster takes a "A" Impact Critical(41-60) Caster takes a "B" Impact Critical(61-75) Caster takes a "C" Impact Critical(76-90) Caster takes a "D" Impact Critical(91-100) Caster takes a "E" Impact Critical(>100) Demon gives caster a Quest (GM discretion)The caster and the Demon make no RRs. The roll is open-ended. The Demon always leaves if uncontrolled.

spell.name: Greater Demonic Gate
spell.description: Caster summons a Demon who gradually appears over the course of 2 rounds, roll for Type: (01-60) Type 3, (61-85) Type 4, (86-95) Type 5, pt (96-100) Type 6. If the Demon is not "Controlled" or "Mastered" (i.e. one of the spells this list) before the Demon materializes, the caster makes a 1-100 roll, adds the Demon Type times ten, and receives one of the following effects -(11-20) Roll on the attack column of the Spell Failure table(21-40) Caster takes a "A" Impact Critical(41-60) Caster takes a "B" Impact Critical(61-75) Caster takes a "C" Impact Critical(76-90) Caster takes a "D" Impact Critical(91-100) Caster takes a "E" Impact Critical(>100) Demon gives caster a Quest (GM discretion)The caster and the Demon make no RRs. The roll is open-ended. The Demon always leaves if uncontrolled.

spell.name: Control Demon IV
spell.description: Allows the caster to totally control a Type 1 to 4 Demon (the chance of non-control is {the demon's type x 2%]); the Demon leaves when the caster stops concentrating. The Demon will not speak with the summoner.

spell.name: Mass Summons
spell.description: As Summons II, except the caster can take as many options as he has levels.

spell.name: Demon Mastery II
spell.description: As Control Demon II, except concentration is not required. There is a 5% chance per Type of the demon that the demon can ignore the master.

spell.name: Waiting Gate
spell.description: Caster can delay the opening of a Greater Demonic Gate. This can be cast at a particular point and the arrival of the summoned creature(s) can be delayed up to 1 day/level of caster or until triggered by one of the following (decided by caster); certain movements, certain sounds, touch, violent actions in the area, etc. Caster summons a Demon who gradually appears over the course of 2 rounds, roll for Type: (01-60) Type 3, (61-85) Type 4, (86-95) Type 5, pt (96-100) Type 6. If the Demon is not "Controlled" or "Mastered" (i.e. one of the spells this list) before the Demon materializes, the caster makes a 1-100 roll, adds the Demon Type times ten, and receives one of the following effects -(11-20) Roll on the attack column of the Spell Failure table(21-40) Caster takes a "A" Impact Critical(41-60) Caster takes a "B" Impact Critical(61-75) Caster takes a "C" Impact Critical(76-90) Caster takes a "D" Impact Critical(91-100) Caster takes a "E" Impact Critical(>100) Demon gives caster a Quest (GM discretion)The caster and the Demon make no RRs. The roll is open-ended. The Demon always leaves if uncontrolled.

spell.name: Control Demon V
spell.description: Allows the caster to totally control a Type 1 to 5 Demon (the chance of non-control is {the demon's type x 2%]); the Demon leaves when the caster stops concentrating. The Demon will not speak with the summoner.

spell.name: Unseen I
spell.description: A single object is made invisible (1 garment, 1 naked body, etc.); until 24 hrs pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Invisibility I
spell.description: The target is made invisible and everything within 1' of the target is also invisible as long as it is within the 1' R. The target will stay invisible until 24 hours pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Invisibility II
spell.description: The target is made invisible and everything within up to 1' of the target is also invisible as long as it is within the 1' R. The target will stay invisible until 24 hours pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Invisibility Sphere I
spell.description: The target is made invisible and everything within 10' of the target is also invisible as long as it is within the R. The target will stay invisible until 24 hours pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Unseen III
spell.description: Three objects are made invisible (3 garments, 3 weapons, etc.); until 24 hrs pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Invisibility Sphere II
spell.description: As Invisibility Sphere I, except the radius can vary up to 10' (chosen at the time of casting).

spell.name: Unseen V
spell.description: Five objects are made invisible (5 garments, 5 naked bodies, etc.); until 24 hrs pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Invisibility Split
spell.description: The targets are made invisible and everything within 1' of them are also invisible as long as they are within the 1' R. The targets will stay invisible until 24 hours pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Unseen X
spell.description: Ten objects are made invisible (10 garments, 10 naked bodies, etc.); until 24 hrs pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Invisibility Split Sphere
spell.description: The targets are made invisible and everything within up 10' of them are also invisible as long as they are within the R. The targets will stay invisible until 24 hours pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Invisibility Sphere III
spell.description: As Invisibility Sphere I, except the radius can vary up to 20' (chosen at the time of casting).

spell.name: Mass Unseen
spell.description: One object per level are made invisible; until 24 hrs pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Mass Invisibility
spell.description: The targets (1/level) are made invisible and everything within 1' of them are also invisible as long as they are within the R. The target will stay invisible until 24 hours pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: True Invisibility
spell.description: As Invisibility II, except only affects the caster. If he attacks he is only visible for the round immediately following the attack. Violent blows do not affect this spell.

spell.name: Shrink Self
spell.description: Caster may shrink to 1/2 his normal mass (height in most situations); no decrease in his strength.

spell.name: Enlarge Self
spell.description: Caster may enlarge by 1/2 his normal mass (height in most situations); no increase in his strength.

spell.name: Change Lore
spell.description: Allows caster to analyze the form of another being for future use with true change.

spell.name: Change to Kind
spell.description: Caster can alter target's form to the form of any desired humanoid race.

spell.name: Shrink
spell.description: Caster may shrink to 10% of caster's mass per level (max of 90% of the target's mass) and it can be cast on any material that is living or was once living.

spell.name: Enlarge
spell.description: Caster may enlarge a target to 10% of caster's mass per level (max of 90% of the target's mass) and it can be cast on any material that is living or was once living.

spell.name: Change
spell.description: Caster can alter target's form to the form of any organic form within 1/2 to 2x target's current mass; does not obtain any special abilities.

spell.name: True Change
spell.description: Caster can alter target's form to the form of any specific being analyzed by Change Lore; does not obtain any special abilities.

spell.name: Changing
spell.description: Caster can alter target's form to the form of any specific being analyzed by Change Lore; does not obtain any special abilities. Caster may assume a different form anytime during the spell, by concentrating for one round per change.

spell.name: Merging
spell.description: Target can merge into any solid inanimate material (up to 1' in depth); he is inactive but aware of surrounding activity. The caster can exit at any time up to the duration, everyone else must emerge after a set time (up to one hour per level).

spell.name: Invulnerability
spell.description: Target has all critical hits lowered by one severity (an 'A' critical is treated as an 'A' critical with a -20 modification)

spell.name: Passing
spell.description: Target may pass through any inanimate material up to 1'/level.

spell.name: Mass Enlarge
spell.description: Caster may enlarge by up to 50% his normal mass, as many objects (can be beings) as the caster's level.

spell.name: Mass Change
spell.description: Caster can alter one target's form per level to the form of any organic form within 1/2 to 2x target's current mass; does not obtain any special abilities. All targets must take the same type of form.

spell.name: Mass Merging
spell.description: One target per level can merge into any solid inanimate material (up to 1' in depth); he is inactive but aware of surrounding activity. The caster can exit at any time up to the duration, everyone else must emerge after a set time (up to one hour per level) or with the caster.

spell.name: Leaping
spell.description: Allows the target to leap 50' laterally or 20' vertically in the round that the spell was cast.

spell.name: Landing
spell.description: Allows the target to land safely in a fall up to 20'/Lvl (of caster), and to take that distance off the severity of any longer fall.

spell.name: Leaving I
spell.description: Caster teleports target to a point up to 100' away, but there can be no intervening "barriers" in a direct line between the the target and the point. A "barrier" is anything he could not physically go through; a closed door is a barrier, a pit is not.

spell.name: Levitation
spell.description: Allows the target to move up and down vertically 10'/Rnd, horizontal movement is possible only through normal means.

spell.name: Fly I
spell.description: Target can fly at a rate of 75'/Rnd (5 mph).

spell.name: Portal
spell.description: Opens a portal 3' x 6' x 3' in any solid surface, through which anyone can pass.

spell.name: Fly II
spell.description: Target can fly at a rate of 150'/Rnd (10 mph).

spell.name: Long Door I
spell.description: Caster teleports target to a point up to 100' away. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. If the arrival point coincides with solid or liquid material, the caster does not move, he is stunned 1 to 10 rounds, and the PPs for this spell are expended.

spell.name: Leaving III
spell.description: Caster teleports target to a point up to 300' away, but there can be no intervening "barriers" in a direct line between the the target and the point. A "barrier" is anything he could not physically go through; a closed door is a barrier, a pit is not.

spell.name: Teleport I
spell.description: Caster teleports target to a point up to 10 miles per level away. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances.This is very risky. The following chances for failing exists: Never seen place (only described) = 50%; Studied for 24 hours = 10%; Studied carefully for 1 week = 1%; Lived in for 1 year = .01%. In case of failure: first determine direction of error (randomly), then determine amount of error (make an open ended roll for number of feet).

spell.name: Fly III
spell.description: Target can fly at a rate of 300'/Rnd (20 mph).

spell.name: Long Door III
spell.description: Caster teleports target to a point up to 300' away. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. If the arrival point coincides with solid or liquid material, the caster does not move, he is stunned 1 to 10 rounds, and the PPs for this spell are expended.

spell.name: Teleport III
spell.description: Caster teleports up to three targets to a point up to 10 miles away per level. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. This is very risky. The following chances for failing exists: Never seen place (only described) = 50%; Studied for 24 hours = 10%; Studied carefully for 1 week = 1%; Lived in for 1 year = .01%. In case of failure: first determine direction of error (randomly), then determine amount of error (make an open ended roll for number of feet).

spell.name: Portal True
spell.description: Opens a portal 3' x 6' and up to 5'/level deep in any solid surface, through which anyone can pass.

spell.name: Long Door V
spell.description: Caster teleports target to a point up to 500' away. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. If the arrival point coincides with solid or liquid material, the caster does not move, he is stunned 1 to 10 rounds, and the PPs for this spell are expended.

spell.name: Teleport V
spell.description: Caster teleports up to five targets to a point up to 10 miles away per level. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances.This is very risky. The following chances for failing exists: Never seen place (only described) = 50%; Studied for 24 hours = 10%; Studied carefully for 1 week = 1%; Lived in for 1 year = .01%. In case of failure: first determine direction of error (randomly), then determine amount of error (make an open ended roll for number of feet).

spell.name: Fly True
spell.description: Target can fly at a rate of 450'/Rnd (30 mph).

spell.name: Teleport X
spell.description: Caster teleports up to ten targets to a point up to 10 miles away per level. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. If the arrival point coincides with solid or liquid material, the caster does not move, he is stunned 1 to 10 rounds, and the PPs for this spell are expended.This is very risky. The following chances for failing exists: Never seen place (only described) = 50%; Studied for 24 hours = 10%; Studied carefully for 1 week = 1%; Lived in for 1 year = .01%. In case of failure: first determine direction of error (randomly), then determine amount of error (make an open ended roll for number of feet).

spell.name: Mass Leaving
spell.description: Caster teleports up to 1 target per level to a point up to 100' away, but there can be no intervening "barriers" in a direct line between the the target and the point. A "barrier" is anything he could not physically go through; a closed door is a barrier, a pit is not.

spell.name: Lord Teleport
spell.description: Caster teleports up to twenty targets to a point up to 10 miles away per level. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. This is very risky. The following chances for failing exists: Never seen place (only described) = 50%; Studied for 24 hours = 10%; Studied carefully for 1 week = 1%; Lived in for 1 year = .01%. In case of failure: first determine direction of error (randomly), then determine amount of error (make an open ended roll for number of feet).

spell.name: Mass Long Door
spell.description: Caster teleports up to one target per level to a point up to 300' away. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. If the arrival point coincides with solid or liquid material, the caster does not move, he is stunned 1 to 10 rounds, and the PPs for this spell are expended.

spell.name: Mass Teleport
spell.description: Caster teleports up to one target per level to a point up to 10 miles away per level. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. This is very risky. The following chances for failing exists: Never seen place (only described) = 50%; Studied for 24 hours = 10%; Studied carefully for 1 week = 1%; Lived in for 1 year = .01%. In case of failure: first determine direction of error (randomly), then determine amount of error (make an open ended roll for number of feet).

spell.name: Teleport True
spell.description: Caster teleports up to three targets to any point. There is no range limit. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. This is very risky. The following chances for failing exists: Never seen place (only described) = 50%; Studied for 24 hours = 10%; Studied carefully for 1 week = 1%; Lived in for 1 year = .01%. In case of failure: first determine direction of error (randomly), then determine amount of error (make an open ended roll for number of feet).

spell.name: Run I
spell.description: Target may run (2x walking pace) without tiring (i.e., he expends no exhaustion points), but once he stops or performs some other action the spell is cancelled.

spell.name: Speed I
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity).

spell.name: Speed Reading
spell.description: Target reads at a rate of 10 pages per minute.

spell.name: Speed II
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity). The duration is two rounds for one target or one round for each of two targets.

spell.name: Sprint I
spell.description: Target may run (3x walking pace) without tiring (i.e., he expends no exhaustion points), but once he stops or performs some other action the spell is cancelled.

spell.name: Haste I
spell.description: Target may perform double actions for the duration. There is no recovery period.

spell.name: Speed III
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity). The duration is three rounds for one target or one round for each of three targets. Or any combination of targets and rounds that total three rounds of speed.

spell.name: Haste II
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate. The duration is two rounds for one target or one round for each of two targets.

spell.name: Fast Sprint
spell.description: Target may run (4x walking pace) without tiring (i.e., he expends no exhaustion points), but once he stops or performs some other action the spell is cancelled.

spell.name: Speed V
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity). The duration is five rounds for one target or one round for each of three targets. Or any combination of targets and rounds that total five rounds of speed.

spell.name: Run III
spell.description: Three targets may run (2x walking pace) without tiring (i.e., he expends no exhaustion points), but once he stops or performs some other action the spell is cancelled.

spell.name: Haste III
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate. The duration is three rounds for one target or one round for each of three targets. Or any combination of targets and rounds that total three rounds of haste.

spell.name: Sprint III
spell.description: Three targets may run (3x walking pace) without tiring (i.e., he expends no exhaustion points), but once he stops or performs some other action the spell is cancelled.

spell.name: Haste V
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate. The duration is five rounds for one target or one round for each of three targets. Or any combination of targets and rounds that total five rounds of speed.

spell.name: Run V
spell.description: Five targets may run (2x walking pace) without tiring (i.e., he expends no exhaustion points), but once he stops or performs some other action the spell is cancelled.

spell.name: Speed X
spell.description: Target(s) may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity). The duration is ten rounds for one target or one round for each of ten targets. Or any combination of targets and rounds that total ten rounds of speed.

spell.name: Sprint V
spell.description: Five targets may run (3x walking pace) without tiring (i.e., he expends no exhaustion points), but once he stops or performs some other action the spell is cancelled.

spell.name: Haste X
spell.description: Target(s) may act at twice his normal rate. The duration is ten rounds for one target or one round for each of ten targets. Or any combination of targets and rounds that total ten rounds of haste.

spell.name: Mass Run
spell.description: One target per level of the caster may run (2x walking pace) without tiring (i.e., he expends no exhaustion points), but once he stops or performs some other action the spell is cancelled.

spell.name: Mass Speed
spell.description: Target(s) may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity). The duration is 1 round per level of the caster for one target or one round for each of caster's level in targets. Or any combination of targets and rounds that total caster's level.

spell.name: Mass Haste
spell.description: Target(s) may act at twice his normal rate. The duration is 1 round per level of the caster for one target or one round for each of caster's level in targets. Or any combination of targets and rounds that total caster's level.

spell.name: Enchanted Shield
spell.description: Caster temporary enchants a non-magic, non-metal shield with a +10 DB.

spell.name: Shield
spell.description: Creates an invisible force shield in front of the caster; it subtracts 25 from melee and missile attacks and functions as a normal shield.

spell.name: Blur
spell.description: Causes target to appear blurred to attackers, subtracting 10 from all attacks.

spell.name: Enchanted Robes
spell.description: Caster temporarily enchants one robe to confer a +10 DB.

spell.name: Deflections I
spell.description: Caster can deflect any one missile that passes within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the missile's attack (missile must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Enchanted Leather
spell.description: Caster temporarily enchants one non-magic suit of leather (usually a shirt) with a +10 DB.

spell.name: Bladeturn I
spell.description: Caster can deflect any one melee attack that passes within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the attack (attacks must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Deflections II
spell.description: Caster can deflect any two missile that passes within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the missiles' attacks (missiles must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Aim Untrue I
spell.description: Caster can deflect any one missile that passes within 100' of him; this causes attack to automatically miss (missile must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Bladeturn II
spell.description: Caster can deflect any two melee attack that pass within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the attacks (attacks must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Deflections III
spell.description: Caster can deflect any three missiles that pass within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the missiles' attacks (missiles must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Aim Untrue II
spell.description: Caster can deflect any two missiles that pass within 100' of him; this causes the attacks to automatically miss (missiles must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Bladeturn III
spell.description: Caster can deflect any three melee attack that pass within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the attacks (attacks must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Re-aiming
spell.description: One missile passing within 100' of caster is reversed and make an attack on its source (the only modification is +5, i.e., no other OB or DB applies).

spell.name: Aim Untrue III
spell.description: Caster can deflect any three missiles that pass within 100' of him; this causes the attacks to automatically miss (missiles must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Mass Deflections
spell.description: Caster can deflect one missile per level that pass within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the missiles' attacks (missiles must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Mass Bladeturn
spell.description: Caster can deflect one melee attack per level that pass within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the attacks (attacks must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Mass Aim Untrue
spell.description: Caster can deflect one missile per level that passes within 100' of him; this causes the attacks to automatically miss (missiles must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Re-aiming True
spell.description: All missiles passing within 100' of caster are reversed and make an attack on its source (the only modification is +5, i.e., no other OB or DB applies).

spell.name: Special Effects
spell.description: Caster can add a minor smell, visual, or audio aspect to the next spell that he casts. This minor effects cannot increase or change the effect of the spell in any fashion.

spell.name: Extension II
spell.description: Causes the caster's next spell cast within 3 rounds to have 2x normal duration, not cumulative with any other extensions.

spell.name: Ranging I
spell.description: Causes the caster's next spell cast within 3 rounds to have 50' added to its range.

spell.name: Extension III
spell.description: Causes the caster's next spell cast within 3 rounds to have 3x normal duration, not cumulative with any other extensions.

spell.name: Instant Ranging I
spell.description: As Ranging I, except the casting time is instant.

spell.name: Increased Radius I
spell.description: Causes the next spell that the caster casts (within 1 minute) to have its area of effect increased by 5'. This spell is not cumulative with other Increase Radius spells.

spell.name: Ranging II
spell.description: Causes the caster's next spell cast within 3 rounds to have 100' added to its range.

spell.name: Extension IV
spell.description: Causes the caster's next spell cast within 3 rounds to have 4x normal duration, not cumulative with any other extensions.

spell.name: Instant Ranging II
spell.description: As Instant Ranging I, except range is increased by 100'.

spell.name: Increased Radius II
spell.description: As Increased Radius I, except area of effect is increased by 10'.

spell.name: Ranging III
spell.description: Causes the caster's next spell cast within 3 rounds to have 150' added to its range.

spell.name: Extension V
spell.description: Es Extension II, except duration is 5 times normal.

spell.name: Instant Ranging III
spell.description: As Instant Ranging I, except range is increased by 200'.

spell.name: Increased Radius III
spell.description: As Increased Radius I, except area of effect is increased by 15'.

spell.name: Ranging IV
spell.description: Causes the caster's next spell cast within 3 rounds to have 200' added to its range.

spell.name: Extension X
spell.description: Es Extension II, except duration is 10 times normal.

spell.name: Instant Ranging IV
spell.description: As Instant Ranging I, except range is increased by 300'.

spell.name: Increased Radius IV
spell.description: As Increased Radius I, except area of effect is increased by 20'.

spell.name: Ranging V
spell.description: Causes the caster's next spell cast within 3 rounds to have 500' added to its range.

spell.name: Greater Extension
spell.description: Causes the caster's next spell cast within 3 rounds to have 12 hours added to the normal duration, not cumulative with any other extensions.

spell.name: Extension True
spell.description: Causes the caster's next spell cast within 3 rounds to have 24 hours added to the normal duration, not cumulative with any other extensions.

spell.name: Permanent
spell.description: Causes the caster's next spell cast within 3 rounds to become permanent in nature. Only one such spell can be in effect at a time for each caster.

spell.name: Spell Store
spell.description: Caster may cast this spell with any spell he wants to store; then the stored spell may be cast at any time, with no preparation. The Storing spell costs the same number of power points as the spell stored. No other spell may be cast while a spell is stored. You will lose the stored spell when a new spell is cast.

spell.name: Identify Casting
spell.description: If the target of this spell is casting a spell, the caster will know what realm the spell is from and what type of spell the target is casting.

spell.name: Spell Hold I
spell.description: Delays another spell for 1 round; if the target of the held spell moves more than 20', the spell will affect any one being within 10' (with a modification of -20 for base attack spells and -30 for elemental attack spells). The held spell gets a RR as in Cancel Essence on the Closed Essence List, Dispelling Ways. The attack spell must first make a successful RR before the caster is forced to make a RR. For the first RR, the attack level is the level of the caster of the Cancel Essence spell, and the defender level is the level of the caster of the attack spell. If the first RR is successful, than the attack spell proceeds normally.

spell.name: Spell Bending I
spell.description: Caster can deflect 1 elemental attack spell up to 10' from its target, causing the attack roll to be modified by -10 per 10 failure.

spell.name: Spell Hold II
spell.description: As Spell Hold I, except attack spell can be help up 2 rounds.

spell.name: Spell Bending II
spell.description: As Spell Bending I, except attack roll is modified by -20 per 10 failure.

spell.name: Spell Hold III
spell.description: Delays another spell for 3 round; if the target of the held spell moves more than 20', the spell will affect any one being within 10' (with a modification of -20 for base attack spells and -30 for elemental attack spells). The held spell gets a RR as in Cancel Essence on the Closed Essence List, Dispelling Ways.

spell.name: Reverse Spell I
spell.description: Reverses one elemental attack spell back on its caster if the attack fails a RR modified by +20. If the attack spell is reversed, it attacks its caster with a +0 modification.

spell.name: Spell Bending III
spell.description: Caster can deflect 1 elemental attack spell up to 10' from its target, causing the attack roll to be modified by -30 per 10 failure.

spell.name: Spell Hold IV
spell.description: As Spell Hold I, except attack spell can be help up 4 rounds.

spell.name: Power Loan
spell.description: The caster may "borrow" power points from days to come. When this spell is cast, the caster regains all his power points (up to his maximum). The PP costs for casting this spell may come from the "borrows" PPs. Every time the caster casts this spell, he looses all PPs for the next two days (the normal duration of this spell). He also takes hits equal to 10% of his normal maximum hits. In addition, for the duration of this spell, he will cast spells as if he were one level lower than he actually is. The spell may be cast multiple times (borrowing PPs from many days to come) but all the effects are cumulative. All penalties will remain in effect until the duration of the spell lapses. At the end of this spell's duration, the caster must sleep for a consecutive 10 hours for each time this spell was cast.

spell.name: Spell Bending IV
spell.description: As Spell Bending I, except attack roll is modified by -40 per 10 failure.

spell.name: Spell Hold V
spell.description: Delays another spell for 5 rounds; if the target of the held spell moves more than 20', the spell will affect any one being within 10' (with a modification of -20 for base attack spells and -30 for elemental attack spells). The held spell gets a RR as in Cancel Essence on the Closed Essence List, Dispelling Ways.The attack spell must first make a successful RR before the caster is forced to make a RR. For the first RR, the attack level is the level of the caster of the Cancel Essence spell, and the defender level is the level of the caster of the attack spell. If the first RR is successful, thane the attack spell proceeds normally.

spell.name: Reverse Spell II
spell.description: As Reverse Spell I, except use an OB equal to half the original OB.

spell.name: Spell Bending V
spell.description: As Spell Bending I, except attack roll is modified by -50 per 10 failure.

spell.name: Spell Hold X
spell.description: Delays another spell for 10 rounds; if the target of the held spell moves more than 20', the spell will affect any one being within 10' (with a modification of -20 for base attack spells and -30 for elemental attack spells). The held spell gets a RR as in Cancel Essence on the Closed Essence List, Dispelling Ways.The attack spell must first make a successful RR before the caster is forced to make a RR. For the first RR, the attack level is the level of the caster of the Cancel Essence spell, and the defender level is the level of the caster of the attack spell. If the first RR is successful, thane the attack spell proceeds normally.

spell.name: Lord Spell Hold
spell.description: Delays another spell for 20 rounds; if the target of the held spell moves more than 20', the spell will affect any one being within 10' (with a modification of -20 for base attack spells and -30 for elemental attack spells). The held spell gets a RR as in Cancel Essence on the Closed Essence List, Dispelling Ways.The attack spell must first make a successful RR before the caster is forced to make a RR. For the first RR, the attack level is the level of the caster of the Cancel Essence spell, and the defender level is the level of the caster of the attack spell. If the first RR is successful, thane the attack spell proceeds normally.

spell.name: Spell Bending True
spell.description: Caster can deflect 1 elemental attack. The spell can be deflected up to 90 degrees in any direction.

spell.name: Spell Hold True
spell.description: Delays another spell for 1 round per caster level; if the target of the held spell moves more than 20', the spell will affect any one being within 10' (with a modification of -20 for base attack spells and -30 for elemental attack spells). The held spell gets a RR as in Cancel Essence on the Closed Essence List, Dispelling Ways.The attack spell must first make a successful RR before the caster is forced to make a RR. For the first RR, the attack level is the level of the caster of the Cancel Essence spell, and the defender level is the level of the caster of the attack spell. If the first RR is successful, thane the attack spell proceeds normally.

spell.name: Reversal True
spell.description: Reverses all elemental attack spells in the radius back on their casters if the attack fails a RR modified by +20. If the attack spell is reversed, it attacks its caster with a +0 modification.

spell.name: Sleep V
spell.description: Causes target(s) to fall into a natural sleep; the total number of levels that can be affected is 5. All targets(s) must be in caster's field of vision. Caster should assign target priority, i.e., which is the 1st potential target, the 2nd, etc.

spell.name: Charm Kind
spell.description: Humaniod target believes caster is a good friend.

spell.name: Sleep VII
spell.description: Causes target(s) to fall into a natural sleep; the total number of levels that can be affected is 7. All targets(s) must be in caster's field of vision. Caster should assign target priority, i.e., which is the 1st potential target, the 2nd, etc.

spell.name: Confusion
spell.description: Target is incapable of making decisions or initiating action; may continue to fight current foes or in self defense.

spell.name: Suggestion
spell.description: Target will follow a single suggested act that is not completely alien to him (e.g., no suicide suggestions, blinding himself suggestions, etc.).

spell.name: Sleep X
spell.description: Causes target(s) to fall into a natural sleep; the total number of levels that can be affected is 10. All targets(s) must be in caster's field of vision. Caster should assign target priority, i.e., which is the 1st potential target, the 2nd, etc.

spell.name: Hold Kind
spell.description: Humanoid target is held to 25% of normal actions.

spell.name: Master of Kind
spell.description: Target must obey caster. Target will follow a single suggested act that is not completely alien to him (e.g., no suicide suggestions, blinding himself suggestions, etc.).

spell.name: Lord Sleep
spell.description: Causes target(s) to fall into a natural sleep; the total number of levels that can be affected is 20. All targets(s) must be in caster's field of vision. Caster should assign target priority, i.e., which is the 1st potential target, the 2nd, etc.

spell.name: True Charm
spell.description: Target believes caster is a good friend. Any sentient creature can be affected.

spell.name: Quest
spell.description: Target is given one task, failure results in a penalty determined by the Gamemaster (task must be within capabilities of target).

spell.name: Word of Stunning
spell.description: Target is stunned for 1 round per 10 failure.

spell.name: Word of Pain
spell.description: Target takes 50% of remaining concussion hits upon failure.

spell.name: Hold True
spell.description: Target is held to 25% of normal actions. Any sentient being can be affected.

spell.name: Word of Sleep
spell.description: Target falls into a natural sleep.

spell.name: Word of Discord
spell.description: Target will not cooperate or agree with anyone for 1 day/10 failure.

spell.name: Word of Calling
spell.description: Target is forced to come and face the caster (fighting if necessary) and remain immobile for 1 round / 10 failure. Caster must remain immobile, or control lapses.

spell.name: Waiting Word
spell.description: Any of the "Words" spells can be set to go off at a specified time or movement.

spell.name: Word of Death
spell.description: Target suffers the results of an E critical strike on the table of the caster's choice.

spell.name: True Quest
spell.description: Target is given one task, failure results in the target suffering a E critical from each of the critical tables.

spell.name: Phrase
spell.description: Any three different "Words" may be used on the same round (a separate RR roll must be made for each one).

spell.name: Mass Word
spell.description: Any "Word" may be used and it will affect a number of levels equal to the level of the caster (as Sleep).

spell.name: Spirit Mastery
spell.description: Caster can use one spell per round on this list (10th level or lower).

spell.name: Smell Mirage
spell.description: Creates any simple set of smells in an area of 10' R. The ofactory aspects of the scene are really created (no RR) and detecting that it is an illusion can normally be accomplished only through spells or the use of a sense other then smell.

spell.name: Strike I
spell.description: Target is struck with the equivalent of a bare fist. Normally, a Rank 1 Martial Arts Striking attack is used. Directed spells skill may be developed for this attack.

spell.name: Taste Mirage
spell.description: Creates any simple set of tastes in an area of 10' R. The taste aspects of the scene are really created (no RR) and detecting that it is an illusion can normally be accomplished only through spells or the use of a sense other then taste.

spell.name: Tear Cloud I
spell.description: Creates a 10' R cloud of noxious gas that will stun anyone failing to resist (must make a RR each round in cloud). Cloud drifts with the wind. Targets are stunned 1 round per 10 failure.

spell.name: Feel Mirage I
spell.description: All objects and surfaces in a 10' R can be made to feel differently than they really are. The feel aspects of the scene are really created (no RR) and detecting that it is an illusion can normally be accomplished only through spells or the use of a sense other then feel. Striking an object or surface will cancel the spell for that object or surface only.

spell.name: Feel/Taste/Smell Glamour
spell.description: One object (up to 10 pounds per level) has either its taste, its smell, or the way its surface feels altered for the duration of this spell. Note that the visual aspects of the object do not change.

spell.name: Strike III
spell.description: Target is struck with the equivalent of a bare fist. Normally, a Rank 1 Martial Arts Striking attack is used. Directed spells skill may be developed for this attack.

spell.name: Tear Cloud II
spell.description: Creates a 20' R cloud of noxious gas that will stun anyone failing to resist (must make a RR each round in cloud). Cloud drifts with the wind. Targets are stunned 1 round per 10 failure.

spell.name: Feel Mirage III
spell.description: As Feel Mirage I, except objects with a feel mirage on them must be struck three times before the feeling is cancelled.

spell.name: Strike V
spell.description: Target is struck with the equivalent of a bare fist. Normally, a Rank 1 Martial Arts Striking attack is used. Directed spells skill may be developed for this attack.

spell.name: Feel Terrain
spell.description: All of the terrain in the area of effect will fill differently than it actually does. The caster may designate in what way the terrain feels differently. For example, flat ground could be made to feel rocky etc.

spell.name: Mass Smell & Taste
spell.description: As many objects as the caster's level can be given individual smells and tastes.

spell.name: Tear Cloud V
spell.description: Creates a 50' R cloud of noxious gas that will stun anyone failing to resist (must make a RR each round in cloud). Cloud drifts with the wind. Targets are stunned 1 round per 10 failure.

spell.name: Feel Mirage V
spell.description: As Feel Mirage I, except objects with a feel mirage on them must be struck five times before the feeling is cancelled.

spell.name: Mass Feel
spell.description: As many objects as the caster's level can be given individual feeling surfaces.

spell.name: Feel Mirage VIII
spell.description: As Feel Mirage I, except objects must be struck seven times.

spell.name: Feel Mirage X
spell.description: As Feel Mirage I, except objects with a feel mirage on them must be struck ten times.

spell.name: Smell Mirage True
spell.description: Creates any simple set of smells in an area of 10' R. The ofactory aspects of the scene are really created (no RR) and detecting that it is an illusion can normally be accomplished only through spells or the use of a sense other then smell.

spell.name: Taste Mirage True
spell.description: Creates any simple set of tastes in an area of 10' R. The taste aspects of the scene are really created (no RR) and detecting that it is an illusion can normally be accomplished only through spells or the use of a sense other then taste.

spell.name: Feel Mirage True
spell.description: All objects and surfaces in a 10' R can be made to feel differently than they really are. The feel aspects of the scene are really created (no RR) and detecting that it is an illusion can normally be accomplished only through spells or the use of a sense other then feel. permanent affect.

spell.name: Blur
spell.description: Causes target to appear blurred to attackers, subtracting 10 from all attacks.

spell.name: Shadow
spell.description: Target and objects on his person appear to be a shadow; and thus are almost invisible in dark areas (e.g., in many situations this could be handled with a Stalking/Hiding bonus between 25 and 75).

spell.name: Facade I
spell.description: Target has a limited illusion on himself that that allows him to look like any humanoid race within 20% of his own size. The illusion moves as the target moves.

spell.name: Signs
spell.description: Caster can communicate simple ideas to the target through sign language (yes, no, hungry, good-bye, etc.); to the target it will seem as if the caster were speaking the target's language.

spell.name: Displacement I
spell.description: Target appears to be offset from where he actually is, all attacks have no effect 10% of the time. Each time a foe misses him, the chance of that foe missing again goes down 5%.

spell.name: Facade II
spell.description: Target has a limited illusion on himself that that allows him to look like any humanoid race within 20% of his own size. The illusion moves as the target moves. One of the other senses can be added (i.e., smell, sound, etc.).

spell.name: Impersonation Facade I
spell.description: Target has a limited illusion on himself that that allows him to look like a specific person. The person can be impersonated with regards to looks. The person must have been observed for at least 1 minute of concentration.

spell.name: Facade III
spell.description: Target has a limited illusion on himself that that allows him to look like any humanoid race within 20% of his own size. The illusion moves as the target moves. Two of the other senses can be added (i.e., smell, sound, etc.).

spell.name: Impersonation Facade II
spell.description: As Impersonation Fascade I, except that on other aspect (or trait) of the person is impersonated. In addition, the caster must study the target for at least two minutes of concentration.

spell.name: Displacement II
spell.description: Target appears to be offset from where he actually is, all attacks have no effect 20% of the time. Each time a foe misses him, the chance of that foe missing again goes down 5%.

spell.name: False Image
spell.description: Creates a duplicate of the caster; which moves as he wills if he concentrates, and otherwise does exactly what he does.

spell.name: Impersonation Facade III
spell.description: As Impersonation Fascade I, except that two other aspects (or traits) of the person is impersonated. In addition, the caster must study the target for at least three minutes of concentration.

spell.name: Mass Blur
spell.description: Causes one target per level to appear blurred to attackers, subtracting 10 from all attacks.

spell.name: Facade V
spell.description: Target has a limited illusion on himself that that allows him to look like any humanoid race within 20% of his own size. The illusion moves as the target moves. All of the other senses can be added (i.e., smell, sound, feel and taste.).

spell.name: Displacement III
spell.description: Target appears to be offset from where he actually is, all attacks have no effect 30% of the time. Each time a foe misses him, the chance of that foe missing again goes down 5%.

spell.name: Impersonation Facade IV
spell.description: As Impersonation Fascade I, except that three other aspects (or traits) of the person is impersonated. In addition, the caster must study the target for at least four minutes of concentration.

spell.name: Impersonation Study
spell.description: The caster may cast this spell and instantly know everything he needs to know for use with the Impersonation spells (i.e., this spell overrides the necessity for studying the target).

spell.name: Impersonation Facade True
spell.description: As Impersonation Fascade I, except all aspects of the person are impersonated. In addition the caster must study the target for at least five minutes of concentration. With this spell, even the closest friends and relations will have difficulty noticing the facade.

spell.name: Displacement IV
spell.description: Target appears to be offset from where he actually is, all attacks have no effect 40% of the time. Each time a foe misses him, the chance of that foe missing again goes down 5%.

spell.name: Mass Facade
spell.description: One target per level has a limited illusion on himself that that allows him to look like any humanoid race within 20% of his own size. The illusion moves as the target moves.

spell.name: Displacement V
spell.description: Target appears to be offset from where he actually is, all attacks have no effect 50% of the time. Each time a foe misses him, the chance of that foe missing again goes down 5%.

spell.name: Changing Facade
spell.description: Target has a limited illusion on himself that that allows him to look like any humanoid race within 20% of his own size. The caster can change the to a different facade once per round. The illusion moves as the target moves. All of the other senses can be added (i.e., smell, sound, feel and taste.).

spell.name: Illusion II
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. One of the following options may also be chosen: A. an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B. the duration can be doubled or C. the range can be doubled or D. the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R).

spell.name: Phantasm I
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere.

spell.name: Illusion III
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Two of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R).

spell.name: Waiting Illusion II
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. One of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). The spell can be delayed up to 24 hours or until triggered by a specified sight or sound.

spell.name: Phantasm II
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere. One of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the radius of the sphere limiting the size of the image can be doubled or D) the range can be doubled or E) another image can be created and moved (all separate phantasms that move must be within the caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Illusion V
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Four of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R).

spell.name: Waiting Phantasm I
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. The spell can be delayed up to 24 hours or until triggered by a specified sight or sound. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere.

spell.name: Waiting Illusion III
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Two of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). The spell can be delayed up to 24 hours or until triggered by a specified sight or sound.

spell.name: Phantasm III
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere. Two of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the radius of the sphere limiting the size of the image can be doubled or D) the range can be doubled or E) another image can be created and moved (all separate phantasms that move must be within the caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Illusion VII
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Six of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R).

spell.name: Waiting Phantasm III
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. The spell can be delayed up to 24 hours or until triggered by a specified sight or sound. The Phantasm will move and act if given a simple command (e.g., attack, run, etc.) or it can deliver a short speech. The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere.

spell.name: Phantasm IV
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere. Three of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the radius of the sphere limiting the size of the image can be doubled or D) the range can be doubled or E) another image can be created and moved (all separate phantasms that move must be within the caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Waiting Illusion V
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Four of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). The spell can be delayed up to 24 hours or until triggered by a specified sight or sound.

spell.name: Phantasm V
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere. Four of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the radius of the sphere limiting the size of the image can be doubled or D) the range can be doubled or E) another image can be created and moved (all separate phantasms that move must be within the caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Illusion X
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Nine of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R).

spell.name: Waiting Phantasm V
spell.description: As Waiting Phantasm I, except any four options may be chosen.

spell.name: Phantasm VII
spell.description: As Phantasm II, except any six of the options may be chosen.

spell.name: Waiting Illusion VII
spell.description: As Waiting Illusion II, except any four of the options may be chosen.

spell.name: Illusory Terrain
spell.description: All of the terrain in the area of effect will appear different than it actually is (the corresponding Terrain spell must be known). The caster may designate in what way the terrain is different.

spell.name: Phantasm X
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere. Nine of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the radius of the sphere limiting the size of the image can be doubled or D) the range can be doubled or E) another image can be created and moved (all separate phantasms that move must be within the caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Waiting Illusion X
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Any nine of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). The spell can be delayed up to 24 hours or until triggered by a specified sight or sound.

spell.name: Illusion True
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. The Duration is permanent. Nine of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R).

spell.name: Phantasm True
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. The duration is permanent. The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere. Nine of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the radius of the sphere limiting the size of the image can be doubled or D) the range can be doubled or E) another image can be created and moved (all separate phantasms that move must be within the caster's field of vision).

notes.note: If more than one optopn can be added to the Illusion or Phantasm spell, the same option may be chosen more than once. For example, with an Illusion III, two options are available. The range could be doubled once to 200' and then doubled again to 400'.

The sense aspects of the illusion (mirage or phantasm) are actually created (no RR) and detecting that it is an illusion can normally be accomplished only through spells or through the use of conflicting sense. Even after the illusion is detected, it still exists (but the detector knows that it is not real).

spell.name: Light Mirage
spell.description: Creates any simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. The visual aspects of the scene are really created (no RR) and detecting that it is an illusion can normally be accomplished only through spells or the use of a sense other than sight.

spell.name: Projected Light
spell.description: Beam of light (like a flashlight) springs from the caster's palm; 50' effective range.

spell.name: Light Control I
spell.description: Caster can control the intensity of light within the range; the intensity can vary from daylight to darkness (natural), and it can be different in different parts of the radius.

spell.name: Sudden Light
spell.description: Causes a 10' R burst of intense light; all those inside are stunned 1 rnd/5 failure.

spell.name: Shock Bolt I
spell.description: A bolt of intense, charged light is shot from the palm of the caster, results are determined on the Shock Bolt Table.

spell.name: Light Glamour
spell.description: One object (up to 10 pounds per level) has visual appearance altered for the duration of this spell. Note that no other aspect of the object changes.

spell.name: Blind
spell.description: Creats an area of darkness about the target's head that blinds him unless dispelled or cancelled by Utterlight.

spell.name: Light Control V
spell.description: Caster can control the intensity of light within the range; the intensity can vary from daylight to darkness (natural), and it can be different in different parts of the radius.

spell.name: Utterlight
spell.description: Nullified all magically created darkness in a 100'R, and lights the area as full daylight.

spell.name: Light Terrain
spell.description: All of the terrain in the area of effect will appear different than it actually is. The caster may designate in what way the terrain is different. Note that only the visual aspect of the terrain changes.

spell.name: Beacon I
spell.description: A ray of light (any color) springs from caster's palm. This ray can be up to 1 mile long.

spell.name: Light Control X
spell.description: As Light COntrol I, except area affected is 100'R.

spell.name: Shock Bolt III
spell.description: As Shock Bolt I, except range is 300'.

spell.name: Beacon V
spell.description: As Beacon I, except ray can be up to 5 miles long.

spell.name: Lightning Bolt I

spell.name: Greater Light Control

spell.name: Lightning Bolt III

spell.name: Light Control True

spell.name: Detect Illusion
spell.description: Caster can check one object or place (up to a 5' R) and tell if it is an illusion or has an illusion on it.

spell.name: Detect Invisible
spell.description: Detects any invisible object or being; one 5' R area can be checked each round. All attacks against something so detected are modified by -25.

spell.name: Misfeel Kind
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, caster appears to be of any race he chooses.

spell.name: Misfeel Power I
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, caster's level appears to be plus or minus 1 from his own.

spell.name: Presence Mirage
spell.description: Creates one "presence" of a being. The visual aspects of the being are really created (no RR) and detecting that it is an illusion can normally be accomplished only through spells or the use of a sense other than sight.

spell.name: Misfeel Calling
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, caster appears to be of any profession he chooses.

spell.name: Misfeel Power III
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, caster's level appears to be plus or minus 3 from his own.

spell.name: Reduce Power Emanations
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, an object's power emanations may be reduced, so that a minor item's power is undetectable and major items seem like minor items (for spells such as Detect Essence, Detect Power, Detect Channeling, etc.).

spell.name: Misfeel Power V
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, Target's level appears to be plus or minus 5 from his own.

spell.name: Disillusion I
spell.description: One illusion within the caster's range ceases to exist for the caster only.

spell.name: Detect Illusion True
spell.description: Caster can check one object or place (up to a 5' R) per round and tell if it is an illusion or has an illusion on it.

spell.name: Misfeel Power X
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, caster's level appears to be plus or minus 10 from his own.

spell.name: Disillusion III
spell.description: As Disillusion I, except up to three illusions within the area of effect cease to exist.

spell.name: Misfeel
spell.description: Allows caster to use all of the " Misfeel " spells on this list at once. Caster can change to any race, profession or level that he chooses.

spell.name: Unpresence I
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, target appears to have no presence (i.e., he can not be detected by Presence type spells).

spell.name: Disillusion V
spell.description: As Disillusion I, except up to five illusions within the area of effect cease to exist.

spell.name: Unpresence III
spell.description: As Unpresence I, except will affect up to three targets.

spell.name: Disillusion True
spell.description: All illusions within the caster's range ceases to exist for the caster only.

spell.name: Unpresence V
spell.description: As Unpresence I, except will affect up to five targets.

spell.name: Lord Unpresence

spell.name: Mass Misfeel
spell.description: Allows caster to use all of the " Misfeel " spells on this list at once. Caster can change to any race, profession or level that he chooses.

spell.name: Sound Mirage

spell.name: Silence I
spell.description: Creates a 5' R area into and out of which sound cannot travel; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with he object/being; +25 to Stalking attempts.

spell.name: Sound Control I
spell.description: Caster can control the intensity of sounds within the range; the intensity can vary from none to a very loud shout, and it can be different in different parts of the radius.

spell.name: Sudden Sound
spell.description: Causes a very loud, sudden sound next to the target's ears; target is stunned 1 round/5 failure.

spell.name: Sound Control V

spell.name: Sound Control True
spell.description: Caster can control the intensity of sounds within the range; the intensity can vary from none to a very loud shout, and it can be different in different parts of the radius. No concentration is necessary.

spell.name: Major Ultrasonics
spell.description: All beings within range c are stunned 1 round per 10 failure; animals capable of hearing ultrasonics will panic and flee. A RR must be made once per round while in radius. Anyone failing by 40 to 75 is unconscious and failure by over 75 means death.

spell.name: Enchanted Rope
spell.description: If caster holds one end of a rope he can cause the rope to move up to its length in any direction and to tie itself in knots (it cannot attack or tie up living beings).

spell.name: Loosen Earth
spell.description: Loosens 100 cu' of earth to the consistency of plowed ground.

spell.name: Earthwall
spell.description: Summons a wall of packed earth up to 10' x 10' x (3' at base, 1' at top); it can be dug through (10 man-rounds at top).

spell.name: Cracks Call
spell.description: Any previous cracks or flaws in material up to 10' x 10' x 10' section will extend to their limits.

spell.name: Repair
spell.description: The caster may mend a single break in a small (up to 2 pounds) in-organic object or multiple breaks, rips, or cracks in a larger (up to 10 pounds) organic object. All component parts of the object must be within 10' radius.

spell.name: Stonewall
spell.description: Summons a wall of stone up to 10' x 10' x 1'; it can be chipped through 200 man-rounds (1' R hole).

spell.name: Earthen Spikes
spell.description: This spell causes the area of effect to bristle with hundreds of 6" to 12" sharp edges and blades. The exact composition of these spikes will depend on the material the ground is made off. The area of effect must be placed horizontally on a surface (i.e., it cannot be placed on walls). Most animals and creatures cannot be induced to walk through the area. Anyone moving through the area must make a maneuver roll (at least Extremely Hard difficulty) for every 5' moved through. Anyone who falls inside the area of effect receives an 'A' Puncture critical strike.

spell.name: Stone/Earth
spell.description: Changes 100 cu' of stone to packed earth; change is gradual and takes 3 rounds.
