spell.name: Stone/Mud
spell.description: Changes 100 cu' of stone to soft mud; change is gradual and takes 3 rounds.

spell.name: Curved Wall
spell.description: Summons a wall of stone up to 10' x 10' x 1'; it can be chipped through 200 man-rounds (1' R hole). The wall may be curved up to a semi-circle,

spell.name: Unstone
spell.description: Disintegrates 100 cu' of stone.

spell.name: Unmetal
spell.description: Disintegrates 1 cu' of metal.

spell.name: Tremors
spell.description: Causes a very minor earthquake which could cause shoddy construction to collapse (can be very terrifying). This is approximately 5.5 on the Richter scale.

spell.name: Earth Mastery
spell.description: Caster can use one lower level spell (son this list) each round.

spell.name: Boil Liquid
spell.description: One cu' of liquid/level can be heated to boiling at a rate of 1 cu'/lvl.

spell.name: Warm Solid
spell.description: Any solid inanimate, non-metal material (1 cu'/lvl) can be warmed to 100 degrees F at a rate of 1 cu'/round.

spell.name: Woodfires
spell.description: Causes any wood to ignite and burn. All wood ignited must be within 1' of caster's palm.

spell.name: Wall of Fire
spell.description: Creates an opaque wall of fire (up to 10' x 10' x 6'). Anyone passing through it takes an "A" heat critical (no RR). "Wall" must rest on a solid surface.

spell.name: Heat Solid
spell.description: Any solid inanimate, non-metal material (1 cu'/lvl) can be warmed to 500 degrees F at a rate of 1 cu'/round and 100 degrees F / round.

spell.name: Fire Bolt I
spell.description: A bolt of fire is shot from the palm of the caster, results are determined on the Fire Bolt Table.

spell.name: Call Flame I
spell.description: Creates an opaque cube of fire (up to 10' x 10' x 10'). Anyone passing through it takes an "A" heat critical (no RR) for each round in the cube. It takes one round for the cube to form and be effective.

spell.name: Fire Ball
spell.description: A 1' ball of fire is shot from the palm of the caster, it explodes to affect a 10' area; results are determined on the Fireball table.

spell.name: Ignite
spell.description: The caster may designate a type of light source to ignite or extinguish (e.f. candles, torches, fireplaces, laterns etc.) This spell will affect all of the light sources of the specified type(s) within the area of effect.

spell.name: Circle Aflame
spell.description: Creates an opaque circular wall of fire in a 10' radius around the caster. The wall is 10' high and 6" thick. Anyone passing through it takes an "A" heat critical (no RR). It is non-mobile. "Wall" must rest on a solid surface.

spell.name: Fire Bolt III
spell.description: A bolt of fire is shot from the palm of the caster, results are determined on the Fire Bolt Table.

spell.name: Call Flame II
spell.description: Creates an opaque cube of fire (up to 20' x 20' x 20'). Anyone passing through it takes an "A" heat critical (no RR) for each round in the cube. It takes one round for the cube to form and be effective.

spell.name: Waiting Flame
spell.description: Creates an opaque cube of fire (up to 10' x 10' x 10'). Anyone passing through it takes an "A" heat critical (no RR) for each round in the cube. It takes one round for the cube to form and be effective.The effect can be delayed up to 24 hours; it can be triggered by one of the following (decided by caster): time period, certain movements, certain sounds, touch, violent actions in the area, etc.

spell.name: Firestorm
spell.description: Creates an cube of fire (up to 10' x 10' x 10') where balls of fire rain down. Anyone in the area takes an "B" heat critical (no RR) for each round in the cube. It takes one round for the rain to start and be effective.

spell.name: Metal Fires
spell.description: Causes a metal object to burst into flames, the object can be up to 1 lb/Level in mass. If the object is on a being, it gets a RR and if it fails the being takes a Heat critical of a severity to be determined by its location on the being's body.

spell.name: Triad of Flame
spell.description: Three bolts of fire are shot from the palm of the caster. They can strike up to three different targets within 60 degree arc of each other (must be in field of vision of caster). Caster's Directed Spell bonus can only apply to one of the attacks.

spell.name: Fire Bolt V

spell.name: Corner Fires
spell.description: A bolt of fire is shot from the palm of the caster, results are determined on the Fire Bolt Table. Caster can make the bolt turn once up to 90 degrees before striking the target (caster must know target's location and his OBs are halved).

spell.name: Following Fires

The bolt can also go through openings as small as 6" radius (caster must know target's location and his OBs are halved).

spell.name: Stone Fires
spell.description: Will cause 300 square feet of stone to erupt into flame. A "C" Heat critical is given each round passing through (or in) the 3' flames.

spell.name: Fire Mastery
spell.description: Caster can use any one lower level spell (on this list) each round.

spell.name: Freeze Liquid

spell.name: Cool Solid

spell.name: Ice Bolt III

spell.name: Water/Ice

spell.name: Chill Metal
spell.description: Any metallic object can be cooled to -200 degrees F, at a rate of 1 cu'/rnd and -100 degrees F per round. The metal is chilled to the point that it is extremely brittle. Under normal conditions, this will reduce the breakage factor of the object to 50% of normal (see ChL Section 7.36); but each following minute the breakage factor will increase by 5% of its normal value until it returns to normal (i.e., it warms up).

spell.name: Call Cold II

spell.name: Ice Bolt V
spell.description: A bolt of ice is shot from the palm of the caster; results are determined on the Ice Bolt Table.

spell.description: Lights a 10' R area about the point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: Shade
spell.description: All shadows in radius deepen, aiding hiding by +25.

spell.name: Sudden Light
spell.description: Causes a 10' R burst of intense light; all those inside are stunned 1 rnd/5 failure.

spell.name: Dark I
spell.description: Darkens a 10' R area about the point touched as if it was a dark night; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: Light V
spell.description: Lights a 50' R area about the point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: Shock Bolt III
spell.description: A bolt of intense, charged light is shot from the palm of the caster, results are determined on the Shock Bolt Table.

spell.name: Dark V
spell.description: Darkens a 50' R area about the point touched as if it was a dark night; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: Lightning Bolt I
spell.description: A bolt of lightning is shot from the palm of the caster, results are determined on the Lightning Bolt Table.

spell.name: Waiting Light
spell.description: In conjunction with any light or dark spell (i.e., this spell is cast and then the light/dark spell is cast) it can delay the action of that spell up to 24 hours; it can be triggered by one of the following (decided by the caster): time period, certain movements, certain sounds, touch, violent actions in the area, etc.

spell.name: Shock Bolt V
spell.description: A bolt of intense, charged light is shot from the palm of the caster, results are determined on the Shock Bolt Table.

spell.name: Beacon V
spell.description: Ray of light of any color springs from caster's palm; can be up to 5 miles long.

spell.name: Lightning Bolt III
spell.description: A bolt of lightning is shot from the palm of the caster, results are determined on the Lightning Bolt Table.

spell.name: Utterlight
spell.description: Lights a 100' R area about the point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being. This light is as bright and intense as sunlight at noon. It will dispell all magically created darkness.

spell.name: Utterdark
spell.description: Darkens a 100' R area about the point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being. This dark is absolute, no nonmagical light can exist inside.

spell.name: Beacon X
spell.description: Ray of light of any color springs from caster's palm; can be up to 10 miles long.

spell.name: Lightning Bolt V
spell.description: A bolt of lightning is shot from the palm of the caster, results are determined on the Lightning Bolt Table.

spell.name: Corner Lightning Bolt
spell.description: A bolt of powerful lightning is shot from the caster's hand. Use the Lightning attack table with Electrical criticals. The caster can make the bolt turn up to 90 degrees before striking the target (caster must know the target's location and his OBs are all halved).

spell.name: Following Lightning Bolt
spell.description: A bolt of powerful lightning is shot from the caster's hand. Use the Lightning attack table with Electrical criticals. The caster can make the bolt go through and turn at any angle (6" or larger) before striking the target (caster must know the target's location and his OBs are all halved).

spell.name: Light Mastery
spell.description: Caster can use one lower level spell on this list each round.

spell.name: Condensation
spell.description: Condenses 1 cu' of water from the surrounding air.

spell.name: Fog
spell.description: Creates a dense fog within up to 10' R/lvl.

spell.name: Waterwall
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 10' x 1' wall of water, cuts all attacks and movements through it by 80% (i.e., -80 to OBs).

spell.name: Water Bolt I
spell.description: A bolt of water is shot from the caster's palm; results are determined on the Water Bolt Table.

spell.name: Unfog
spell.description: Disperses fog in a 10' R/lvl.

spell.name: Calm Water
spell.description: Water within radius is calmed; waves are cut by 20' in center and less towards the perimeter.

spell.name: Waterwall True
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 10' x 1' wall of water, cuts all attacks and movements through it by 80% (i.e., -80 to OBs).

spell.name: Water Bolt III
spell.description: A bolt of water is shot from the caster's palm; results are determined on the Water Bolt Table.

spell.name: Call Rain
spell.description: If there are clouds in the sky, it rains outdoors for the duration of the spell.

spell.name: Water Bolt V
spell.description: A bolt of water is shot from the caster's palm; results are determined on the Water Bolt Table.

spell.name: Triad of Water
spell.description: Three bolts of water are shot from the palm of the caster. They can strike up to three different targets within 60 degree arc of each other (must be in field of vision of caster). Caster's Directed Spell bonus can only apply to one of the attacks.

spell.name: Command Current
spell.description: The area of effect for this spell is the water immediately surrounding the boat that the caster is on. For as long as the caster concentrates, the speed of the boat be be increased by 50' per round (approximately 3 miles per hour).

spell.name: Calm Water True
spell.description: Water within radius is calmed; waves are cut by 50' in center and less towards the perimeter.

spell.name: Whirlpool
spell.description: Creates a 50' whirlpool that will draw in any unpowered object within 500' (takes 2 minutes of concentration to start).

spell.name: Part Water
spell.description: Caster can part water up to 100' deep and 100'/lvl long and 10' wide at the bottom (50' at top).

spell.name: Sea Storm
spell.description: Summons forces of nature in a fierce sea storm; waves of 20-50', heavy rain, winds of 25-60 mph; can be delayed up to 1 hr/lvl after cast.

spell.name: Water Mastery
spell.description: Caster can use any one lower level spell (on this list) each round.

spell.name: Breezes
spell.description: Causes a light breeze as long as the caster concentrates.

spell.name: Airwall
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 10' x 3' wall of dense air, cuts all attacks and movements through it by 50% (i.e., -50 to OBs).

spell.name: Slumber Mist
spell.description: By concentrating, the caster can remove most of the oxygen from the area of effect. After three rounds of concentration, all targets in the area of effect must make an RR each round in the area of effect or fall asleep (1 round per 10 failure). All fire spells in the area suffer a -20 penalty (or are 20% less effective in the case of non-attack spells).

spell.name: Stun Cloud I
spell.description: Creates a 5' R cloud of charged gas particles: delivers a "C" Electricity critical on 1st and 2nd rounds, a "B" on 3rd and 4th rounds, and a "A" on rnds 5 and 6. It drifts with the wind and affects all within the radius. The cloud takes one round to form, so anyone in the radius when it is cast may make a maneuver to move out of the radius without taking a critical; however, after that anyone with the radius at anytime in the round takes the critical indicated (a maximum of one per round).

spell.name: Air Stop I
spell.description: Stops all generalized air movement (e.g., wind) up to wind of 30 mph; cuts higher winds by 30 mph in a 10' R.

spell.name: Stun Cloud II
spell.description: Creates a 10' R cloud of charged gas particles: delivers a "C" Electricity critical on 1st and 2nd rounds, a "B" on 3rd and 4th rounds, and a "A" on rnds 5 and 6. It drifts with the wind and affects all within the radius. The cloud takes one round to form, so anyone in the radius when it is cast may make a maneuver to move out of the radius without taking a critical; however, after that anyone with the radius at anytime in the round takes the critical indicated (a maximum of one per round).

spell.name: Vacuum I
spell.description: Creates a 5' Radius near vacuum, all in radius take a "B" impact critical, as air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Air Stop II
spell.description: Stops all generalized air movement (e.g., wind) up to wind of 30 mph; cuts higher winds by 30 mph in a 20' R.

spell.name: Slumber Cloud
spell.description: As Slumber Mist, except for the duration and it drifts with the wind.

spell.name: Stun Cloud IV
spell.description: Creates a 20' R cloud of charged gas particles: delivers a "C" Electricity critical on 1st and 2nd rounds, a "B" on 3rd and 4th rounds, and a "A" on rnds 5 and 6. It drifts with the wind and affects all within the radius. The cloud takes one round to form, so anyone in the radius when it is cast may make a maneuver to move out of the radius without taking a critical; however, after that anyone with the radius at anytime in the round takes the critical indicated (a maximum of one per round).

spell.name: Death Cloud I
spell.description: Creates a 5' R cloud of charged gas particles: delivers a "E" Electricity critical on 1st and 2nd rounds, a "D" on 3rd and 4th rounds, a "C" on rnds 5 and 6. Rounds 7 and 8 deliver "B" crits and rounds 9 and 10 give "A" crits. It drifts with the wind and affects all within the radius. The cloud takes one round to form, so anyone in the radius when it is cast may make a maneuver to move out of the radius without taking a critical; however, after that anyone with the radius at anytime in the round takes the critical indicated (a maximum of one per round).

spell.name: Vacuum II
spell.description: Creates a 10' Radius near vacuum, all in radius take a "B" impact critical, as air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Air Stop X
spell.description: Stops all generalized air movement (e.g., wind) up to wind of 30 mph; cuts higher winds by 30 mph in a 100' R.

spell.name: Whirlwind
spell.description: A 10' R whirlwind is created. It delivers an "A" impact critical to all inside (every rnd); reduces movement within of through radius by 80%; caster can move it 1'/rnd.

spell.name: Death Cloud II
spell.description: Creates a 10' R cloud of charged gas particles: delivers a "E" Electricity critical on 1st and 2nd rounds, a "D" on 3rd and 4th rounds, a "C" on rnds 5 and 6. Rounds 7 and 8 deliver "B" crits and rounds 9 and 10 give "A" crits. It drifts with the wind and affects all within the radius. The cloud takes one round to form, so anyone in the radius when it is cast may make a maneuver to move out of the radius without taking a critical; however, after that anyone with the radius at anytime in the round takes the critical indicated (a maximum of one per round).

spell.name: Vacuum IV
spell.description: Creates a 20' Radius near vacuum, all in radius take a "B" impact critical, as air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Great Vacuum
spell.description: Creates a 5' Radius near vacuum, all in radius take a "D" impact critical, as air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Stun Cloud True
spell.description: Creates a 20' R cloud of charged gas particles: delivers a "C" Electricity critical on 1st and 2nd rounds, a "B" on 3rd and 4th rounds, and a "A" on rnds 5 and 6. It drifts with the wind and affects all within the radius. The cloud takes one round to form, so anyone in the radius when it is cast may make a maneuver to move out of the radius without taking a critical; however, after that anyone with the radius at anytime in the round takes the critical indicated (a maximum of one per round).The caster can move the cloud 10'/rnd up to 100' away by concentrating.

spell.name: Reverse Winds
spell.description: Allows the caster to change the direction of the wind within the radius.

spell.name: Hard Wind
spell.description: Caster must outstretch arms and then a hard wind comes forth from them, fanning out till it has a 25' R at 300'; all within the cone receive a "B" impact critical.

spell.name: Storm Call
spell.description: Summons forces of nature in a fierce thunderstorm; heavy rain, winds of 25-60 mph, random lightning, and a blizzard (if correct climate). Can be delayed up to 1 hr/lvl after cast.

spell.name: Wind Mastery
spell.description: Caster can use any one lower level spell (on this list) each round.

spell.name: Shadow
spell.description: Target and objects on his person appear to be a shadow; and thus are almost invisible in dark areas (e.g. in many situations this could be handled with a Stalking/Hiding bonus between 25 and 75)

spell.name: Unseen III
spell.description: Up to three objects (e.g. 1 garment, 1 naked body, and 1 weapon) are made invisible. The object(s) will remain invisible until 24 hours pass, or the object is struck by a violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (e.g. an attack).

spell.name: Conceal I
spell.description: Target inanimate object take on the visual appearance of a similar object. For example, a small red key may appear as a small blue spoon. The object cannot vary in dimensions by more than 100% of actual size in any given dimension. This is strictly a visual illusion (and can be detected as such).

spell.name: Locate Object
spell.description: This spell allows the caster to find any inanimate object. The caster must be able to uniquely describe the object.

spell.name: Darkness
spell.description: Creates an area of darkness up to 2'R/lvl about the point touched. The darkness is equal to the darkest night. If the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: Secret I
spell.description: Target inanimate object takes on the visual and tactile appearance of another object. For example, a crystal goblet might look and fell like a wooden mug. The object cannot vary in dimensions by more than 100% of actual size in any given dimension. This is a illusion (and can be detected as such).

spell.name: Unseen V
spell.description: As Unseen III. except affects up to five objects.

spell.name: Displacement I
spell.description: Target appears to be offset form where he actually is. All attacks have no effect 10% of the time. Each time a foes misses him, the chance of that foe missing again goes down by 5%

spell.name: Conceal III
spell.description: As Conceal I, except affects up to three objects.

spell.name: Unseen X
spell.description: As Unseen III, except affects up to ten objects.

spell.name: Displacement II
spell.description: As Displacement I, except chance of missing is 20%.

spell.name: Secret III
spell.description: As Secret I, except affects up to three objects.

spell.name: Unseen XV
spell.description: As Unseen III, except affects up to fifteen objects.

spell.name: Conceal V
spell.description: As Conceal I, except affects up to five objects.

spell.name: Lord Unseen
spell.description: As Unseen III, except affects up to twenty objects.

spell.name: Secret V
spell.description: As Secret I, except affects up to five objects.

spell.name: Displacement III
spell.description: As Displacement I, except chance of missing is 30%.

spell.name: Conceal X
spell.description: As Conceal I, except affects up to ten objects.

spell.name: Unseen True
spell.description: As Unseen III, except affects up to one object for every level of the caster.

spell.name: Secret X
spell.description: As Secret I, except affects up to ten objects.

spell.name: Concealment Mastery
spell.description: As Conceal I, except affects a number of objects equal to the caster's level.

spell.name: Sleep III
spell.description: Causes target(s) to fall into a natural sleep. This spell can affect a number of targets whose levels total up to 3. The caster must be able to see all targets. At the time of casting, the caster should designate target priority (i.e. affect target A; if levels are left, affect target B; etc.) The first 2 rounds of sleep are magical (the target cannot be awakened through normal means).

spell.name: Charm Animals
spell.description: Target animal(s) will believe the caster is a good friend.

spell.name: Charm Kind
spell.description: Target humanoid believes the caster is a good friend.

spell.name: Sleep V
spell.description: As Sleep III, except affects a total of 5 levels.

spell.name: Suggestion
spell.description: Target will follow a single suggested act that is not completely alien to him (e.g. no suicide suggestions, no blinding himself suggestions, etc.)

spell.name: Telepathy I
spell.description: Caster can read the surface thoughts of the target.

spell.name: Sleep VII
spell.description: As Sleep III, except affects a total of 7 levels.

spell.name: Hold Kind
spell.description: Target humanoid is held to 25% activity.

spell.name: Greater Charm Kind
spell.description: As Charm Kind, except will affect one target for every five levels (or fraction thereof) of the caster.

spell.name: Sleep X
spell.description: As Sleep III, except affects a total of 10 levels.

spell.name: Greater Suggestion
spell.description: As Suggestion, except will affect one target for every five levels (or fraction thereof) of the caster.

spell.name: Master of Kind
spell.description: Target humanoid must obey caster. However will not perform any act that is not completely alien to him (e.g. no suicide suggestions, no blinding himself suggestions, etc.)

spell.name: Sleep XII
spell.description: As Sleep III, except affects a total of 12 levels.

spell.name: Greater Hold Kind
spell.description: As Hold Kind, except will affect one target for every five levels (or fraction thereof) of the caster.

spell.name: Telepathy II
spell.description: As Telepathy I, except for range.

spell.name: Sleep XV
spell.description: As Sleep III, except affects a total of 15 levels.

spell.name: Greater Master of Kind
spell.description: As Master of Kind, except will affect one target for every five levels (or fraction thereof) of the caster.

spell.name: Quest
spell.description: Target is given one task. Failure results in a penalty determined by the GM (task must be within the capabilities of the target). If the target ignores the quest, he will suffer the same effects as for failure.

spell.name: Lord Sleep
spell.description: As Sleep III, except affects a total of 20 levels.

spell.name: Sleep True
spell.description: As Sleep III, except affects a total number of levels equal to the caster's level.

spell.name: Telepathy True
spell.description: As Telepathy I, except for range.

spell.name: Quest True
spell.description: As Quest, except failure is punished by the target suffering five 'E' criticals (choose which critical types randomly).

spell.name: Machine Lore
spell.description: This spell analyzes one "machine", giving the caster an idea of its purpose and operating procedures. This gives the caster a +20 when operating this particular machine. Anyone to whom he describes the analysis to can get a +10 when operating the machine.

spell.name: Tune
spell.description: When this spell is cast upon a machine, the machine's efficiency will return to its original level. For example, if cast upon a rusty lock, the lock will return to its original non-rusty operational level.

spell.name: Jam I
spell.description: This spell has a 50% chance of jamming the target mechanism (e.g. trap, lock, machine, etc.) If the target mechanism is jammed, there is only a 5% chance that the target mechanism operates normally when used/triggered normally (check separately each time the mechanism is used). For example, if this spell is cast upon a pressure plate in the floor (that will drop a portcullis when someone steps upon it), there is a 5% chance the mechanism will trigger each time someone walks over it.

spell.name: Unlock I
spell.description: This spell has a 30% chance of opening any non-magical lock. If the lock is not unlocked, there is a 10% chance that any traps associated with it are set off. Rolls are open-ended and the sophistication of the lock may modify the roll.

spell.name: Untrap I
spell.description: As Unlock I, except it chances concern disarming traps.

spell.name: Operate I
spell.description: As Unlock I, except this spell has a 30% chance of operating any non-magical machine in its normal capacity for the duration of the spell. After the duration, the machine will operate normally. For example, if this spell were used to turn a wheel, the wheel would spin for the duration of the spell, then slowly spin to a stop.

spell.name: Detect Active Power
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, the caster will be aware when any active magic is in the area of effect. The caster will not know what the magic is or where it is; only that it is in the area of effect.

spell.name: Jam II
spell.description: As Jam I, except has a 70% chance of jamming the trap (and only a 4% chance of setting it off).

spell.name: Unlock II
spell.description: As Unlock I, except has a 50% chance of opening the lock (and only an 8% chance of setting of associated traps).

spell.name: Untrap II
spell.description: As Untrap I, except has a 50% chance of disarming the trap (and only has an 8% chance of setting off the trap).

spell.name: Operate II
spell.description: As Operate I, except has a 50% chance of operating the machine.

spell.name: Jam III
spell.description: As Jam I, except has a 90% chance of jamming the trap (and only a 3% chance of setting it off).

spell.name: Unlock III
spell.description: As Unlock I, except has a 70% chance of opening the lock (and only an 6% chance of setting of associated traps).

spell.name: Untrap III
spell.description: As Untrap I, except has a 70% chance of disarming the trap (and only has an 7% chance of setting off the trap).

spell.name: Operate III
spell.description: As Operate I, except has a 70% chance of operating the machine.

spell.name: Jam IV
spell.description: As Jam I, except has a 100% chance of jamming the trap (and only a 2% chance of setting it off).

spell.name: Unlock IV
spell.description: As Unlock I, except has a 90% chance of opening the lock (and only an 4% chance of setting of associated traps).

spell.name: Untrap IV
spell.description: As Untrap I, except has a 70% chance of disarming the trap (and only has an 4% chance of setting off the trap).

spell.name: Operate IV
spell.description: As Operate I, except has a 90% chance of operating the machine.

spell.name: Jam True
spell.description: As Jam III, except affects all traps in the area of effect.

spell.name: Unlock True
spell.description: As Unlock III, except affects all locks in the area of effect.

spell.name: Untrap True
spell.description: As Untrap III, except affects all traps in the area of effect.

spell.name: Operate True
spell.description: As Operate III, except affects all machine in the area of effect.

spell.name: Run
spell.description: Allows caster at two times normal walking pace (i.e. Run pace). He only expends exhaustion points as if he were walking. Once he stops or performs some other action, the spell is canceled.

spell.name: Longjump
spell.description: The caster may jump (from any pace) up to 10' plus 5' per level of the caster horizontally, or 5' plus 2' per level of the caster vertically. This spell will allow the caster to always land safely from jumps of this distance or less.

spell.name: Landing
spell.description: Allows the caster to land safely in a fall up to 20' per level of the caste; and the caster can take the distance off the severity of any longer fall.

spell.name: Shadow Steps
spell.description: Allows the caster to cloak all of his movements in complete silence, so long as he moves no faster than a walking pace.

spell.name: Underwater Movement
spell.description: The caster may move underwater as if he were on land.

spell.name: Balance I
spell.description: With this spell, the caster gets a +50 bonus to any movement maneuvers performed at a walking pace.

spell.name: Spider's Step
spell.description: The caster can move (at half walking pace) along any solid surface angled up to 90°; so long as he keeps at least a 3-point contact with the surface (e.g. both feet and one hand).

spell.name: Long Dive
spell.description: Caster can safely dive through the air up to 50' per level if water deep enough is present (at least 2' of water per 50' dived).

spell.name: Traceless Passing
spell.description: Caster can move at walking pace without leaving tracks or other visible signs of his passing.

spell.name: Spider's Step True
spell.description: As Spider's Step, except caster can move along any surface (including ceilings).

spell.name: Float
spell.description: This spell allows the caster to float upon the air. While floating, the caster is at the mercy of prevailing winds and cannot control any aspect of his flight without access to some other motive force (i.e. pulling along a rope or wall, being towed, etc.)

spell.name: Spider's Walk
spell.description: As Spider's Step except caster may move at a normal walking pace and he needs only to maintain a 2-point contact with the wall.

spell.name: Balance II
spell.description: As Balance I, except caster may move at two times normal walking pace (i.e. Run pace)

spell.name: Shadow Landing
spell.description: Caster will safely fall from any distance 99% of the time and will land without making a sound.

spell.name: Spider's Run
spell.description: As Spider's Walk, except caster can move at two times normal walking pace (i.e. Run pace).

spell.name: Glide I
spell.description: Caster can glide like a bird. The product of caster's altitude and horizontal speed cannot exceed 100' per round. For example, a caster can glide along at a rate of 5' per round if he were 20' off the ground; or he could glide at the rate of 50' per round is he were 2' off the ground. Note that the product must equal 100' (i.e. the caster cannot choose to have a total less than or more than 100').

spell.name: Balance III
spell.description: As Balance I, except caster may move at three times normal walking pace (i.e. Run pace)

spell.name: Spider's Walk True
spell.description: As Spiders Walk, except caster can move along any surface (including ceilings).

spell.name: Windwalking
spell.description: Allows the caster to walk on calm air; movement must be at a constant height (the caster may move vertically, but most do so under his own power; this spell provides no vertical movement capability).

spell.name: Balance True
spell.description: As Balance I, except caster can move at any pace.

spell.name: Movement Mastery
spell.description: Caster may use any lower level spell from this list once per round.

spell.name: Sly Ears
spell.description: Caster gains double normal hearing. This results in a +50 to Perception involving only hearing, +25 to Perception involving hearing and other senses.

spell.name: Nightvision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' on a normal night as if it were daylight,

spell.name: Scent
spell.description: Caster gains an extremely acute sense of smell. This results in +50 to Perception involving only smell, +25 to Perception involving smell and other senses.

spell.name: Sensory Marker
spell.description: One location is "marked" so that the caster can find it again with a Far Sense spell. The marker is automatically located when the caster casts a Far Sense spell if the marker is within range of the Far Sense spell. A marker can be placed on any inanimate object. The caster can only have as many markers as he has levels.

spell.name: Far Sense I
spell.description: Caster may designate one of his senses to be used at any "marked" location within range (see Sensory Marker). The caster can use any perception skill he has at the time (e.g. if he is currently under the effects of Nightvision, he will have Nightvision at the marked location). The remote sensory point may be rotated to face any direction. WHile he is sensing at the marked location, he must remain immobile and concentrate.

spell.name: Sidevision
spell.description: Caster has a 300° field of vision. The flank bonus for attacks against the caster is lowered to +5 and the rear bonus is lowered to +15.

spell.name: Touch
spell.description: Caster gains extreme tactile sensitivity. This results in a +25 to all actions that depend on the tactile sense (e.g. pick locks, disarm traps, etc.)

spell.name: Watervision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' in any water (including murky water) as if it were daylight.

spell.name: Darkvision
spell.description: As Nightvision, except any darkness can be seen through. Also, no light is needed for this spell to work.

spell.name: Far Sense II
spell.description: As Far Sense I, except caster may designate up to two senses at the marked location.

spell.name: Woodsight
spell.description: Caster can see through wood (up to 1"/lvl)

spell.name: Lightvision
spell.description: Caster can see in any brightness of light (including that which would be blinding or glaring). This spell does not work in the absence of light.

spell.name: Greater Far Sense I
spell.description: As Far Sense I, except caster can move (though he must continue to concentrate).

spell.name: Long Far Sense I
spell.description: As Far Sense I, except for range.

spell.name: Stonesight
spell.description: As Woodsight, except the caster can see through stone.

spell.name: Greater Far Sense II
spell.description: As Far Sense II, except caster can move (though he must concentrate).

spell.name: Ironsight
spell.description: As Woodsight, except the caster can see through iron (or steel).

spell.name: Long Far Sense II
spell.description: As Far Sense II, except for range.

spell.name: Vision True
spell.description: As all Vision spells on this list operating at the same time.

spell.name: Senses True
spell.description: Caster has the effects of Sly Ears, Scent, Touch and all VIsion spell simultaneously.

spell.name: Sense Mastery
spell.description: Caster may use any lower level spell on this list once per round.

spell.name: Gauge Wealth
spell.description: The caster get a feeling for how much the target of this spell believes he is worth (i.e. his net worth). note that this could be drastically different than how much money the target has (as wealth could include land, livestock, etc.)

spell.name: Weight Pockets
spell.description: The caster knows approximately how much "wealth" the target has upon his person.

spell.name: Mark Target
spell.description: The caster magically "marks" a target for use with the Locate Target spell. The caster can only have one target at a time.

spell.name: Find Buyer I
spell.description: Locate the nearest person (within the area of effect; direction and distance) who wants a specific object. The caster must be touching the object at the time this spell is cast.

spell.name: Locate Target
spell.description: The caster knows the exact location (direction and distance) of a "marked" target.

spell.name: Jewel/Metal Assessment
spell.description: Caster can assess the value of jewels and metals within 10% of actual value. This spell allows him to calculate different values for all the cultures he is familiar with. Note that this spell evaluates the materials only (not the craftsmanship of the magical properties).

spell.name: Item Assessment
spell.description: As Jewel/Metal Assessment, except this spell will take into account the craftsmanship of the item. Magical properties are not evaluated.

spell.name: Find Buyer II
spell.description: Locate the nearest person (within the area of effect; direction and distance) who wants a specific object and is willing to acquire it at this time. The caster must be touching the object at the time this spell is cast.

spell.name: Detect Power
spell.description: Detects magical power in an item (but not the realm or how much power is in the item).

spell.name: Item Analysis I
spell.description: Caster has a 10% chance of determining the enchanted abilities of an object (roll separately for each ability). Once this spell has been cast on an item, it may not be cast on the same item again until the caster has gained a level of experience.

spell.name: Find Owner I
spell.description: The caster knows the location of the owner of a specified object (the caster must be touching the object at the time that this spell is cast). The owner must be within the area of effect. For the purposes of this spell, the owner of an object is defined as someone who has "legal" ownership of the object. The GM must determine what constitutes legal ownership in his world (e.g. the creator, the purchaser of the created item, possessor, etc.)

spell.name: Find Buyer III
spell.description: Locates the nearest person (within the area of effect; direction and distance) who wants a specific object, is willing to acquire it at this time, and is willing to acquire it in a non-violent fashion. The caster must be touching the object at the time this spell is cast.

spell.name: Assessment True
spell.description: As Item Assessment, except that nay item can be assessed (e.g. livestock, houses, boats, etc.)

spell.name: Significance
spell.description: Determines if the item examined has any cultural or historical significance (but not exactly what the significance is).

spell.name: Find Owner II
spell.description: As Find Owner I, except for area of effect.

spell.name: Find Buyer IV
spell.description: Locates the nearest person (within the area of effect; direction and distance) who wants a specific object, is willing to acquire it at this time (in a non-violent fashion), and is willing to pay the best price. The caster must be touching the object at the time this spell is cast.

spell.name: Origins
spell.description: Give the area of origin of the item, the race of the being who created it, and when it was made (within 100 years)

spell.name: Find Owner III
spell.description: As Find Owner I, except for area of effect.

spell.name: Owner Vision
spell.description: Caster gets a visual image of the owner of an item.

spell.name: Item Vision
spell.description: Gives a vision of a significant event in the item's past.

spell.name: Origins True
spell.description: As Origins, except it gives the exact place of origin, the being who made it, and when it was made.

spell.name: Find Owner True
spell.description: As Find Owner I, except for area of effect.

spell.name: Balance
spell.description: Adds 50 to any rolls for one slow maneuver (e.g., walking a 3" beam).

spell.name: Contractions
spell.description: Allows the caster to slightly alter his muscles, limbs, and trunk; this facilitates escaping from bonds and small places. Gives a +25 to 50 bonus to Contortion attempts (GM discretion).

spell.name: Concentration II
spell.description: Adds 10 to any one maneuver (not combat), no other action can be performed the round of this maneuver.

spell.name: Unpain I
spell.description: Caster is able to sustain an additional 25% of his total concussion hits before passing out, hits are still taken and remain when the spell lapses.

spell.name: Face Shifting
spell.description: Allows caster to alter form of his face to resemble someone else.

spell.name: Waterlungs
spell.description: Caster can breathe water but not air.

spell.name: Concentration III
spell.description: Adds 20 to any one maneuver (not combat), no other action can be performed the round of this maneuver.

spell.name: Strength II
spell.description: Doubles the caster's strength; in melee the caster does 2x normal concussive hits and increases his OB by 10.

spell.name: Unpain II
spell.description: Caster is able to sustain an additional 50% of his total concussion hits before passing out, hits are still taken and remain when the spell lapses.

spell.name: Body Shifting
spell.description: Allows caster to alter the form of his body to the general shape and size of the desired humanoid race (must be within 25% of the caster's normal mass).

spell.name: Concentration IV
spell.description: Adds 30 to any one maneuver (not combat), no other action can be performed the round of this maneuver.

spell.name: Strength III
spell.description: Doubles the caster's strength; in melee the caster does 3x normal concussive hits and increases his OB by 15.

spell.name: Awake
spell.description: This spell will awaken the caster from sleep the round following casting (caster can preset conditions under which the spell will activate).

spell.name: Gaslungs
spell.description: Caster can breath any gas as if it were normal air.

spell.name: Unpain III
spell.description: Caster is able to sustain an additional 75% of his total concussion hits before passing out, hits are still taken and remain when the spell lapses.

spell.name: Concentration V
spell.description: As Concentration I, except bonus is 50.

spell.name: Monk's Sleep
spell.description: This spell halves the normal amount of time needed for rest. This spell will remain in effect for the duration of the sleep.

spell.name: Unpain IV
spell.description: As Unpain I, except 100% additional hits may be sustained.

spell.name: Meditative Sleep
spell.description: During a normal sleep, the caster may make Perception rolls (that are not based upon sight) at no penalty.

spell.name: Self Keeping
spell.description: Upon receiving a death blow, the caster goes into a stat of suspended animation, until he is cured or his brain is destroyed.

spell.name: Monk's Sleep True
spell.description: As Monk's Sleep and Meditative Sleep operating at the same time.

spell.name: Strength IV
spell.description: Doubles the caster's strength; in melee the caster does 4x normal concussive hits and increases his OB by 20.

spell.name: Unpain True
spell.description: Caster ignores all pain; thus, ignores all penalties due to wounds and his hit total is his normal hits + constitution score (on a 1-100 scale). When he exceeds this limit he does not pass out, he dies from system shock.

spell.name: Flow Stoppage I
spell.description: Reduces caster's hits/round by one, as long as the caster concentrates or is immobile.

spell.name: Clotting I
spell.description: Reduces caster's hits/round by one. After one hour of concentration the stoppage is permanent; if caster is unconscious this spell will act without concentration.

spell.name: Stun Relief I
spell.description: Target is relieved of one round's worth of accumulated stun.

spell.name: Pain Relief I
spell.description: Heals one hit per minute; if caster is unconscious this spell will operate without concentration.

spell.name: Cut Repair I
spell.description: Reduces caster's hits/round by one. Is permanent after one round.

spell.name: Fracture Repair
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell two hours per day for 1 to 10 days (depending upon severity) will repair a broken bone but not a shattered or destroyed one.

spell.name: Muscle/Tendon Repair
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell two hours per day for 1 to 10 days (depending upon severity) will repair cut or broken muscles or tendons.

spell.name: Clotting III
spell.description: Reduces caster's hits/round by three. After one hour of concentration the stoppage is permanent; if caster is unconscious this spell will act without concentration.

spell.name: Stun Relief III
spell.description: Target is relieved of three rounds' worth of accumulated stun.

spell.name: Resist Poison
spell.description: Delays the effects of a poison as long as the caster concentrates.

spell.name: Pain Relief II
spell.description: Heals two hits per minute; if caster is unconscious this spell will operate without concentration.

spell.name: Vein/Artery Repair
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell two hours per day for 1 to 10 days (depending upon severity) will repair a damaged vein or artery.

spell.name: Cut Repair III
spell.description: Reduces caster's hits/round by three. Is permanent after one round.

spell.name: Fracture Repair True
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell for two hours will repair a broken bone but not a shattered or destroyed one.

spell.name: Muscle/Tendon Repair True
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell for two hours will repair a broken or cut muscle or tendon.

spell.name: Minor Nerve Repair
spell.description: Repairs minor damage to one nerve. Requires a 1 day recovery period. Minor damage is defined as any nerve damage that results in penalties up to -20.

spell.name: Eye/Ear Repair
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell for 2 hours per day for 1-10 days (depending on severity) will repair any external damage to his ear or his eye.

spell.name: Self Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach a severed limb, limb is fully functional after 1-10 days (caster must concentrate with this spell for 2 hours each day).

spell.name: Neutralize Disease
spell.description: Has a 50% change of neutralizing a disease if the caster is unconscious or concentrates for 1 hour. In any case, it delays the disease for as long as the caster can concentrate.

spell.name: Neutralize Poison
spell.description: Ha s 50% chance of neutralizing a poison (Modified by potency of the poison) if the caster is unconscious or concentrates for 1 hour. In any case, it delays the poison for as long as the caster concentrates.

spell.name: Clotting True
spell.description: Stops all of caster's hits/round. After one minute of concentration the stoppage is permanent; if caster is unconscious this spell will act without concentration.

spell.name: Neutralize Poison/Disease True
spell.description: Has 100% chance of neutralizing a poison (Modified by potency of the poison) if the caster is unconscious or concentrates for 1 hour. In any case, it delays the poison for as long as the caster concentrates.

spell.name: Renewal True
spell.description: While in a trance (from self keeping on the Body Reins list), the caster can use the lower level spells on this list to repair himself.

spell.name: Swing I
spell.description: Allows caster to leap up to 10' vertically or laterally, grasp and swing from a fixed object, and land perfectly. The object could be a tree, branch, rafter, rope, chandelier, etc.

spell.name: Speed I
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity).

spell.name: Dodging I
spell.description: Allows caster to "dodge" one nonspell attack (missile and melee); the attack must be frontal and receives a -50 modification.

spell.name: Swing III
spell.description: Allows the caster to perform 3 "swings" in rapid succession. He can leap up to 10' vertically or laterally, grasp and swing from a fixed object, and land perfectly. The object could be a tree, branch, rafter, rope, chandelier, etc.

spell.name: Flip I
spell.description: Allows caster to "flip" in any direction, landing up to 10' away (facing in any direction).

spell.name: Haste I
spell.description: Target may perform double actions for the duration. There is no recovery period.

spell.name: Speed III
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity).

spell.name: Dodging III
spell.description: Allows caster to "dodge" three nonspell attacks (missile and melee); the attack must be frontal and receives a -50 modification.

spell.name: Swing V
spell.description: Allows the caster to perform 5 "swings" in rapid succession. He can leap up to 10' vertically or laterally, grasp and swing from a fixed object, and land perfectly. The object could be a tree, branch, rafter, rope, chandelier, etc.

spell.name: Speed V
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity).

spell.name: Flip III
spell.description: Allows caster to "flip" in any direction 3 times, landing up to 10' away for each flip (facing in any direction).

spell.name: Haste III
spell.description: Target may perform double actions for the duration. There is no recovery period.

spell.name: Dodging IV
spell.description: Allows caster to "dodge" four nonspell attacks (missile and melee); the attack must be frontal and receives a -50 modification.

spell.name: Speed VII
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity).

spell.name: Haste IV
spell.description: As Haste I, except duration is 4 rounds.

spell.name: Great Flip
spell.description: As Flip I, except total distance traveled is 1' per level.

spell.name: Dodging V
spell.description: As Dodging I, except 5 attacks can be dodged.

spell.name: Speed X
spell.description: As Spell I, except duration is 10 rounds.

spell.name: Haste V
spell.description: Target may perform double actions for the duration. There is no recovery period.

spell.name: Dodging True
spell.description: Allows caster to "dodge" all nonspell attack (missile and melee); the attacks must be frontal and receives a -50 modification.

spell.name: Haste X
spell.description: Target may perform double actions for the duration. There is no recovery period.

spell.name: Monk's Move True
spell.description: Caster can use any of one of the non-Speed/Haste spells (on this list) each round.

spell.name: Body Weaponry I
spell.description: Caster gets a bonus of +5 to all Martial Arts attacks.

spell.name: Adrenal Focus II
spell.description: Caster gets a +20 bonus for all Adrenal Moves.

spell.name: Missile's Master II
spell.description: Caster gets a +20 for attempts to deflect, block, or parry on missile attack.

spell.name: Shattering Blow I
spell.description: Caster can strike an aninimate object and deliver damage to it (taking no damage himself). Caster makes a normal Martial Arts Strikes attack against the object. In addition, there is a chance that the object that is struck will break if it has any flaws (e.g., cracks, fractures, etc.) in it. The chance is equal to 10% plus 1% per degree of severity of the critical delivered in the attack (i.e. 'A' critical=5%, 'B' critical=10% etc.). This chance is modified by +10% to +50% depending on the severity of the flaw.

spell.name: Adrenal Focus III
spell.description: As Adrenal Focus II, except bonus is +30.

spell.name: Body Weaponry II
spell.description: As Body Weaponry I, except bonus is +10.

spell.name: Missile's Master III
spell.description: As Missile's Master II, except bonus is +30.

spell.name: Body Armor III
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, the caster's skin is treated as AT 3 (this is only effective if the caster is wearing no armor at all).

spell.name: Lion's Heart
spell.description: The caster may ignore the effects of the first critical strike made against him. At the end of this spell's duration, all effects apply normally. Only one wound can be ignored in this fashion at a time (i.e., the caster cannot have more than one Lion's Heart spell active at any given time).

spell.name: Adrenal Focus IV
spell.description: As Adrenal Focus II, except bonus is +40.

spell.name: Shattering Blow II
spell.description: As Shattering Blow I, except the chance of breaking the object is 25% plus 3% per degree of severity of the critical.

spell.name: Body Weaponry III
spell.description: As Body Weaponry I, except bonus is +15.

spell.name: Missile's Master IV
spell.description: As Missile's Master II,e xcept bonus is +40.

spell.name: Adrenal Focus V
spell.description: As Adrenal Focus II, except bonus is +50.

spell.name: Body Armor IV
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, the caster's skin is treated as AT 4 (this is only effective if the caster is wearing no armor at all).

spell.name: Shattering Blow III
spell.description: As Shattering Blow I, except the chance of breaking the object is 40% plus 6% per degree of severity of the critical.

spell.name: Missile's Master V
spell.description: As Missile's Master II, except bonus is +50.

spell.name: Body Weaponry IV
spell.description: As Body Weaponry I, except bonus is +20.

spell.name: Adrenal Focus True
spell.description: As Adrenal Focus II, except bonus is +75.

spell.name: Body Weaponry True
spell.description: As Body Weaponry I, except bonus is +30.

spell.name: Shattering Blow True
spell.description: As Shattering Blow I, except the chance of breaking the object is 50% plus 10% per degree of severity of the critical.

spell.name: Mind over Matter
spell.description: Caster may use any one of the lower level spells on this list, once per round.

spell.name: Leaping I
spell.description: Allows the caster to leap 50' laterally or 20' vertically in the round that the spell was cast.

spell.name: Landing
spell.description: Allows caster to land safely in a fall up to 20'/lvl, and to take that distance off the severity of any longer fall.

spell.name: Traction
spell.description: Caster can run on even, unstable surfaces (sand, ice, etc.) as he would on a hard, stable surface.

spell.name: Edgerunning
spell.description: Caster can run on even, narrow (at least 2" wide) surfaces as if he were on normal ground.

spell.name: Leaping III
spell.description: Allows the caster to leap 50' laterally or 20' vertically in the round that the spell was cast. Three of these leaps can be performed in succession. Each leap must be within 90 degrees of the last leap's direction.

spell.name: Cornering I
spell.description: Allows caster to execute a turn up to 180 degrees with no deceleration or unbalance (can be used with any "running" spells).

spell.name: Levitation
spell.description: Allows the target to move up and down vertically 10'/Rnd, horizontal movement is possible only through normal means.

spell.name: Landing True
spell.description: Allows caster to land safely in a fall up to 50'/lvl, and to take that distance off the severity of any longer fall.

spell.name: Wallwalking
spell.description: Caster can walk on solid surfaces up to 90 degrees as if he were on normal ground.

spell.name: Great Leap
spell.description: Allows the caster to leap 10'/lvl laterally or 5'/lvl vertically.

spell.name: Cornering III
spell.description: Allows caster to execute up to 3 turns that are up to 180 degrees with no deceleration or unbalance (can be used with any "running" spells).

spell.name: Wall Flip
spell.description: If the caster has a wall within 10', he can leap up to the wall, bounce off and land up to 25' form the wall (facing any direction).

spell.name: Wallrunning
spell.description: Caster can run on solid surfaces up to 90 degrees as if he were on normal ground.

spell.name: Leaving I
spell.description: Caster teleports target to a point up to 100' away, but there can be no intervening "barriers" in a direct line between the the target and the point. A "barrier" is anything he could not physically go through; a closed door is a barrier, a pit is not.

spell.name: Breezerunning
spell.description: Caster can run on air if there is a wind blowing, however, he can only run in the direction the wind is blowing.

spell.name: Fluidrunning
spell.description: Caster may run on any fluid surface as if on level ground.

spell.name: Leaving III
spell.description: As Leaving I, except range is 300'.

spell.name: Breezerunning True
spell.description: As Breezerunning, except may run against the wind, and his movement rate is unaffected by wind speed.

spell.name: Ceilingwalking
spell.description: Caster can walk on any solid surfaces as if he were on normal ground (includes ceilings).

spell.name: Ceilingrunning
spell.description: Caster can run on any solid surfaces as if he were on normal ground (includes ceilings).

spell.name: Run True
spell.description: Caster can use any one of the lower level "running" spells on this list each round. Edgerunning, Wallrunning, Windrunning, and Ceiling running.

spell.name: Monk's Bridge
spell.description: Caster can use any one of the lower level spells on this list each round.

spell.name: Sly Ears
spell.description: Caster gains double normal hearing (e.g., +50 to Perception involving only hearing, +25 to Perception involving hearing and other senses).

spell.name: Nightvision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' on a clear night as if it were day.

spell.name: Sidevision
spell.description: Caster has a 300 degree field of vision.

spell.name: Scent
spell.description: Caster gains extremely acute sense of smell (e.g., +50 to Perception involving only smell, +25 to Perception involving smell and other senses).

spell.name: Watervision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' even in murky water.

spell.name: Fogvision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' through any precipitation.

spell.name: Touch
spell.description: Caster gains extreme tactile sensitivity. For example, caster might receive +25 to picking locks, disarming traps, opening secret doors, etc.

spell.name: Darkvision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' on a clear night as if it were day. This also works in most magically created darkness.

spell.name: Detect Invisible
spell.description: Detects any invisible things; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round. All attacks against something so detected are modified by -50.

spell.name: Detect Illusion
spell.description: Caster can check one object or place (up to a 5' R) and tell if it is an illusion or has an illusion on it.

spell.name: Scent True
spell.description: Caster gains extremely acute sense of smell (e.g., +75 to Perception involving only smell, +50 to Perception involving smell and other senses). Caster can detect extremely faint scents (e.g., up to 48 hours old, after rain storms, through snow, etc.).

spell.name: Disillusion
spell.description: One illusion within the caster's range ceases to exist for the caster only.

spell.name: Touch True
spell.description: Caster gains extreme tactile sensitivity. For example, caster might receive +50 to picking locks, disarming traps, opening secret doors, etc.

spell.name: Woodsight
spell.description: Caster can see through 1"/Lvl of wood.

spell.name: See Invisible
spell.description: Caster can see all invisible things anywhere that he can normally see. In addition, he suffers no penalty against invisible targets.

spell.name: Long Vision
spell.description: As any lower level Vision spell on this list but without a range limitation.

spell.name: Illusionsight
spell.description: Caster cannot see any visual illusion. This does not affect any of the other senses.

spell.name: Stonesight
spell.description: Caster can see through 1"/Lvl of stone.

spell.name: Monkvision
spell.description: As all lower level "vision" spells functioning at the same time. Darkvision True, Fogvision, Watervision and Sidevision.

spell.name: Ironsight
spell.description: Caster can see through 1"/Lvl of iron(or steel).

spell.name: Metalsight
spell.description: As Woodsight, except any metal can be seen through.

spell.name: Monksense
spell.description: Caster can use any one of the lower level spells on this list each round.

spell.name: Extended Endurance I
spell.description: While this spell is in effect, the caster expends two-thirds of the normal exhaustion points for any actions he performs.

spell.name: Stun Relief I
spell.description: Caster is relieved of one round's worth of accumulated stun.

spell.name: Unpain I
spell.description: Caster is able to sustain an additonal 25% of his total concusion hits before passing out. hits are still taken and remain when the spell lapses.

spell.name: Concentration II
spell.description: Adds +20 to any one maneuver. No other action can be performed the round this maneuver is resolved.

spell.name: Extended Endurance II
spell.description: As Extended Endurance I, except the caster only expends (FIXME) of the normal exhaustion points.

spell.name: Stun Relief II
spell.description: As Stun Relief I, except 2 rounds of stun are relieved.

spell.name: Ignore Wound I
spell.description: Cuts the maneuver penalty from any one wound in half for the duration of the spell.

spell.name: Unpain II
spell.description: As Unpain I, except 50% additonal hits may be sustained.

spell.name: Interrogation Resistance
spell.description: Caster gains a +50 to RRs versus interrogation and +50 to RRs versus mind reading spells the caster is aware of.

spell.name: Concentration IV
spell.description: As Concentration II, except bonus is +40.

spell.name: Moment of Clarity
spell.description: Caster can ignore all penalties and accumulated stun rounds from all wounds he has taken for 1 round. He may also ignore any penalties for the total concussion hits he has taken.

spell.name: Extended Endurance III
spell.description: As Extended Endurance I, except the caster only extends half of the normal exhaustion points.

spell.name: Unstun
spell.description: Caster can ignore all stun rounds incurred from any one wound.

spell.name: Unpain III
spell.description: As Unpain I, eexcept 75% additional hits may be sustained.

spell.name: Ignore Elements
spell.description: Caster is unaffected by natural extremes of temperature. He may move about comfortable in the hottest desert (200 Fahrenheit / 95 celcius) or the coldest artic waster (-100 Fahrenheit / -75 Celcius) in only light clothing.

spell.name: Ignore Wound II
spell.description: As Ignore Wound I, except that the penalty is reduced by 75%.

spell.name: Concentration V
spell.description: As Concentration I, except bonus is +50.

spell.name: Focus
spell.description: Caster gains a +20 bonus to all maneuvers he attempts that bring him closer to a goal he sets at the time of casting. This goal must be attainable in the spells duration. Once the goal is set, the caster will be reluctant to perform any action that does not carry him closer to the goal.

spell.name: Unpain IV
spell.description: As Unpain I, except 100% additional hits may sustained.

spell.name: Extended Endurance IV
spell.description: While this spell is in effect, the caster expends no exhaustion points for any actions he performs.

spell.name: Ignore Wound III
spell.description: As Ignore Wound I, except that the penalty is reduced by 90%.

spell.name: Warriors Will True
spell.description: For the duration, caster cannot be stunned, takes no maneuver penalties from wounds, and expends no exhaustion points. At the end of the spell, the caster goes unconscious for 1 hour for every round the spell was in effect

spell.name: Sprain Limb
spell.description: A random part of a random limb is sprained. If it is part of a leg: movement is cut by 25%, combat is at -10; if it is part of an arm, combat is modified by -20.

spell.name: Limb Pain
spell.description: A random limb is in intense pain; for a leg, the target cannot walk; for an arm, that arm cannot be used.

spell.name: Touch of Disruption
spell.description: The bones and tissues of the target's body are disrupted as if the target had fallen a long distance. If the target fails his RR by (1-10), he takes an "A" Impact, (11-20) = "B"; (21-30) = "C"; (31-40) = "D"; (41-up) = "E".

spell.name: Lock Joint
spell.description: One of the target's joints locks; it is in intense pain; for a leg, the target cannot walk; for an arm, that arm cannot be used. With leg lock, and the target is moving, he falls; if the target has arm lock and is carrying anything, it is dropped.

spell.name: Break Limb
spell.description: A random limb is broken; for a leg, the target can only move at 50% and combat is modified by -75; for an arm, that arm cannot be used.

spell.name: Disruption II
spell.description: The bones and tissues of the target's body are disrupted as if the target had fallen a long distance. If the target fails his RR by (1-10), he takes an "A" Impact, (11-20) = "B"; (21-30) = "C"; (31-40) = "D"; (41-up) = "E".

spell.name: Skin Death
spell.description: Target's skin will flake and peel all over his body; there is no tactical penalty, but it lowers Appearance of the individual by 50%. Lasts until dispelled and 1 month passes.

spell.name: Disruption V
spell.description: The bones and tissues of the target's body are disrupted as if the target had fallen a long distance. If the target fails his RR by (1-10), he takes an "A" Impact, (11-20) = "B"; (21-30) = "C"; (31-40) = "D"; (41-up) = "E".

spell.name: Rupture Ear
spell.description: One of the target's ears is disrupted, his hearing is at 50% of normal until cured (-25 to Perception involving hearing, -50 to Perception only involving hearing). If both ears go, he is deaf.

spell.name: Limb Death
spell.description: One of the target's limbs (random) will wither and die. Target loses 5% of the use of the limb per day; when the total reaches 100%, the limb falls off. Can be cured through circulation and nerve repair spells up to 80% point, then it must be regenerated.

spell.name: Eye Disruption
spell.description: One of the target's eyes is disrupted, his sight is at 50% of normal until cured (-25 to Perception involving sight -50 to Perception only involving sight). If both eyes go, he is blind.

spell.name: Collapse Lung
spell.description: One of the target's lungs collapses; he is at 50% of normal for all physical activity until the lung is repaired.

spell.name: Muscle Death
spell.description: One of the target's muscles (random) will wither and die. Target loses 5% of the use of the muscle per day; when the total reaches 100%, the muscle falls off. Can be cured through circulation and nerve repair spells up to 80% point, then it must be regenerated. Excludes major organs, e.g., not the heart.

spell.name: Bone Death
spell.description: One of the target's bones (random but not part of the spine or skull) will gradually disintegrate. Target loses 5% of the use of the bone per day; when the total reaches 100%, the limb falls off. Can be cured through bone repair spells up to 80% point, then it must be regenerated.

spell.name: Black Channel I
spell.description: Caster may cast one of the following Black Channels spells.1. Thrayn's Touch (R:Touch, RR mod -50)Disrupts Body Cells; Foe operates at -50.2. Eye of Nur (R: 25', RR mod -30)Knocks foe out, 25 hits.3. Uonic Curse (R: 50', RR mod -25)Any one limb useless for 1 - 10 days.4.Tauric Finger (R: 50', RR mod -10)Blinds for 1 - 10 Days; +10 hits.5. Londarin's Hand (R: 100', RR mod none)Nerve disruption; foe is sent into a coma.The GM must determine which one(s) may be cast, based on: culture, background, deity served, etc. The caster might be allowed to pick and choose.

spell.name: Long Flesh Destruction
spell.description: As any single 10th level or lower spell on this list, except with a range of 300'.

spell.name: Mass Flesh Destruction
spell.description: As any single lower level spell, except it may be cast upon as many targets as the caster has levels.

spell.name: Petrification
spell.description: The target's bones will gradually petrify; a loss of activity of 5% per day; when the total reaches 100%, the victim is dead. This occurs due to loss of blood production.

spell.name: Black Channel II
spell.description: Caster may cast one of the following Black Channels spells.1. Womaw Finger (R: 25', RR mod -30)Destroys muscles and tendons in legs.2. Urulic Eye (R: 50, RR mod -25)Removes foe's hands.3. Finger of Sart (R: 75', RR mod -15)Paralyzes foe entirely.4. Channels of Crey (R: 100', RR mod -10)Severe brain disorder; convulsive spasms, foe operates at -75.5. Umli Breeze (R: 50', RR mod none)Sends foe into a permanent coma; +10 hits.The GM must determine which one(s) may be cast, based on: culture, background, deity served, etc. The caster might be allowed to pick and choose.

spell.name: Disruption True
spell.description: As Touch of Disruption, except range is 300' and always delivers an 'E' Impact critical if the target fails to resist.

spell.name: Black Channel III
spell.description: Caster may cast one of the following Black Channels spells. 1. Black Finger (R:25', RR mod -50) Erases facial area. 2. Desert Curse (R:50', RR mod -100) Blood Boils. 3. Death's Wave (R:100') Liquefies skeleton.

spell.name: Vaporize Fluid
spell.description: Vaporizes 10 cu' of liquid/lvl.

spell.name: Freeze Fluid
spell.description: Freezes 10 cu' of liquid per level.

spell.name: Evaporate I
spell.description: Causes 1000 cu' of liquid to rapidly evaporate over the course of one hour.

spell.name: Unwater I
spell.description: Instantly disintegrates 100 cu' of water.

spell.name: Calm Water
spell.description: Water within radius is calmed; waves are cut 20' in center and less towards the perimeter.

spell.name: Water Bolt I
spell.description: A bolt of water is shot from the palm of the caster; results determined on the Water Bolt Table.

spell.name: Unrain
spell.description: No precipitation will occur in a 100' R for 1 hr/lvl.

spell.name: Dehydrate
spell.description: Removes all liquid (usually water) from one cu' of inanimate material.

spell.name: Evaporate II
spell.description: Causes 10000 cu' of liquid to rapidly evaporate over the course of one hour.

spell.name: Unwater II
spell.description: Instantly disintegrates 1000 cu' of water.

spell.name: Unrain True
spell.description: No precipitation will occur in a 500' R for 1 day / level.

spell.name: Dehydrate True
spell.description: Removes all liquid (usually water) from ten cu' of inanimate material.

spell.name: Evaporate III
spell.description: Causes 100,000 cu' of liquid to rapidly evaporate over the course of one hour.

spell.name: Unwater III
spell.description: Instantly disintegrates 10000 cu' of water.

spell.name: Greater Calm Water
spell.description: Water within radius is calmed; waves are cut 50' in center and less towards the perimeter.

spell.name: Long Fluid Destruction
spell.description: As any single 10th level or lower spell on this list, except with a range of 300'.

spell.name: Desiccation
spell.description: The target immediately begins to dehydrate and weather as if in a win-blown, sandy desert. The target is immediately at -10% to activities and takes 1% of his total hits. For each round that the caster concentrates, the target loses another 5% activity and 1% of his total hits. If the caster maintains concentration for 28 consecutive rounds, animate targets will be reduced to dried out husks. If the caster is prevented from completing his rounds of concentration or the target gets out of range of the spell, the target keeps accumulated activity penalty and hits lost. The hits will heal normally, but the activity penalty only recovers at the rate of 10% per day. Alternatively, the GM may allow the activity penalty to be removed with a Cure Disease spell (or equivalent) cast after all of the hits are restored.

spell.name: Dehumidify
spell.description: For every minute that the caster concentrates, the humidity drops 1% of the original humidity (up to 50%). The humidity will gradually increase at a rate of 5% (of original humidity) per day until the original humidity is reached.

spell.name: Evaporate True
spell.description: Causes 1,000,000 cu' of liquid to rapidly evaporate over the course of one hour.

spell.name: Calm Water True
spell.description: Water within radius is calmed; waves are cut 50' in center and less towards the perimeter.

spell.name: Dehumidify True
spell.description: For every minute that the caster concentrates, the humidity drops 5% of the original humidity (up to 95%). The humidity will gradually increase at a rate of 5% (of original humidity) per day until the original humidity is reached.

spell.name: Unfog
spell.description: Disperses all fog in a 10'/lvl Radius.

spell.name: Air Stop I
spell.description: Cuts all generalized air movement (e.g., wind) by 30 mph in a 10' R (will not affect breathing).

spell.name: Vacuum I
spell.description: Creates a 5' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "B" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Deoxygenation I
spell.description: Caster can remove the oxygen in a 10' R at the rate of 1% of the original oxygen/rnd.

spell.name: Air Stop II
spell.description: Cuts all generalized air movement (e.g., wind) by 30 mph in a 10' R (will not affect breathing).

spell.name: Vacuum II
spell.description: Creates a 10' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "B" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Deoxygenation II
spell.description: Caster can remove the oxygen in a 20' R at the rate of 1% of the original oxygen/rnd.

spell.name: Gas To Air
spell.description: Changes any gas to oxygen permanently. This occurs at 1 cu'/rnd as long as the caster concentrates.

spell.name: Air Stop X
spell.description: Cuts all generalized air movement (e.g., wind) by 30 mph in a 10' R (will not affect breathing).

spell.name: Vacuum IV
spell.description: Creates a 20' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "B" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Great Vacuum I
spell.description: Creates a 5' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "D" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Fast Deoxygenation I
spell.description: As Deoxygenation I, except removal rate is 5% per round.

spell.name: Deoxygenation V
spell.description: Caster can remove the oxygen in a 50' R at the rate of 1% of the original oxygen/rnd.

spell.name: Great Vacuum II
spell.description: Creates a 10' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "D" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Fast Deoxygenation II
spell.description: As Fast Deoxygenation I, except affects a radius of 20'.

spell.name: Long Gas Destruction
spell.description: As any single 10th level or lower spell on this list, except with a range of 300'.

spell.name: Major Deoxygenation
spell.description: As Deoxygenation I, except affects a radius of 20' and removal rate is 20% per round.

spell.name: Major Vacuum
spell.description: Creates a 5' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "E" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Deoxygenation True
spell.description: Caster can remove the oxygen in a 20' R at the rate of 20% of the original oxygen/rnd.

spell.name: Vacuum True
spell.description: Creates a 10' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "E" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Implosion
spell.description: Destroys gases in a single enclosure (e.g., usually a building) up to a size of 100' x 100' x 100' (or 1,000,000 cu'). The building has a chance of collapsing (dependent on construction) and everyone inside takes a "E" impact critical from the falling debris.

spell.name: Minor Pain
spell.description: Target takes 25% of his remaining concussion hits (i.e., those not already taken); these hits are healed when the duration is up, provided the target has not died.

spell.name: Jolts I
spell.description: Target is stunned

spell.name: Disorientation
spell.description: Target must subtract 25 from all orientation, perception, and initiative rolls.

spell.name: Unbalance
spell.description: Target must subtract 25 from all maneuver rolls.

spell.name: Distortions
spell.description: Target must subtract 25 from all combat rolls.

spell.name: Jolts III
spell.description: Target is stunned for 3 rnds per 10 failure.

spell.name: Major Pain
spell.description: Target takes 50% of his remaining concussion hits (i.e., those not already taken); these hits are healed when the duration is up, provided the target has not died.

spell.name: Forget
spell.description: Target forgets a period of (1 min/lvl) of his past, as desired by the caster.

spell.name: Word of Pain
spell.description: Target takes 50% of his remaining concussion hits (i.e., those not already taken); these hits are healed when the duration is up, provided the target has not died.

spell.name: Mind Shock
spell.description: Target must subtract 25 from all orientation, perception, initiative, maneuver and combat rolls.

spell.name: Mind Death
spell.description: Target's mind blanks out for a period of 10 min/day at random. Target is incapable of activity or thought during this period.

spell.name: Jolts V
spell.description: Target is stunned for 5 rounds per 10 failure.

spell.name: Unminding
spell.description: Target's mind is completely blank for the duration. He cannot perceive events, time, or activity, he is stunned for 1 round after his mind comes back.

spell.name: Mass Disorientation
spell.description: Affects as many targets as the caster's level' each target only has a 50% chance of making a decision each round (can still defend) and the range is 300'.

spell.name: Mind Break
spell.description: Target is a blathering idiot; he can be lead around, but he can take no action.

spell.name: Mass Unbalance
spell.description: As Unbalance, except affects a number of targets equal to caster's level.

spell.name: Long Mind Destruction
spell.description: As any single 10th level or lower spell on this list, except with a range of 300'.

spell.name: Mass Distortions
spell.description: As Distortions, except affects a number of targets equal to caster's level.

spell.name: Horror
spell.description: The target believes he is being engaged by a creature of his own worst fear. The target will be attacked each round by the creature (who has a +100 Martial Arts Strike Rank I attack; the damage is real). Regardless of the damage done by the target (to the creature), the creature will only be defeated when the target makes his RR (one RR each minute) or when he loses consciousness.

spell.name: Lost Experience I
spell.description: Target loses 5% of his collected experience (usually experience points).

spell.name: Mass Pain
spell.description: Target takes 25% of his remaining concussion hits (i.e., those not already taken); these hits are healed when the duration is up, provided the target has not died.

spell.name: Mass Mind Shock
spell.description: Target must subtract 25 from all orientation, perception, initiative, maneuver and combat rolls.

spell.name: Mass Unminding
