spell.description: Target's mind is completely blank for the duration. He cannot perceive events, time, or activity, he is stunned for 1 round after his mind comes back.

spell.name: Melt Ice
spell.description: Melts up to 10 cu'/lvl of ice.

spell.name: Loosen Earth
spell.description: Loosens 100 cu' of earth tot he consistency of plowed ground.

spell.name: Erosions
spell.description: Causes a 100 cu'/lvl section of inorganic material to erode and deteriorate at 1000 x normal rate.

spell.name: Cracks Call
spell.description: Any previous cracks or flaws in material up to 10' x 10' x 10' (not 1000 cu feet) section will extend to their limit.

spell.name: Undoor
spell.description: Will vaporize a nonmagic door up to 6" thick, 10' high, and 10' wide (if the door is thicker than 6" it will vaporize the closes 6").

spell.name: Stone/Earth
spell.description: Changes 100 cu' of stone to packed earth; change is gradual and takes 3 rnds.

spell.name: Earth/Mud
spell.description: Changes 100 cu' of earth to soft mud; change is gradual and takes 3 rnds.

spell.name: Corridor
spell.description: Creates a 3' x 6' corridor that is 1'/lvl long; it can be cut through any non metal, inorganic material. The corridor can be cut at a rate of 1' (length) per rnd as the caster concentrates.

spell.name: Shatter
spell.description: Can shatter an inorganic object, up to 1 cu'. All within a 5' R take an "A" impact critical and holder takes a "C".

spell.name: Unearth
spell.description: Disintegrates 100 cu' of earth.

spell.name: Unstone
spell.description: Disintegrates 100 cu' of stone.

spell.name: Undoor True
spell.description: Will vaporize any single door, no size limit.

spell.name: Unmetal
spell.description: Disintegrates 1 cu' of metal.

spell.name: Long Solid Destruction
spell.description: As any single 10th level or lower spell on this list, except with a range of 300'.

spell.name: Crevasse
spell.description: Causes a large crack to open in the ground. The size of the crack will be up to 10' wide, up to 100Ä deep and up to 200' long. The crack takes 2 rounds to open.

spell.name: Solid Destruction True
spell.description: Disintegrates 1 cu'/lvl of any inanimate solid.

spell.name: Tremors
spell.description: Causes a very minor earthquake which could cause shoddy construction to collapse (can be very terrifying). This is approximately 5.5 on the Richter scale.

spell.name: Great Crack
spell.description: Causes a large crevice to open tin the ground (up to 10'/lvl deep, 1'/lvl wide and 20'/lvl long). The crevice takes 2 round to open. The caster can concentrate for 3 rounds to close the crevice.

spell.name: Quake
spell.description: Caster can cause an earthquake, with the spot he touches as the epicenter. The quake can be delayed up to 1 rnd/lvl. The severity of the quake on the Richter scale is determined by a roll: (01-20) = 5.5, (21-45) = 6, (46-65) = 6.5, (66-80) = 7.0, (81-90) = 7.5, (91-95) = 8.0, (96-98) = 8.5, (99-100) = 9.0.

spell.name: Question
spell.description: Target must answer a single concept question.

spell.name: Demonic Possession I
spell.description: Target is possessed by a Type 1 Demon (see Evil Magician list Dark Summons); caster has no control of the target or Demon. The Demon will force the target to do random (not necessarily destructive) things; target gets an RR every other round to attempt to get rid of the Demon.

spell.name: Neurosis
spell.description: Target has an extreme dislike for any specific thing the caster chooses; target has a 50% of overcoming the neurosis when given a choice (e.g., neurosis concerning horses would mean that every time the target tried to get on or near a horse he would only have a 50% chance).

spell.name: Guilt
spell.description: Target becomes guilty over some action in his past; he will not perform such an action again.

spell.name: Paranoia
spell.description: Target believes everyone is out to get him; he will trust no one.

spell.name: Demonic Possession II
spell.description: Target is possessed by a Type 2 Demon (see Evil Magician list Dark Summons); caster has no control of the target or Demon. The Demon will force the target to do random (not necessarily destructive) things; target gets an RR every minute to attempt to get rid of the Demon.

spell.name: Panic
spell.description: Target will flee in panic in any personally dangerous situation, unless he successfully makes an RR.

spell.name: Transferral
spell.description: Target's "soul" and the caster's "soul" are interchanged. The caster can operate at 50% of his normal activity in the body of the target. The target in the caster's body is inactive. The caster can cancel the spell at any time (takes 1 round), the target can only cancel the spell if he makes a successful RR (he gets one every 10 minutes). If either body is killed, both "souls" will be destroyed (as Absolution).

spell.name: Demonic Possession III
spell.description: Target is possessed by a Type 3 Demon (see Evil Magician list Dark Summons); caster has no control of the target or Demon. The Demon will force the target to do random (not necessarily destructive) things; target gets an RR once every ten minutes to attempt to get rid of the Demon.

spell.name: Subjugation
spell.description: Part of the target's soul is taken and placed in an organic object on the caster's person; the body of the target will act as the caster directs whenever he concentrates. The spell is canceled when the caster cancels it or the object is destroyed or the body is more than 100' from the caster or the object leaves the caster's person. If the caster is not concentrating the target is free to do anything he wants, at -30 to all activities.

spell.name: Unsoul Curse
spell.description: Part of the target's soul is transferred to a random object within 100 miles; the target is at -30 to all activities until the object is destroyed. The target will always know the direction of his "soul".

spell.name: Demonic Possession IV
spell.description: Target is possessed by a Type 4 Demon (see Evil Magician list Dark Summons); caster has no control of the target or Demon. The Demon will force the target to do random (not necessarily destructive) things; target gets an RR once every hour to attempt to get rid of the Demon.

spell.name: Word of Panic
spell.description: Target flees in total panic from caster.

spell.name: Shout of Panic
spell.description: All targets in area of effect flee in total panic from caster.

spell.name: Long Soul Destruction
spell.description: As any single 10th level or lower spell on this list, except with a range of 300'.

spell.name: Dark Slumbers
spell.description: The target is put into a state of deep sleep from which he will not awake or age. He will only die if his body is killed. This sleep will continue until dispelled or until a single, non-magical event (specified by the caster at the time of casting) is accomplished. Note that the cast must specify the non-magical condition (i.e. it is not an option).

spell.name: Banishment
spell.description: Part of the target's soul is taken and placed in an organic object on the caster's person; the body of the target will act as the caster directs whenever he concentrates. The spell is canceled when the caster cancels it or the object is destroyed If the caster is not concentrating the target is free to do anything he wants, at -30 to all activities. The target is always aware of the direction of the object holding his "soul".

spell.name: Transferral True
spell.description: Target's "soul" and the caster's "soul" are interchanged. The caster can operate at 90% of his normal activity in the body of the target. The target in the caster's body is inactive. The caster can cancel the spell at any time (takes 1 round), the target can only cancel the spell if he makes a successful RR (he gets one every hour). If either body is killed, both "souls" will be destroyed (as Absolution).

spell.name: Absolution
spell.description: Target's "soul" is torn from his body; it remains in whatever place "souls" go for 30 days/10 failure. The soul can be returned early only through the spell Lifegiving. Target is unconscious until soul is restored; even for subconscious activity, he is at -75.

spell.name: Absolution Pure
spell.description: Target's "soul" is torn from his body. The soul can only be returned through the spell Lifegiving. Target is unconscious until soul is restored; even for subconscious activity, he is at -75.

spell.name: Force Analysis III
spell.description: Forces a Type 1, 2, or 3 Demon who is present (or contacted) to analyze one item, the chance of a Demon successfully analyzing each property of the item is: Type 1 (0%), Type 2 (0%), Type 3 (10%), Type 4 (30%), Type 5 (60%), Type 6 (90%). This spell fails if a 1-100 roll is less than or equal to the Demon's type (i.e., against a Type 3 Demon this spell fails on a 01 to 03). Failure results as in Lesser Demonic Gate in Dark Summons.The caster makes a 1-100 roll, adds the Demon Type times ten, and receives one of the following effects -(11-20) Roll on the attack column of the Spell Failure table(21-40) Caster takes a "A" Impact Critical(41-60) Caster takes a "B" Impact Critical(61-75) Caster takes a "C" Impact Critical(76-90) Caster takes a "D" Impact Critical(91-100) Caster takes a "E" Impact Critical(>100) Demon gives caster a Quest (GM discretion)The caster and the Demon make no RRs. The roll is open-ended. The Demon always leaves if uncontrolled.

spell.name: Lesser Demonic Contact
spell.description: Caster contacts a Demon. Roll for Type: (01-60) Type 1, (61-90) Type 2, (91-100) Type 3. If the Demon is not "Forced" (i.e. one of the Force spells this list) the demon will leave and the caster suffers one of the following effects. First make a 1-100 roll and add 10 times the Demon's Type - if (01-90) roll on the Spell Failure Table (attack section); if (91-up) effect depends on the "Force" spell intended: Force Analysis = Lose item, Force Information = coma (same # of weeks as Demon Type), Force Search = quest (GM discretion).

spell.name: Force Information III
spell.description: Forces a Type 1, 2, or 3 Demon who is present (or contacted) to answer one yes or no question, whose answer exists in someone's unshielded mind. The chance of a Demon successfully answering the question is: Type 1 (0%), Type 2 (0%), Type 3 (10%), Type 4 (30%), Type 5 (60%), Type 6 (90%). This spell fails if a 1-100 roll is less than or equal to the Demon's type (i.e., against a Type 3 Demon this spell fails on a 01 to 03). Failure results as in Lesser Demonic Gate in Dark Summons.The caster makes a 1-100 roll, adds the Demon Type times three, and receives one of the following effects -(11-20) Roll on the attack column of the Spell Failure table(21-40) Caster takes a "A" Impact Critical(41-60) Caster takes a "B" Impact Critical(61-75) Caster takes a "C" Impact Critical(76-90) Caster takes a "D" Impact Critical(91-100) Caster takes a "E" Impact Critical(>100) Demon gives caster a Quest (GM discretion)The caster and the Demon make no RRs. The roll is open-ended. The Demon always leaves if uncontrolled.

spell.name: Force Search III
spell.description: Forces a Type 1 to 3 Demon who is present (or contacted) to conduct a search for a specific person, place, or thing. The Demon searches but not on our plane of existence. The chance of a Demon successfully completing the search is: Type 1 (0%), Type 2 (0%), Type 3 (10%), Type 4 (30%), Type 5 (60%), Type 6 (90%). This spell fails if a 1-100 roll is less than or equal to the Demon's type (i.e., against a Type 3 Demon this spell fails on a 01 to 03). Failure results as in Lesser Demonic Gate in Dark Summons.The caster makes a 1-100 roll, adds the Demon Type times five, and receives one of the following effects -(11-20) Roll on the attack column of the Spell Failure table(21-40) Caster takes a "A" Impact Critical(41-60) Caster takes a "B" Impact Critical(61-75) Caster takes a "C" Impact Critical(76-90) Caster takes a "D" Impact Critical(91-100) Caster takes a "E" Impact Critical(>100) Demon gives caster a Quest (GM discretion)The caster and the Demon make no RRs. The roll is open-ended. The Demon always leaves if uncontrolled.

spell.name: Greater Demonic Contact
spell.description: Caster contacts a Demon. Roll for Type: (01-60) Type 3, (61-85) Type 4, (86-95) Type 5, (96-100) Type 6. If the Demon is not "Forced" (i.e. one of the Force spells this list) the demon will leave and the caster suffers one of the following effects. First make a 1-100 roll and add 10 times the Demon's Type - if (01-90) roll on the Spell Failure Table (attack section); if (91-up) effect depends on the "Force" spell intended: Force Analysis = Lose item, Force Information = coma (same # of weeks as Demon Type), Force Search = quest (GM discretion).

spell.name: Force Analysis IV
spell.description: Forces a Type 1, 2, 3, or 4 Demon who is present (or contacted) to analyze one item, the chance of a Demon successfully analyzing each property of the item is: Type 1 (0%), Type 2 (0%), Type 3 (10%), Type 4 (30%), Type 5 (60%), Type 6 (90%). This spell fails if a 1-100 roll is less than or equal to the Demon's type (i.e., against a Type 3 Demon this spell fails on a 01 to 03). Failure results as in Lesser Demonic Gate in Dark Summons.The caster makes a 1-100 roll, adds the Demon Type times ten, and receives one of the following effects -(11-20) Roll on the attack column of the Spell Failure table(21-40) Caster takes a "A" Impact Critical(41-60) Caster takes a "B" Impact Critical(61-75) Caster takes a "C" Impact Critical(76-90) Caster takes a "D" Impact Critical(91-100) Caster takes a "E" Impact Critical(>100) Demon gives caster a Quest (GM discretion)The caster and the Demon make no RRs. The roll is open-ended. The Demon always leaves if uncontrolled.

spell.name: Force Information IV
spell.description: Forces a Type 1 to 4 Demon who is present (or contacted) to answer one yes or no question, whose answer exists in someone's unshielded mind. The chance of a Demon successfully answering the question is: Type 1 (0%), Type 2 (0%), Type 3 (10%), Type 4 (30%), Type 5 (60%), Type 6 (90%). This spell fails if a 1-100 roll is less than or equal to the Demon's type (i.e., against a Type 3 Demon this spell fails on a 01 to 03). Failure results as in Lesser Demonic Gate in Dark Summons.The caster makes a 1-100 roll, adds the Demon Type times three, and receives one of the following effects -(11-20) Roll on the attack column of the Spell Failure table(21-40) Caster takes a "A" Impact Critical(41-60) Caster takes a "B" Impact Critical(61-75) Caster takes a "C" Impact Critical(76-90) Caster takes a "D" Impact Critical(91-100) Caster takes a "E" Impact Critical(>100) Demon gives caster a Quest (GM discretion)The caster and the Demon make no RRs. The roll is open-ended. The Demon always leaves if uncontrolled.

spell.description: Forces a Type 1 to 4 Demon who is present (or contacted) to conduct a search for a specific person, place, or thing. The Demon searches but not on our plane of existence. The chance of a Demon successfully completing the search is: Type 1 (0%), Type 2 (0%), Type 3 (10%), Type 4 (30%), Type 5 (60%), Type 6 (90%). This spell fails if a 1-100 roll is less than or equal to the Demon's type (i.e., against a Type 3 Demon this spell fails on a 01 to 03). Failure results as in Lesser Demonic Gate in Dark Summons.The caster makes a 1-100 roll, adds the Demon Type times five, and receives one of the following effects -(11-20) Roll on the attack column of the Spell Failure table(21-40) Caster takes a "A" Impact Critical(41-60) Caster takes a "B" Impact Critical(61-75) Caster takes a "C" Impact Critical(76-90) Caster takes a "D" Impact Critical(91-100) Caster takes a "E" Impact Critical(>100) Demon gives caster a Quest (GM discretion)The caster and the Demon make no RRs. The roll is open-ended. The Demon always leaves if uncontrolled.

spell.name: Demonic Analysis Link
spell.description: As Demonic Information Link, except will act as a a Greater Demonic Contact and then a a Force Analysis IV.

spell.name: Demonic Information Link
spell.description: Creates a permanent link to the world of Demons. The target of this spell must be a large object or location. Upon activation, the target object or place will act as a Greater Demonic Contact and then a Force Information IV. The target object or place can only be activated once per day. For example, this spell could be cast upon a large mirror. Someone could use the mirror once per day to attempt to find out the answer to his question (i.e., "Mirror, Mirror, on the wall...")

spell.name: Familiar
spell.description: The caster can attune himself to a small animal (to be called his familiar). The caster must obtain the animal and cast the spell on the animal once/day for 1 week (concentrating for 2 hours/day). The caster can then control the familiar and view the world through its senses by concentrating on it (must be within 50'/lvl). If the animal is killed the caster will have a -25 modification to all actions for two weeks.

spell.name: Summons I
spell.description: Caster can instantly summon a first level non-intelligent creature that he can control by concentrating on it. The creature disappears after 1 minute (6 rounds). The general type of the creature can be specified by the caster but exactly what the creature is should be determined randomly (e.g., the caster could specify four-legged, hoofed and could get a zebra, horse, camel, etc.).

spell.name: Investiture I
spell.description: This spell is cast upon the caster's familiar. However, the familiar must be a type of animal that is usually associated with "evil" (e.g. a reptile, a bat, a raven, etc.) This spell transfers part of the caster's "life" into the familiar. This spell must be cast upon the familiar every day for a month (concentrating for 2 hours a day). The familiar retains all his old abilities and gains special abilities. The familiar will become a malformed version of the animal it once was (more grotesque). The caster can view the world through the senses of the creature at a range of 250' per level. The creature's AT changes to 4 and it gains a +10 to its DB and OB. The caster can cast spells through the familiar as if the caster were exactly where the familiar is (this includes casting "self" spells on the familiar - the range for this ability is 50' per level). The creature will make all of its RR at half the caster's level (or its own level, whichever is higher). The familiar can be sent on long range missions relating to the caster's nature. If the familiar dies, the caster will lose one quarter of his Power Points and Hits for 1-5 weeks (can't be regained by any means until time has passed).

spell.name: Summons II
spell.description: As Summons I, except caster can also choose one of the following options: a. the level of the summoned creature is increased by one, b. an extra first level is summoned or c. the duration can be doubled.

spell.name: Binding II
spell.description: Caster can bind one creature (animal intelligence, up to second level). The bound creature must follow the commands of the caster (the caster does not have to concentrate). The caster can only have as many creatures bond as he has levels. If the creature is ever outside of the range of the spell, the spell is dispelled.

spell.name: Summons III
spell.description: As Summons II, except it has 2 options.

spell.name: Order Bound II
spell.description: The target of this spell is any creature (animal intelligence, up to second level) that has been bond (with a Binding spell). The caster can give a simple, straight-forward task to the creature to attempt to complete. The creature will do its best to complete the task (within the duration of the spell). When the duration of this spell expires, the creature returns to its "unbound" status.

spell.name: Summons V
spell.description: As Summons II, except it has four options.

spell.name: Binding V
spell.description: As Binding II, except binds up to 5th level creature.

spell.name: Summons VII
spell.description: As Summons II, except it has six options.

spell.name: Investiture II
spell.description: The target of this spell is a familiar that has had Invenstiture I successfully cast upon it. This spell puts more of the caster into his familiar. The caster must cast this spell once per day for six month (for 2 hours each day). The caster can use the familiar's sense up to 1000 feet per level away; can cast spells through the familiar up to 200' per level away; the creature's AT improves to 11; it gets a DB bonus of +20 (to the original DB); it gets a OB bonus of +30 (to the original OB); gains a poisonous attack that is used in conjunction with its normal attack (bite, sting, etc.); makes RRs at three quarters the caster's level or its own level (whichever is higher); it appearance continue to become more grotesque (assuming the nature of the caster - it may not be recognized as the animal-type that it once was). If the familiar dies, the caster loses half his Power Points and Hits for 1-5 weeks.

spell.name: Summons X
spell.description: As Summons II, except it has nine options.

spell.name: Binding X
spell.description: As Binding II, except binds up to a 10th level creature.

spell.name: Summons XII
spell.description: As Summons II, except it has eleven options.

spell.name: Order Bound X
spell.description: As Order Bound II, except affects up to a 10th level creature.

spell.name: Summons XV
spell.description: As Summons II, except it has fourteen options.

spell.name: Binding XV
spell.description: As Binding II, except binds a 15th level creature.

spell.name: Summons XVII
spell.description: As Summons II, except it has sixteen options.

spell.name: Investiture III
spell.description: As Invenstiture II, except familiar becomes even more part of the caster. Investiture II must already have been completed, then the caster must cast this spell once per day for one year (for 2 hours each day). Caster can use the familiar's senses up to 1 mile per level; can cast spells through the familiar up to 1000' per level away; the creature's AT improves to 12; it gets a DB of +30 (to the original DB); it gets an OB bonus of +50 (to the original OB); gains a minor breath weapon attack (in addition to its normal attacks), makes its RRs at the caster's level (or its own, whichever is higher); its form becomes completely grotesque and could not be associated with the animal it once was. However, if the familiar dies, the caster loses three quarters of his Power Points and Hits for 1-5 weeks.

spell.name: Lord Summons
spell.description: As Summons II, except has nineteen options:

spell.name: Binding True
spell.description: As Binding II, except binds any creature.

spell.name: Order Bound True
spell.description: As Order Bound II, except affects any level creature.

spell.name: Summon Mastery
spell.description: Caster can use any lower spell on this list, once per round.

spell.name: Darkness II
spell.description: Darkens a 20' R area about the point touched as if it was a dark night; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object / being.

spell.name: Nightvision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' on a clear night as if it were day.

spell.name: Dark Control II
spell.description: Caster can vary the intensity of darkness in the area, but he cannot lighten it past its natural state.

spell.name: Darkness X
spell.description: Darkens a 100' R area about the point touched as if it was a dark night; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object / being.

spell.name: Darkvision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' on a clear night as if it were day. This also works in all darknesses (even magical).

spell.name: Dark Control V
spell.description: Caster can vary the intensity of darkness in the area, but he cannot lighten it past its natural state.

spell.name: Shadow Forms
spell.description: Caster can create either the visual illusion of shadow figures or real shadows (as many as the caster's level).

spell.name: Lesser Darkness
spell.description: Darkens a 300' R area about the point touched as if it was a dark night; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object / being.

spell.name: Lesser Utterdark
spell.description: Darkens a 20' R area about the point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being. This dark is absolute, no nonmagical light can exist inside.

spell.name: Dark Control X
spell.description: Caster can vary the intensity of darkness in the area, but he cannot lighten it past its natural state.

spell.name: Nightvision True
spell.description: Caster can see on a clear night as if it were day. The range is the normal daylight vision range.

spell.name: Utterdark
spell.description: Darkens a 100' R area about the point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being. This dark is absolute, no nonmagical light can exist inside.

spell.name: Minor Darkness
spell.description: Darkens a 500' R area about the point touched as if it was a dark night; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object / being.

spell.name: Clouds of Darkness I
spell.description: Creates a "cloud" of darkness that has a 100' R and drifts with the wind. The darkness is as in the darkest night (spell Darkness).

spell.name: Mass Nightvision
spell.description: As Nightvision, except affects a number of targets equal to caster's level.

spell.name: Greater Utterdark
spell.description: As Lesser Utterdark, except area of effect is 200'.

spell.name: Mass Darkvision
spell.description: As Darkvision, except affects a number of targets equal to caster's level.

spell.name: Clouds of Darkness II
spell.description: As Clouds of Darkness I, except for area of effect.

spell.name: Greater Darkness
spell.description: Darkens a 1000' R area about the point touched as if it was a dark night; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object / being.

spell.name: Utterdark True
spell.description: Darkens a 300' R area about the point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being. This dark is absolute, no nonmagical light can exist inside.

spell.name: Darkness True
spell.description: Darkens a 100' R / Level area about the point touched as if it was a dark night; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object / being.

spell.name: Clouds of Darkness True
spell.description: Creates a "cloud" of darkness that has a 1 Mile per level R and drifts with the wind. The darkness is as in the darkest night (spell Darkness).

spell.name: Summon Elemental I
spell.description: Caster summons an Elemental Servant (a Type I Entity) that gradually appears over the course of two rounds. If it is not "controlled" or "Mastered" (usually by one of the spells on this list); it will attack random targets until it fades away after 2-20 rounds.

spell.name: Control Entity I
spell.description: Allows the caster to totally control a Type I Entity (the chance of non-control is [Entity's Type]x2%). The Entity leaves when the caster stops concentrating. The Entity will not speak with the summoner.

spell.name: Summon Elemental II
spell.description: As Summon Elemental I, except the caster summons a Weak Elemental (a Type II entity).

spell.name: Lesser Demonic Gate
spell.description: Caster summons a Demon who gradually appears over the course of 2 rounds. Roll d100 (not open-ended) for Type. A results of 01-60 is Type I, a results of 61-90 is Type II; a result of 91-100 is Type III. If the Demon is not "Controlled" or "Mastered" (i.e. usually by one of the spells on this list) before the Demon materializes, the caster suffers an effect as outlined in Spell Law 7.1.31.

spell.name: Entity Mastery I
spell.description: As Control Entity I, except the caster needs not concentrate to control the Entity. The chance of failure is 4% times the Entity's Type. The Entity will remain and obey the caster until the caster is killed or the Entity is outside the range limit or the caster releases him. A maximum of two Entities can be mastered at one time by one being. Obtaining information may only be accomplished by using spells off Dark Contacts.

spell.name: Control Entity II
spell.description: As Control Entity I, except Type II can be controlled.

spell.name: Summon Elemental III
spell.description: As Summon Elemental I, except caster summons a Guardian Elemental (a Type III Entity).

spell.name: Entity Mastery II
spell.description: As Entity Master I, except Type I and II can be mastered.

spell.name: Control Entity III
spell.description: As Control Entity I, except Type III can be controlled.

spell.name: Summon Elemental IV
spell.description: As Summon Elemental I, except caster summons a Strong Elemental (a Type IV Entity).

spell.name: Greater Demonic Gate
spell.description: As Lesser Demonic Gate, except Types III-VI can be summoned: (01-60) Type III, (61-85) Type IV (85-95) Type V, (96-100) Type VI

spell.name: Entity Mastery III
spell.description: As Entity Master I, except Types I-III can be mastered.

spell.name: Control Entity IV
spell.description: As Control Entity I, except Types I-IV can be controlled.

spell.name: Entity Mastery IV
spell.description: As Entity Master I, except Types I-IV can be mastered.

spell.name: Order Elemental
spell.description: The target of this spell is any Mastered Elemental. The Elemental can be given a simple, straight-forward task that it will attempt to complete (within the duration of the spell). When this spell expires, the Elemental returns to its plane.

spell.name: Contain Elemental
spell.description: The target of this spell is any Mastered Elemental. The Elemental is contained within an object (must be within 50% of the elemental's actual size). The Elemental will be release by a specific trigger (specified by the caster at time of casting). Possible triggers include touching the object, proximity to the object, specific words spoken, etc.

spell.name: Order Entity
spell.description: As Order Elemental, except will work on any Mastered Entity.

spell.name: Contain Entity
spell.description: As Contain Elemental, except will work on any Mastered Entity.

spell.name: Control Entity V
spell.description: As Control Entity I, except Types I-V can be controlled.

spell.name: Entity Mastery V
spell.description: As Entity Master I, except Types I-V can be mastered.

spell.name: Control Entity VI
spell.description: As Control Entity I, except Types I-VI can be controlled.

spell.name: Entity Mastery VI
spell.description: As Entity Master I, except Types I-VI can be mastered.

spell.name: Un-Ice I
spell.description: Turns 100 cu' of ice into water vapor.

spell.name: Earth to Dust I
spell.description: Turns 10 cu' of earth into fine dust.

spell.name: Cracks Call
spell.description: Any previous cracks or flaws within a section of any normal material 1000 cu' (10' x 10' x 10') will extend to their limit.

spell.name: Powder Stone I
spell.description: Turns 10 cu' of stone into fine powder.

spell.name: Un-Ice X
spell.description: Turns 1000 cu' of ice into water vapor.

spell.name: Disruption I
spell.description: Turns 1 cu' of any inorganic material to fine powder (must be one object).

spell.name: Earth to Dust X
spell.description: Turns 100 cu' of earth into fine dust.

spell.name: Shatter
spell.description: Causes 1 cu' of inorganic material to shatter into small pieces; all within 5' take an A impact critical, holder takes a C.

spell.name: Powder Stone X
spell.description: Turns 100 cu' of stone into fine powder.

spell.name: Un-Ice True
spell.description: Turns 100 cu' of ice / caster level into water vapor.

spell.name: Disruption X
spell.description: Turns 10 cu' of any inorganic material to fine powder (must be one object).

spell.name: Earth to Dust True
spell.description: Turns 1000 cu' of earth into fine dust.

spell.name: Cause Cracks
spell.description: Causes cracks to appear in up to 100 cu; of nonmetal, inorganic material.

spell.name: Powder Stone True
spell.description: Turns 1000 cu' of stone into fine powder.

spell.name: Disintegration I
spell.description: Completely disintegrates 1 cu' of inorganic material.

spell.name: Long Matter Disruption
spell.description: As any single spell (10th level or lower) form this list, except with a range of 300'.

spell.name: Disintegration X
spell.description: As Disintegration I, except affects 10 cubic feet.

spell.name: Mass Earth to Dust
spell.description: Turns 100 cu' / Level of earth into fine dust.

spell.name: Mass Powder Stone
spell.description: Turns 100 cu'/ Level of stone into fine powder.

spell.name: Mass Disruption
spell.description: Turns 1 cu ' of any inorganic material to fine powder (must be one object). As many objects as the caster has levels can be affected, and range is 100'.

spell.name: Disintegration True
spell.description: Completely disintegrates 100 cu' of inorganic material.

spell.name: Pain
spell.description: Target feels pain, and he takes 20% of his remaining hits.

spell.name: Impair I
spell.description: Target has one of his physical stats (characteristics) temporarily lowered (5 in a 1-100 system, 1 in a 3-18 system). If a system of temporary/permanent stats is used, only the temporary stat is lowered. Physical stats include Strength, Agility, Quickness, Constitution, Appearance, dexterity, etc.

spell.name: Ache
spell.description: The target feels pain that seems natural and reduces his hits by 10% until cured (caster must specify nature of ache). The target is unaware that the spell has been cast on him, since it affects him gradually.

spell.name: Fire Nerves
spell.description: Target feels pain, and he takes 40% of his remaining hits.

spell.name: Trait Erosion I
spell.description: Target has one of his physical stats (characteristics) temporarily lowered (5 in a 1-100 system, 1 in a 3-18 system). If a system of temporary/permanent stats is used, both the temporary and permanent stat is lowered. Physical stats include Strength, Agility, Quickness, Constitution, Appearance, dexterity, etc.

spell.name: Impair III
spell.description: Target has one of his physical stats (characteristics) temporarily lowered (15 in a 1-100 system, 1 in a 3-18 system). If a system of temporary/permanent stats is used, only the temporary stat is lowered. Physical stats include Strength, Agility, Quickness, Constitution, Appearance, dexterity, etc.

spell.name: Pang
spell.description: The target feels pain that seems natural and reduces his hits by 20% until cured (caster must specify nature of pang). The target is unaware that the spell has been cast on him, since it affects him gradually.

spell.name: Agony
spell.description: Target feels pain, and he takes 60% of his remaining hits.

spell.name: Trait Erosion II
spell.description: Target has one of his physical stats (characteristics) temporarily lowered (10 in a 1-100 system, 1 in a 3-18 system). If a system of temporary/permanent stats is used, both the temporary and permanent stat is lowered. Physical stats include Strength, Agility, Quickness, Constitution, Appearance, dexterity, etc.

spell.name: Impair V
spell.description: Target has one of his physical stats (characteristics) temporarily lowered (25 in a 1-100 system, 1 in a 3-18 system). If a system of temporary/permanent stats is used, only the temporary stat is lowered. Physical stats include Strength, Agility, Quickness, Constitution, Appearance, dexterity, etc.

spell.name: Spasm
spell.description: The target feels pain that seems natural and reduces his hits by 40% until cured (caster must specify nature of spasm). The target is unaware that the spell has been cast on him, since it affects him gradually.

spell.name: Mass Pain
spell.description: One target per level feels pain, and he takes 20% of his remaining hits.

spell.name: Torment
spell.description: Target feels pain, and he takes 90% of his remaining hits.

spell.name: Trait Erosion III
spell.description: Target has one of his physical stats (characteristics) temporarily lowered (15 in a 1-100 system, 1 in a 3-18 system). If a system of temporary/permanent stats is used, both the temporary and permanent stat is lowered. Physical stats include Strength, Agility, Quickness, Constitution, Appearance, dexterity, etc.

spell.name: Mass Impair I
spell.description: As Impair I, except affects a number of targets equal to caster's level.

spell.name: Mass Fire Nerves
spell.description: As Fire Nerves, except affects a number of targets equal to caster's level.

spell.name: Mass Trait Erosion I
spell.description: As Trait Erosion I, except affects a number of targets equal to caster's level.

spell.name: Impair X
spell.description: Target has one of his physical stats (characteristics) temporarily lowered (50 in a 1-100 system, 1 in a 3-18 system). If a system of temporary/permanent stats is used, only the temporary stat is lowered. Physical stats include Strength, Agility, Quickness, Constitution, Appearance, dexterity, etc.

spell.name: Mass Agony
spell.description: As Agony, except as many targets as the caster's level can be affected.

spell.name: Trait Erosion V
spell.description: Target has one of his physical stats (characteristics) temporarily lowered (25 in a 1-100 system, 1 in a 3-18 system). If a system of temporary/permanent stats is used, both the temporary and permanent stat is lowered. Physical stats include Strength, Agility, Quickness, Constitution, Appearance, dexterity, etc.

spell.name: Trait Erosion True
spell.description: Target has one of his physical stats (characteristics) temporary and potential lowered to 1. Physical stats include Strength, Agility, Quickness, Constitution, Appearance, dexterity, etc.

spell.name: Anticipate Missile
spell.description: Caster can attempt to avoid one missile shot fired at him. The missile must be in his field of vision when the spell is cast. The caster gets a bonus of +50 to his DB against this attack.

spell.name: Anticipate Blow
spell.description: As Anticipate Missile, except allies to one melee attack that the caster is aware of.

spell.name: Guess
spell.description: When faced with a choice about which he has little or no information (e.g., which corridor leads outside the quickest) the caster may cast this spell and the Gamemaster will determine which way he goes, biasing the choice favorable by 25% (e.g., roll 1-100: incorrect on 1-25).

spell.name: Anticipate Spell
spell.description: Caster can avoid one spell cast on him. The caster gets a bonus of +50 to his DB against a directed elemental attack; his normal DB against an area elemental attack; or the caster's BAR suffers -10 penalty (on all other spell attacks).

spell.name: Intuitions I
spell.description: Caster gains a vision of what will happen in the next minute if he takes a specific action.

spell.name: Anticipate Hostility
spell.description: Caster is aware of any being within the area of effect that has hostile intentions toward him. The hostility must be directed specifically at the caster or the spell reveals nothing. The being's hostility must be active (i.e., drive the being to perform aggressive actions), not passive (i.e., hate exists, but no action is planed).

spell.name: Dream I
spell.description: Caster has a dream relating to a topic decided upon just before retiring; limited to once per night.

spell.name: Room Feel I
spell.description: Caster has a vision of what has occurred in a room or place; limited to up to 1 min/lvl into the past.

spell.name: Anticipations
spell.description: Predicts the most probable action of a being in the next round; specifics are not learned (e.g., attack in melee, cast a spell; but no detail on attack target or what spell).

spell.name: Intuitions II
spell.description: Caster gains a vision of what will happen in the next two minutes if he takes a specific action.

spell.name: Room Feel II
spell.description: Caster has a vision of what has occurred in a room or place; limited to up to 1 hour/lvl into the past.

spell.name: Anticipate Hostility True
spell.description: As Anticipate Hostility, except for area of effect, duration and range.

spell.name: Dream II
spell.description: Caster has two dreams relating to two topics decided upon just before retiring; limited to once per night.

spell.name: Spell Anticipation
spell.description: Predicts the most probable action of a being in the next round if they are casting a spell; type of spell and the target are learned.

spell.name: Room Feel III
spell.description: Caster has a vision of what has occurred in a room or place; limited to up to 1 day/lvl into the past.

spell.name: Dream III
spell.description: Caster has three dreams relating to three topics decided upon just before retiring; limited to once per night.

spell.name: Room Feel True
spell.description: Caster has a vision of what has occurred in a room or place; limited to up to 1 week/lvl into the past.

spell.name: Intuitions True
spell.description: Caster gains a vision of what will happen in the next one minute per level if he takes a specific action.

spell.name: Anticipations True
spell.description: Predicts the most probable action of all beings in the next round within a 100' radius; specifics are not learned (e.g., attack in melee, cast a spell; but no detail on attack target or what spell).

spell.name: Dream V
spell.description: Caster has five dreams relating to five topics decided upon just before retiring; limited to once per night.

spell.name: Spell Anticipation True
spell.description: Predicts the most probable action of all beings within 100' in the next round if they are casting a spell; type of spell and the target are learned.

spell.name: Turn Missile
spell.description: Caster adds +20 to his DB versus one missile fired at the caster. The caster must be able to see the attack.

spell.name: Turn Blade
spell.description: As Turn Missile, except applies to a melee attack.

spell.name: Shield
spell.description: Creates an invisible force shield in front of the caster; it subtracts 25 from melee and missile attacks and functions as a normal shield.

spell.name: Deflect I
spell.description: Caster can deflect any one missile that passes within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the missile's attack (missile must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Bladeturn I
spell.description: Caster can deflect any one melee attack that passes within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the attack (attacks must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Aim Untrue I
spell.description: Caster can deflect any one missile that passes within 100' of him; this causes attack to automatically miss (missile must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Still Air
spell.description: Creates a pocket of still air 1"/lvl on all sides of the caster, that no outside gas can come into (duration is the time for the oxygen to be exhausted by one person).

spell.name: Deflect II
spell.description: Caster can deflect any two missiles that passes within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the missile's attack (missile must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Spell Deflect I
spell.description: Deflects one elemental spell against caster; attack roll has 50 subtracted from it (must be in field of vision).

spell.name: Bladeturn II
spell.description: Caster can deflect any one melee attack that passes within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the attack (attacks must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Deflect III
spell.description: Caster can deflect any three missiles that passes within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the missile's attack (missile must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Spell Deflect II
spell.description: Deflects two elemental spells against caster; attack roll has 50 subtracted from it (must be in field of vision).

spell.name: Bladeturn III
spell.description: Caster can deflect any three melee attacks that passes within 100' of him; this causes 100 to be subtracted from the attack (attacks must pass through caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Spell Deflect III
spell.description: Deflects three elemental spells against caster; attack roll has 50 subtracted from it (must be in field of vision).

spell.name: Deflect True
spell.description: Deflects three elemental spells against caster; or missile or melee attacks. Elemental spell rolls have 50 subtracted from them and melee or missile have 100 subtracted (must be in field of vision).

spell.name: Projected Light
spell.description: Beam of light (like a flashlight) springs from the caster's palm; 20' effective range.

spell.name: Glow
spell.description: Causes a small, 1" diameter point of light that will glow softly. This spell provides enough light for Nightvision to work properly; but not enough light to allow much mobility in the dark.

spell.name: Light I
spell.description: Lights a 10' R area about the point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: Self Aura
spell.description: Causes a bright aura about the caster, making him appear more powerful and subtracting 5 from all attacks.

spell.name: Light Eruption
spell.description: Causes a 10' R sphere of intense light, all within are stunned for 1 round/10 failure.

spell.name: Shock Bolt
spell.description: A bolt of intense, charged light is shot from the palm of the caster, results are determined on the Shock Bolt Table.

spell.name: Darkness I
spell.description: Darkens a 10' R area about the point touched as if it was a dark night; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: True Aura
spell.description: As Self Aura, except it makes him appear extremely powerful and subtracts 15 from all attacks.

spell.name: Light V
spell.description: Lights a 50' R area about the point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: Darkness V
spell.description: Darkens a 50' R area about the point touched as if it was a dark night; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: Hue
spell.description: Causes any object up to 1000 cu' to glow with any desired color.

spell.name: Beacon
spell.description: Ray of light of any color springs from caster's palm; can be up to 5 miles long.

spell.name: Greater Darkness
spell.description: Darkens a 100'/Lvl R area about the point touched as if it was a dark night; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being.

spell.name: Utterlight
spell.description: Lights a 100' R area about the point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being. This light is as bright and intense as sunlight at noon. It will dispell all magically created darkness.

spell.name: Utterdark
spell.description: Darkens a 100' R area about the point touched; if the point is on a mobile object or being, it will move with the object/being. This dark is absolute, no non-magical light can exist inside.

spell.name: Sunfires
spell.description: Focuses sunlight as a lens, must be focused initially on a fixed point. After 1 round, it can be moved at a rate of 1'/round. It will burn through a 1' diameter at a rate of: 1' wood/rnd, 4" stone/rnd, or 1" metal/rnd.

spell.name: Sunfires True
spell.description: Focuses light as a lens, must be focused initially on a fixed point. After 1 round, it can be moved at a rate of 1'/round. It will burn through a 1' diameter at a rate of: 1' wood/rnd, 4" stone/rnd, or 1" metal/rnd. No sunlight is required.

spell.name: Hand of Fire
spell.description: Focuses sunlight as a lens, is focused on a fixed point 6" from the open palm of the caster (caster's arm is immune) and it can be moved 10'/rnd. It can be used in a combat, it strikes on the Firebolt table (x2 hits) with an OB equal to 30 + caster's directed spell bonus with Hand of Fire; Concentration is not required if being used in melee.

spell.name: Hand of Fire True
spell.description: Focuses light as a lens (sunlight is not needed), is focused on a fixed point 6" from the open palm of the caster (caster's arm is immune) and it can be moved 10'/rnd. It can be used in a combat, it strikes on the Firebolt table (x2 hits) with an OB equal to 30 + caster's directed spell bonus with Hand of Fire; Concentration is not required if being used in melee.

spell.name: Blur
spell.description: Causes target to appear blurred to attackers, subtracting 10 from all attacks.

spell.name: Shadow
spell.description: Caster and objects on his person appear to be a shadow; and thus are almost invisible in dark areas (e.g., in many situations this could be handled with a stalk/hiding bonus between 25 and 75).

spell.name: Unseen
spell.description: A single object is made invisible (1 garment, 1 naked body, etc.); until 24 hrs pass or the object is struck by violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Cloaking I
spell.description: Target makes an RR. Failure results in the caster being invisible to the target; others see the caster normally. If the caster makes an obvious action (e.g. talking, moving an object, etc), the target may make another RR( the GM may deem it appropriate to apply modifiers to this RR based upon the action the caster takes). If the caster attacks the target, he may make another RR with a +50 modifier. If the caster begins to concentrate (50% activity), he can extend the duration of this spell indefinitely (as long as he can concentrate).

spell.name: Facades I
spell.description: A limited illusion that allows the caster to look like any humanoid figure within 20% of his own size.

spell.name: Cloaking III
spell.description: As Cloaking I, except the caster can affect 3 targets (the caster makes one BAR that applies to all targets).

spell.name: Cloaking Sphere I
spell.description: As Cloaking I, except every target in the area of effect must make a RR (one BAR a round for all targets). Once a target makes a successful RR, he need not make another RR against the spell.

spell.name: Cloaking V
spell.description: As Cloaking I, except the caster can affect 5 targets (the caster makes one BAR that applies to all targets).

spell.name: Cloaking Sphere II
spell.description: As Cloaking Sphere I, except for the area of effect.

spell.name: Shadow Mentalist I
spell.description: Creates a duplicate of the caster; if he concentrates, it will move as he wills; otherwise, it does exactly as he does.

spell.name: Facades II
spell.description: A limited illusion that allows the caster to look like any humanoid figure within 20% of his own size. This illusion may include sounds and voices.

spell.name: Cloaking X
spell.description: As Cloaking I, except the caster can affect 10 targets (the caster makes one BAR that applies to all targets).

spell.name: Cloaking Sphere III
spell.description: As Cloaking Sphere I, except for the area of effect.

spell.name: Displacement I
spell.description: Caster appears to be offset from where he really is, all attacks have not effect 10% of the time (no normal RRs). Each time a foe misses him, the chance of "no effect" for that foe goes down by 5%.

spell.name: Camouflage
spell.description: Caster and objects on his person take on the visual texture, color, and form of surrounding area; acts as near invisibility when motionless and gives a +50 bonus to Stalking attempts if he concentrates.

spell.name: Cloaking XX
spell.description: As Cloaking I, except the caster can affect 20 targets (the caster makes one BAR that applies to all targets).

spell.name: Displacement II
spell.description: Caster appears to be offset from where he really is, all attacks have not effect 20% of the time (no normal RRs). Each time a foe misses him, the chance of "no effect" for that foe goes down by 5%.

spell.name: Cloaking Sphere V
spell.description: As Cloaking Sphere I, except for the area of effect.

spell.name: Shadow Mentalist II
spell.description: Creates two duplicates of the caster; if he concentrates, they will move as he wills; otherwise, they do exactly as he does.

spell.name: Displacement III
spell.description: Caster appears to be offset from where he really is, all attacks have not effect 30% of the time (no normal RRs). Each time a foe misses him, the chance of "no effect" for that foe goes down by 5%.

spell.name: Camouflage True
spell.description: Caster and objects on his person take on the visual texture, color, and form of surrounding area; acts as near invisibility when motionless and gives a +75 bonus to Stalking attempts. No concentration is required.

spell.name: True Cloaking
spell.description: As Cloaking I, except the caster can affect as many targets as he has levels and the range is only limited to the caster's field of vision.

spell.name: Heat Resistance
spell.description: Caster is protected from natural heat up to 200 degrees F; +20 to all RRs vs. heat; -20 to elemental fire/heat attacks. If caster doesn't concentrate the effects are halved.

spell.name: Cold Resistance
spell.description: Caster is protected from natural cold up to -20 degrees F; +20 to all RRs vs. cold; -20 to elemental ice/cold attacks. If caster doesn't concentrate the effects are halved.

spell.name: Unpain I
spell.description: Caster is able to sustain an additional 25% of his total concussion hits (round off) before passing out; hits are still taken and remain when the spell lapses.

spell.name: Stun Relief I
spell.description: Relieves one round's worth of accumulated stun.

spell.name: Resist Poison
spell.description: Delays the effect of a poison as long as the caster concentrates.

spell.name: Unpain II
spell.description: Caster is able to sustain an additional 50% of his total concussion hits (round off) before passing out; hits are still taken and remain when the spell lapses.

spell.name: Stun Relief III
spell.description: Relieves three rounds' worth of accumulated stun.

spell.name: Neutralize Poison
spell.description: Has a 50% chance of neutralizing a poison (modified by the potency) if caster concentrates for 1 hour. In any case, it delays the poison for as long as the caster can concentrate.

spell.name: Awake
spell.description: Will awaken the caster from sleep the round after casting.

spell.name: Unpain III
spell.description: Caster is able to sustain an additional 75% of his total concussion hits (round off) before passing out; hits are still taken and remain when the spell lapses.

spell.name: Heat Resistance True
spell.description: Caster is immune to natural heat; +20 to all RRs vs. heat; -20 to elemental fire/heat attacks. And takes half damage from all fire/heat attacks. If caster doesn't concentrate the effects are halved.

spell.name: Cold Resistance True
spell.description: Caster is immune to natural cold; +20 to all RRs vs. heat; -20 to elemental ice/cold attacks. And takes half damage from all ice/cold attacks. If caster doesn't concentrate the effects are halved.

spell.name: Unpain IV
spell.description: Caster is able to sustain an additional 100% of his total concussion hits (round off) before passing out; hits are still taken and remain when the spell lapses.

spell.name: Neutralize Poison True
spell.description: Has a 100% chance of neutralizing a poison (modified by the potency) if caster concentrates for 1 hour. In any case, it delays the poison for as long as the caster can concentrate.

spell.name: Awake True
spell.description: Will awaken the caster from sleep immediately and it can be set to be triggered by any activity (e.g., attack, danger, etc.).

spell.name: Unpain True
spell.description: Caster ignores all pain; he will be active until he takes more than his normal hits plus his Constitution (on a 1-100 scale); he ignores all penalties due to wounds. When he exceeds this limit, he does not pass out, he dies from system shock.

spell.name: Item Feel
spell.description: Caster receives a basic idea of item's purpose, if any.

spell.name: Detect Power
spell.description: Detects power in an object, but not what realm or how much; caster may concentrate on a different object each round.

spell.name: Origins
spell.description: Gives a general idea of the place of origin of an item.

spell.name: Detect Curse
spell.description: Detects if a curse is on an item.

spell.name: Power Lore
spell.description: Gives the origins of an item's power.

spell.name: Rock Lore
spell.description: Gives details of where, when, and how the examined pice of rock was worked.

spell.name: Item Vision
spell.description: Gives significant details about an item's construction and purpose (not specific powers).

spell.name: Delving
spell.description: Gives significant details about an item's construction and purpose (not specific powers).

spell.name: Past Vision I
spell.description: Caster gets a vision up to one hr/lvl into the past; desired time can be set within + or - 30 minutes. Vision must be associated with an item or place. Vision can last up to 1 min/lvl, if the caster concentrates and remains inactive.

spell.name: Item Lore
spell.description: Gives major abilities and powers of an item.

spell.name: Death's Memory
spell.description: Gives a vision of how someone died and an image of their killer; must be cast within 24 hours of the death; must be cast at the place of death or in the presence of the body.

spell.name: Past Hold
spell.description: When cast just before a Vision Behind spell, it allows caster to lock onto a specific event in an item's past, and then examine that even with a Past Vision.

spell.name: Item Analysis
spell.description: Gives a complete rundown on an item's construction, powers, and purpose (may be modified if an item is extremely powerful).

spell.name: Past Vision II
spell.description: Caster gets a vision up to one day/lvl into the past; desired time can be set within + or - 1 hour. Vision must be associated with an item or place. Vision can last up to 10 min/lvl, if the caster concentrates and remains inactive.

spell.name: Past Vision III
spell.description: Caster gets a vision up to one month/lvl into the past; desired time can be set within + or - 1 day. Vision must be associated with an item or place. Vision can last up to 1 hr/lvl, if the caster concentrates and remains inactive.

spell.name: Past Vision IV
spell.description: Caster gets a vision up to one year/lvl into the past; desired time can be set within + or - 1 week. Vision must be associated with an item or place. Vision can last up to 5 hr/lvl, if the caster concentrates and remains inactive.

spell.name: Past Vision True
spell.description: Caster gets a vision up to ten years/lvl into the past; desired time can be set within + or - 1 month. Vision must be associated with an item or place. Vision can last up to 10 hours/lvl (each hour only takes 10 minutes real time), if the caster concentrates and remains inactive.

spell.name: Detect Mentalism
spell.description: Detects any active spells or items from the Mentalism realm; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Detect Essence
spell.description: Detects any active spells or items from the Essence realm; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Detect Channeling
spell.description: Detects any active spells or items from the Channeling realm; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Detect Emotion
spell.description: As Detect Mentalism, except caster can detect extremes of emotion (e.g., hatred, love, sadness, etc.) In addition, the caster learns which emotion the target is feeling is extreme. If there are no extreme emotions (i.e., only normal feelings), this spell detects nothing.

spell.name: Detect Invisible
spell.description: Detects any invisible things; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round. All attacks against something so detected are modified by -50.

spell.name: Detect Evil
spell.description: Detects if any being is evil or an item created by evil or long used by a very evil person; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Detect Traps
spell.description: Detects any traps; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round. It gives a 75% chance of detecting a trap (may be modified by certain traps).

spell.name: Perceive Power I
spell.description: Gives an estimate of power for any active spells, items, or persons(level); caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Power Typing
spell.description: Analyses general spell type (in item or cost) and what profession cast or created it; or in the case of a person, it gives his exact profession; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Perceive Power II
spell.description: Gives an estimate of the power of the person (level) or item or spell examined; caster can concentrate on a 10' R area each round.

spell.name: See Invisible
spell.description: Caster can see invisible things anywhere he can normally see; his attacks get no subtraction.

spell.name: Detect Spell
spell.description: Detects any spells that have ever been cast in the area; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Perceive Power III
spell.description: Gives an estimate of power for any active spells, items, or persons(level); caster can concentrate on a 50' R area each round.

spell.name: Spell Typing
spell.description: Gives the exact spell type for every spell thrown in the area of affect; caster can concentrate on a 5' R area each round.

spell.name: Perceive Power True
spell.description: Gives an estimate of power for any active spells, items, or persons(level); caster can concentrate on a 300' R area each round.

spell.name: Location
spell.description: Give the direction and distance to any specific object or place that the caster is familiar with or has had described in detail.

spell.name: Detect True
spell.description: Any of the lower level spell on this list can be used once per round.

spell.name: Awareness
spell.description: Any or all of the lower level spells on this list may be used simultaneously.

spell.name: Bending
spell.description: Makes an inanimate object (up to 1000 cu') appear to be 10' to one side of its actual location.

spell.name: Light/Sound Mirage
spell.description: Creates any simple immobile image or scene up to 10' R or any constant sounds coming from a 10' R.

spell.name: Illusion II
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. One of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). See the Illusionist Base list, Illusion Mastery, for complete guidelines for Illusions.

spell.name: Phantasm I
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere. See the Illusionist Base list, Illusion Mastery, for complete guidelines for Phantasms.

spell.name: Light Glamour
spell.description: This spell may only be cast on one inanimate object up to 10 pounds per level of the caster. The spell alters the visual appearance of the object, concealing its true appearance.

spell.name: Illusion III
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Two of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). See the Illusionist Base list, Illusion Mastery, for complete guidelines for Illusions.

spell.name: Waiting Illusion I
spell.description: Creates any simple immobile image or scene up to 10' R or any constant sounds coming from a 10' R. The spell can be delayed up to 24 hours or until triggered by a specified sight or sound.

spell.name: Illusion IV
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Three of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). See the Illusionist Base list, Illusion Mastery, for complete guidelines for Illusions.

spell.name: Phantasm II
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere. See the Illusionist Base list, Illusion Mastery, for complete guidelines for Phantasms. One of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the radius of the sphere limiting the size of the image can be doubled or D) the range can be doubled or E) another image can be created and moved (all separate phantasms that move must be within the caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Waiting Illusion II
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. One of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). The spell can be delayed up to 24 hours or until triggered by a specified sight or sound.

spell.name: Illusion V
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Four of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). See the Illusionist Base list, Illusion Mastery, for complete guidelines for Illusions.

spell.name: Phantasm III
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere. See the Illusionist Base list, Illusion Mastery, for complete guidelines for Phantasms. Two of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the radius of the sphere limiting the size of the image can be doubled or D) the range can be doubled or E) another image can be created and moved (all separate phantasms that move must be within the caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Waiting Illusion III
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Two of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). The spell can be delayed up to 24 hours or until triggered by a specified sight or sound.

spell.name: Illusion VII
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Six of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). See the Illusionist Base list, Illusion Mastery, for complete guidelines for Illusions.

spell.name: Waiting Illusion V
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Four of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). The spell can be delayed up to 24 hours or until triggered by a specified sight or sound.

spell.name: Illusion X
spell.description: Creates a simple immobile image or scene up to an area of 10' R. Nine of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the range can be doubled or D) the radius of effect can be doubled (limited to 640' R). See the Illusionist Base list, Illusion Mastery, for complete guidelines for Illusions.

spell.name: Phantasm V
spell.description: Creates the image of one object or being, that will move however the caster wants while he concentrates. When the caster stops concentrating the image remains, but stops moving (the caster can resume concentration later and resume moving the phantasm). The image can be any size that would fit into a 10' R sphere. See the Illusionist Base list, Illusion Mastery, for complete guidelines for Phantasms. Four of the following options may also be chosen: A) an extra sense can be added to the illusion (the corresponding "Mirage" spell must be known) or B) the duration can be doubled or C) the radius of the sphere limiting the size of the image can be doubled or D) the range can be doubled or E) another image can be created and moved (all separate phantasms that move must be within the caster's field of vision).

spell.name: Clot I
spell.description: Clots wound to reduce hits/rnd by 1, permanent after one hour; if caster is unconscious this spell will operate without concentration.

spell.name: Clot III
spell.description: Clots wound to reduce hits/rnd by 3, permanent after one hour; if caster is unconscious this spell will operate without concentration.

spell.name: Pain Relief I
spell.description: Heals one hit per minute; if caster is unconscious this spell will operate without concentration.

spell.name: Fracture Repair
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell two hours per day for 1 to 10 days (depending upon severity) will repair a broken bone but not a shattered or destroyed one.

spell.name: Cut Repair I
spell.description: Reduces caster's hits/round by one. Is permanent after one round.

spell.name: Muscle/Tendon Repair
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell two hours per day for 1 to 10 days (depending upon severity) will repair cut or broken muscles or tendons.

spell.name: Minor Nerve Repair
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell two hours per day for 1 to 10 days (depending upon severity) will repair a damaged set of nerves.

spell.name: Eye/Ear Repair
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell two hours per day for 1 to 10 days (depending upon severity) will repair a damaged eye/ear but not a destroyed one.

spell.name: Vein/Artery Repair
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell two hours per day for 1 to 10 days (depending upon severity) will repair a damaged vein/artery but not a destroyed one.

spell.name: Pain Relief II
spell.description: Heals two hits per minute; if caster is unconscious this spell will operate without concentration.

spell.name: Self Keeping
spell.description: Upon receiving a death blow, the caster goes into a state of suspended animation until he is cured or his brain is destroyed.

spell.name: Self Joining
spell.description: Caster can reattach a severed limb by concentrating 8 hours/day for 5 days; must start first 8 hours within 2 hours of the limb being severed. Limb regains full use after Nerve Repair.

spell.name: Pain Relief True
spell.description: Heals one hit per round; if caster is unconscious this spell will operate without concentration.

spell.name: Limb Regeneration
spell.description: Concentrating with this spell 2 hours/day for 10-100 days will regenerate a limb (based on severity).

spell.name: Organ Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to completely regenerate any destroyed organ (except brain). The caster may use Self Keeping and this spell. The organ is regenerated in 10-100 days of complete inactivity (based on the severity).

spell.name: Regeneration True
spell.description: Allows caster to completely regenerate all damage (except brain). The caster may use Self Keeping and this spell. The damage is regenerated in 10-100 days of complete inactivity (based on the severity).

spell.name: Protection I
spell.description: Subtracts 5 from elemental attack rolls against the caster and adds 5 to all of the being's RRs vs. spells.

spell.name: Cancel Mentalism
spell.description: When a spell of the Mentalism realm is cast against the caster (of Cancel), the attack spell must first make a successful RR before the caster is forced to make a RR. For the first RR, the attack level is the level of the caster of the Cancel spell, and the defender level is the level of the caster of the attack spell. If the first RR is successful, thane the attack spell proceeds normally.

spell.name: Cancel Essence
spell.description: As Cancel Mentalism, except affects spells from the realm of Essence.

spell.name: Protection II
spell.description: Subtracts 10 from elemental attack rolls against the caster and adds 10 to all of the being's RRs vs. spells.

spell.name: Cancel Channeling
spell.description: As Cancel Mentalism, except affects spells from the realm of Channeling.

spell.name: Mind Shield
spell.description: Creates a shimmering shield in front of the caster: it subtracts 10 from all frontal Mentalism attack rolls on the caster (base and elemental). If the caster performs no other actions during the round, he can "parry" one spell attack. Parry consists of subtracting all bonuses that the caster would normally have for his base attack roll from the attack roll made against him.

spell.name: Essence Shield
spell.description: Creates a shimmering shield in front of the caster: it subtracts 10 from all frontal Essence attack rolls on the caster (base and elemental). If the caster performs no other actions during the round, he can "parry" one spell attack. Parry consists of subtracting all bonuses that the caster would normally have for his base attack roll from the attack roll made against him.

spell.name: Protection III
spell.description: Subtracts 15 from elemental attack rolls against the caster and adds 15 to all of the being's RRs vs. spells.

spell.name: Channeling Shield
spell.description: Creates a shimmering shield in front of the caster: it subtracts 10 from all frontal Channeling attack rolls on the caster (base and elemental). If the caster performs no other actions during the round, he can "parry" one spell attack. Parry consists of subtracting all bonuses that the caster would normally have for his base attack roll from the attack roll made against him.

spell.name: Spell Shield II
spell.description: Creates a shimmering shield in front of the caster: it subtracts 10 from all frontal attack rolls on the caster (base and elemental, select two realms of power that it will protect against). If the caster performs no other actions during the round, he can "parry" one spell attack. Parry consists of subtracting all bonuses that the caster would normally have for his base attack roll from the attack roll made against him.

spell.name: Protection V
spell.description: Subtracts 25 from elemental attack rolls against the caster and adds 25 to all of the being's RRs vs. spells.

spell.name: Spell Shield True
spell.description: Creates a shimmering shield in front of the caster: it subtracts 10 from all frontal attack rolls on the caster (all spells). If the caster performs no other actions during the round, he can "parry" one spell attack. Parry consists of subtracting all bonuses that the caster would normally have for his base attack roll from the attack roll made against him.

spell.name: Mentalism Resistance
spell.description: Gives a +50 to all RRs against Mentalism Spells.

spell.name: Essence Resistance
spell.description: Gives a +50 to all RRs against Essence Spells.

spell.name: Channeling Resistance
spell.description: Gives a +50 to all RRs against Channeling Spells.

spell.name: Resistance True
spell.description: Gives a +50 to all RRs against spells of any two realms of power.

spell.name: Condensation
spell.description: Condenses 1 cu' of water from the surrounding air.

spell.name: Warm Air
spell.description: Warms 1 cu' per level of air (any inanimate gas) up to 100 degrees F above normal.

spell.name: Fog I
spell.description: Creates dense fog in a 10' R; normal visibility is 1'.

spell.name: Airwall
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 10' x 1' wall of dense churning air: cuts all movement and attacks through it by 50% (i.e., -50 to attacks).

spell.name: Air Stop I
spell.description: Cuts all generalized air movement (e.g., wind) by 30 mph in a 10' R (will not affect breathing).

spell.name: Vacuum I
spell.description: Creates a 5' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "A" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Fog V
spell.description: Creates dense fog in a 50' R; normal visibility is 1'.

spell.name: Unfog V
spell.description: Disperses all fog in a 50' Radius.

spell.name: Curved Airwall
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 20' x 1' wall of dense churning air: cuts all movement and attacks through it by 50% (i.e., -50 to attacks). The wall can be curved up to a semi-circle.

spell.name: Airwall True
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 10' x 1' wall of dense churning air: cuts all movement and attacks through it by 50% (i.e., -50 to attacks). Does not require concentration.

spell.name: Fog X
spell.description: Creates dense fog in a 100' R; normal visibility is 1'.

spell.name: Air Stop V
spell.description: Cuts all generalized air movement (e.g., wind) by 30 mph in a 50' R (will not affect breathing).

spell.name: Unfog X
spell.description: Disperses all fog in a 100' Radius.

spell.name: Vacuum II
spell.description: Creates a 10' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "A" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Gas-Air
spell.description: All gas within 10' R of the caster is converted to breathable air.

spell.name: Whirling Winds
spell.description: Creates a whirlwind about caster; it moves with the caster and has a 10' R. No missile attacks can penetrate it and any movement or melee (except for caster's) into or through it is cut by 80%.

spell.name: Vacuum IV
spell.description: Creates a 20' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "A" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Oxygenation
spell.description: Creates a 50' R of high oxygen content air; all within receive a 20 bonus to their OB's and fire attacks deliver double damage.
