spell.name: Fog True
spell.description: Creates dense fog in a 100'/lvl R; normal visibility is 1'.

spell.name: Unfog True
spell.description: Disperses all fog in a 100' per level Radius.

spell.name: Cloud Mastery
spell.description: Caster has complete control of clouds within range (includes fog); he can control storm clouds and cause them to rain, but he can't create them.

spell.name: Boil Water
spell.description: Heats 1 cu' /level of liquid to boiling, at a rate of 1 cu' / round; any inanimate liquid, not just water.

spell.name: Freeze Water
spell.description: Cools 1 cu' /level of liquid to freezing, at a rate of 1 cu' / round; any inanimate liquid, not just water.

spell.name: Clear Water
spell.description: Clears liquid of all sediment, at a rate of 1 cu' / round; any inanimate liquid, not just water.

spell.name: Desalination
spell.description: Removes all dissolved substances from 1 cu'/lvl of liquid, at a rate of 1 cu' / round; any inanimate liquid, not just water.

spell.name: Waterwall
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 10' x 1' wall of churning water (a water source must be within 10'), cuts all attacks and movements through it by 80%.

spell.name: Evaporation
spell.description: Evaporates 1 cu' /level of liquid to gas, at a rate of 1 cu' / round; any inanimate liquid, not just water.

spell.name: Water Corridor I
spell.description: Creates a corridor through liquid up to 100' long, 3' wide, and 10' deep (must be open at top).

spell.name: Water Bolt
spell.description: A bolt of water is shot from the caster's palm (a water source must be within 10'); results are determined on the Water Bolt Table.

spell.name: Curved Waterwall
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 20' x 1' wall of churning water and can be curved up to a semi-circle (a water source must be within 10'), cuts all attacks and movements through it by 80%.

spell.name: Calm Water
spell.description: Water within a 100' radius is calmed; waves are cut by 20' in center and less towards the perimeter.

spell.name: Waterwall True
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 10' x 1' wall of churning water (a water source must be within 10'), cuts all attacks and movements through it by 80%. No concentration is required.

spell.name: Water Corridor III
spell.description: Creates a corridor through liquid up to 300' long, 4' wide, and 50' deep (must be open at top).

spell.name: Whirlpool
spell.description: Creates a 20' R whirlpool that will draw in any unpowered objects up to 200' away.

spell.name: Wave
spell.description: Creates a wave moving away from the caster; wave is 1' high per level in the center and 10' per level wide.

spell.name: Water Bubble
spell.description: Creates a bubble of air (10' R) around the caster and others, which will carry them in up to 100' of water (air is resuscitated).

spell.name: Calm Water True
spell.description: Water within a 100'/level radius is calmed; waves are cut by 50' in center and less towards the perimeter.

spell.name: Water Corridor True
spell.description: Creates a corridor through liquid up to 100'/ level long, 6' wide, and 100' deep (must be open at top).

spell.name: Water Bubble True
spell.description: Creates a bubble of air (20' R) around the caster and others, which will carry them in any depth of water (air is resuscitated).

spell.name: Water Mastery
spell.description: Total control of water within range; this means that the caster can use one of the lower spells on this list each round.

spell.name: Storing
spell.description: Caster may cast this spell with any spell he wants to store; then the stored spell may be cast at any time, with no preparation. The Storing spell costs the same number of power points as the spell stored. No other spell may be cast while a spell is stored.

spell.name: Presence
spell.description: Caster is aware of the presence of all sentient/thinking beings within 20'.

spell.name: Inner Wall I
spell.description: Caster gets +5 bonus to his RRs versus mind attacks.

spell.name: Recall
spell.description: Caster gets a 25% chance of recalling some key fact or occurrence from his subconscious; this information should relate to the current situation (could be from his background or something he has forgotten); increases the caster's Memory stat bonus by 50 for the duration of one maneuver involving Memory (e.g., the use of a "lore" skill, one hand of a card game, one "star-gazing" attempt, etc.).

spell.name: Misfeel Kind
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, caster appears to be of any race he chooses.

spell.name: Observation
spell.description: Caster gains insight or facts by observing a person or thing with intense concentration (e.g., room, item, etc.); increases caster's Perception skill bonus by 50 for one "observation".

spell.name: Inner Wall II
spell.description: Caster gets +10 bonus to his RR versus mind Attacks.

spell.name: Misfeel Calling
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, caster appears to be of any profession he chooses.

spell.name: Correlation
spell.description: Caster is able to correlate known facts to obtain conclusions; increases the caster's Reasoning stat bonus by 50 for the duration of one maneuver involving Reasoning (e.g., the use of a "lore" skill, picking a lock, one "navigation" attempt, etc.).

spell.name: Misfeel Power
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, caster appears to be any level he chooses.

spell.name: Resolve
spell.description: Caster is able to intensely focus and control himself for one situation or maneuver; increase the caster's Self Discipline stat bonus by 50 for the duration of one maneuver involving SD (e.g., stalking a foe, and Adrenal Move, one "Contortions" attempt, etc.).

spell.name: Inner Wall III
spell.description: Caster gets +15 bonus to his RRs versus mind attacks.

spell.name: Unpresence
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, caster appears to have no presence (i.e., he can not be detected by Presence type spells).

spell.name: Inner Wall V
spell.description: Caster gets +25 bonus to his RRs versus mind attacks.

spell.name: Total Recall
spell.description: Recall is nearly automatic and in effect gives the caster a photographic memory; increases the caster's Memory stat bonus by 100 for the duration of one maneuver involving Memory (e.g., the use of a "lore" skill, one hand of a card game, one "star-gazing" attempt, etc.).

spell.name: Misfeel
spell.description: For the purposes or mental or magical detections, caster appears to be of any race, profession or level he chooses.

spell.name: Inner Wall True
spell.description: Caster gets +50 bonus to his RRs versus mind attacks.

spell.name: Observation True
spell.description: Caster gains insight or facts by observing a person or thing with intense concentration (e.g., room, item, etc.); increases caster's Perception skill bonus by 100 for one "observation".

spell.name: Correlation True
spell.description: Caster is able to correlate known facts to obtain conclusions; increases the caster's Reasoning stat bonus by 100 for the duration of one maneuver involving Reasoning (e.g., the use of a "lore" skill, picking a lock, one "navigation" attempt, etc.).

spell.name: Resolve True
spell.description: Caster is able to intensely focus and control himself for one situation or maneuver; increase the caster's Self Discipline stat bonus by 100 for the duration of one maneuver involving SD (e.g., stalking a foe, and Adrenal Move, one "Contortions" attempt, etc.).

spell.name: Mirrormind
spell.description: Caster reflects all mind attacks back on the attacker who must then make a RR against his own spell.

spell.name: Leave Item I
spell.description: Caster "teleports" a single inanimate object to a point up to 100' away from its current location. There can be no intervening barriers in a direct line between the target and the point (for these purposes, a barrier is anything the object could not physically go through). The object has a maximum weight limit of 1 pound per level of the caster.

spell.name: Long Door Item I
spell.description: As Leave Item I, except the object can pass through barriers by specifying exact direction and distance. If the arrival point coincides with solid or liquid material, the object does not move (through the caster loses the PP).

spell.name: Leaving I
spell.description: Caster teleports to a point up to 100' away, but there can be no intervening "barriers" in a direct line between the the target and the point. A "barrier" is anything he could not physically go through; a closed door is a barrier, a pit is not.

spell.name: Leave Item III
spell.description: As Leave Item I, except object can be moved up to 300'.

spell.name: Long Door Item V
spell.description: As Long Door Item I, except for range.

spell.name: Leaving III
spell.description: Caster teleports to a point up to 300' away, but there can be no intervening "barriers" in a direct line between the the target and the point. A "barrier" is anything he could not physically go through; a closed door is a barrier, a pit is not.

spell.name: Leave Item V
spell.description: As Leave Item I, except object can be moved up to 500'.

spell.name: Minor Long Door
spell.description: Caster teleports target to a point up to 50' away. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. If the arrival point coincides with solid or liquid material, the caster does not move, he is stunned 1 to 10 rounds, and the PPs for this spell are expended.

spell.name: Leaving V
spell.description: Caster teleports to a point up to 500' away, but there can be no intervening "barriers" in a direct line between the the target and the point. A "barrier" is anything he could not physically go through; a closed door is a barrier, a pit is not.

spell.name: Long Door I
spell.description: Caster teleports target to a point up to 100' away. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. If the arrival point coincides with solid or liquid material, the caster does not move, he is stunned 1 to 10 rounds, and the PPs for this spell are expended.

spell.name: Long Door Item X
spell.description: As Long Door Item I, except for range.

spell.name: Lord Leaving
spell.description: Caster teleports to a point up to 100'/level or up to 2000' away, but there can be no intervening "barriers" in a direct line between the the target and the point. A "barrier" is anything he could not physically go through; a closed door is a barrier, a pit is not.

spell.name: Long Door III
spell.description: Caster teleports target to a point up to 300' away. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. If the arrival point coincides with solid or liquid material, the caster does not move, he is stunned 1 to 10 rounds, and the PPs for this spell are expended.

spell.name: Long Door V
spell.description: Caster teleports target to a point up to 500' away. Target can pass through barriers by specifying exact distances. If the arrival point coincides with solid or liquid material, the caster does not move, he is stunned 1 to 10 rounds, and the PPs for this spell are expended.

spell.name: Mind's Door I
spell.description: If caster has established mental contact with a target (an intelligent being) that will cooperate, the caster can teleport to the target's location or the target can teleport to the caster's location. There is no chance of failure and the movement limit is one mile.

spell.name: Leaving True
spell.description: Caster teleports as far as the eye can see. Movement is only limited by the barrier restriction (on a flat plain this would be the horizon).

spell.name: Mind's Door II
spell.description: If caster has established mental contact with a target (an intelligent being) that will cooperate, the caster can teleport to the target's location or the target can teleport to the caster's location. There is no chance of failure and the movement limit is 10 miles per level.

spell.name: Mind's Door True
spell.description: If caster has established mental contact with a target (an intelligent being) that will cooperate, the caster can teleport to the target's location or the target can teleport to the caster's location. There is no chance of failure and there is no movement limit.

spell.name: Leaping
spell.description: Allows the caster to leap 50' laterally or 20' vertically.

spell.name: Landing
spell.description: Allows caster to land safely in a fall up to 20'/lvl, and to take that distance off the severity of any longer fall.

spell.name: Levitation I
spell.description: Allows the target to move up and down vertically 10'/Rnd, horizontal movement is possible only through normal means.

spell.name: Wind Drift
spell.description: Caster becomes weightless, but has no magical movement control; weight gradually returns at the end of the duration.

spell.name: Underwater Movement
spell.description: Caster can take action underwater as if on land.

spell.name: Fly I
spell.description: Target can fly at a rate of 15'/Rnd (1 mph).

spell.name: Levitation V
spell.description: As Levitation I, except rate is 50' per round.

spell.name: Long Dive
spell.description: Caster can safely dive up to 50'/lvl if water deep enough is present.

spell.name: Merging
spell.description: Caster can merge into any solid, inanimate material (up to body +1' in depth); caster is inactive and unaware of surrounding activity; caster can not cast spells.

spell.name: Fly II
spell.description: Target can fly at a rate of 75'/Rnd (5 mph).

spell.name: Landing True
spell.description: Caster can land safely from any fall 99% of the time.

spell.name: Levitation XX
spell.description: Allows the target to move up and down vertically 200'/Rnd, horizontal movement is possible only through normal means.

spell.name: Passing
spell.description: Caster can pass through any inanimate material up to 1'/lvl.

spell.name: Fly III
spell.description: Target can fly at a rate of 150'/Rnd (10 mph).

spell.name: Great Merge
spell.description: Caster can merge into any solid, inanimate material (up to body +1' in depth); caster can turn within the material and can see outside if within 6" of the surface. No spells can be cast.

spell.name: Merge True
spell.description: Caster can merge into any solid, inanimate material (up to body +1' in depth); caster can turn within the material and can see outside if within 6" of the surface. Caster can cast spells on himself.

spell.name: Fly IV
spell.description: Target can fly at a rate of 300'/Rnd (20 mph).

spell.name: Passing True
spell.description: Caster can pass through any inanimate material as the duration allows at a rate of 10'/lvl.

spell.name: Master of Movement
spell.description: Caster may use the abilities of any one of the spells on this list each round.

spell.name: Sly Ears
spell.description: Caster gains double normal hearing (e.g., +50 to Perception involving only hearing, +25 to Perception involving hearing and other senses).

spell.name: Nightvision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' on a clear night as if it were day.

spell.name: Sidevision
spell.description: Caster has a 300 degree field of vision.

spell.name: Detect Illusion
spell.description: Caster can check one object or place (up to a 5' R) and tell if it is an illusion or has an illusion on it.

spell.name: Watervision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' even in murky water.

spell.name: Scent
spell.description: Caster gains extremely acute sense of smell (e.g., +50 to Perception involving only smell, +25 to Perception involving smell and other senses).

spell.name: Fogvision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' through any precipitation.

spell.name: Touch
spell.description: Caster gains extreme tactile sensitivity. For example, caster might receive +25 to picking locks, disarming traps, opening secret doors, etc. and +50 to Perception involving only touch, +25 to Perception involving touch and other senses.

spell.name: Darkvision
spell.description: Caster can see 100' on a clear night as if it were day. This also works in magically created darkness.

spell.name: Mentalist Ear
spell.description: Caster can pick a point up to 100'/lvl away and he will hear as if he were at that point (there can be intervening objects such as walls); he must have visited the place.

spell.name: Mentalist Eye
spell.description: Caster can pick a point up to 100'/lvl away and he will see as if he were at that point (there can be intervening objects such as walls); he must have visited the place.

spell.name: Disillusion
spell.description: One illusion within the caster's range ceases to exist for the caster only.

spell.name: Detect Illusion True
spell.description: Caster can check one object or place (up to a 5' R) per round and tell if it is an illusion or has an illusion on it.

spell.name: Vision
spell.description: Bestows all lower level "vision" spells on this list to the caster at the same time. Nightvision, Sidevision, Watervision, Fogvision and Darkvision are in affect for the duration.

spell.name: Nightvision True
spell.description: Caster can see on a clear night as if it were day. The range is the normal daylight vision range.

spell.name: Disillusion True
spell.description: All illusions within the caster's range ceases to exist for the caster only.

spell.name: Watervision True
spell.description: Caster can see even in murky water. The range is the normal daylight vision range.

spell.name: Fogvision True
spell.description: Caster can see through any precipitation. The range is the normal daylight vision range.

spell.name: Vision True
spell.description: Bestows all lower level "True Vision" spells on this list to the caster at the same time. Nightvision, Sidevision, Watervision, Fogvision and Darkvision are in affect for the duration.

spell.name: Mentalist Ear True
spell.description: Caster can pick a point up to 1 mile/lvl away and he will hear as if he were at that point (there can be intervening objects such as walls); he must have visited the place.

spell.name: Mentalist Eye True
spell.description: Caster can pick a point up to 1 mile/lvl away and he will see as if he were at that point (there can be intervening objects such as walls); he must have visited the place.

spell.name: Sensory Merge
spell.description: Caster can "merge" his senses with those of a subject whose location is known by spells or by prior arrangement.

spell.name: Balance
spell.description: Adds 50 to any rolls for one slow maneuver (e.g., walking a 3" beam).

spell.name: Contraction
spell.description: Allows caster to disjoint limbs, contract muscles, etc.; in order to escape manacles and ropes and slip through small places (+50 to +100 to Contortion maneuvers).

spell.name: Face Shifting
spell.description: Allows caster to alter form of his face to resemble someone else.

spell.name: Waterlungs
spell.description: Caster can breathe water but not air.

spell.name: Change to Kind
spell.description: Caster can alter his entire body to the form of another humanoid race.

spell.name: Gaslungs
spell.description: Caster can breathe any gas as normal air.

spell.name: Greater Face Shifting
spell.description: Allows caster to alter form of his face to resemble someone else.

spell.name: Changing Lungs
spell.description: Caster can breathe any air, water, and gas at will.

spell.name: Change
spell.description: Caster can alter his entire body to any organic form within 1/2 to 2x target's current mass; does not obtain any special abilities.

spell.name: Solid Form
spell.description: Caster becomes as if made of very dense stone (cannot move or cast spells).

spell.name: Shapechanging
spell.description: Caster can alter his entire body to any organic form within 1/2 to 2x target's current mass; does not obtain any special abilities. Caster may assume a different form anytime during the spell; concentration for 1 rnd/change.

spell.name: Waterform
spell.description: Caster takes the form of a liquid mass, able to seep through cracks as well as water; can move through water at 10 mph; may not cast spells while in this form.

spell.name: Mistform
spell.description: Caster takes the form of a mist, able to fly at 20 mph; seep through cracks; extend self to become virtually invisible; etc. (may not cast spells in this form).

spell.name: Form Master
spell.description: The caster can interchange between the following two forms at will (1 round to change): Liquid mass - The caster is able to seep through cracks as well as water; can move through water at 10 mph; may not cast spells while in this form. Mist - The caster is able to fly at 20 mph; seep through cracks; extend self to become virtually invisible; etc. (may not cast spells in this form).

spell.name: Change Master
spell.description: The caster can interchange between the following forms at will (1 round to change): Liquid mass - The caster is able to seep through cracks as well as water; can move through water at 10 mph; may not cast spells while in this form. Mist - The caster is able to fly at 20 mph; seep through cracks; extend self to become virtually invisible; etc. (may not cast spells in this form). Organic - Caster can alter his entire body to any organic form within 1/10 to 10x target's current mass; does not obtain any special abilities.

spell.name: Warm Stone
spell.description: Warms one cu'/lvl of stone up to 100 degrees F.

spell.name: Warm Metal
spell.description: Warms 6 cu"/lvl of metal up to 100 degrees F.

spell.name: Warm Solid
spell.description: Warms one cu"/lvl of solid, inanimate, non-metal material up to 100 degrees F.

spell.name: Heat Stone
spell.description: Heats one cu'/lvl of stone up to 500 degrees F.

spell.name: Heat Metal
spell.description: Heats 6 cu"/lvl of metal up to 500 degrees F.

spell.name: Heat Solid
spell.description: As Heat Stone, except affects any solid, inanimate, non-metal material.

spell.name: Cool Solid
spell.description: Cools one cu'/lvl of solid, inanimate material down to 0 degrees F.

spell.name: Chill Solid
spell.description: As Heat Stone, except temperature can be lowered to -200°F at a rate of 100°F per round.

spell.name: Cracks Call
spell.description: Any previous cracks or flaws in material up to 10' x 10' x 10' (not 1000 cu feet) section will extend to their limit.

spell.name: Melt Solid
spell.description: Heats one cu'/lvl of any solid, inanimate, non metal material up to its melting point..

spell.name: Crumble
spell.description: Any material with cracks or flaws up to 10' x 10' x 10' (not 1000 cu feet) section will crumble to dust.

spell.name: Bowbreak
spell.description: Will break a piece of wood up to 1' in diameter.

spell.name: Stone Door
spell.description: Creates a 3' x 6' x 1' doorway through stone.

spell.name: Metal Door
spell.description: Creates a 3' x 6' x 1' doorway through metal.

spell.name: Bladebreak
spell.description: As Bowbreak, except a piece of metal can be broken. Will affect metals up to 3" in diameter.

spell.name: Lockbreak
spell.description: Causes a lock to break. The lock can be broken in a locked or unlocked state (regardless of its state at the time the spell is cast).

spell.name: Solid Door
spell.description: Creates a 3' x 6' x 1' doorway through any inanimate, solid material. It can be 3' x 6' with a depth of 1' per level for stone and 3" per level for all other materials.

spell.name: Mold Stone
spell.description: By molding with his hands, caster may shape 1 cu' of stone as if it were putty; then it hardens to normal consistency.

spell.name: Mold Metal
spell.description: By molding with his hands, caster may shape 1 cu' of metal as if it were putty; then it hardens to normal consistency.

spell.name: Mold Solid
spell.description: By molding with his hands, caster may shape 1 cu' of any solid, inanimate material as if it were putty; then it hardens to normal consistency.

spell.name: Solid Transmutation
spell.description: May transmute 1 oz. of solid material into another non-magical material that the caster has a sample of. This spell takes 8 hours of continuos, uninterrupted concentration.

spell.name: Run
spell.description: Target may run (2x walking pace) without tiring (i.e., he expends no exhaustion points), but once he stops or performs some other action the spell is cancelled.

spell.name: Speed Reading
spell.description: Caster reads 10 pages per minute.

spell.name: Speed I
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity). Suggested rules for handling this can be found in Section 7.4 of Spell Law.

spell.name: Speed II
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity). Suggested rules for handling this can be found in Section 7.4 of Spell Law.

spell.name: Haste I
spell.description: Target may perform double actions for the duration. There is no recovery period.

spell.name: Speed III
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity). Suggested rules for handling this can be found in Section 7.4 of Spell Law.

spell.name: Sprint
spell.description: As Run, except caster may move at 3x walking pace.

spell.name: Haste II
spell.description: Target may perform double actions for the duration. There is no recovery period.

spell.name: Fast Swim
spell.description: Target may swim (2x walking pace) without tiring (i.e., he expends no exhaustion points), but once he stops or performs some other action the spell is cancelled.

spell.name: Speed V
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity). Suggested rules for handling this can be found in Section 7.4 of Spell Law.

spell.name: Haste III
spell.description: Target may perform double actions for the duration. There is no recovery period.

spell.name: Haste V
spell.description: Target may perform double actions for the duration. There is no recovery period.

spell.name: Fast Sprint
spell.description: Target may run (4x walking pace) without tiring (i.e., he expends no exhaustion points), but once he stops or performs some other action the spell is cancelled.

spell.name: Speed X
spell.description: Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity). Suggested rules for handling this can be found in Section 7.4 of Spell Law.

spell.name: Haste X
spell.description: Target may perform double actions for the duration. There is no recovery period.

spell.name: Speed True
spell.description: This Speed spell will last up to 24 hours or until caster sleeps, rests, or cancels the spell.Target may act at twice his normal rate, but immediately afterwards must spend a number of rounds equal to the rounds speeded at half rate (i.e., only 50% normal activity). Suggested rules for handling this can be found in Section 7.4 of Spell Law.

spell.name: Haste True
spell.description: This Haste spell will last up to 24 hours or until caster sleeps, rests, or cancels the spell.Target may act at twice his normal rate for the duration of the spell. There is no recovery period.

spell.name: Telekinesis I
spell.description: Can move one object, up to 1 lb in mass, up to 1' per second with no acceleration. Living beings or items in contact with a living being get a normal RR based on the living being. If the caster stops concentration before the duration is up, the object remains stationary as if it had Staying thrown on it.

spell.name: Staying II
spell.description: Exerts 5 lbs of pressure on a person or object. Object can not be moved by staying alone, and pressure can only be in one direction.

spell.name: Telekinesis II
spell.description: Can move one object, up to 5 lbs in mass, up to 1' per second with no acceleration. Living beings or items in contact with a living being get a normal RR based on the living being. If the caster stops concentration before the duration is up, the object remains stationary as if it had Staying thrown on it.

spell.name: Staying III
spell.description: Exerts 25 lbs of pressure on a person or object. Object can not be moved by staying alone, and pressure can only be in one direction.

spell.name: Greater Staying II
spell.description: As Staying II, except 2 objects may be affected with 5 pounds total pressure, or Staying II can be used to 200'.

spell.name: Greater Telekinesis II
spell.description: As Telekinesis I, except 2 objects of 5 pounds total mass may be moved or Telekinesis I, can be used at 200'.

spell.name: Telekinesis III
spell.description: As Telekinesis I, except mass limit is 25 pounds.

spell.name: Staying IV
spell.description: As Staying II, except pressure limit is 50 pounds.

spell.name: Telekinesis IV
spell.description: As Telekinesis I, except mass limit is 50 pounds.

spell.name: Hurling I
spell.description: Caster may "hurl" one object (that starts within 10' of him) of 1 lb or less with sufficient force to deliver an attack on the shock bolt attack table; use the elemental attack rules, Impact criticals, and the range effects on the Shock bolt table with a max range of 300'. Use the Sling attack table if Arms Law is available. Base the caster's OB on his directed spell skill with this spell.

spell.name: Staying V
spell.description: Exerts 100 lbs of pressure on a person or object. Object can not be moved by staying alone, and pressure can only be in one direction.

spell.name: Telekinesis V
spell.description: Can move one object, up to 100 lbs in mass, up to 1' per second with no acceleration. Living beings or items in contact with a living being get a normal RR based on the living being. If the caster stops concentration before the duration is up, the object remains stationary as if it had Staying thrown on it.

spell.name: Hurling II
spell.description: Caster may "hurl" one object (that starts within 10' of him) of 5 lb or less with sufficient force to deliver an attack on the shock bolt attack table, delivering 3x normal hits; use the elemental attack rules, Impact criticals, and the range effects on the Shock bolt table with a max range of 300'. Use the Sling attack table if Arms Law is available. Base the caster's OB on his directed spell skill with this spell.

spell.name: Staying VI
spell.description: Exerts 200 lbs of pressure on a person or object. Object can not be moved by staying alone, and pressure can only be in one direction.

spell.name: Greater Staying III
spell.description: As Greater Staying II, except 3 objects may be affected with 25 pounds total pressure or Staying I can be used to 300'.

spell.name: Greater Telekinesis III
spell.description: As Telekinesis I, except 3 objects of 25 pounds total mass may be moved or Telekinesis I can be used to 300'.

spell.name: Telekinesis VI
spell.description: Can move one object, up to 200 lbs in mass, up to 1' per second with no acceleration. Living beings or items in contact with a living being get a normal RR based on the living being. If the caster stops concentration before the duration is up, the object remains stationary as if it had Staying thrown on it.

spell.name: Hurling III
spell.description: Caster may "hurl" one object (that starts within 10' of him) of 25 lb or less with sufficient force to deliver an attack on the shock bolt attack table, delivering 5x normal hits; use the elemental attack rules, Impact criticals, and the range effects on the Shock bolt table with a max range of 300'. Use the Sling attack table if Arms Law is available. Base the caster's OB on his directed spell skill with this spell.

spell.name: Staying True
spell.description: Exerts 500 lbs of pressure on a person or object. Object can not be moved by staying alone, and pressure can only be in one direction.

spell.name: Telekinesis True
spell.description: Can move one object, up to 500 lbs in mass, up to 1' per second with no acceleration. Living beings or items in contact with a living being get a normal RR based on the living being. If the caster stops concentration before the duration is up, the object remains stationary as if it had Staying thrown on it.

spell.name: Greater Hurling III
spell.description: Caster may "hurl" one object (that starts within 300' of him) or three objects (that start within 100' of him) of 1 lb or less with sufficient force to deliver an attack on the shock bolt attack table; use the elemental attack rules, Impact criticals, and the range effects on the Shock bolt table with a max range of 300'. Use the Sling attack table if Arms Law is available. Base the caster's OB on his directed spell skill with this spell.

spell.name: Hurling IV
spell.description: Caster may "hurl" one object (that starts within 10' of him) of 50 lb or less with sufficient force to deliver an attack on the shock bolt attack table, delivering 5x normal hits and +50 OB; use the elemental attack rules, Impact criticals, and the range effects on the Shock bolt table with a max range of 300'. Use the Sling attack table if Arms Law is available. Base the caster's OB on his directed spell skill with this spell.

spell.name: Telekinesis Mastery
spell.description: Each round, the caster may use any lower level spell on this list.

spell.name: Flowstop III
spell.description: Allows caster to reduce a targets blood loss by 3 hit/rnd; target may not be moved, or bleeding will resume at prior rate.

spell.name: Clotting I
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding at rate of 1 hit/rnd on one target; for one hour target can move at no more than a walking pace, or bleeding will resume at prior rate.

spell.name: Cut Repair I
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding from one wound that bleeds at a rate of 1 hit /rnd.

spell.name: Clotting III
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding at rate of 3 hit/rnd on one target; for one hour target can move at no more than a walking pace, or bleeding will resume at prior rate.

spell.name: Minor Vessel Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair one damaged minor blood vessel (a vessel that bleeds at up to two hits/rnd, not major arteries or veins).

spell.name: Cut Repair III
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding from one wound that bleeds at a rate of 3 hit /rnd.

spell.name: Vein Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair one damaged minor blood vessel (a vessel that bleeds at up to three hits/rnd, not major arteries). Target can't move (under own power) without reopening wound.

spell.name: Arterial Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair one damaged artery, including severed veins and arteries; target can't move (under own power) without reopening wound. A artery is a wound that bleeds at five hits/rnd or more when severed.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Bone Mastery, Muscle Mastery, and Nerve and Organ Mastery Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in 10-100 days.

spell.name: Flowstop True
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding from any one wound up to 1 hit/level; target may not be moved, or bleeding will resume at prior rate.

spell.name: Suspend Life I
spell.description: Target is kept in a state of suspended animation and prevented from dying for 1 hr/lvl of caster (i.e. the body is "preserved" and the "soul" will not leave the body, see section 11.1 in Spell Law).

spell.name: Clotting True
spell.description: Allows caster to stop extreme bleeding on any one target; for one hour target can move at no more than a walking pace, or bleeding will resume at prior rate.

spell.name: Unclotting
spell.description: Allows caster to remove any one blood clot; will counter Clotting Curse (on the Evil Cleric list, Curses).

spell.name: Cut Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to stop bleeding and close any one wound.

spell.name: Suspend Life II
spell.description: As Suspend Life I, except for duration and the requirement of the other Suspend Life II spell (on the Nerve and Organ Mastery spell list).

spell.name: Unclotting True
spell.description: As Unclotting, except will affect all blood clots in the target.

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Bone Mastery, Muscle Mastery, and Nerve and Organ Mastery Joining True spells in order to restore functional status. Limb is fully functional in 10 minutes.

spell.name: Regulations
spell.description: Allows caster to control all internal and external blood flow; cannot be used in harmful manner (i.e., it is a life preserving spell, not a killing spell).

spell.name: New Blood
spell.description: Caster can restore all of the blood in one target's body; recovery time: 1 - 10 days.

spell.name: Blood Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to cast one of the lower level spells on this list each round.

spell.name: Bone Lore
spell.description: Caster acquires a complete understanding of any bone damage, including the tools and methods required for healing; caster does not receive the skill or power to perform the cure.

spell.name: Minor Fracture Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair simple fractures (not compound fractures, shatters, joint damage, etc.); one fracture per spell cast; one day recovery period. Does not work on skull fractures.

spell.name: Cartilage Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair all cartilage around one joint; one day recovery period.

spell.name: Major Fracture Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair compound fractures (not shatters, joint damage, etc.); one fracture per spell cast; one day recovery period.

spell.name: Limb Preservation
spell.description: Allows caster to prevent the deterioration of one limb (even while severed); also requires use of the same spells from Muscle Mastery.

spell.name: Skull Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to mend one fracture in skull (but not a shattered area); recovery time: 1 to 10 days, depending on the damage.

spell.name: Joint Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair one broken (but not shattered) joint; recovery time is 1 to 10 days.

spell.name: Minor Fracture Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to repair s1mple fractures (not compound fractures, shatters, joint damage, etc.); one fracture per spell cast; recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Muscle Mastery, Nerve and Organ Mastery, and Blood Mastery Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in 10-100 days.

spell.name: Cartilage Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to repair all cartilage around one joint; recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Major Fracture Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to repair compound fractures (not shatters, joint damage, etc.); one fracture per spell cast; recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Skull Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to mend one fracture in skull (but not a shattered area); recovery time is instantaneous.

spell.name: Bone Transplant
spell.description: Allows caster to transplant a healthy bone; 1 hour operation; recovery time: 1 to 10 days; chance of rejection is 10% if same race; 50% if other humanoid.

spell.name: Shatter Repair
spell.description: Allos caster to repair any broken or shattered bone; requires a 1 hour operation and 1 to 10 days recovery time.

spell.name: Joint Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to repair one broken (but not shattered) joint; recovery time instantaneous

spell.name: Rapid Bone Transplant
spell.description: As Bone Transplant, except with a recovery time of 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Rapid Shatter Repair
spell.description: As Shatter Repair, except with a recovery time of 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Muscle Mastery, Nerve and Organ Mastery, and Blood Mastery Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in ten minutes.

spell.name: Cartilage Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate one section of cartilage in target's body; recovery time is 1 to 10 days.

spell.name: Bone Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate one lost bone in the target's body; recovery time is 1 to 10 days.

spell.name: Skeletal Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate any part (or all) of a skeleton (including cartilage) in 1 to 10 days, depending on damage.

spell.name: Healing I
spell.description: Target is healed of 1-10 concussion hits.

spell.name: Stun Relief I
spell.description: Target is relieved of one round's worth of accumulated stun effects.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief I
spell.description: Will heal one area of mild frostbite or 1st degree burn.

spell.name: Regeneration I
spell.description: Will reduce damage a target has by one hit every round as long as caster concentrates.

spell.name: Awakening
spell.description: Target is instantly awake.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief II
spell.description: Will heal two areas of mild frostbite or 1st degree burn. Or one area of moderate damage (e.g., 2nd degree burn).

spell.name: Healing V
spell.description: Target is healed of 5-50 concussion hits.

spell.name: Stun Relief III
spell.description: Target is relieved of three round's worth of accumulated stun effects.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief III
spell.description: Will heal three areas of mild frostbite or 1st degree burn. Or one area of severe damage (e.g., 3rd degree burn). Or a combination of one mild and one moderate area of damage.

spell.name: Regeneration II
spell.description: Will reduce damage a target has by two hits every round as long as caster concentrates.

spell.name: Healing X
spell.description: Target is healed of 10-100 concussion hits.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief IV
spell.description: Will heal four areas of mild frostbite or 1st degree burn. Or two areas of severe damage (e.g., 3rd degree burn). Or any combination of mild and moderate areas of damage that total no more then four.

spell.name: Stun Relief V
spell.description: Target is relieved of five round's worth of accumulated stun effects.

spell.name: Long Stun Relief
spell.description: Target is relieved of one round's worth of accumulated stun effects within 100'.

spell.name: Regeneration III
spell.description: Will reduce damage a target has by three hits every round as long as caster concentrates.

spell.name: Healing XV
spell.description: As Healing I, except heals 15d10 hits.

spell.name: Stun Relief X
spell.description: As Stun Relief I, except target is relieved of 10 rounds of accumulated stun effects.

spell.name: Healing XX
spell.description: Target is healed of 20-200 concussion hits.

spell.name: True Healing
spell.description: Target is healed of all concussive hit damage.

spell.name: Frost/Burn Relief True
spell.description: Will heal all areas of frostbite or burns.

spell.name: Stun Relief True
spell.description: Target is relieved of all accumulated stun effects.

spell.name: Sprain Repair
spell.description: Allows the caster to repair one sprain; 1 hour operation.

spell.name: Muscle/Tendon Lore
spell.description: Caster acquires a complete understanding of any muscle and or tendon damage, including the tools and methods required for healing; caster does not receive the skill or power to perform the cure.

spell.name: Muscle Repair I
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) one damaged muscle; recovery time is one day per muscle repaired.

spell.name: Tendon Repair I
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) one damaged tendon; recovery time is one day per muscle repaired.

spell.name: Limb Preservation
spell.description: Allows caster to prevent the deterioration of one limb (even while severed); also requires use of the same spells from Bone Mastery.

spell.name: Muscle Repair III
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) three damaged muscles; recovery time is one day per muscle repaired.

spell.name: Tendon Repair III
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) three damaged tendons, recovery time is one day per tendon repaired.

spell.name: Muscle Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) one damaged muscle; recovery time instantaneous. The operation takes one minute.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Bone Mastery, Nerve and Organ Mastery, and Blood Mastery Joining spells in order to restore functional status; limb is fully functional in 10-100 days.

spell.name: Tendon Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to repair (not replace) one damaged tendon; recovery time instantaneous. The operation takes one minute.

spell.name: Soft Structure Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair all tendon and muscle damage in target's body; 1 hour operation; recovery time is 1 to 10 days.

spell.name: Muscle Transplant
spell.description: Allows caster to transplant a healthy muscle; 1 hour operation; recovery time: 1 to 10 days; chance of rejection is 10% if same race; 50% if other humanoid.

spell.name: Muscle Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate one muscle; regrowth takes one to ten days, depending on the extent of loss.

spell.name: Tendon Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate one tendon; regrowth takes one to ten days, depending on the extent of loss.

spell.name: Rapid Muscle Transplant
spell.description: As Muscle Transplant, except recovery time is 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Rapid Muscle Regeneration
spell.description: As Muscle Regeneration, except recovery time is 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Rapid Tendon Regeneration
spell.description: As Tendon Regeneration, except recovery time is 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach limb, but requires use of Bone Mastery, Nerve and Organ Mastery, and Blood Mastery Joining spells in order to restore functional status. Limb is fully functional in 10 minutes.

spell.name: Muscle Regeneration True
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate one muscle; regrowth takes ten minutes.

spell.name: Tendon Regeneration True
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate one muscle; regrowth takes ten minutes.

spell.name: Soft Structure Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to repair all tendon and muscle damage in target's body; 10 minute operation; recovery time is instantaneous.

spell.name: Nerve/Organ Lore
spell.description: Caster acquires complete understanding of any nerve and/or organ damage including the tools and methods required for healing; caster does not receive the skill or power necessary to perform the cure.

spell.name: Numbing
spell.description: Allows the caster to stop or reduce feeling in a specific area of the body (6 cu"); works to reduce pain with minor side effects (e.g., -10 to given ability).

spell.name: Minor Nerve Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair minor nerve damage; target regains feeling in 1 to 10 days.

spell.name: Minor Ear/Nose Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any exterior ear damage short of complete ear loss or any nose damage short of complete nose loss; requires 1 to 60 minutes depending on damage.

spell.name: Organ Preservation
spell.description: Allows caster to prevent the deteriorization of any specific organ (e.g., eye, ear, liver, etc.), even if it is "outside" of its body.

spell.name: Minor Eye Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any minor eye damage (e.g., corneal scratch or removal of foreign object).

spell.name: Major Nerve Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair major nerve damage; recovery time is 1 to 10 days.

spell.name: Major Ear Repair
spell.description: The caster can repair any exterior and interior damage. Hearing is restored in 1 to 10 days. Note that complete replacement of the ear is an exception.

spell.name: Joining
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach one severed limb; requires use of the other three Lay Healer Joining spells in order to make limb fully functional. Limb is fully functional in 10 to 100 days.

spell.name: Major Eye Repair
spell.description: Caster can repair any eye damage short of total eye loss (e.g., eye's destruction precludes repair); recovery time is 1 to 10 days.

spell.name: Suspend Life I
spell.description: Target is kept in a state of suspended animation and prevented from dying for 1 hour per level of the caster (i.e., the body is "preserved" and the "soul" will not leave the body).

spell.name: Nerve Repair True
spell.description: Allows caster to repair major nerve damage; recovery is instantaneous.

spell.name: Organ Transplant
spell.description: Allows caster to transplant a healthy organ. One hour operation. Recovery time is 1 to 10 days. Chance of rejection is 10% if same race, 50% of other humanoid.

spell.name: Organ Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair any organ that has not been completely destroyed; recovery time is 1 to 10 days.

spell.name: Minor Brain Repair
spell.description: Allows caster to repair minor brain damage (including recovery from coma). Note that experience is not restored (% lost permanent dependent on severity of damage). One hour operation; recovery time is 1 to 10 days.

spell.name: Paralysis Cures
spell.description: Allows caster to cure paralysis in 1 target (recovery time of 1-10 days). Paralysis must have resulted from a spell or disease (not a poison).

spell.name: Suspend Life II
spell.description: As Suspend Life I, except for duration and the requirement of the Suspend Life II spell (on the Blood Mastery spell list).

spell.name: Rapid Organ Transplant
spell.description: As Organ Transplant, except recovery time is only 1-10 hours.

spell.name: Joining True
spell.description: Allows caster to reattach one severed limb; requires use of the other three Lay Healer Joining spells in order to make limb fully functional. Limb is fully functional in 10 minutes.

spell.name: Nerve Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate lost nerve; regrowth takes 1 to 10 days, depending on extent of loss.

spell.name: Organ Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to completely regenerate lost organ; process takes 1 to 10 hours. Recovery time 1 to 10 days. Target remains in coma during recovery; brain regeneration is not permitted.

spell.name: Brain Regeneration
spell.description: Allows caster to regenerate brain tissue in 1 to 10 days (target is in coma during recovery). Note that lost experience is not restored (the % lost permanently depends on severity of damage).

spell.name: Measure
spell.description: Allows Lay Healer to measure and memorize dimensions necessary to make false limbs.

spell.name: Mold Wood
spell.description: Confers woodworking skills for making of artificial limb; skills last 1 day, i.e., the time necessary to mold a limb.

spell.name: Fit Wood
spell.description: Allows caster to fit a wooden limb to a body.

spell.name: Animation I
spell.description: Allows wearer to operate an artificial limb at will for the duration.

spell.name: Mold Glass
spell.description: Confers glass working skills for making of artificial limb; skills last 1 day. This material requires two days of work.

spell.name: Fit Glass
spell.description: Allows caster to fit a glass limb to a body.

spell.name: Animation II
spell.description: Allows wearer to operate an artificial limb at will for the duration.

spell.name: Mold Normal Metal
spell.description: Confers metal working skills for making of artificial limb out of basic metals; skills last 1 day. This material requires four days of work.

spell.name: Fit Normal Metal
spell.description: Allows caster to fit a metal limb to a body.

spell.name: Artificial Flesh
spell.description: Gives the caster the skills to make an work semi-realistic synthetic skin to cover an artificial limb; skills last 1 day; takes 1 to 10 days, depending on the amount required.

spell.name: Animation III
spell.description: Allows wearer to operate an artificial limb at will for the duration.

spell.name: Fit Enchanted Materials
spell.description: As Fit Wood; except allows caster to fit limbs of enchanted materials (the limb must be created through some other means).

spell.name: Animation IV
spell.description: Allows wearer to operate an artificial limb at will for the duration.

spell.name: Animation V
spell.description: As Animation I, except duration is 3 month.

spell.name: Animation VI
spell.description: As Animation I, except duration is 6 month.

spell.name: Artificial Flesh True
spell.description: Gives the caster the skills to make an work perfectly realistic synthetic skin to cover an artificial limb; skills last 1 day; takes 10 to 100 days, depending on the amount required.

spell.name: Animation VII
spell.description: Allows wearer to operate an artificial limb at will for the duration.

spell.name: Animation VIII
spell.description: Allows wearer to operate an artificial limb at will for the duration.

spell.name: Animation True
spell.description: Allows wearer to operate an artificial limb at will.

spell.name: Jolts I
spell.description: Target is stunned

spell.name: Hesitation
spell.description: Target hesitates in any nondefensive action; -50 to initiative; must parry with at least half OB.

spell.name: Minor Pain
spell.description: Target takes 25% of his remaining concussion hits (i.e., those not already taken).

spell.name: Shock A
spell.description: Target takes an "A" Electricity critical strike.

spell.name: Jolts III
spell.description: Target is stunned for 3 rounds.

spell.name: Paralyze I
spell.description: Target is paralyzed.

spell.name: Shock B
spell.description: Target takes an "B" Electricity critical strike.

spell.name: Major Pain
spell.description: Target takes 50% of his remaining concussion hits (i.e., those not already taken).

spell.name: Mind Shout I
spell.description: Everyone within the radius is a target, all failing to resist are stunned.

spell.name: Jolts V
spell.description: Target is stunned for 5 rounds.

spell.name: Paralyze III
spell.description: Target is paralyzed for 3 Rnd/10 F.

spell.name: Shock C
spell.description: Target takes an "C" Electricity critical strike.

spell.name: Mind Shout II
spell.description: Everyone within the radius is a target, all failing to resist are stunned.

spell.name: Shock D
spell.description: Target takes an "D" Electricity critical strike.

spell.name: Paralyze V
spell.description: Target is paralyzed for 5 Rnd/10 F.

spell.name: Jolts X
spell.description: Target is stunned for 10 rounds.

spell.name: Mind Shout III
spell.description: Everyone within the radius is a target, all failing to resist are stunned.

spell.name: Shock E
spell.description: Target takes an "E" Electricity critical strike.

spell.name: Great Shout
spell.description: Everyone within the radius is a target, all failing to resist are stunned. Anyone failing by over 50 is unconscious for eight hours.

spell.name: Mind Shout True
spell.description: Everyone within the radius is a target, all failing to resist are stunned.

spell.name: Shout True
spell.description: Everyone within the radius is a target, all failing to resist by 1 to 50 are unconscious, and targets failing by 50+ are dead; RRs for casters of Mentalism are modified by -20.

spell.name: Question
spell.description: Target must answer one single concept question truthfully.

spell.name: Sleep
spell.description: Target falls into a natural sleep.

spell.name: Charm Kind
spell.description: Humaniod target believes caster is a good friend.

spell.name: Calm
spell.description: Target will take no aggressive/offensive action, and will fight only in self defense.

spell.name: Confusion
spell.description: Target is incapable of making decisions or initiating action; may continue to fight current foes or in self defense.

spell.name: Fear
spell.description: Target fears caster and attempts to flee.

spell.name: Suggestion
spell.description: Target will follow a single suggested act that is not completely alien to him (e.g., no suicide suggestions, blinding himself suggestions, etc.).

spell.name: Hold Kind
spell.description: Target is held to 25% of normal actions.

spell.name: Emotions
spell.description: Causes any desired emotion.

spell.name: Master of Kind
spell.description: Target must obey caster. Target will follow a single suggested act that is not completely alien to him (e.g., no suicide suggestions, blinding himself suggestions, etc.).

spell.name: Coma
spell.description: Causes coma.

spell.name: True Charm
spell.description: Target believes caster is a good friend. Any sentient creature can be affected.

spell.name: Hold True
spell.description: Target is paralyzed and can do nothing.

spell.name: Geas
spell.description: Target is given one task, failure results in penalty determined by GM (task must be within target's capabilities).

spell.name: Hold Kind True
spell.description: Target is totally paralyzed (0% action).

spell.name: Mind Break
spell.description: Target is a vegetable.

spell.name: True Sleep
spell.description: Target is unconscious and unwakeable.

spell.name: True Geas
spell.description: Target is given one task, failure results in the target suffering an "E" critical from each of the critical tables.

spell.name: Mind Control True
spell.description: Caster has total control of target's mind. After the initial casting, the range for control is 1 mile per level.

spell.name: Mind Master
spell.description: Caster has total control of target's mind. After the initial casting, the range for control is 1 mile per level. Duration is permanent (until dispelled). Caster need only concentrate to give commands; only one target can be so controlled at a time.

spell.name: Empathy
spell.description: Caster learns target's basic feelings; can concentrate on one target each round.

spell.name: Read Emotions
spell.description: Caster learns target's emotions in detail. The caster can concentrate on a new target each round.

spell.name: Merge With Mentalist
spell.description: Allows two Mentalism spell users to communicate mentally and exchange power points.

spell.name: Focus Merge
spell.description: WHen cast before (within 1 minute) a Mind Merge or a Ready Merge spell, this spell allows the caster to focus on a specific person as the target that he has Mind Stored (See the Presence spell list).

spell.name: Thoughts
spell.description: Caster receives surface thoughts form target; if target makes his RR by more than 25 he realizes what is happening; caster can concentrate on one target each round.

spell.name: Mind Merge I
spell.description: Allows caster and target to interchange thoughts; if both are Mentalism spell users then they can interchange power points.

spell.name: Prepare Merge
spell.description: The caster prepares himself to be the target of a Mind Merge or Ready Merge spell, thus, increasing the range of the "incoming" spell. The increased range is equal to the original range times the number of Power Points used to cast the PReapre Merge spell (e.g. if the caster uses 18 Power Points, the range is 18x normal).

spell.name: Mind Merge II
spell.description: Allows caster and target to interchange thoughts; if both are Mentalism spell users then they can interchange power points.

spell.name: Inner Thoughts
spell.description: Caster receives surface thoughts, learns reasoning and thought patterns behind surface thoughts from target; if target makes his RR by more than 25 he realizes what is happening; caster can concentrate on one target each round.

spell.name: Ready Merge
spell.description: Allows caster and target to interchange thoughts; if both are Mentalism spell users then they can interchange power points. Caster and target must have "Merged" before.

spell.name: Mind Switch
spell.description: Target and caster switch minds and spell casting abilities; target is in a coma if he is not also a Mentalist.

spell.name: Mind Scan
spell.description: Caster receives surface thoughts, learns reasoning and thought patterns behind surface thoughts from target. Caster can also scan target's conscious memories at a rate of 1 scene per round. If target makes his RR by more than 25 he realizes what is happening; caster can concentrate on one target each round.

spell.name: Mind Merge True
spell.description: Allows caster and target to interchange thoughts; if both are Mentalism spell users then they can interchange power points. Caster must know the exact location of the target mentally or through some other means.

spell.name: Mind Probe
spell.description: Caster receives surface thoughts, learns reasoning and thought patterns behind surface thoughts from target. Caster can also scan target's conscious and subconscious memories (i.e. all experiences) at a rate of 1 scene per round. If target makes his RR by more than 25 he realizes what is happening; caster can concentrate on one target each round.

spell.name: Mind Switch True
spell.description: Target and caster switch minds and spell casting abilities; target is in a coma if he is not also a Mentalist. This will last until the caster decides to return to his own body.

spell.name: Thought Steal
spell.description: Caster can remove one thought or memory from the target's mind each round.

spell.name: Ready Merge True
spell.description: Allows caster and target to interchange thoughts; if both are Mentalism spell users then they can interchange power points. Caster and target must have "Merged" before.

spell.name: Mentalist Tongue
spell.description: Caster may mentally speak with another caster of the Mentalism realm.

spell.name: Prepare Mind I
spell.description: The caster enters a trance-like state to prepare his mind to be the recipient of a Mind TOnghue spell. While under the effects of this spell, any "incoming" Mind Tongue spell has its range increased by 10 times.

spell.name: Mind Tongue I
spell.description: Caster may mentally speak with any thinking being.

spell.name: Focus Mind
spell.description: When this spell is cast, the next Mind Tongue spell (cast within one minute of this spell) will be able to focus in on a specific person as its target. The person must be Mind Stored (see Presence spell list).

spell.name: Prepare Mind II
spell.description: As Prepare Mind I, except range is increased by 20 times.

spell.name: Mind Tongue II
spell.description: Caster may mentally speak with any thinking being.

spell.name: Prepare Mind III
spell.description: As Prepare Mind I, except range is increased by 50 times.

spell.name: Mind Speech I
spell.description: Caster can broadcast thoughts to minds of all within range.

spell.name: Mind Tongue III
spell.description: Caster may mentally speak with any thinking being.

spell.name: Prepare Mind IV
spell.description: As Prepare Mind I, except range is increased by 100 times.

spell.name: Mind Speech II
spell.description: Caster can broadcast thoughts to minds of all within range.

spell.name: Friend Speech
spell.description: Caster can broadcast thoughts to minds of all within range. Caster can limit broadcast to desired beings.

spell.name: Prepare Mind V
spell.description: As Prepare Mind I, except range is increased by 500 times.

spell.name: Mind Speech III
spell.description: Caster can broadcast thoughts to minds of all within range.

spell.name: Waiting Tongue
spell.description: Caster may leave a message of 25 words or less, set to be triggered by a specific mental pattern (known through Mind Store) or a time limit of up to 24 hours, or by certain movements, sounds, touch, reading, etc.

spell.name: Prepare Mind True
spell.description: As Prepare Mind I, except range is increased by 1000 times.

spell.name: Mind Tongue IV
spell.description: Caster may mentally speak with any thinking being.

spell.name: Friend Speech II
spell.description: Caster can broadcast thoughts to minds of all within range. Caster can limit broadcast to desired beings.

spell.name: Mind Speech True
spell.description: Caster can broadcast thoughts to minds of all within range.

spell.name: Mind Tongue True
spell.description: Caster may mentally speak with any thinking being.

spell.name: Waiting Speech
spell.description: Caster may leave a message of 25 words or less, set to be triggered by a specific mental pattern (known through Mind Store) or a time limit of up to 24 hours, or by certain movements, sounds, touch, reading, etc. All within the radius will hear it.

spell.name: Far Mind Speech
spell.description: Caster can broadcast thoughts to minds of all within range.

spell.name: Presence
spell.description: Caster is aware of the presence of all sentient/thinking beings within 10'/level.

spell.name: Feel I
spell.description: Caster gets general idea of the race and level of one being; being must first be located by Presence or Presence True.

spell.name: Mind Store
spell.description: Caster stores mental pattern of target; can be later used to locate specific person through Feel or Finding.

spell.name: Transfer Mind Store
spell.description: The caster can transfer a copy of any one Mind Stored person to another caster from the Mentalism realm (i.e., both casters now have the person stored), The target of this spell must know the Mind Store spell.

spell.name: Feel III
spell.description: As Feel I, except analyzes 3 targets at once (all targets must be within range).

spell.name: Mind Typing
spell.description: Caster learns the race, profession and level of one being; being must first be located by Presence or Presence True.

spell.name: Finding I
spell.description: Caster gets direction to any unshielded mind which he has a mental pattern of from Mind Store.

spell.name: Direction I
spell.description: Caster gets direction to any unshielded mind which he has a mental pattern of from Mind Store.

spell.name: Presence True
spell.description: Caster is aware of the presence of all in a 50' radius within his range. Caster can concentrate on one 50' R area each round.

spell.name: Awareness
spell.description: Caster is aware of the presence of all sentient/thinking beings within 20'. Also a general knowledge of the actions of each being (e.g., being is casting a spell, but not what spell is being cast).

spell.name: Direction II
spell.description: Caster gets direction to any unshielded mind which he has a mental pattern of from Mind Store.

spell.name: Long Feel
spell.description: Caster gets general idea of the race and level of one being; being must first be located by Presence or Presence True.

spell.name: Feel V
spell.description: As Feel I, except analyzes 5 targets at once (all targets must be within range).

spell.name: Mass Feel
spell.description: Caster gets general idea of the race and level of one being; being must first be located by Presence or Presence True.

spell.name: Mind Typing True
spell.description: Caster learns the race, profession and level of one being; being must first be located by Presence or Presence True.

spell.name: Finding II
spell.description: Caster gets direction to any unshielded mind which he has a mental pattern of from Mind Store.

spell.name: Feel X
spell.description: As Feel I, except analyzes 10 targets at once (all targets must be within range).

spell.name: Awareness True
spell.description: As Awareness, except that caster learns all actions of the target.

spell.name: Finding III
spell.description: Caster gets direction to any unshielded mind which he has a mental pattern of from Mind Store.

spell.name: Direction True
spell.description: Caster gets direction to any unshielded mind which he has a mental pattern of from Mind Store. No range limitations.

spell.name: Finding True
spell.description: Caster gets direction to any unshielded mind which he has a mental pattern of from Mind Store. No range limitations.

spell.name: Distraction
spell.description: Target is at -30 for all actions.

spell.name: Numbing
spell.description: Random limb of target's is numb and useless.

spell.name: Blur Vision
spell.description: Target has a -100 OB mod for missile attacks; -50 for all other actions.

spell.name: Minor Sense Control
spell.description: Cause false sensations in any one of these senses: smell, taste, or touch.

spell.name: Audio Attack
spell.description: Loud sound stuns target.

spell.name: Audio Control
spell.description: Causes target to hear any sound(s) desired.

spell.name: Fumble
spell.description: Target fumbles weapon or item in hands; roll on the appropriate Fumble Table.

spell.name: Vision Control
spell.description: Causes target to see whatever the caster desires.

spell.name: Vision Attack
spell.description: Bright light blinds target.

spell.name: Nerve Stun
spell.description: Target is totally numbed; is at -75 for all actions and is stunned.

spell.name: Hallucination
spell.description: Target sees a nonexistant for; must fight him until the foe is "defeated" (i.e. takes damage that would drop the target); foe has same capabilities as target but does no damage (i.e., always misses).

spell.name: Taunting Hallucination
spell.description: As Hallucination, but will never attack. He will only taunt the character (parrying all attacks against him).

spell.name: Sense Control II
spell.description: Cause false sensations in target's sight and hearing.

spell.name: Sensory Overload
spell.description: Overloads senses: 1-50 failure = Stun, 51+ = unconsciousness.

spell.name: Sense Control III
spell.description: Cause false sensations in target's sight, touch, and hearing (any three senses).

spell.name: Sense Control IV
spell.description: Cause false sensations in four of a target's senses.

spell.name: Sensory Deprivation
spell.description: Total sensory deprivation, i.e., no sensory input.

spell.name: Sense Control V
spell.description: Cause false sensations in all of a target's senses.

spell.name: Long Control
spell.description: Cause false sensations in all of a target's senses. Range for initial casting is 300', then the range for control is 1 mile per level.

spell.name: Sense Control True
spell.description: Causes false sensations in all of a target's senses. Range for initial casting is 300', then the range for control is 1 mile per level. Caster can "program" memory input and concentration is only required to "program" memory input and the duration is 10 minutes per level and all senses are controlled.

spell.name: Private World
spell.description: Target lives in own fantasy world, totally controlled by caster when he concentrates; no activity or sensory input.

spell.name: Calm Song
spell.description: Target is calmed and can't take aggressive (offensive) action, while caster plays/sings (concentrates).

spell.name: Holding Song
spell.description: Target is limited to 25% of normal action, while caster plays/sings (concentrates).

spell.name: Stun Song
spell.description: Target is stunned while caster plays/sings (concentrates).

spell.name: Sleep Song
spell.description: Target falls into a light sleep while the caster plays/sings (concentrates).

spell.name: Charm Song
spell.description: Target thinks the caster is a good friend while the caster plays/sings (concentrates).

spell.name: Fear's Song
spell.description: Target fears caster and will attempt to flee form him while the caster plays/sings (concentrates).

spell.name: Calm Song True
spell.description: Target is calmed and can't take aggressive (offensive) action, while caster plays/sings (concentrates). After the caster stops playing / singing the effect will continue for the number of rounds the caster has already played / sung (e.g., if the caster sings for 3 rounds, then after he stops the target will remain affected for 3 more rounds).

spell.name: Stun Song True
spell.description: Target is stunned while caster plays/sings (concentrates). After the caster stops playing / singing the effect will continue for the number of rounds the caster has already played / sung (e.g., if the caster sings for 3 rounds, then after he stops the target will remain affected for 3 more rounds).

spell.name: Forgetting Song
spell.description: Target will forget what transpired in a certain period of time specified by the caster (within 1 day/lvl). The length of the "forgetting" time period is equal to the amount of time the caster plays/sings (concentrates).

spell.name: Charm Song True
spell.description: Target thinks the caster is a good friend while the caster plays/sings (concentrates). After the caster stops playing / singing the effect will continue for the number of rounds the caster has already played / sung (e.g., if the caster sings for 3 rounds, then after he stops the target will remain affected for 3 more rounds).

spell.name: Panic's Song
spell.description: Target panics (routs) and flees, dropping or throwing away most of his equipment to speed his departure, while caster plays/sings (concentrates).

spell.name: Song of Mastery
spell.description: Target must obey the caster, while caster plays/sings (concentrates).

spell.name: Sleep Song True
spell.description: Target falls into a light sleep while the caster plays/sings (concentrates). After the caster stops playing / singing the effect will continue for the number of rounds the caster has already played / sung (e.g., if the caster sings for 3 rounds, then after he stops the target will remain affected for 3 more rounds).

spell.name: Panic's Song True
spell.description: As Calm Song True, except target panics and flees (as in Panic's Song).

spell.name: Song of Seeking
spell.description: Target must perform a task specified by the caster. Failure to complete the task results in a penalty determined by the GM (ignoring the task suffers the same effects as failure). Completing the task must be within the target's capabilities. The effects of this spell last until the task is completed.

spell.name: Song True
spell.description: As any of the Song True spells: Calm Song, Stun Song, Charm Song and Sleep Song (caster's choice). When the caster stops playing / singing, the duration of the spell is 2x the time the caster has already played / sung (concentrated).

spell.name: Song of Mastery True
spell.description: Target must obey the caster, while caster plays/sings (concentrates). After the caster stops playing / singing the effect will continue for the number of rounds the caster has already played / sung (e.g., if the caster sings for 3 rounds, then after he stops the target will remain affected for 3 more rounds).

spell.name: Song of Coma
spell.description: Target falls into a deep coma, from which he will awaken only if the caster cancels it or it is dispelled.

spell.name: Slaying Song
spell.description: Target dies instantly if he fails his RR by over 50. If he fails by 1 to 50 he falls into a deep coma from which he will awaken only if the caster cancels it or it is dispelled.

spell.name: Spotlight
spell.description: The cast is lit by a bright circle of light. At the time of casting, the caster designates his "front" and the light will shine from that direction,. The caster can change his "front" by concentrating (the light will blink off and another will blink on).

spell.name: Dim Lights
spell.description: All non-magical light sources in the area of effect are dimmed to the luminosity of soft candle light.

spell.name: Hush
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, all sounds in the area of effect are not louder than a whisper. The caster is immune to the effects of this spell. In addition, the caster can designate up to one extra target per level to be immune to the effects of this spell. By concentrating, for one round, the caster may designate the extra targets.

spell.name: Fanfare
spell.description: A fanfare of music plays. The caster may designate one instrument (that will make the sound of the fanfare) for every five levels of experience (or portion thereof). The volume of the fanfare cannot exceed that which would be normally made by the designated instrument(s).

spell.name: Showman I
spell.description: The caster receives a +5 bonus to all performing skills (in the Artistic/Active category) for the duration of this spell.

spell.name: Legerdemain
spell.description: THe caster can make any one target (up to 1 pound per level of the caster) he touches to vanish. The caster must designate a location for the target to "reappear" in (location must be within the caster's line of sight). The object is teleported to the designated location at the time of casting.

spell.name: Enthrall I
spell.description: The target of this spell is enthralled with the caster (for as long as the caster is performing or for the duration of this spell, whichever is shorter). While enthralled, the target is limited to only 20% of his normal activity.

spell.name: Hidden Pocket
spell.description: The caster can place any one inanimate object (up to 1 cubic foot per level of the caster) into any available container. THe container opening must be large enough to fit at least one dimension of the object. WHen the container is examined, it will appear empty to all normal perception (including feeling), The caster may pluck the item from the container at any time (up to the duration of the spell). If the object is not taken from the container before the duration is up, the object appears in the container as if it were there all along.

spell.name: Lightshow
spell.description: The caster can create a colored light that will shine in the area of effect. The caster can change the color of the light by concentrating. The light can take any form the caster desires, but the light will not illuminate more than the area of effect. For example, several small spheres of various colors can float around the caster's feet, or five red beams can flash back and forth across the caster's body.

spell.name: Showman II
spell.description: As Showman I, except bonus is +10.

spell.name: Music
spell.description: The caster may designate any music to be played as if he were playing the music (and he must have played the music at least once). The music will play continuously for the duration of the spell. If the musical score finishes before the duration is over, the music will repeat as many times as needed. The caster can designate singing instead of an instrument.

spell.name: Enthrall V
spell.description: As Enthral I, except affects 5 targets.

spell.name: Volunteer from the Audience
spell.description: The target if this spell will perform any actions that the caster dictates him (for the duration of this spell). If the target of this spell has previously been a "volunteer" for the caster, he suffers a RR modification of -1 for each previous time he was successful target. If the action(s) is something completely alien to the target, he may make another RR with a +50 modification.

spell.name: Lovely Assistant
spell.description: The target of this spell (which may be the caster) has his appearance enhanced. Treat as a temporary +25 to Appearance (to a maximum of 101). If the target's Appearance raises over 100, the appearance will cause all who view the target to be distracted (treat as -10 to all perceptions while the target is in sight). This spell enhances facial appearance, body appearance, and clothing appearance.

spell.name: Showman III
