spell.description: As Showman I, except bonus is +15.

spell.name: Orchestra
spell.description: As Music, except caster may designate one instrument per five levels of experience (or portion thereof). All instruments (including vocal) will play as if the caster were playing them simultaneously.

spell.name: Enthrall X
spell.description: As Enthral I, except affects 10 targets.

spell.name: Disappear
spell.description: As Legerdemain, except affects any target up to the caster's own mass.

spell.name: Showman IV
spell.description: As Showman I, except bonus is +20.

spell.name: Mass Enthrall
spell.description: As Enthrall I, except affects a number of targets equal to the caster's level.

spell.name: Disappear True
spell.description: As Disappear, except may affect any one living creature or an inanimate object up to 100 pounds per level of the caster.

spell.name: Showman True
spell.description: As Showman I, except bonus is +25.

spell.name: Jewel/Metal Assessment
spell.description: Caster can assess the value of jewels and metals to within 10%. Allows the caster to calculate different values for the different cultures he is familiar with.

spell.name: Item Assessment
spell.description: Caster can assess the value of crafted items to within 10%. Allows the caster to calculate different values for the different cultures he is familiar with. Magic capabilities are not included.

spell.name: Detect Power
spell.description: Detects power in an item, but not the realm or how much.

spell.name: Item Analysis I
spell.description: Caster has a 10% chance for each ability of determining what enchanted abilities the item has. Once an Item Analysis spell has been cast on an item, it may not be cast on that item again until the caster has reached a new level of experience.

spell.name: Assessment True
spell.description: Caster can assess the value of anything to within 10%. Livestock, houses, boats, etc., are examples. Allows the caster to calculate different values for the different cultures he is familiar with. Magic capabilities are not included.

spell.name: Significance
spell.description: Determines if the item examined has any cultural or historical significance, but not specifically what significance.

spell.name: Item Analysis II
spell.description: Caster has a 20% chance for each ability of determining what enchanted abilities the item has. Once an Item Analysis spell has been cast on an item, it may not be cast on that item again until the caster has reached a new level of experience.

spell.name: Origins
spell.description: Gives the area of origin of the item, the race of the being who made it, and when it was made (within 100 years).

spell.name: Item Vision
spell.description: Gives a vision of the most significant event in the item's past. The event cannot have occurred more than 1 hour per level of the caster in the past.

spell.name: Item Analysis III
spell.description: Caster has a 30% chance for each ability of determining what enchanted abilities the item has. Once an Item Analysis spell has been cast on an item, it may not be cast on that item again until the caster has reached a new level of experience.

spell.name: Detect Curse
spell.description: Determines if the item has a curse on it.

spell.name: Significance True
spell.description: Determines if the item examined has any cultural or historical significance. This spell will determine the exact cultural and historical significance.

spell.name: Item Analysis IV
spell.description: As Item Analysis I, except there is a 40$ chance for each ability.

spell.name: Death's Lore
spell.description: Gives a vision how someone died and an image of their killer. When this spell is cast, the caster must be touching an object that had significance in the death (i.e., the murder weapon, the body, etc.)

spell.name: Item Vision True
spell.description: As Item Vision, except without time limit.

spell.name: Item Analysis V
spell.description: Caster has a 50% chance for each ability of determining what enchanted abilities the item has. Once an Item Analysis spell has been cast on an item, it may not be cast on that item again until the caster has reached a new level of experience.

spell.name: Item Analysis VI
spell.description: As Item Analysis I,. except there is a 60% chance for each ability.

spell.name: Origins True
spell.description: Gives the exact origin of the item, the being who made it and when it was made.

spell.name: Item Analysis VII
spell.description: Caster has a 70% chance for each ability of determining what enchanted abilities the item has. Once an Item Analysis spell has been cast on an item, it may not be cast on that item again until the caster has reached a new level of experience.

spell.name: Item Analysis True
spell.description: Caster automatically knows each abilities the item has. Once an Item Analysis spell has been cast on an item, it may not be cast on that item again until the caster has reached a new level of experience.

spell.name: Recall
spell.description: Allows the caster to access his memory as if he had total recall. Any skill resolution involving Memory gets a bonus. If the skill uses Memory as one of the stats (many Influence skills) the bonus is +10. If the skill uses Memory as two of these stats (most Lore skills) the bonus is +25, if the skill uses Memory as all three stats (i.e., a straight "memory" check), the bonus is +50.

spell.name: Learn Language II
spell.description: Doubles the rate at which the caster can learn a language.

spell.name: Language Lore
spell.description: Caster learns what language a piece of text is written in, and the author if he was noteworthy or the caster has seen his work.

spell.name: Mind's Lore I
spell.description: Caster can scan the target's mind; and receive up to 10% of the target's knowledge (conscious and unconscious) concerning one very specific topic. The 10% chance should be to each piece of information that the target knows (1 per round).

spell.name: Study II
spell.description: Caster can read at double the normal rate (resulting in 2 pages per minute while this spell is active).

spell.name: Learn Language III
spell.description: Triples the rate at which the caster can learn a language.

spell.name: Mind's Lore III
spell.description: Caster can scan the target's mind; and receive up to 30% of the target's knowledge (conscious and unconscious) concerning one very specific topic. The 30% chance should be to each piece of information that the target knows (1 per round).

spell.name: Study III
spell.description: As Study II, except caster can read three times normal rate (i.e., 3 pages per minute).

spell.name: Passage Origin
spell.description: Caster can read a piece of text and tell if it has been translated; and if so, what the original language was and possibly the author if he was noteworthy or the caster has seen his work.

spell.name: Learn Language IV
spell.description: Increases the rate at which the caster can learn a language by 4x.

spell.name: Mind's Lore V
spell.description: Caster can scan the target's mind; and receive up to 50% of the target's knowledge (conscious and unconscious) concerning one very specific topic. The 50% chance should be to each piece of information that the target knows (1 per round).

spell.name: Study V
spell.description: As Study II, except caster can read five times normal rate (i.e., 5 pages per minute).

spell.name: Study X
spell.description: As Study II, except caster can read ten times normal rate (i.e., 10 pages per minute).

spell.name: Mind's Lore VII
spell.description: As Mind's Lore I, except chance is 70% for each bit of knowledge.

spell.name: Study True
spell.description: As Study I, except caster can read as fast as he can glance at a page.

spell.name: Learn Language V
spell.description: Increases the rate at which the caster can learn a language by 5x.

spell.name: Mind's Lore True
spell.description: Caster can scan the target's mind; and receive all of the target's knowledge (conscious and unconscious) concerning one very specific topic. The 100% chance should be to each piece of information that the target knows (1 per round).

spell.name: Learn Language True
spell.description: If the caster has access to a being that knows a certain language, he can learn the language as well as the given being knows it; he must touch the being and concentrate for 24 hours.

spell.name: Quiet I
spell.description: Any sounds originating within 1' of the caster's body cannot be heard outside the radius; +25 to stalking.

spell.name: Sonic Law I
spell.description: Caster may manipulate sound within 1' of his body. He can create any sound he wants; and if he desires, that sound can be heard outside the radius.

spell.name: Silence I
spell.description: Any sounds originating within 10' of the caster's body cannot be heard outside the radius; +25 to stalking.

spell.name: Sonic Law II
spell.description: Caster may manipulate sound within 10' of his body. He can create any sound he wants; and if he desires, that sound can be heard outside the radius.

spell.name: Sudden Sound
spell.description: Causes a very loud, sudden sound next to the target's ear. The target is stunned for the duration.

spell.name: Deafen
spell.description: Target cannot hear sound occurring more than 6" from his ear.

spell.name: Cracks
spell.description: Certain sound waves will cause any previous cracks or flaws in solid inanimate material up to 1000 cu feet section to expand to their limit.

spell.name: Silence III
spell.description: Any sounds originating within 50' of the caster's body cannot be heard outside the radius; +25 to stalking.

spell.name: Sonic Law III
spell.description: Caster may manipulate sound within 100' of his body. He can create any sound he wants; and if he desires, that sound can be heard outside the radius.

spell.name: Shatter Blast
spell.description: Can shatter an inorganic object, up to 1 cu'. All within a 5' R take an "A" impact critical and holder takes a "C".

spell.name: Waiting Sound
spell.description: A set series of sounds can be concentrated upon and then delayed up to 24 hours or until triggered by a specified sound.

spell.name: Sonic Law IV
spell.description: Caster may manipulate sound within 10' per level of his body. He can create any sound he wants; and if he desires, that sound can be heard outside the radius.

spell.name: Long Sudden Sound
spell.description: As Sudden Sound, except for the range.

spell.name: Mind's Song
spell.description: All targets within the area of effect are stunned due to ultrasonics (this includes animals).

spell.name: Crumble
spell.description: Certain sound waves will cause any previous cracks or flaws in solid inanimate material up to 1000 cu feet section to cause the material to crumble to dust.

spell.name: Silence True
spell.description: Any sounds originating within 100' of the caster's body cannot be heard outside the radius; +25 to stalking.

spell.name: Mind's Song True
spell.description: Everyone within the radius is a target, all failing are stunned due to ultrasonics (this includes animals).

spell.name: Sonic Law True
spell.description: Caster may manipulate sound within 10' per level of his body. He can create any sound he wants; and if he desires, that sound can be heard outside the radius. Sounds can be programmed, delayed (up to 24 hours), more than one at a time, and instantly changeable.

spell.name: Long Whisper I
spell.description: Caster can whisper and the whisper can be heard at any point he chooses within the range.

spell.name: Sounding II
spell.description: Caster's voice is amplified 2x.

spell.name: Song Sounding II
spell.description: Doubles the range of a spell on the Bard Base list, Controlling Songs; must be caster just before that spell.

spell.name: Song II
spell.description: Allows the caster to affect two targets with a spell off the Bard Base list, Controlling Songs; this spell requires the same PPs as the controlling spell, and is cast simultaneously with that spell.

spell.name: Long Whisper III
spell.description: Caster can whisper and the whisper can be heard at any point he chooses within the range.

spell.name: Sounding V
spell.description: Caster's voice is amplified 5x.

spell.name: Great Song I
spell.description: Allows the caster to affect everyone within the radius with a spell off the Bard Base list, Controlling Songs; this spell requires the same PPs as the controlling spell, and is cast simultaneously with that spell.

spell.name: Song Sounding III
spell.description: Triples the range of a spell on the Bard Base list, Controlling Songs; must be caster just before that spell.

spell.name: Long Whisper V
spell.description: Caster can whisper and the whisper can be heard at any point he chooses within the range.

spell.name: Song III
spell.description: Allows the caster to affect three targets with a spell off the Bard Base list, Controlling Songs; this spell requires the same PPs as the controlling spell, and is cast simultaneously with that spell.

spell.name: Silent Song
spell.description: When this is cast with a spell off the Bard Base list, Controlling Songs, no one but the target(s) will hear the song; this spell requires the same PPs as the controlling spell, and is cast simultaneously with the controlling spell.

spell.name: Song Sounding IV
spell.description: Makes the range of a spell on the Bard Base list , Controlling Songs 4x longer; must be caster just before that spell.

spell.name: Long Whisper X
spell.description: Caster can whisper and the whisper can be heard at any point he chooses within the range.

spell.name: Song V
spell.description: Allows the caster to affect five targets with a spell off the Bard Base list, Controlling Songs; this spell requires the same PPs as the controlling spell, and is cast simultaneously with that spell.

spell.name: Great Song V
spell.description: Allows the caster to affect everyone within the radius with a spell off the Bard Base list, Controlling Songs; this spell requires the same PPs as the controlling spell, and is cast simultaneously with that spell.

spell.name: Song Sounding V
spell.description: Makes the range of a spell on the Bard Base list , Controlling Songs 5x longer; must be caster just before that spell.

spell.name: Long Whisper True
spell.description: As Long Whisper I, except range is 100' per level of the caster.

spell.name: Song X
spell.description: As Song II, except 10 targets may be affected.

spell.name: Song Sounding VII
spell.description: As Song Sounding II, except range is seven times normal.

spell.name: Great Song True
spell.description: Allows the caster to affect everyone within the radius with a spell off the Bard Base list, Controlling Songs; this spell requires the same PPs as the controlling spell, and is cast simultaneously with that spell.

spell.name: Song Sounding X
spell.description: As Song Sounding II, except range is ten times normal.

spell.name: Song Mastery
spell.description: Any of the spells below can be cast at a rate of 1 round for the duration of the spell; any controlling songs must be cast separately and additional power points must be expended.

spell.name: Concealed Object I
spell.description: Target object (no larger than a dagger) is camouflaged to appear as part of caster's clothing or skin. This is an illusion to all senses (including feel) and can be detected as illusion. The object will remain concealed until taken from the location, or the duration expires.

spell.name: Study Patsy
spell.description: When this spell is cast on a person, it remains active for 24 hours. After 24 hours has passed (but before another 24 hours has passed), the caster must cast this spell again on the same person. During this time the spell is active, it is recording information concerning the activiies of the person. When the spell is cast the second time, the information about those activities is revealed to the caster. This information is used for spells later on this list and spells on other lists (see the Misdirections and Disguise Mastery spell lists). The caster can only have one "patsy" studied at a time.

spell.name: Well-Aimed Attack I
spell.description: The next attack made by the caster (within one minute of casting this spell), receives a bonus of +25.

spell.name: Open Ambush I
spell.description: If the next attack made by the caster (within one minute of casting this spell) gets a "flank" or "rear" bonus, he may use his Ambush skill with a bonus of +1 (even if the target is aware of the caster).

spell.name: Targeting I
spell.description: After this spell is cast (within one minute of casting this spell), the caster may fire a missile weapon at a non-moving target (or at a target that is moving predictably). The roll to resolve any resulting critical may be modified up or down by 1 (as if using Ambush skill).

spell.name: Create Evidence I
spell.description: Caster may cast this spell to create one piece of physical evidence (non-mobile) that implicates the currently studied patsy (see Study Patsy). This could include a fingerprint, a footprint etc. (but must be something that cannot normally be moved from the scene of the crime). The evidence should be treated as circumstantial (i.e. a good alibi might get the patsy off the hook)

spell.name: Concealed Object II
spell.description: As Conceal Object I, except will affect an object up to a sword in size.

spell.name: Well-Aimed Attack II
spell.description: As Well-Aimed Attack I, except bonus is +50.

spell.name: Open Ambush II
spell.description: As Open Ambush I, except the modification is +2.

spell.name: Targeting II
spell.description: As Targeting I, except modification is +2.

spell.name: Lightning Reactions
spell.description: Caster gets a bonus +10 to his initiative roll(s) this round.

spell.name: Create Evidence II
spell.description: As Create Evidence I, except two pieces of evidence are created; one piece of evidence is incriminating (i.e. patsy will need more than a good alibi)

spell.name: Well-Aimed Attack III
spell.description: As Well-Aimed Attack I, except bonus is +75.

spell.name: Open Ambush III
spell.description: As Open Ambush I, except the modification is +3.

spell.name: Targeting III
spell.description: As Targeting I, except the modification is +3.

spell.name: Concealed Object True
spell.description: As Concealed Object I, except object may be of any size (so long as the largest dimension of the object is smaller than the caster).

spell.name: Study Victim
spell.description: As Study Patsy, excpet information is used with the slaying Attack spells later on this list.

spell.name: Create Evidence III
spell.description: As Create Evidence I, except three pieces of evidence are created; two of which are incriminating.

spell.name: Well-Aimed Attack True
spell.description: As Well-Aimed Attack I, except bonus is +100.

spell.name: Slaying Attack
spell.description: The next attack made (within one minute of casting this spell) against the currently Studied victim (see the 17th level spell on this list) will be resolved as a slaying attack. The attack must occur before the duration of this spell is up.

spell.name: Open Ambush True
spell.description: As Open Ambush I, except the modification ia +5.

spell.name: Targeting True
spell.description: As Targeting I, except the modification is +5.

spell.name: Slaying Attack True
spell.description: As Slaying Attack, except all attacks made against the victim will be resolved as slaying attacks (for the duration of the spell).

spell.name: Study Disguise
spell.description: Caster studies a person for use with disguise spells later on this list. The caster can only have as many disguises studied as he has levels.

spell.name: Locklore
spell.description: Gives the caster a +20 bonus for picking the lock analyzed. If the caster describes the information gained from this spell, that person will get a +10 bonus to picking the lock analyzed.

spell.name: Copy I
spell.description: This spell copies a document that the caster is examining. The caster merely concentrates and touches the document with one hand and a blank sheed with his other hand. The copy is not exact (i.e., not a forgery). Note that the caster does not have to be able to read the document. Alternatively, this spell can transcribe (in black and white) one scene that he is viewing onto a page. The process occurs at the rate of 1 minute per page or scene.

spell.name: Listen
spell.description: The caster can pick a point up to 10' away and he will hear as if he were at that point (there can be intervening barriers such as walls).

spell.name: Duplicate I
spell.description: This spell makes a hardened clay copy of a small, 3-dimensional object (up to 6" x 6" x 6"). This spell requires that the caster have enough clat to make the copy (at a one to one scale). The clay must start off soft (the spell will harden if), This process requires one minute of concentration.

spell.name: Sensory Marker
spell.description: One location is "marked" so that the caster can find it again later with a Far Sense spell. The marker is automatically located when the caster casts a Far Sense spell (if the marker is within the range of the Far Sense spell). A marker can be placed on an inanimate object. The caster can only have as many markers as he has levels.

spell.name: Copy II
spell.description: As Copy I, except copoes 1 page/scene every 4 rounds.

spell.name: Far Sense I
spell.description: Caster may designate any one of his senses to be used at a "marked" location within range (see Sensory Marker). The caster can use any perception skill he has at the time (e.g., if he is currently under the effects of a Nightvision spell, he will have nightvision at the marked location). The remote sensory point, may be rotated to face any direction. While he is sensing at the marked location, the caster must remain immobile and concentrate.

spell.name: Locate Evidence I
spell.description: After casting this spell, the caster will know what (if any) evidence exists within the range which would implicate the currently studied patsy if found at the scene if the crime (see Study Patsy on the Assassination Mastery list). The evidence (if any exists) will be circumstantial, bur will imply the patsy was at the scene when a crime occured. This procied only the direction, distance, and descriprion of the evidence. If does not provide any details as to why the patsy will be implicated by this evidence.

spell.name: Watch
spell.description: As Listen, excpe the cater sees from the fixed point (it can rotate).

spell.name: Duplicate II
spell.description: As Duplicate I, except will work on objects up to 3 cubic feet in size.

spell.name: Copy III
spell.description: As Copy I, except copies 1 page/scene per 2 rounds.

spell.name: Far Sense II
spell.description: As Far Sense I, except caster may designate up to two sense at the marked location.

spell.name: Woodsight
spell.description: Caster can see through wood (up to 1"/level).

spell.name: Locate Evidence II
spell.description: As Locate Evidence I, except two pieces of evidence are located, and the evidence will be incremenating (i.e., not just circumstantial).

spell.name: Duplicate III
spell.description: As Duplicate I, except will work on objects up to 6 cubit feet.

spell.name: Copy IV
spell.description: As Copy I, except copies 1 page/scene per round.

spell.name: Greater Far Sense I
spell.description: As Far Sense I, except caster can move while the spell is active (though he must maintain concentration).

spell.name: Stonesight
spell.description: As Woodsight, except caster sees through stone.

spell.name: Locate Evidence III
spell.description: As Locate Evidence I, except 3 peices of evidence are located and the evidence will "prove" the that the patsy is guilty.

spell.name: Greater Far Sense True
spell.description: As Far Sense II, except caster can move while the spell is active (though he must maintain concentration).

spell.name: Ironsight
spell.description: As Woodsight, except caster can see through iron or steel.

spell.name: Long Far Sense I
spell.description: As Far Sense I, except for range.

spell.name: Copy V
spell.description: As Copy I, except copies at 2 page/scene per round.

spell.name: Copy True
spell.description: As Copy I, except will copy any bound vloume onto an equal number of pages (not necessarily bound). Also the caster need not examine the material (he simply casts the spell and then he can leave the spell running). The spell will copy pages at the rate of 5 pages per round (and will even copy colour images).

spell.name: False Credentials
spell.description: Target will think that the caster has the proper credentials for the current situation (this could include passwords or documents).

spell.name: Poison Lore
spell.description: The caster knows what type of poison(s) are needed to acheive a particular effect. The GM may deem it appropriate to give the caster a bonus of +25 to his Poison Lore skill.

spell.name: Distraction
spell.description: Target is at -30 for all actions.

spell.name: Confusion
spell.description: Target is incapable of making decisions or initiating action; may continue to fight current foes or in self defense.

spell.name: Blur Vision
spell.description: Target has a -100 OB mod for missile attacks; -50 for all other actions.

spell.name: Fear
spell.description: Target fears caster and attempts to flee.

spell.name: Stumble
spell.description: Target becomes unbalance; if he is moving, he trips and falls (out 1 to 4 rounds); if he is performing a maneuver, he fails it.

spell.name: Fumble
spell.description: Target fumbles any weapon or item in his hands; roll on the appropriate Arms Law Fumble Table.

spell.name: Hallucination
spell.description: Target sees a nonexistent foe; must fight him until the foe is "defeated" (i.e., takes damage that would drop the target); foe has same capabilities as target but does him no damage (i.e., always misses).

spell.name: Spin
spell.description: Target is spun about 180 degrees, taking 1 round per 10 failure to recover.

spell.name: Weapon Alteration
spell.description: Target's weapon is altered to appear to him that it is some other weapon, with which he must fight; treat as a similar weapon for OB purposes.

spell.name: Mirages
spell.description: Target sees all moving things clearly, but the caster can control the fixed scene that the target "sees".

spell.name: Blinding
spell.description: Target is blinded.

spell.name: Shifting
spell.description: Target sees moving things shifted between 6" and 18" form where they really are; any attack he makes against a foe has a 50% chance of having no effect.

spell.name: Mass Distraction
spell.description: One target per level is at -30 for all actions. They must be in the caster's field of vision.

spell.name: Word of Fear
spell.description: Target fears caster and attempts to flee.

spell.name: Amnesia
spell.description: Target has amnesia, but loses none of his skills or abilities.

spell.name: Shout of Confusion
spell.description: All beings within radius are incapable of making decisions or initiating action; may continue to fight current foes or in self defense.

spell.name: Long Bewilderment
spell.description: As any single spell from this list of 10th level or lower, except the range is increased to 300'.

spell.name: Shout of Fear
spell.description: As Fear, except the spell is instantaneous and the duration is one round per 5 failure and all beings within a 50'R are targets.

spell.name: Lord Bewilderment
spell.description: As any single spell from this list of 10th level or lower, except affects up to 20 targets.

spell.name: Amnesia True
spell.description: Target has amnesia, but loses none of his skills or abilities. Duration is permanent (until dispelled).

spell.name: Parallel Reality
spell.description: Target sees and hears a world in which everything real has an image, but the image is changed or distorted (e.g., a Dwarf might seem to be an Orc, a house might seem to be a cave, etc.)

spell.name: Bewilderment True
spell.description: As any single spell from this list of 20th level or lower, except the range is increased to 300' and will affect up to 1 target per level of caster.

spell.name: Condensation
spell.description: Condenses 1 cu' of water from the surrounding air.

spell.name: Airwall
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 10' x 3' wall of dense air, cuts all attacks and movements through it by 50% (i.e., -50 to OBs).

spell.name: Fog II
spell.description: Creates dense fog in a 20' R.

spell.name: Vacuum A
spell.description: Creates a 5'R near vacuum, all in radius take a 'A' impact critical, as air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Air Stop I
spell.description: Stops all generalized air movement (e.g., wind) up to wind of 30 mph; cuts higher winds by 30 mph in a 10' R.

spell.name: Fog X
spell.description: Creates dense fog in a 100' R.

spell.name: Airwall True
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 10' x 3' wall of dense air, cuts all attacks and movements through it by 50% (i.e., -50 to OBs).

spell.name: Fire Bolt I
spell.description: A bolt of fire is shot from the palm of the caster, results are determined on the Fire Bolt Table.

spell.name: Vacuum B
spell.description: As Vacuum A, except results in a 'B' Impact Critical.

spell.name: Airstop V
spell.description: Stops all generalized air movement (e.g., wind) up to wind of 30 mph; cuts higher winds by 30 mph in a 50' R.

spell.name: Fog XXX
spell.description: Creates dense fog in a 100' R.

spell.name: Gas-Air
spell.description: All gas within 10' R of the caster is converted to breathable air.

spell.name: Vacuum C
spell.description: Creates a 5' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "C" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Oxygenation
spell.description: Creates a 50' R of high oxygen content air; all within receive a 20 bonus to their OB's and fire attacks deliver double damage.

spell.name: Whirling Winds
spell.description: Creates a whirlwind about caster; it moves with the caster and has a 10' R. No missile attacks can penetrate it and any movement or melee (except for caster's) into or through it is cut by 80%.

spell.name: Firebolt III
spell.description: As Firebolt, except range is 300'.

spell.name: Vacuum D
spell.description: As Vacuum A, except results in a 'D' Impact Critical.

spell.name: Reverse Winds
spell.description: Allows the caster to change the direction of the wind within the radius.

spell.name: Fog True
spell.description: Creates dense fog in a 100' per level R.

spell.name: Vacuum E
spell.description: Creates a 5' R near vacuum; all within the radius take a "E" Impact critical as the air leaves and rushes back in.

spell.name: Cloud Shaping
spell.description: Caster has complete control of clouds within range (includes fog); he can control storm clouds and cause them to rain, but he can't create them.

spell.name: Transmutation
spell.description: May transmute 1000 cu' of gas (no part can be more than 20' away) into another non-magical gas that the caster has a sample of; usable once per day.

spell.name: Blur
spell.description: Causes caster to appear blurred to attackers, subtracting 10 from all attacks.

spell.name: Unseen I
spell.description: A single object is made invisible (1 garment, 1 naked body, etc.); until 24 hours pass or the object is struck by a violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack).

spell.name: Shadow
spell.description: Caster and objects on his person appear to be a shadow, and thus are almost invisible in dark areas. (e.g., in many situations this could be handled with a Stalking/Hiding bonus between 25 and 75).

spell.name: Silence
spell.description: Any sounds originating within a 1' R of the caster's body are completely muffled; +25 to Stalking.

spell.name: Invisibility I
spell.description: Everything within 1' of the target is invisible as long as it is within the 1' R and none of the following occur: 24 hours pass or the object is struck by a violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack). Only objects totally contained in the radius at the time of casting become invisible.

spell.name: Invisibility II
spell.description: Everything up to 1' of the target is invisible as long as it is within the up to 1' R and none of the following occur: 24 hours pass or the object is struck by a violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack). Only objects totally contained in the radius at the time of casting become invisible.

spell.name: Screens
spell.description: Creates a 1000 sq' screen on which the caster can place any static scene; seems 3-dimensional and normal.

spell.name: Displacement I
spell.description: Caster appears to be offset from where he really is. All attacks have no effect 10% of the time (no normal RRs). Each time a foe misses him, the chance of "no effect for that foe goes down by 5%.

spell.name: No Sense
spell.description: Everything within 1' of the target is invisible as long as it is within the 1' R and none of the following occur: 24 hours pass or the object is struck by a violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack). Only objects totally contained in the radius at the time of casting become invisible.Also, the caster is undetectable by smell and sound.

spell.name: Shadow Mystic
spell.description: Creates a duplicate of the caster; if he concentrates, it will move as he wills; otherwise, it does exactly as he does.

spell.name: Invisibility Sphere I
spell.description: Everything up to 10' of the target is invisible as long as it is within the up to 10' R and none of the following occur: 24 hours pass or the object is struck by a violent blow (being hit by a weapon, falling, etc.) or the object makes a violent move (i.e., an attack). Only objects totally contained in the radius at the time of casting become invisible.

spell.name: Displacement II
spell.description: Caster appears to be offset from where he really is. All attacks have no effect 20% of the time (no normal RRs). Each time a foe misses him, the chance of "no effect for that foe goes down by 5%.

spell.name: Flattening
spell.description: Caster is flattened on his side until he has only two dimensions; thus he can slide through cracks and can't be seen from the side.

spell.name: Merging
spell.description: Caster can merge into any inanimate, solid material (up to 1' in depth), he is inactive and unaware of surrounding activity.

spell.name: Unpresence
spell.description: Caster appears to have no presence to magical or mental detections.

spell.name: Displacement III
spell.description: Caster appears to be offset from where he really is. All attacks have no effect 30% of the time (no normal RRs). Each time a foe misses him, the chance of "no effect for that foe goes down by 5%.

spell.name: Passing
spell.description: Caster can pass through 1' per level of any inorganic material at the rate of 2' per minute.

spell.name: Great Merge
spell.description: As Merging, except caster may turn within the material and perceive the world outside the material if within 6" of the surface.

spell.name: Displacement IV
spell.description: As Displacement I, except base chance of missing is 40%.

spell.name: Nondetect
spell.description: Caster and objects on his person cannot be detected by any "Detect ..." spells.

spell.name: Displacement V
spell.description: Caster appears to be offset from where he really is. All attacks have no effect 50% of the time (no normal RRs). Each time a foe misses him, the chance of "no effect for that foe goes down by 5%.

spell.name: Hiding True
spell.description: Caster can "Merge" into a material, use " Unpresence ", use " Nondetect " and observe surrounding activity; all with this one spell.

spell.name: Boil/Freeze Water
spell.description: Heats or cools 1 cu' /level of liquid to boiling or freezing, at a rate of 1 cu' / round; any inanimate liquid, not just water.

spell.name: Clear/Desalinate Water
spell.description: Clears liquid of all sediment and dissolved substances, at a rate of 1 cu' / round; any inanimate liquid, not just water.

spell.name: Evaporate Water
spell.description: Evaporates 1000 cu' /level of liquid to gas, at a rate of 100 cu' / round; any inanimate liquid, not just water.

spell.name: Waterwall
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 10' x 1' wall of churning water (a water source must be within 10'), cuts all attacks and movements through it by 80%.

spell.name: Water Bolt I
spell.description: A bolt of water is shot from the caster's palm (a water source must be within 10'); results are determined on the Water Bolt Table.

spell.name: Water Corridor I
spell.description: Creates a corridor through liquid up to 100' long, 3' wide, and 10' deep (must be open at top).

spell.name: Call Rain
spell.description: Causes it to rain in a 100' R about the caster, heaviness is determined by the humidity.

spell.name: Calm Water
spell.description: All water within a 100' R is calmed: waves are cut by 20' in the center and less towards the perimeter.

spell.name: Wave
spell.description: Creates a wave moving away form the caster; wave is 1' high per level in the center and 10'/Lvl wide.

spell.name: Waterwall True
spell.description: Creates a 10' x 10' x 1' wall of churning water (a water source must be within 10'), cuts all attacks and movements through it by 80%. No concentration is required.

spell.name: Water Corridor III
spell.description: Creates a corridor through liquid up to 300' long, 4' wide, and 50' deep (must be open at top).

spell.name: Liquid-Water
spell.description: Changes any liquid into water.

spell.name: Whirlpool
spell.description: Creates a 20' R whirlpool that will draw in any unpowered objects up to 200' away.

spell.name: Water Tunnel
spell.description: Creates a tunnel through liquid that is 5' in diameter and 100' long.

spell.name: Calm Water True
spell.description: Water within a 100' per level radius is calmed; waves are cut by 20' in center and less towards the perimeter.

spell.name: Command Current
spell.description: The area of effect for this spell is the water immediately surrounding the boat the caster is on. For as long as the caster concentrates, the speed of the boat will be increased by 50' per round (approximately 3 miles per hour).

spell.name: Water Bubble
spell.description: Creates a bubble of air (10'R) around the caster and others. The bubble will carry them in up to 100' of water (air is resuscitated). The caster must concentrate to move the bubble (without concentration will simply raise to the surface). At the end of the duration, the bubble will begin to rise to the surface. All objects in the bubble will rise with it. After reaching the surface, the bubble will burst.

spell.name: Water Bolt III
spell.description: As Water Bolt I, except for the range.

spell.name: Water Corridor True
spell.description: Creates a corridor through liquid up to 100'/ level long, 6' wide, and 100' deep (must be open at top). Does not require concentration.

spell.name: Water Tunnel True
spell.description: Creates a tunnel through liquid that is 6' in diameter and 100'/Level long. Does not require concentration.

spell.name: Stream Diversion
spell.description: Caster can divert a water source or part of a water source into a stream which can be up to 15' x 6' and as long as the range of this spell.

spell.name: Transmutation
spell.description: May transmute 1 cu' of liquid into another non-magical liquid that the caster has a sample of; usable once per day.

spell.name: Study Form
spell.description: Caster studies and memorizes the appearance and mannerisms of a being, for later use in a Face Shift or Change type spell.

spell.name: Face Shifting True
spell.description: Allows caster to alter form of his face to resemble someone else. If he Studied a being he can take on the exact form.

spell.name: Change to Kind
spell.description: Caster can alter his entire body to the form of another humanoid race (no change in mass). This cannot be a specific person.

spell.name: Misfeel Kind
spell.description: (No PPs expended) Caster appears to of any race he chooses to magical or mental detections.

spell.name: Enlarge
spell.description: Caster can increase his mass (and usually height) by 10%/Lvl; but there is no proportional increase in strength (other than for movement purposes).

spell.name: Shrink
spell.description: Caster can shrink his mass (and usually height) by 10%/Lvl(maximium of 90%); but there is no proportional decrease in strength.

spell.name: Misfeel Calling
spell.description: (No PPs expended) Caster appears to of any race and profession he chooses to magical or mental detections.

spell.name: Changing Lungs
spell.description: Caster can breathe any air, water, and gas at will.

spell.name: Change
spell.description: Caster can alter his entire body to the form of another organic form within 1/2 to 2x his mass; does not obtain any special abilities.

spell.name: Mystical Tongue
spell.description: Caster can speak mentally with any sentient being; and to the being it will seem as if the caster was speaking in the being's own language.

spell.name: Misfeel Power
spell.description: (No PPs expended) Caster appears to of any level he chooses to magical or mental detections.

spell.name: Impersonation Change
spell.description: If a being has been Studied, the caster can change to the exact duplicate of him.

spell.name: Unpresence
spell.description: Target appears to have no presence.

spell.name: Misfeel
spell.description: Allows caster to use all of the " Misfeel " spells on this list at once. Caster can change to any race, profession or level that he chooses.

spell.name: Changing
spell.description: Caster can alter his entire body to the form of another organic form within 1/2 to 2x his mass; does not obtain any special abilities. Caster can alter his form at will, by concentrating for one round per change.

spell.name: Great Change to Kind
spell.description: As Change to Kind, except for the duration.

spell.name: Great Change
spell.description: As Changes except for duration.

spell.name: Misfeel True
spell.description: As Misfeel, except caster does not have to concentrate.

spell.name: Great Impersonation Change
spell.description: As Impersonation Change, except for duration.

spell.name: Impersonation Change True
spell.description: As Impersonation Change, except will last until the caster cancels the spell (or it is dispelled).

spell.name: Holy Presence
spell.description: Allows caster to use all of the " Misfeel " spells on this list at once. Caster can change to any race, profession or level that he chooses. He can misrepresent his presence and power, so that he seems to be a minor deity.

spell.name: Submerge Self
spell.description: Caster develops an entire false persona and places his own persona deep in his subconscious. To all detection attempts (except perhaps, Mind Probe), the caster seems to be the false persona. The caster has no control over his actions, until the set duration is over. The false person can be a specific person if "Study" has been cast once per day (for 30 days) on that person.

spell.name: Warm Solid
spell.description: Any solid inanimate, non-metal material (1 cu'/lvl) can be warmed to 100 degrees F at a rate of 1 cu'/round.

spell.name: Heat Solid I
spell.description: Any solid inanimate, non-metal material (1 cu'/lvl) can be warmed to 500 degrees F at a rate of 1 cu'/round and 100 degrees F / round. Caster needs only touch the target when the spell is cast; caster is immune to heat.

spell.name: Cool Solid
spell.description: Any solid, inanimate, non-metal material can be cooled to 0 degrees F, at a rate of 1 cu'/rnd.

spell.name: Cracks Call
spell.description: Any previous cracks or flaws in material up to 10' x 10' x 10' section will extend to their limits.

spell.name: Door
spell.description: Can cause a door to expand or contract due to subtle temperature changes; door can be jammed or loosened.

spell.name: Woodfires
spell.description: Causes wood and other burnable materials to instantly burst into flames.

spell.name: Heat Solid II
spell.description: Any solid inanimate, non-metal material (1 cu'/lvl) can be warmed to 500 degrees F at a rate of 1 cu'/round and 50 degrees F / round while the the caster concentrates. Caster needs only touch the target when the spell is cast; caster is immune to heat.

spell.name: Chill Solid
spell.description: Any solid, inanimate, non-metal material can be cooled to-200 degrees F, at a rate of 1 cu'/rnd. The temperature decreases 50 degrees F each round that the caster concentrates.

spell.name: Wall of Ice
spell.description: Summons a transparent wall of ice up to 10' x 10' x (2' at base, 1' at top); it can be melted through (100 hits of fire) or chipped through (50 man-rounds). Requires a source of water within 10'.

spell.name: Solid Door I
spell.description: Creates a doorway through any solid, inanimate material; it can be up to 3' x 6' x 1'.

spell.name: Stone/Earth/Mud
spell.description: Will turn 100 cu' of stone to packed earth, 100 cu' of earth to mud, 100 cu' of mud to earth, or 100 cu' of earth to stone.

spell.name: Shatter
spell.description: Causes a non-metal, inanimate object to shatter (up to 1 cu' in size). All within 5' R take an "A" Impact critical, holder takes a "C".

spell.name: Solid Door II
spell.description: Creates a doorway through any solid, inanimate material; it can be up to 4' x 8' x 5'.

spell.name: Mold Solid
spell.description: May shape by molding with hands 1 cu' of any solid, inanimate material.

spell.name: Break Solid
spell.description: 1 cubic foot of any solid, inanimate material becomes very brittle. This causes the object to break if struck (the GM may rule that certain objects get an RR to resist breakage).

spell.name: Unstone
spell.description: Disintegrates (i.e., nothing is left of) the target 100 cubic feet of stone.

spell.name: Unmetal
spell.description: As Unstone, except affects 1 cubic foot of metal.

spell.name: Solid Tunnel
spell.description: Creates a tunnel through solid, inanimate material that is 4' in diameter and 5' per level long.

spell.name: Solid Door True
spell.description: Creates a doorway through any solid, inanimate material; it can be up to 6' x 12' x 10'.

spell.name: Solid Tunnel True
spell.description: Creates a tunnel through solid, inanimate material that is 3' x 6' and 1' per level long. The tunnel is permanent.

spell.name: Transmutation
spell.description: May transmute 1 oz. of material into another non-magical material that the caster has a sample of; usable once per day.

spell.name: Mental Block I
spell.description: The target's memory of a 20 minute period is blanked. After a period of up to 1 hour (specified by the caster at the time of casting), the target will remember all that transpired during the period.

spell.name: Forget I
spell.description: Target forgets 10 minutes totally, caster's choice.

spell.name: Mind Blank I
spell.description: Target's mind is temporarily blank and he can do nothing.

spell.name: Forget X
spell.description: Target forgets 100 minutes totally, caster's choice.

spell.name: Mental Block II
spell.description: As Mental Block I, except up to 1 hour of memory can be delayed for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Mind Blank III
spell.description: Target's mind is temporarily blank and he can do nothing.

spell.name: Lord Forget
spell.description: Target forgets 200 minutes totally, caster's choice.

spell.name: Mind Death I
spell.description: Target's mind is temporarily blank and he can do nothing. This is at random for 10 minutes each and every day.

spell.name: Lost Experience I
spell.description: Target loses 5% of his collected experience (usually experience points).

spell.name: Mental Block True
spell.description: As Mental Block I, except memories of up to 1 hour/level can be delayed for up to 1 day per level.

spell.name: Mind Blank V
spell.description: Target's mind is temporarily blank and he can do nothing.

spell.name: Forget True
spell.description: Target forgets 1 hour per level totally, caster's choice.

spell.name: Mind Death II
spell.description: Target's mind is temporarily blank and he can do nothing. This occurs 2x per day. This is at random for 10 minutes each and every day.

spell.name: Mind Death III
spell.description: Target's mind is temporarily blank and he can do nothing. This occurs 3x per day. This is at random for 10 minutes each and every day.

spell.name: Mind Blank X
spell.description: As Mind Blank I, except duration is 10 rounds.

spell.name: Lost Experience II
spell.description: Target loses 10% of his collected experience (usually experience points).

spell.name: Mind Death V
spell.description: Target's mind is temporarily blank and he can do nothing. This occurs 5x per day. This is at random for 10 minutes each and every day.

spell.name: Lost Experience III
spell.description: As Lost Experience I, except loss is 15%.

spell.name: Mind Death X
spell.description: As Mind Death I, except target blanks out ten times a day.

spell.name: Mind Blank True
spell.description: As Mind Blank I, except the target has a 5% chance of blanking out each round.

spell.name: Insomnia
spell.description: Target has trouble sleeping; he is at -25 to all activities after suffering this for 2 days.

spell.name: Neurosis
spell.description: Target has an extreme dislike for any specific thing the caster chooses; target has a 50% of overcoming the neurosis when given a choice (e.g., neurosis concerning horses would mean that every time the target tried to get on or near a horse he would only have a 50% chance).

spell.name: Guilt
spell.description: Target becomes guilty over some action in his past; he will not perform such an action again.

spell.name: Paranoia
spell.description: Target believes everyone is out to get him; he will trust no one.

spell.name: Panic
spell.description: Target will flee in panic in any personally dangerous situation, unless he successfully makes an RR.

spell.name: Phobia
spell.description: Target has an fears a specific thing the caster chooses; target has a 25% of overcoming the phobia when given a choice (e.g., phobia concerning horses would mean that every time the target tried to get on or near a horse he would only have a 25% chance). There is a 10% chance that he will flee from the thing.

spell.name: Hallucinate
spell.description: The target has a tendency to hallucinate and see things as they aren't. For each major event in a day, the target has a 10% chance of hallucinating and seeing major threats as nothing major and minor things as major threads (similar to the syndrome that Don Quixote suffered from).

spell.name: Schizophrenia
spell.description: Target develops a 2nd personality of another "alignment", which will be active 10% of the time (at random).

spell.name: Psychosis
spell.description: Target has an fears a specific thing the caster chooses; target has a 10% of overcoming the phobia when given a choice (e.g., phobia concerning horses would mean that every time the target tried to get on or near a horse he would only have a 10% chance). There is a 50% chance that he will flee from the thing.

spell.name: Catatonia
spell.description: Target drifts in and out of a catatonic state; every hour there is a 25% chance he will become catatonic for one hour.

spell.name: Insomnia True
spell.description: Target can only sleep if he uses drugs or spells (e.g., a sleep spell); he adds 100 to his RRs against all sleep spells; if he gets no sleep, he will slowly go mad.

spell.name: Neurosis True
spell.description: Target has an extreme dislike for a specific type of thing the caster chooses. The target has a 25% (modified by three times the target's Self Discipline bonus) chance of maintaining control around the object. If the target fails to control himself around the subject, roll d100 (not open-ended) to determine how the target must react to the subject. A result of 1-10 results in the target blindly attacking the subject (attempting to destroy it at all costs). A result of 11-60 results in the target fleeing from the subject (moving at maximum pace to get away from it). A result of 61 or more results in the target avoiding the subject at all costs.

spell.name: Guilt True
spell.description: Target becomes guilty over some action in his past; he will not perform such an action again. Every day that he fails a normal RR, the target will take actions to atone for his guilt incident.

spell.name: Greater Paranoia
spell.description: Target believes everyone is out to get him; he will trust no one.

spell.name: Paranoia True
spell.description: As Greater Paranoia, except target will not associate with anyone for more than one hour.

spell.name: Hallucinate True
spell.description: As Hallucinate, except chance is 20%.

spell.name: Psychosis True
spell.description: Target has an fears a specific thing the caster chooses; target has no chance of overcoming the phobia when given a choice (e.g., phobia concerning horses would mean that every time the target tried to get on or near a horse he would "lose it"). There is a 90% chance that he will flee from the thing. If he is held near the thing he fears, he will slowly go mad.

spell.name: Schizophrenia True
spell.description: Target develops a 2nd personality of another "alignment", which will be active 50% of the time (at random).

spell.name: MPD
spell.description: As Schizophrenia, except the target develops d10+1 extra personalities (i.e., Multiple Personality Disorder). There is a 10% chance per day that a non-active personality will become active.

spell.name: Catatonia True
spell.description: Target drifts in and out of a catatonic state; every hour there is a 95% chance he will become catatonic for one hour.

spell.name: Mind Disease True
spell.description: Target may be given any mental disease that the caster chooses.

spell.name: Mind Distraction
spell.description: Target is distracted by an imaginary object. For the duration of this spell, the target is limited to 70% activity each round.

spell.name: Mind Lock
spell.description: Caster and target are locked in mental contact until: the caster ceases concentration or either the caster or the target have a RR failure of 30 or more (RR must be made against each other every round). The one failing by 30 becomes unconscious; neither can take any action.

spell.name: Mind Invasion
spell.description: Target is frozen in mental combat, but caster may perform 50% of his normal activity.

spell.name: Demonic Possession I
spell.description: Target is possessed by a Type 1 Demon (see Evil Magician list Dark Summons); additional RRs can be made (once per day) to regain self-control; demon is random, maniacal, and homicidal.

spell.name: Transferral
spell.description: Caster transfers his "mind/essence/soul" into the target and the target's "mind/essence/soul" is imprisoned. While in control of the target's body, the caster may only function at 50% of his normal activity; the target ill make additional RRs once per day to regain self-control. When a successful RR is made, the caster is returned to his own body which has been in suspended animation.

spell.name: Domination
spell.description: Target must obey the will of the caster. If the caster gives an order to do something completely alien to the target, he may make another RR with a +25 modifier.

spell.name: Demonic Possession II
spell.description: Target is possessed by a Type 2 Demon (see Evil Magician list Dark Summons); additional RRs can be made (once per day) to regain self-control; demon is random, maniacal, and homicidal.

spell.name: Mind Slave
spell.description: Target is a zombie until he makes his once/day RR; on any round that the caster concentrates, the target will obey his will.

spell.name: Banishment
spell.description: Target is a zombie until he makes his once/day RR. Also, the target's soul is in agony. On any round that the caster concentrates, the target will obey his will. Otherwise the body will obey anyone's verbal commands; Conflicting commands mean the target does nothing.

spell.name: Demonic Possession III
spell.description: Target is possessed by a Type 3 Demon (see Evil Magician list Dark Summons); additional RRs can be made (once per day) to regain self-control; demon is random, maniacal, and homicidal.

spell.name: Waiting Domination
spell.description: As Domination, except the target must perform a single, straight forward task. The task may take the target out of range of the caster and he must still attempt to complete the task.

spell.name: Waiting Domination True
spell.description: As Waiting Domination, except only gets a RR once per week.

spell.name: Demonic Possession IV
spell.description: As Demonic Possession I, except Demon is Type IV.

spell.name: Mind Slave True
spell.description: Target is a zombie until he makes his once/day RR; caster does not need to concentrates to issue commands that the target will obey.

spell.name: Demonic Possession V
spell.description: As Demonic Possession I, except Demon is Type V.

spell.name: Transferral True
spell.description: Caster transfers his "mind/essence/soul" into the target and the target's "mind/essence/soul" is imprisoned. While in control of the target's body, the caster may only function at 50% of his normal activity; the target will make additional RRs once per month to regain self-control. Every time the target fails the RR, his chance to successful resist decreases by 1. When a successful RR is made, the caster is returned to his own body which has been in suspended animation.

spell.name: Banishment True
spell.description: Target is a zombie until he makes his once/month RR. Each time the target fails his RR, his chance to successfully resist decrease by 1. Also, the target's soul is in agony. On any round that the caster concentrates, the target will obey his will. Otherwise the body will obey anyone's verbal commands; Conflicting commands mean the target does nothing.

spell.name: Dull Mind I
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 5 (by 1 in a 3-18 system); in RM, the temporary stat is lowered, not the potential. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline (also wisdom, intelligence, charisma, etc.). If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Dazed
spell.description: Target is mentally bewildered; each round, he has only a 50% chance of making a decision; he will always defend himself form direct attack.

spell.name: Power Leak I
spell.description: The target immediately loses 10% of his remaining power points. They may be recovered normally (i.e. usually after a sleep period).

spell.name: Dull Mind II
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 10 (by 2 in a 3-18 system); in RM, the temporary stat is lowered, not the potential. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline. If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Mind Erosion I
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 5; in RM, the temporary & potential stats are lowered. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline. If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Power Leak II
spell.description: As Power Leak I, except decrease is 25%.

spell.name: Dull Mind III
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 15 (by 3 in a 3-18 system); in RM, the temporary stat is lowered, not the potential. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline. If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Power Leak III
spell.description: As Power Leak I, except decrease is 30%.

spell.name: Dull Mind IV
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 20 (by 4 in a 3-18 system); in RM, the temporary stat is lowered, not the potential. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline. If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Mind Erosion II
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 10; in RM, the temporary & potential stats are lowered. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline. If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Power Leak IV
spell.description: As Power Leak I, except decrease is 40%.

spell.name: Dull Mind V
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 25 (by 5 in a 3-18 system); in RM, the temporary stat is lowered, not the potential. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline. If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Power Leak V
spell.description: As Power Leak I, except decrease is 50%.

spell.name: Dull Mind VI
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 30 (by 6 in a 3-18 system); in RM, the temporary stat is lowered, not the potential. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline. If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Mind Erosion III
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 15; in RM, the temporary & potential stats are lowered. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline. If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Power Leak VI
spell.description: As Power Leak I, except decrease is 60%.

spell.name: Mind Erosion IV
spell.description: As Mind Erosion, except decrease is 4d10.

spell.name: Power Leak VII
spell.description: As Power Leak I, except decrease is 70%.

spell.name: Dull Mind VIII
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 40 (by 8 in a 3-18 system); in RM, the temporary stat is lowered, not the potential. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline. If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Dull Mind X
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 50 (by 10 in a 3-18 system); in RM, the temporary stat is lowered, not the potential. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline. If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Mind Erosion V
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered by 25; in RM, the temporary & potential stats are lowered. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline. If a stat drops below 01, the target is in a coma until the stat reaches 01; it will increase at a rate of 1 per day until 01 is reached.

spell.name: Mind Erosion True
spell.description: Target has one of his mental stats (determine randomly) temporarily lowered to 01; in RM, the temporary & potential stats are lowered. The mental stats are: Presence, Empathy, Intuition, Memory, Reasoning and Self Discipline.

spell.name: Jumbled Text
spell.description: All text that the target reads will appear jumbled (and is indecipherable).

spell.name: Hypochondria
spell.description: The target believes he is very ill (or sicker than he actually is). The GM should base the severity of the "imaginary" illness upon the amount the target fails his RR by (e.g., if he fails his RR by more than 50, he might think he is terminally ill).

spell.name: False Sense I
spell.description: The target will perceive something incorrectly through one of his senses. For example, he might see something out of the corner of his eye, or hear something that isn't there. The sensory effect cannot last longer than one round.

spell.name: Misleading I
spell.description: The target's perception is skewed. All perception rolls are modified by -10 (this includes orientation rolls).

spell.name: Lesser Phantom
spell.description: The target is attacked by a create of shadow. The creature is actually a mental illusion and only the target sees the creature. The creature will immediately attack the target (in melee). The create has an AT of 1; but has the same DB, OB and Hits as the target (use the target's highest OB as the creature's OB). If the caster casts spells upon himself (e.g. Haste), the creature acts as if affected by the same spell. The creature is immune to spell attacks. If the creature is slain (by killing or incapacitating it), the spell is canceled.

spell.name: Waking Dream I
spell.description: The target will view things as if he were in a dream. His reactions are slowed (he suffers a -10 to all actions). In addition, he will sometimes perceive things differently than they actually are. The GM should roll for each event that occurs with a 10% chance that the event is mistaken. For example, the target might see an approaching horse as a large wild animal; or he might see the charging Orc as a messenger bringing news. Note that the caster has no control over what the target perceives or how he perceives it.

spell.name: Mistaken Identity I
spell.description: The target will believe the next person he sees is someone else. At the time of casting, the caster choose what type of person the target sees. For example, he might see a servant entering the palace gate instead of the skulking figure. If the next person attacks the target, the effect of this spell is canceled.

spell.name: Misleading III
spell.description: As Misleading I, except penalty is -30.

spell.name: False Sense II
spell.description: As False Sense I, except affects up to 2 senses and the effect can last for up to 2 rounds.

spell.name: Minor Phantom
spell.description: As Lesser Phantom, except the creature has an AT of 3.

spell.name: Waking Dream II
spell.description: As Waking Dream I, except actions suffer a -20 penalty, and the chance of perceiving things incorrectly is 20%.

spell.name: Misleading V
spell.description: As Misleading I, except penalty is -50.

spell.name: False Sense III
spell.description: As False Sense I, except affects up to 3 senses and the effect can last for up to 3 rounds.

spell.name: Mistaken Identity II
spell.description: As Mistaken Identity, except the target mistakes the next person he sees for a specific person. For example, he might see the Chamberlain entering the throne room, instead of a burglar.

spell.name: Greater Phantom
spell.description: As Lesser Phantom, except the creature has an AT of 11.

spell.name: False Sense IV
spell.description: As False Sense I, except affects up to 4 senses and the effect can last for up to 4 rounds.

spell.name: Misleading VII
spell.description: As Misleading I, except penalty is -70.

spell.name: Waking Dream III
spell.description: As Waking Dream I, except actions suffer a -30 penalty, and the chance of perceiving things incorrectly is 30%.

spell.name: False Sense V
spell.description: As False Sense I, except affects up to 5 senses and the effect can last for up to 5 rounds.

spell.name: Phantom True
spell.description: As Lesser Phantom, except the creature has an AT of 12.

spell.name: Misleading True
spell.description: As Misleading I, except penalty is -100.

spell.name: Mistaken Identity True
spell.description: As Mistaken Identity I, except the target will permanently confuse the next person he sees with someone else. Each time he sees that person, there is a 50% chance he will mistaken them for someone else.

spell.name: Waking Dream True
spell.description: As Waking Dream III, except for the duration and the target suffers a -40 to all actions, and the chance of perceiving things differently is 40%.

notes.note: Many of these spells affect a target(s) perception of a situation. The duration for the spell is how long they will incorrectly perceive the situation. At the end of the duration, if the situation has ended, the target will remember the situation incorrectly (as that was how he perceived it).

spell.name: Suspicion
spell.description: Target suspects the actions of his associates (GM may give descriptions that arouse the player's own suspicions).

spell.name: Trait Subversion I
spell.description: One of the target's personal traits is perverted; such traits might include: kindness, loyalty, thrift, cheerfulness, reverence, etc.

spell.name: Lying
spell.description: On any statement, target will lie 20% of the time.

spell.name: Trait Subversion II
spell.description: Two of the target's personal traits is perverted; such traits might include: kindness, loyalty, thrift, cheerfulness, reverence, etc.

spell.name: Cheating
spell.description: Target will attempt to cheat on all matters (e.g., splitting loot, card games, etc.).

spell.name: Vandal
spell.description: The target has urges to commit minor property damage. When such an opportunity arises, there is an 60% chance the target must attempt to commit such damage.

spell.name: Stealing
spell.description: Target becomes a kleptomaniac and has a 10% chance of attempting to steal anything that catches his fancy (if it does not involve violence).

spell.name: Trait Subversion III
spell.description: Three of the target's personal traits is perverted; such traits might include: kindness, loyalty, thrift, cheerfulness, reverence, etc.

spell.name: Pyromania
spell.description: The target has a fascination with burning things. Every day there is a 20% chance that he must try to burn something. He will burn things that do not result in injury to people or animals (through there is a 1% chance that he will injure himself in the attempt to burn things).

spell.name: Aggravated Theft
spell.description: Target becomes a kleptomaniac and has a 10% chance of attempting to steal anything that catches his fancy. He will use violence if necessary.

spell.name: Trait Subversion V
spell.description: Five of the target's personal traits is perverted; such traits might include: kindness, loyalty, thrift, cheerfulness, reverence, etc.

spell.name: Random Trait Subversion I
spell.description: As Trait Subversion I, except a different trait is affected each day (with the previous day's trait reverted back to its normal state).

spell.name: Assault
spell.description: There is a 5% chance target will assault a person when he initially encounters him.

spell.name: Arson
spell.description: As Pyromania, except target doesn't care if people (or animals) are injured. There is a 5% chance that he will injure himself in the attempt.

spell.name: Trait Subversion VII
spell.description: As Trait Subversion I, except 7 traits may be perverted.

spell.name: Random Trait Subversion II
spell.description: As Random Trait Subversion I, except 2 traits are affected at one time.

spell.name: Maim
spell.description: As Assault, except there is a 10% chance that the target will attempt to maim any given person.

spell.name: Trait Subversion X
spell.description: Ten of the target's personal traits is perverted; such traits might include: kindness, loyalty, thrift, cheerfulness, reverence, etc.´

spell.name: Random Trait Subversion III
spell.description: As Random Trait Subversion I, except 3 traits are affected at one time.

spell.name: Homicide
spell.description: There is a 5% chance target will attempt to kill a person when he initially encounters him.

spell.name: Assassination
spell.description: There is a 5% chance target will mark a person after he initially encounters him. Later, the target will plan to assassinate the marked person.

spell.name: Trait Subversion True
spell.description: One of the target's personal traits is perverted; such traits might include: kindness, loyalty, thrift, cheerfulness, reverence, etc.

spell.name: Suicide
spell.description: After the RR is failed, the target is will be made "unstable". Whenever the target is injured, suffers humiliation, or fails in something, he will attempt suicide i some imaginative way.

spell.name: Memorize
spell.description: The caster memorizes a single image (that may be recalled at any time). The caster can only have one image stored per level of experience.

spell.name: Initiative V
spell.description: Caster adds 5 to his initiative roll next round.

spell.name: Speed Reading
spell.description: Caster reads at a rate of 20 pages per minute.

spell.name: Haste I
spell.description: Target may act twice hos normal rate (i.e. 200% activity).

spell.name: Toughness I
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, any wounds that deliver stun effects to the caster have the number of rounds of stun reduced by one.

spell.name: Focus I
spell.description: Caster receives a special +15 bonus to his next static maneuver (the static maneuver must be completed before the duration of this spell expires).

spell.name: Strength II
spell.description: In melee, the caster does double normal concusion hits and his Strength stat bonus is doubled.

spell.name: Haste II
spell.description: As Haste I, except for the duration.

spell.name: Initiative X
spell.description: Caster adds 10 to his next initiative roll next round.

spell.name: Focus II
spell.description: As Focus I, except the bonus is +30.

spell.name: Toughness II
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, all criticals against the caster are reduced by one in severity (e.g., "E" becomes "D", "B" becomes "A", with an "A" receiving a -50 modifier).

spell.name: Haste III
spell.description: As Haste I, except for the duration.

spell.name: Focus III
spell.description: As Focus I, except the bonus is +45.

spell.name: Health
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, the caster receives a bonus of +50 to any RRs versus diease and poison.

spell.name: Haste IV
spell.description: As Haste I, except for the duration.

spell.name: Unpain IV
spell.description: Caster is able to sustain an additional 100% of his total concussion hits before passing out. Hits are still taken and remain when the spell lapses.

spell.name: Toughness III
spell.description: For the duration of this spell, the caster's skin toughens, giving him an effective AT of 11.

spell.name: Focus True
spell.description: As Focus I, except the bonus is +60.

spell.name: Toughness True
spell.description: Caster receives the bonuses of Toughness I, Toughness II, Toughness III and Unpain simultaneously.

spell.name: Containment Lore
spell.description: Caster gains insight into the best way to hold a particular spell user so as to most impair his spell casting. If the caster follows this spell's advice to the letter (which may take some time), every spell casting attempt will require a Spell Casting Static Maneuver with a special modification of -50.

spell.name: Impair Limb
spell.description: One of target's limbs (choosen randomly) is impaired and useless.

spell.name: Soudn Binding
spell.description: Target may not make any sounds.

spell.name: Binds I
spell.description: Target is wrapped in magical bonds. If the target struggles, he suffers a 'B' Electicity.

spell.name: Hold Kind
spell.description: Target humanoid is reduced to 25% activity.

spell.name: Create Cell
spell.description: Caster converts a room into a cell for holding spell users. The room can only contain one spell user (more than that sispells this spell). While in the cell, all spell casting attempts require a Spell Casting Static Maneuver with a special -100 modifier.

spell.name: Binds II
spell.description: As Binds I, except for the duration.

spell.name: Hold True
spell.description: As Hold Kind, except that any being may be held.

spell.name: Remove Power I
spell.description: Target loses all PPs for the duration. The caster must know the target's realm of power, and the target must be from a single realm (i.e., not a hybrid spell user).

spell.name: Bind III
spell.description: As Binds I, except for the duration.

spell.name: Create Prison
spell.description: As Create Cell, except room may hold 1 spell user for every 10 square feet in the room. In addition, spell users will suffer a "D" Void critical when they enter the room.

spell.name: Holding
spell.description: As Hold Kind, except for the duration.

spell.name: Remove Power II
spell.description: As Remove Power I, exceot that any hybrid spell user may be targeted.

spell.name: Mass Hold
spell.description: As Hold Kind, except for the number of targets.

spell.name: Greater Remove Power
spell.description: As Remove Power I, except for the duration.

spell.name: Question
spell.description: Target must answer a single concept question truthfully (presuming the target can understand the question).

spell.name: Detect Lie
spell.description: Caster knows wheter the target is lying or not.

spell.name: Charm Kind
spell.description: Target humanoid believes that the caster is a good friend.

spell.name: Question V
spell.description: As Question, except that target must respond to up to 5 single concept questions.

spell.name: Suggestion
spell.description: Target will follow a single suggestion so long as it is not completely alien to him (no jumping off the bridge suggestions etc.)

spell.name: Fumble Spell I
spell.description: The next spell the target attempts to cast requires a Spell Casting Maneuver (with a special -10 modifier)

spell.name: Question X
spell.description: As Question, except that target must respond to up to 10 single concept questions.

spell.name: Suggestion II
spell.description: As Suggestion, except that two targets will receive the same suggestion.

spell.name: Telepathy
spell.description: Caster can read the surface thoughts of one target.

spell.name: Master of Kind
spell.description: Target humanoid must obey caster. Commands must not be completely alien to the target.

spell.name: Lord Question
spell.description: As Question, except that target must respond to up to 20 single concept questions.

spell.name: Fumble Spell III
spell.description: As Fumble Spell I, except affects the next three spells the target attempts to cast.

spell.name: Telepathy II
spell.description: As Telepathy, except for the range.

spell.name: Forget Spell
spell.description: The target forgets the spell that he most recently cast. He may not cast that spell again for the duration of this spell. All lower- and higher-level versions of the spell are also forgotten (e.g., Sleep V, Sleep X etc.)

spell.name: Mind Scan
spell.description: Caster may read target's conscious memories, at a rate of 1 scene per round.

spell.name: Fumble Spell V
spell.description: As Fumble Spell I, except affects the next five spells the target attempts to cast.

spell.name: Mind Probe
spell.description: Caster may read target's deep conscious memories, at a rate of 1 scene per round.

spell.name: Mind Scan II
spell.description: As Mind Scan, except that the caster may scan different targets each round.

spell.name: Thought Steal
spell.description: Caster may read a single memory from target's mind each round.

spell.name: Mind Probe True
spell.description: As Mind Probe, except that the caster may scan a different target each round. In addition, the number of scenes scanned per round is equal to the caster's level.

spell.name: Spell Signature
spell.description: Caster memorizes the "signature" of a given spell user (the target of this spell). The caster can only have one signature memorized at a time. Any time this spell is cast, any previously memorized signatures are lost.

spell.name: Type Spell
spell.description: This spell must be cast upon an active spell. The caster will immediately know if the spell was cast by the spell user with his currently memorized signature (see Spell Signature). The caster will also know if he has ever memorized the signature of the caster of the spell (though he does not knwo exactly which signature it is).

spell.name: Spell Detection
spell.description: Caster learns wheter or not there are any active spells in the area. The area of effect can be moved once per round (up to the range of the spell).

spell.name: Protect I
spell.description: Caster gains +5 to all RRs versus spells of all realms.

spell.name: Resist Heat
spell.description: Caster is totally protected agains all natural heat (up to 200°F and modifies spells involving heat by 10)

spell.name: Resist Cold
spell.description: As Resist Heat, except protects against natural cold to -20°F and modified spells involving cold by 10.

spell.name: Store Spell Signal
spell.description: Caster "stores" the signal from a specific spell. This spell can only be cast on an active spell. The caster can only jave as many spell signals stored as he has levels.

spell.name: Sense I
spell.description: Caster learns the direction and distance to the currently stored spell user (i.e., whose signature has been stored with a Spell Signature spell, see the Power Lore spell list). The spell user must be within the area of effect.
